movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Xia Luo, with his hands on his hips, stood in the midst of the crowd, looking around. He then walked to the window, opened it, and looked outside. Xia Luo said: "Mom, I'll burn some extra paper for you later."
Xia Luo, in a fit of rage, forcefully pushed open the window and leaped out.
Ma Dongmei turned her head in surprise, and the light in the room suddenly turned on.
Doctor opened his eyes and said: "Wife," "I dreamt of my mom."
Nurse said: "Son, who are you calling your wife?"
Xia Luo opened his eyes and said, "Mom," but before he could finish, the image of Ma Dongmei appeared before him.
Mom said: 'You scared your Mom to death, can't believe you are still alive, can you?'
Xia Luo said: 'I can't believe you are still alive.'
Mom was about to touch Xia Luo when the door suddenly opened, and Doctor came in. Doctor said: "From the current situation, there shouldn't be any major issues."
Xia Luo suddenly sat up and asked, "What year is it now, and is the President of the United States still Obama?"
Mom looked at the doctor and said: "Maybe you should consider transferring hospitals."
Mom asked, "Son, what's wrong?" Xia Luo suddenly got up and left, and Mom asked, "Xia Luo?"

Xia Luo left the hospital in a daze, only vaguely hearing a few people talking. He ran out, wearing a hospital gown and a neck brace, with no shoes on. He ran barefoot on the street, his steps unsteady. A few kids were playing with bicycles nearby. He ignored them and ran straight ahead, his mind only on Ma Dongmei.

The scene shifts to Xia Luo waking up from his nightmare. He is seen wearing a neck brace, staggering through the streets, passing by a dilapidated house. The camera pans left, showing a large banner on the house's wall with Chairman Mao's portrait and the words 'Long Live the People's Liberation Army.'
The doctor said: "Xia Luo, wake up, Xia Luo, you can't fall asleep now."

The scene shifts to a bustling intersection, where Xia Luo, holding hands with Ma Dongmei, runs across the street. The city is filled with cars and people, with tall buildings standing proudly. The two run into a residential area, with the camera slowly zooming out, revealing more and more of the city.

Ma Dongmei continued: 'If something happens to Xia Luo, I just can't go on living.' 'Honestly, Xia Luo has been fatherless since he was little.' 'Right after Xia Luo was born, Xia Luo's father disappeared.'
Ma Dongmei comforted her: "Auntie, I can especially understand you. Our family is in the same situation. My father is Ma Dong; as soon as I was born, my father was gone, so they call me, Ma Dongmei."
At this moment, Xia Luo limped into the house, and everyone turned to look at him. He leaned against the door frame and said, "I'm paralysed."

The next day, the two of them arrived at the school gate, sneaking into the campus. They climbed the steps leading to the playground, where students were bustling around. Xia Luo accidentally tripped and fell, and Ma Dongmei, seeing this, walked over with a puzzled look.

A Hao's consciousness gradually faded, and he returned to the past. In the memory, Ah Mui was picking wildflowers in the woods. She wore a plain cheongsam, her hair neatly tied back. Ah Mui turned around to face A Hao, and the ring on her left ring finger shimmered in the sunlight. Ah Mui twirled the wildflower in her hand, and petals scattered in the air.
A Hao and Ah Mui were running in the forest, with Ah Mui shouting behind: 'A Hao' 'Help' 'A Hao' 'Ah Meng'
Nurse said, "Wu Shi Hao," "Wu Shi Hao," "Are you feeling better?"
Nurse said, 'Slow down, your ribs are injured.'
A Hao tried to get up and said, "Miss."
A Hao suddenly appeared in another cell, saying, "It's him" "Open the door" "Do you remember me?"
A Hao asked, "Do you remember him?"
A Hao raised his hand and said, "Do you remember my face? Do you like to beat up policemen?"
A Hao hurriedly said, "I'm sorry, I'm sorry..."
A Hao asked in confusion, "Why?"
The interrogating policeman got even angrier and said, "Speak English!" "Come on!"
A Hao asked in confusion, "What?"
A Hao was dumbfounded, then quickly apologized, "Sorry, sorry."
Hunter said, "I'm sorry," "He's sorry," "Okay, then I'm very sorry too."
A Hao charged at Hunter, but was pushed back by him. Then, Hunter took out a taser from his waist and shocked A Hao.
A Hao was kicked to the ground, and the police started hitting him. He yelled, 'Help, the police are beating people!'
A-Zheng immediately opened the water tap to suppress them. The water flow was strong enough to directly knock down the three people.

A-Zheng and Piggy arrived at the prison gate just in time to witness the fight between A Hao and Hunter. A-Zheng, who had been secretly photographing the fight, was shoved aside by the agitated crowd.
Lei Luo approached and said, "Oh, officer, you are here." "You should have given me a heads up."
The prison guard said, "Don't take pictures, leave here."
The policeman in front said, "There is nothing to shoot here, let's go."
Lei Luo said, 'Yes, let the officer leave first, I'll handle them.'
A-Zheng said, "Open the door," and two policemen came forward to open the prison door.
Hunter pointed at Lei Luo and said, "I know what you want." "Don't be proud of yourself."
Piggy said, "Goodbye, officer."

movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.text: Tang Zheng, who had been hiding in the wall, saw this and hurriedly crawled out to join the fight. The three of them cooperated seamlessly, easily dispatching the bodyguards. Lin Chong then leaped into the pool, causing a huge splash, and dived into the water.

Lin Chong rushed into the rain, shouting, "Sis, get up!" Xiao Xing, lying on the ground, was hit by Lin Chong's hand. Lin Chong, who was about to help, was kicked into the pool by Tang Zheng. Lin Chong, who got up, was punched and kicked by Tang Zheng, falling into the pool. Tang Zheng, who was about to leave, was shot dead by Lin Chong.

Liang Cong shouted, "Sis, sis, save me, sis. Get up quickly. Hurry up and get up. Sis, hurry up and get up." Xiao Xing, with eyes closed, weakly pushed Liang Cong away. Liang Cong was pushed away and hit the car window, bleeding profusely. Xiao Xing, with eyes closed, weakly pushed Liang Cong away. Liang Cong was pushed away and hit the car window, bleeding profusely.
Xiao Xing opened her eyes and saw Liang Cong beside her. Liang Cong said, "Sis, get up quickly!" Xiao Xing slowly got up, looking at Liang Cong beside her.
Tang Zheng struggled to get up and help Xiao Xing, saying, "Get up, get up quickly, sis, get up quickly."

Tang Zheng was drenched, leaning over the piano, trembling as he touched the little paper man in the music box. The lights went out, plunging the room into darkness. Tang Zheng picked up the music box, bringing the little paper man close to his ear, as if trying to hear something.

Tang Zheng picked up the music box and walked out of the bedroom. Xiao Xing, who was lying on the ground, kept kicking the floor in anger. She wanted to get up but couldn't stand the pain. She could only lie down again, watching Tang Zheng walk out of the bedroom with the music box, then threw herself at the door.
Xiao Xing crawled towards the wallet on the ground, while Tang Zheng picked up the glass bottle, Xiao Xing looked at the wallet in hand, eyes filled with terror.
Tang Zheng suddenly knelt down, pressing on Xiao Xing's chest with both hands, trying to resuscitate her.
Tang Zheng grabbed Xiao Xing's neck and said, "Why, why won't you listen to me, I'm doing this for your own good, you know, why don't you listen to me, why, obey me."
Xiao Xing struggled to turn her head, saw Tang Zheng beside her, reached out to choke him, but Tang Zheng grabbed her wrist and forced her down.
Xiao Xing, with a face full of blood, struggled to open her eyes and saw Lin Chong standing not far away, holding a golf club and gritting her teeth.
Lin Chong knelt down and said, "Sister, sister, are you alright?" Xiao Xing weakly smiled, and Lin Chong continued, "I am Lin Chong."
Xiao Xing looked at Lin Chong and said, "Lin Chong..."
Xiao Xing looked at Lin Chong's face and gently shook his head. Xiao Xing took off his coat and pressed it against Lin Chong's wound. Xiao Xing said, "Go quickly."
Lin Chong said, "You should leave quickly," then helped Xiao Xing up from the ground.
Lin Chong unlocked the chains binding Xiao Xing, then untied the ropes around their feet, helping Xiao Xing sit on the ground.
Lin Chong, who had just crawled out from the bottom of the stairs, stood up with Xiao Xing's support. The two of them, leaning on each other, walked towards the door.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: Qi Jia changed into a new outfit, looking very mature. She looked at herself in the mirror, adjusted her clothes, and then noticed a lunchbox on the table that read 'good morning, good mood'. She opened the lunchbox and found it full of delicious food.
Qi Jia opened the lid, revealing a cute and adorable bento box made by Yuan Xiaoou. She couldn't help but smile and then started to drink the milk.
Yuan Xiaoou ran and shouted, "Exercise to protect the motherland! Pick up the pace!"

Qi Jia, wearing 3D glasses, sat in the cinema, glaring at Yuan Xiaoou beside her. Yuan Xiaoou, also wearing 3D glasses, reached out to hold Qi Jia's hand, but accidentally touched her ring finger. Qi Jia, seeing the ring on her finger, happily screamed, and the popcorn bucket in Yuan Xiaoou's hand suddenly slipped from his grasp and flew out.
Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou went to the cinema, then to the spa. Qi Jia lay on the bed with a green face mask, while Yuan Xiaoou sat on the sofa with a magazine over his head.
Qi Jia, with a face mask, patted Yuan Xiaoou's face with the mask and left. Yuan Xiaoou asked, 'Hey, why didn’t you wake me?' 'What’s so funny? Am I not handsome enough?'
Qi Jia, holding Yuan Xiaoou's arm, said, "You look super handsome today." "Look!" "Right?"
Yuan Xiaoou explained, 'It's not about what I'm wearing today.' 'How come... They think I look very...’ As Yuan Xiaoou was explaining, he suddenly spotted his own photo in a shop window.

After the laundry was complete, Yuan Xiaoou carried the basin of clothes into the house. Walking through the living room, he suddenly paused, as if struck by a good idea. He stopped in his tracks, sniffed, and then looked around the room.
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Qi Jia, Qi Jia, come quickly, what is this thing?'
Qi Jia, seeing the turtle under Yuan Xiaoou's foot, quickly stood up and said, "Yuan Xiaoou, you’re stepping on it, you murderer! Yuan Xiaoou, after all these years, are you still doing okay?"
Yuan Xiaoou, holding the dirty clothes, asked, "If I may ask, then what should I be called?"
Qi Jia glanced at him, then turned her head away, unwilling to look at him. Yuan Xiaoou persisted, asking, 'What’s your name anyway?'
Yuan Xiaoou said, "Forget it, it’s not important anymore. That turtle has been starving for four years, find it something to eat, will you?"
Qi Jia, holding the turtle, said, 'At this age, the turtle is in the prime of its life in the turtle world, food isn’t that important' 'Let’s release it and let it find a girlfriend.'
Yuan Xiaoou asked, "Is what you're wearing the trend from fashion week this year?"
The two walked on the beach. Qi Jia said, 'I forgot to change my pants.' 'I was wondering why it felt so breezy.'
Qi Jia said, "But you’re quite fashionable, oh!" Qi Jia lifted a leg to show Yuan Xiaoou, and continued, "Look at me, showing a bit of leg hair. Is it fashionable too?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_6060_6240.text: Xiao Xing stood up, brushed the rain off her body, and walked towards the car. The man in the passenger seat shouted, "Sister, save me! Sister, hurry!"

Xiao Xing, who was still in shock, was knocked down by Tang Zheng from behind. Tang Zheng took the opportunity to hit Xiao Xing with a guitar, and Xiao Xing, already half-dazed, hit his head on the ground.

Xiao Xing crawled forward, reaching out to grab the violin, but accidentally knocked it away. She continued to crawl forward, trying hard to hold the violin, but failed. She tried again and again, but the violin was stubbornly under the bench.
Lin Chong cried out, "Sister, come save me, Sister, come save me, Sister, hurry and save me."
Lin Chong was hit by the car, rolling into the pool behind him. Xiao Xing, who was still in shock, saw the car rushing towards her.

Liang Cong raised his hands above his head, trying to grab the window, but the glass shattered with his touch. Xiao Xing's hand, covered in blood, was about to touch the window when it suddenly stopped.
Xiao Xing tried to open the car door, but the doorknob came off in her hand.
Xiao Xing cried out in pain, her hands covered in blood as she clung to the car window.
Xiao Xing struggled to get up, looked at the fallen Lin Chong, and then at Liang Cong in the car. She couldn't make a sound, tears kept flowing down her face.
Liang Cong turned around and said, "Sister."
Xiao Xing reached out to touch the statue, saying: "I dare not go up"

The boy's voice brought Xiao Xing back to reality. In the heavy rain, Xiao Xing was hugging the leg of the statue, crying uncontrollably. The rainwater mingled with her tears, accentuating her sorrow.
Liang Cong looked at Xiao Xing with a smile full of affection and then said: "I love you."
Xiao Xing cried out, "I am not like you! I am not like you!"
Tang Zheng, who had just rushed out of the house, saw Lin Chong struggling to get up and hurried over. He reached out to help Lin Chong up.

Tang Zheng climbed out of the pool, holding a dagger in his right hand, and walked towards Xiao Xing with a determined look. Xiao Xing was visibly trembling, but she met Tang Zheng's gaze, not showing any fear.
Tang Zheng said, "Just rush forward without turning back." "Fear is not the master."
Tang Zheng walked towards Xiao Xing in the pouring rain, and Xiao Xing also walked towards him, their steps echoing each other.
Tang Zheng clenched the black umbrella in his hand, struggling to hold on, as the strong wind carried the umbrella away, leaving Tang Zheng alone in the rain.

Xiao Xing stood in the rain, closed her eyes, and slowly lowered her head. The gun in her hand was trembling slightly. She slowly raised her head, her eyes still closed, and slowly opened them. The gun was already empty, and Xiao Xing's expression was extremely calm. She looked at the man in front of her, who was panting heavily.

Qi Jia stood up and looked at Yuan Xiaoou, who was still kneeling on the ground, and then the two of them went to the lakeside promenade.

Yuan Xiaoou said: "Mr. Liu, you can finally go back to your parents now," "once you leave don't come back."
The scene shifts to a rooftop bar. Lin Shuer said: "Not bad, your complexion is rosy and shiny, could it be that you got the big fool to do something for you?"
Qi Jia sips her drink and says: 'I just had a good sleep, is that a big deal?'
Lin Shuer crossed her arms and said: "During my travels, I heard that the big fool has trained you very well, it was worthwhile to take him in."
Qi Jia sips her drink and says: "When I took him in, I had no ulterior motives at all."
Lin Shuer said: 'Could it be that you two are the long-lost 'tears between men and women' that scares many of-age youths in the world, the pure friendship between a man and a woman?'
Qi Jia sips her drink and says: 'He and I have pure friendship like sisters.'

Lin Shuer said: 'You have such a 'sacred beast' that 'harvests Yang to supplement Yin' at home, and you're so calm. To be honest, there aren’t many people who would give their lives and shed blood for you.'
Qi Jia sips her drink and says: "But..."

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: The scene shifts to the school, where two big speakers are installed on the balcony. Da Chun is standing behind the three, and the three are saying: "Xia Luo is pretty badass," "daring to hit a teacher."

Ma Dongmei angrily said, "Listen up." "If you have something to say, say it to my face." "Stop gossiping behind my back all day."

Ma Dongmei: "But seriously, isn't Xia Luo kind of dumb? He dared to hit the teacher for my sake. I warned him that I can't date right now because I need to focus on practicing the shot put. And what did he do? He jumped out of a window for me. When will Xia Luo finally grow up?"
Qiu Ya: "Dongmei, maybe I should tell you in detail what happened after you left."
Qiu Ya apologized repeatedly: "Sorry, sorry." Then turned to Losao and said: "Hey, Losao, kick the ball back, please."

Principal said sternly: "Since the founding of the school," "or even since the establishment of New China," "nothing this egregious has ever happened in the history of education." "Therefore, the school has decided to expel him!"

Principal looked at the woman and said, "I'm listening to your lecture." The woman took off her hair clip, letting her hair down, and looked at the fish tank on the table, saying, "I'm talking about the company."
The woman said: "It's all for the sake of the child." "Sorry, principal, please understand." "Help!" "The principal is molesting me!"

The loudspeaker announced: "No recess exercise today." "We need to hold an emergency meeting." Considering this, the school will record a major demerit for Xia Luo and ask him to self-critique in front of the entire school." "Come on, Xia Luo, come to the front." movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.text: Xiao Xing said: "Thank you, Cong Cong." "I'm not eating anymore, you eat." "I'm not eating anymore, you eat, Cong Cong."
The next day, the alarm clock went off as usual, and the breakfast on the stove was still the usual scrambled eggs.
The next day, Zheng Huiying was scrubbing the floor when Mama came in with a bowl of dog food and said: "Cong Cong, eat up."

She desperately banged on the door, but there was no response. She leaned against the door, her heart filled with despair. Suddenly, there was a power outage, and the hallway plunged into darkness. Terrified, Zheng Huiying screamed loudly.
Xiao Xing quickly hid in the stairwell as the door was opened, a pair of leather shoes stepping into the stairwell.

The man walked down the stairs step by step, and Zheng Huiying, hiding in the corner, stared at his back with wide eyes, panting heavily. The man walked out of the door, leaving Zheng Huiying alone, who continued to hide on the stairs, her body covered in blood.
Zheng Huiying's eyes were filled with panic and fear. She tried to run but stumbled and fell down the stairs. The iron door of the house closed slowly, locking Zheng Huiying inside.

"The missing case of female college student Zheng Huiying," "The police are appealing to the public for clues," "Zheng Huiying, 21 years old," "a junior student at the city's Economic and Trade University," "has been missing since leaving the campus on the evening of the 2nd of this month." "If anyone knows her whereabouts, please contact our station as soon as possible."
The scene shifted to a high-rise building, where Xiao Xing walked to the intercom, pressed the answer button, and the screen lit up showing Mama's image.
Mama: "Xiao Xing, it's Mom."

The car continued on the road, Mama said: "Uncle Liang plans to sell our old Lanhu Villa house." "Do you want to come back and see if there's anything you want to take away?" "And there's Liang Cong's stuff, do you want to keep any of it?"

The next day, Xiao Xing arrived at the villa where Cong Cong used to live. She opened the door and walked in, but her heart felt empty. She looked around but didn't see any sign of Cong Cong. Just then, Liang Cong and Zheng Huiying ran by her side. Zheng Huiying shouted, "Slow down!"
Xiao Xing chased after Cong Cong and Liang Cong, shouting: "Slow down"
Xiao Xing ran over and warned: "Be careful!"
Liang Cong climbed up and said: "There are so many, Sister Xiao Xing, come up here quickly!"
Xiao Xing looked up at the sky and wiped the sweat from her forehead: "But how do I get up there? I'm afraid to go up."
Xiao Xing stood at the door, staring blankly at the place where Cong Cong had disappeared, feeling a deep sense of loss.
The next day, Xiao Xing, dressed in a trench coat, came downstairs with a satchel. She looked around, her gaze finally settling on a room on the second floor.

Xiao Xing opened the door and saw Zheng Huiying saying to Liang Cong: "This is what I bought for you with the savings from my New Year's money. You have to practice diligently," "and play beautiful melodies."

The man squatting on the ground said: "No."
A Hao held Si Yan Zai's head and said: "He's all skin and bones from doing drugs" "Do you want to be like him?"
Si Yan Zai shook his head and said, 'No.'

A Hao continued to persuade: "Try it once, and you're hooked for life." "I'm telling you, don't let me find out you've been back to buy." "And don't let me find out you've bought elsewhere." "Or I'll break your legs."
A Hao grabbed Si Yan Zai by the neck and said: 'Understood.'
A Hao pushed Si Yan Zai away and said, 'Take your money and go, go.'
Xiao Wei stepped forward and said: "Brother Hao," "why refuse money when it's offered?"
A Hao said: "That's how we operate."
The three looked up at the pipe, Xiao Wei said: 'Got it, we need to have bottom lines.'
A Hao said: "Do you need to be so loud?"

A Qi and Da Wei were playing soccer in the alley, with A Hao and Xiao Wei chasing the ball back and forth. The three of them were completely immersed in the game, completely unaware of the danger that was slowly approaching them from the alley.
A Qi, seeing this, laughed and gestured for them to follow. The group then walked through the bustling streets, passed by a hot pot restaurant, and finally arrived at a pub.

Xiao Wei, who had been waiting for a long time, finally couldn't stand it anymore. He clenched his fists and shouted loudly at the window. At that moment, Xiao Wei was wearing a suit and had a shaved head. He kicked Da Wei out of the window and then jumped out himself.

A Qi and Da Wei rushed to the scene upon hearing the commotion. The three of them were ambushed by the thugs who had been waiting for a long time. They were overpowered and subdued. The thugs took the opportunity to inject A Hao with a liquid from a syringe. The three of them were taken to a small room, where they were tied up and left to wait.

A Hao walked out of the bar with a cigarette in his mouth. He casually flicked the ash on his hand and stubbed out the cigarette. He looked around and kicked a stool over. The young men who were playing cards outside the bar rushed out upon hearing the commotion.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou and said: "If we are about to die later on, can you get away from me? I don't want others to find us and say we died together due to a flood."

Qi Jia, who was still in the car, looked at the rising water level with a heart in her throat. She turned her head to look at Yuan Xiaoou, who was still unconscious, and then turned back to look at the water outside the window again.
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou, why do you want to die with me?" "Are you shy?"
Qi Jia reached out to grab Yuan Xiaoou's face and said: "Do you think I'm short of your breath? Open your mouth! Open it, Yuan Xiaoou!"
Qi Jia said: "You want to hold your breath, right?" "If you're going to hold your breath, I will hold mine with you."

The car was sinking in the water like a giant sinking slowly. The two people inside were also getting closer and closer. Yuan Xiaoou's chest was heaving violently, and he couldn't help but stretch out his arms to pull Qi Jia into his embrace. Yuan Xiaoou's hands slid from the back of Qi Jia's head to her shoulders as he leaned in to kiss her. The kiss was gentle at first, but soon Yuan Xiaoou's emotions became more intense.
Yuan Xiaoou, holding Qi Jia's face, said: "I really think it's good to die with you."

Yuan Xiaoou, with his head close to Qi Jia's, reached out and touched her cheek, saying: "Can I hug you?" Qi Jia, with a smile, opened her arms and Yuan Xiaoou, with his head close to Qi Jia's, reached out and hugged her.
Qi Jia said while walking: "Where's my car? If I can't find it later, I'll be in trouble."
Qi Jia opened the chat software and said: "Hurry back and rescue us, the water has already seeped into the car. Hurry up! Hurry up! Hurry up!"
The rain grew heavier, and the water in the car reached Yuan Xiaoou's chest. The rescue team arrived and successfully rescued Yuan Xiaoou and Qi Jia from the car.

The scene shifts to the dimly lit alley, where Yuan Xiaoou and Qi Jia walk side by side with their hands crossed. The damp clothes clinging to Qi Jia's body made her feel uncomfortable. She looked at Yuan Xiaoou beside her, who was walking with his head down, and suddenly felt a surge of affection.

Yuan Xiaoou followed behind, looking at the back of Qi Jia, calling out to her. Qi Jia stopped in her tracks, Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia's back, feeling a pang of sympathy. The two stood in the alley, neither willing to back down.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Do you think I still need to go to Shanghai?"
Qi Jia looked down at the clothes in her hands, glanced at Yuan Xiaoou, and said: "Go" "Isn't Shanghai quite good?"
Qi Jia crossed her arms and looked at him, then turned and walked away, glancing back at Yuan Xiaoou.
Qi Jia, feeling helpless, turned around and walked back into the house. Yuan Xiaoou, with arms crossed, slowly walked back to the doorstep, then turned into the alley.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.text: The scene shifts to the interior of a house, where a woman is on the phone saying, "Grandma passed away on the morning of January 2, 2014. Grandma's granddaughter contacted me online to say that Grandma had passed away. The funeral was also arranged, Grandma really passed away."
The woman asked, "Is the old lady really gone?"
The woman said, "All is bought by you" "All the things you bought have never been used," as the man walked past the woman, she shyly lowered her head.
The man said, "I said so many people care about you, you all"
The father said, "Isn't there that many people?" while tidying up the bedding.
The woman took out a quilt and said, "This has not been used, it's new."
The woman said, "Come on weekends," "I visit grandma Wang Yuka's house more often," "Seems like once a month," "This grandma is the loneliest among the seven grandmas in Hainan."
The woman continued, "Because she lives alone, other grandmas roughly live with their families."
The scene shifts to a place of detention, in the Guangxi Zhuang region.

The scene shifts to the next day, Liang Zhaosheng is seen riding a motorcycle with a tricycle attached to the back, transporting goods to the village committee. He slowly turns into the gate of the village committee, and the camera gradually zooms in.
Liang Zhaosheng said: "The nursing home has been built for three years," "Now I manage it," "That's to open the door in the morning, open the main gate, and close the door in the evening."

Lin Ailan said: "This window is burglar-proof," "It's to prevent someone (thief) breaking the glass and stealing things" "The elderly who come here are all five guarantees households" "Blind and disabled elderly without descendants"
Lin Ailan, pushing a stool to the top of the watchtower, said: "She moved up here three years ago"" She moved up as soon as it was established"" She was the earliest to come"

The camera shifts to the other side, where Lin Ailan is standing in the yard, looking at the distant Liang Zhaosheng. Her eyes are full of worry and expectation. The days pass by, and Lin Ailan still waits every day at the yard, hoping to see Liang Zhaosheng return.
The scene shifts to the prison, where Liang Zhaosheng, having served his sentence, is about to leave. A man in a suit stands in front of him, blocking his way, saying, "Where are you going?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Xia Luo cursed angrily: "Who the hell did this?"
Xia Luo said, "Hey, Qiu Ya, my bike's broken. Get on, I'll give you a ride home."
Da Chun: "Thanks, Dongmei."
Qiu Ya said: "No problem." "Xia Luo, why do you have so many locks on this crappy bike?" "Who would even want to steal it?"
Xia Luo shouted: "Ma Dongmei" "You annoying ugly!" Da Chun looked at Xia Luo in surprise.
Da Chun said: "Xia Luo, how can you say that about Dongmei? I think Ma Dongmei looks better than Qiu Ya."
Da Chun mocked, "When did you go blind? You must like her, don’t you?" Xia Luo gave Da Chun a kick.
Xia Luo quickly said: "I don't, I don't, I don't," "No, no," while Da Chun sat on the side, laughing uncontrollably.

Xia Luo: "I don't believe it," Xia Luo turned to Dachun and said: "Dachun," "The gender ratio in our country is severely imbalanced. In the future, tens of millions of men will remain bachelors here. Do you think you'll be one of them?"
Da Chun: "Of course I will be. Isn't that obvious?" "Xia Luo, what should I do?"

Xia Luo patted Da Chun and said: "Go chase Ma Dongmei." "Just follow my earlier advice." "Be persistent and relentless." "If you don’t seize the opportunity at school, you'll be worse off in society."
Da Chun asked anxiously: "The college entrance exam is coming soon. What about my studies?"

Xia Luo looked at Da Chun and said, "Is that something you should be worrying about? Dachun, let me tell you, you’re different from others. Don’t waste your time on studying. You definitely shouldn't go to college. Tell your mom, get her to take the money she saved for your college tuition and buy a house instead. Buy a house within the second ring road. Your mom will listen to you. No one argues with a fool."

Da Chun looked at the machine and said: "Alright, it's settled." The two of them looked at the machine, and Da Chun suddenly said: "Hey, Xia Luo, I got it!" "Xia Luo, Xia Luo, it's my first win!" "Xia Luo, I won!"
The gang leader pointed at Xia Luo and said: "You're Xia Luo, right?" "Let's go."
Xia Luo stood up and shouted: "What do you want?"
Da Chun slapped Xia Luo and said, "Get out!"
Da Chun glared at Xia Luo and said: "Fine, I'm leaving!" Then he stormed out.

The scene shifts to a photo of the Five Tiger Gang, with Da Chun in the center holding a samurai sword, surrounded by his gang members. The camera moves upward, revealing that the current owner of the photo is Chen Kai. He is surrounded by his underlings, standing on the steps of a residential building, looking down at Xia Luo who is curled up at his feet.
Chen Kai said, "So, you're the Xia Luo I've heard about?" "You're cocky, huh?" Xia Luo jumped up and kicked Chen Kai in the chest, then ran away.
Da Chun leaned against the wall and said, "I'm telling you, don't bully me. I'll jump off a building. My brain doesn’t work right!"
Chen Kai said: "Who are you trying to scare? Acting like only your brain works, huh?"
The gang leader pointed at Xia Luo and said: "Don’t act cocky." "You should find out who my big bro Chen Kai is."
The boy said: "Big bro Chen Kai."

Chen Kai pointed at Xia Luo and said, "Let me tell you, Qiu Ya is my sister-in-law. Stay away from her in the future, got it?" Chen Kai kicked Xia Luo, saying, "Got it, got it, got it?!" "Did you hear me?" "Got it, got it, got it!"
Da Chun: "Big bro."

movie101_7021829520667705869_2340_2520.text: The room was filled with mosquitoes, and the walls were covered with bite marks.
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "When I was 13, I joined the Communist Party."
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "I fought the Japanese along the way to Hangzhou." "I fought the Japanese along the way to Hangzhou."
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "The trigger was also here, I hung the gun around my neck, one in each hand, with all the bullets loaded, and I was shooting practice targets."
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "I have a hole right here," "If I had let them enter, I would have died." "Just like that, my head would have been blown off."
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "We ran out of cigarettes," "Go have a smoke," "There's plenty of food," "I've eaten already," "It's just that the portions are too big," "I don't think it's enough for me."

The next day, Yan Xuechen rode a bicycle to the Nansheng Elementary School. The school was surrounded by lush trees, providing a pleasant teaching environment. The children's reading voices echoed from the classroom. Yan Xuechen parked the bicycle at the school gate and walked inside.

Yan Xuechen continued: 'When I came back from school, I often passed by her door.' 'She was very difficult, no one helped her.' 'I'd buy some stuff, cook rice, fetch water for her.' 'That's how I got to know her.' 'There was once an old anti-Japanese war veteran.' 'He is dead now, but he told me before!' 'Grandma Lin Ailan had great contributions to the revolution, to the party, and to the people.' 'Why, you ask? Because she infiltrated the enemy interior.' 'Qi Lian told me; she's no longer around now.' 'Then, she stole a lot of bullets for our troops.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.text: Qi Jia, who had just returned from the market, was about to close the door when Yuan Xiaoou came in through the window.

The next day, Qi Jia woke up alone in the spacious bedroom, wrapped in a blanket, looking around. She saw a large bed, a desk, and a cabinet in the corner. The room was decorated in a Scandinavian style, with a large poster of bare trees on the wall. Qi Jia sat on the bed, holding a newspaper, and looked around blankly.
Qi Jia put down the keys, turned around, and picked up the letter that had been delivered.
Qi Jia took the two admission notices, her hands trembling slightly as she held them, her expression serious. She slowly opened one of the notices, her eyes revealing a hint of panic and fear.
The scene shifts to Qi Jia's bedroom, where the phone rings. Qi Jia glances at the caller ID and then hangs up.

Yuan Xiaoou continued: "Qi Jia, I don't like saying goodbye face to face. Let's say goodbye in this way. First and foremost, you must take your medicine on time, two bowls with half a pot of water, drink it after breakfast and dinner, the one at night doesn't need to be reheated, just warm it in hot water. Don't panic when you forget your keys, I've hidden a spare one in the electricity meter box at the door, you'll touch it as you reach out. You can't give up on exercise halfway, you must add ten sit-ups every week, and running must be an hour after dinner. When running, don't think about anything, just run."
Qi Jia opened the cabinet in the kitchen, intending to take out a knife. But when she opened the cabinet, she found several sharp knives inside.

Yuan Xiaoou comforted: "Qi Jia, don't cry for the people who don't deserve it." "Be the real you." "You are kind, but good people should treat themselves better." "When you're tired, sleep; when you wake up, smile." "Simple life is the best." "Thank you." "Qi Jia, I'm leaving."

The next morning, Yuan Xiaoou came to Qi Jia's window to water the plants, as usual, he looked at Qi Jia while watering the plants. Qi Jia was also looking at him, but this time he didn't look away when he saw him.
Qi Jia touched the flowerpot with her injured finger, and the next second, the flowerpot's thorns penetrated her wound.
Qi Jia looked at the cactus, smiling foolishly, feeling deeply immersed in the affectionate moments with Yuan Xiaoou. The scene gradually fades to black.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: Yan Xuezhan said: "She smuggled out a lot of bullets for the troops" "She also mobilized the public and young women to join the army"

The camera shifts to Grandma Lin Ailan, who is sitting at home, carefully tying plastic bags for the garbage. She's using a cane to peel potatoes over the stove. Despite her fragile body, she's still busy with housework.

The scene shifts to the village, where Grandma Lin Ailan is sitting at the door, and Yan Xuezhan walks over and says: "How many photos have you taken after shooting for so long?" "I don't know where they went after being handed over to the state." "Did I forget? No, I'm not a fool."

Grandma Lin Ailan: "I kept and placed them at the foot of the bed." "I know the medals are kept with the money and the wallet." "There's nothing in that wallet either, it has been stolen." "It wasn't stolen, it's been found." "(Look) You said someone stole it, but it's here."

Grandma Lin Ailan: "It wasn't stolen, it's been found." "(Look) You said someone stole it, but it's here." "It's placed inside here." "It might have fallen out from here." "You accused Ah Han of stealing and wanted others to chase Ah Han."

The neighbor said, "Where did you find it? I've searched everywhere." Grandma Lin Ailan said, "This one is inside the flower bag." The neighbor said, "Where is it, let me take a look." Grandma Lin Ailan said, "In that flower bag" "If you hide it like this, you will definitely not be able to find it."
The man took out a red envelope and said, "This one is like this," "Both are the same, oh well, never mind."
Yan Xuezhan said: "Our troops rescued her and she joined the army. So, here in our Civil Affairs Bureau, we awarded her the 60th Anniversary of the Anti-Japanese War Medal!"
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "A few of us girls" "sang those songs," "songs about fighting the devils," "The Japanese devils' artillery destroyed our families,"
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "They captured my father and mother, and then captured us," "Our troops saved me, they are our saviors," "We are going to fight Japan," "Oh, there are so many such songs."

Grandma Lin Ailan said: "We are going to fight Japan, oh, there are so many such songs. When you sing them, the Japanese come to fight us, and it was then that the Japanese had just arrived and destroyed our home."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: A Hao and his brothers arrived at the rooftop. A little girl was running around with a box of mooncakes, shouting, "Who wants to eat mooncakes?"
A Qi holding a bottle of wine said: "I want, I want too."
A woman nearby asked: "Can you cut them?"
A Hao's father replied: "Sure."
The woman said: "Be careful, well done."
A Hao's Wife praised: "Wow, you're so smart."
A Hao said: "Well done."
A Qi said: "Bro Yan Zheng, hey."
A Hao smiled and said: "Hello, hello."
A Hao said: "Happy Mid-Autumn Festival." "Sit, sit, sit."
Yan Zheng said: "So happy to see you!"
A Hao said: "Come, sit."
A Hao said: "Today is the Mid-Autumn Festival. I specifically brought mooncakes to honor you." Then he added: "And also, fine wine."
Yan Zheng quickly said: "I can't accept these things. I'm a public official."
A Hao said: "It's Mid-Autumn Festival, bro Yan Zheng. Just take the mooncakes, take them."
Yan Zheng said: "Alright, then. I'll only accept this box of mooncakes" "The rest, you take back" "Thanks for the gesture."
A Hao said: "Bro Yan Zheng, you helped me last time. I've kept it in my heart all along. Actually, I've been wanting to find a chance to repay you."
Yan Zheng said: "No need to be so polite."
A Hao put down the bottle, took out a pack of cigarettes from his pocket, and said: "This is for the children, for the children."
Yan Zheng quickly said: "No, no, no. I can't take your money."
A Hao grabbed Yan Zheng's hand and said: "What do you mean? I don't want it."
A Hao said: "It's a small thing, don't be so formal."
A Qi grabbed A Hao's hand and said: "I already said I don't want your money."
Yan Zheng grabbed A Hao's collar and said: "A Hao, you're filthy rich, right?" "Tell me, have you been selling drugs with Fat Boy Chao recently?" "Speak!"
A Hao said with a smile: "Just trying to make a living."

Yan Zheng said: "It doesn't matter if you don't admit it. My colleagues have already told me everything. Let me tell you, I've been a cop for twenty years. I haven't taken a single bribe. So I won't take your dirty money. Take these gifts and leave immediately!"
A Hao grabbed Yan Zheng's arm and said: "Bro Yan Zheng."
Yan Zheng said angrily: "If you won't leave, I'll leave."
A Qi and A Hao each picked up a handful of cards from the ground and began to shuffle them in their hands.

The scene shifts to the second floor where A Qi and Lei Luo are standing by the railing. A Qi said: "In this world, some people are greedy for money, while others aren't. Yan Zheng is one of the ungreedy ones. Let him go."
A Hao laughed and said: "I'm greedy for money. Having money is great."
A Hao said: "By the way, bro Lei Luo, last time you got Brother Zai to lend me some money. How about I return it now?"
Lei Luo said: "That's it? You're still short on principal and interest. Keep it as a deposit for now. When I need you, you come."
A Hao laughed and said: "I'll definitely come."
Lei Luo laughed and said: "You said it."
A Hao said: "I said it."
A Hao and Lei Luo laughed and held hands, A Hao said: "Thank you, bro Lei Luo."
Lei Luo said: "I said it." Lei Luo and A Qi arrived at the bar, where Fat Boy Chao was playing the drums on stage.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4740_4920.text: Qi Jia walked to the street, a truck drove in front of her, she stepped forward and said to the driver: "Don't you value your life?!"
Qi Jia turned around to look at the posters on the wall, all of which were related to the exhibition of the first issue of 'No. 1' magazine. She stood under the scorching sun, feeling a bit dizzy.

The exhibition content was about the campus environment. There was a large tree on the poster, with the words 'Campus Environment Exhibition' written above it. Qi Jia walked into the exhibition hall, where students were coming and going. She looked at the tree on the poster, then at the other exhibits in the hall, and finally stopped in front of a painting.
Qi Jia walked to the side, carefully observing the little girl's painting. The girl was still standing under the tree, gazing at the painting on the wall.
Qi Jia was stunned when she saw the content of the painting. It was a couple kissing under a tree, exactly like the scene in the painting that Yuan Xiaoou had once described to her.
Qi Jia was stunned by the paintings depicting romantic scenes between a man and a woman. All the paintings showed a man and a woman kissing under a tree.

Qi Jia was stunned on the spot, her eyes wide open, unable to believe that the paintings in front of her were all created by Yuan Xiaoou. She kept looking at the paintings, her eyes filled with disbelief.
Qi Jia was stunned, and the scene flashed back to the day she and Yuan Xiaoou first met, when they were kissing under a big tree.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don't worry, as long as I'm here, I'll definitely protect both of you." After saying this, Yuan Xiaoou carried Qi Jia to the restaurant.
The scene shifts to the couple's home, where Yuan Xiaoou is slapped by Qi Jia while claiming he will definitely cure her.
The scene shifts to the day of their wedding, Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou in the car full of water, Yuan Xiaoou holding Qi Jia and saying: "I want to marry you."
Qi Jia walked out of the gallery with a bag, while the students dispersed, bidding farewell to each other.
The scene shifts to Shanghai in 2013. Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou are having a blind date at a restaurant.
The scene shifts to a man in a suit, who is taking the elevator to the office floor, preparing to go to work. He just entered the office building when he encountered Qi Jia.
The manager, covering his face in pain, stumbled into the meeting room, with the employees curiously surrounding him.
The man said: "Oh man, these two foreigners can really drink" "They nearly drank me to death last night" "But yes," and then everyone cheered and celebrated.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Da Chun and Zhang Yang were holding shoes, looking at the approaching Xia Luo with a smile, while Little Brother-in-law opened the car door, Xia Luo got out of the car with a smile.
Zhang Yang said: "Xia Luo!"
Zhang Yang, seeing this, was overjoyed and said: "Xia Luo, you're doing well."
Da Chun said: "I was just wondering who was driving around here in circles."
Xia Luo said: "Long time no see." Xia Luo took the flowers and walked away.
Zhang Yang cursed: "Little Brother-in-law, you little bastard!"

Xia Luo monologues in his mind: "Everything I did today was for the one secretly hidden in my heart. Her name is Qiu Ya. She was famous in school, recognized as the school beauty, while I was even more famous as the school joke. But I just don't get it—why do such beautiful girls always end up marrying a pig in the end? I want to have a moment of brilliance on her most important day and then disappear forever, becoming the unattainable idol in her life. Although I'm not the protagonist today, I want to dress the most handsome. Unfortunately, I ended up wearing the same outfit as the Master of Ceremonies."
Master of Ceremonies said: "This esteemed colleague, did you walk into the wrong room?" Xia Luo furrowed his brows, glared, and then sneered.
Zhang Yang turned to Yuan Hua and said: "Yuan Hua, can you improvise a poem for Xia Luo's outfit?"
Xia Luo nodded and said: "That's right."
Zhang Yang said: "Come on, come on, give us one!"
Yuan Hua stood up and said: "Alright, I'll try." "A lone banquet guest, feathered outfit—all classmates, hence feathered attire."
Yuan Hua poured a glass of wine for Xia Luo and said: "Xia Luo, I was just joking. Don't take it to heart. It was purely for rhyme." The two of them drank the wine.
Old Wang holding a wine glass, said: "Classmates, how have you been?"
Da Chun stood up and said: "Old Wang, I heard you were expelled for accepting gifts and yet came here with the face."
Zhang Yang said: "Do you remember me? I won the winter marathon that year."
Old Wang laughed and said: "First."
Zhang Yang said: "That New Year's, my dad brought over a Sony radio for you."
Old Wang pointed at Zhang Yang and said: "Zhang Yang, a teacher can never forget."
Yuan Hua said: "Mr. Wang, my dad sent a television." "Yuan Hua." Old Wang said: "Still as talented as ever."
Da Chun said: "Teacher, I gave you a calendar."
Old Wang said: "The teacher can't remember that." "I don't hold grudges." "You all have changed so much."
Meng Te said: "Old Wang, I'm Meng Te. I go by Meng Te Jiao now."
Old Wang, smiling, says: "Come, sit, sit."
Old Wang picked up a glass of wine and said: "Please, take a seat."
Old Wang said: "To be honest, the student I remember most from your class is that fool, Xia Luo. What is that idiot doing now?"
Old Wang said: "Come here, fool!" "Tell the teacher what you're doing now." Everyone laughed.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.text: Grandma said, "My mother was caught and killed", her hands bound and thrown into the river. After saying this, she covered her face and wept.
Grandma said: 'They caught my mother and threw her into the river that they were building.' 'The person who threw my mother was him (the Japanese soldier).'
Grandma's face was full of wrinkles, her eyes deeply sunken, and her skin had turned yellowish, looking extremely frail.
The next day, the sun shone on the earth, and the tree branches swayed with the breeze. A group of elderly people sat outside the detention center, each with their own worries.
Grandma sat by the window, bowed her head, and cried silently.
The clouds in the sky were rolling and changing, and the sun was sometimes blocked by the clouds, sometimes shining brightly.

Grandma continued, "They wanted to kill people of Songmei village, I was caught by the Japanese, and three of us from Songmei Village were forced to marry him. I pretended to agree, but in my heart, I thought of stabbing him with a knife."
Grandma said: 'I pretended to agree to marry him, but later I opposed him.'
Grandma said: "Many of my experiences are known to the state. He (the Japanese) made me crippled, and he is dead too."
The frail body of Grandma was trembling, and her face was covered with wrinkles. She was wearing slippers, supporting herself with two plastic stools, slowly making her way to the dining table.
Deputy Dean Liang Chaosheng replied: "When she gets up, someone feeds her. Sit until noon and then slowly move inside to sleep."

Deputy Dean Liang Chaosheng continued, 'In the afternoon, she sits at the door, waiting for the woman (caretaker) in the afternoon to prepare the food, then gives it to her to eat. We cook for three people and deliver it to them, the others who can walk can go and get their meals from the dining hall themselves.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Yuan Xiaoou was still in the hall, pretending to be busy, but was actually waiting for Lin Shuer. He called Lin Shuer and said: "Hey, rich lady," "what made you think of calling me?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Yo, I was even worried that you were too busy with state affairs to take my call."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "What am I busy with? It’s not that I don’t contact you all because I’m afraid you wouldn’t want to deal with me."
Lin Shuer said: "I knew you’d try to turn it around." "You’re really shining in Shanghai, aren’t you?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don’t say that... Whenever you want to come to Shanghai, I'm always ready to welcome you."
Lin Shuer laughed and said: "Look at you, sweet talker." "When Qi Jia went to Shanghai, I didn’t see you being so attentive."
Yuan Xiaoou asked: "When did she come to Shanghai?"
Yuan Xiaoou replied: "She's been there for a while now, currently in the hospital."
Yuan Xiaoou asked anxiously: "Why is she still in the hospital?"
Lin Shuer replied: "Qi Jia has been in Shanghai for almost a year now."
Yuan Xiaoou asked: "No, which hospital is she in?"

Yuan Xiaoou replied: "What, you want to visit her? I’m telling you, you’re too late. Even if you saw her, you wouldn’t recognize her. Do you know why you can’t catch up with Qi Jia, blockhead? It’s not because you’re poor, dumb, and ugly; it’s simple, because you lack the savvy."
Yuan Xiaoou angrily said: "Stop the bullshit and just tell me which hospital and what ward she's in."
