"So that people will spread the word, from ten to a hundred to a thousand." "We will promote these activities in the United States, Korea, and Japan." "Tell them about this grandmother and call on more people to help her." "All 24 of us went to Xiaogan to help her renovate her house." "We painted and rebuilt the walls." "Those who visited her home wanted to express their feelings." "They wanted to give the grandmother their most precious things." "So they prepared these items." "Such as thermal underwear, scarves, Korean music, and maps."

The scene shifts to the early morning of the next day in Xianggang City, Guangdong Province. The door of the room slowly opens, and Volunteer An Shihong, who is still half-asleep, is startled awake. He looks around the room in a daze, trying to remember what happened yesterday.

Volunteer An Shihong recalled, "My mother couldn't have children. She wanted a child. A neighbor suggested she adopt one, so she took me in. At that time, I was only two years old. I heard from others that I was still nursing."
Volunteer An Shihong's mother-in-law said: "I have four sons. He has a son and a daughter, my grandsons."

Volunteer An Shihong's mother came over with a bowl of freshly cooked noodles. She said to the neighbors, 'Then there are the three of us. My husband, me, and my mother. That's seven people in total.'
Volunteer An Shihong squatted on the ground, looking at the little girl, and said, 'She was born under unfortunate circumstances, fleeing from Korea to China.'

Volunteer An Shihong, with a limp, walked into the alley, where he encountered an old man who had just come out of his house. The old man, seeing Volunteer An Shihong, stopped in his tracks and stared at him intently. Volunteer An Shihong, undeterred, continued walking forward.
Volunteer An Shihong said: "Mama in Korean", "Papa in Korean", "Grandma in Korean"

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Qiu Ya followed closely behind, and the three of them looked at Yuan Hua on the small boat, feeling a bit scared.
Xia Luo and Qiu Ya exchanged a glance and then looked at Yuan Hua together. Yuan Hua was startled by their gaze and stood up straight.

Zhang Yang: "What a twist of fate," "Can you believe what happened to our Uncle Yuan Hua?" Yuan Hua was stunned by the news. Meanwhile, Qiu Ya was in the pool, shaking her head to splash water on her face.
Yuan Hua's eyes were drawn to Qiu Ya's slender figure. Qiu Ya, with a smile, walked past him. Zhang Yang said to Yuan Hua: "Stop looking. She is your sister-in-law now."
Qiu Ya turned around, looked at Yuan Hua, and gave him a wink. Yuan Hua, feeling embarrassed, turned his head away. Qiu Ya picked up a wine glass and said: "Why are you still sneaking a peek?"
Xia Luo said: "Yuan Hua" "I have always admired you" "You were distinguished even in school days"
Yuan Hua glanced at the others and said: "Showing off, showing off."
Xia Luo: "Could you write an impromptu poem about my current outfit?"
Yuan Hua smiled and said: "My poetry is always critical."
Xia Luo: "It's okay."
Yuan Hua said: "Let me try." He then mimicked Xia Luo's cocky walk and said: "Strutting cockerel, Soars higher than the phoenix."

Zhang Yang clapped and said: "Good, good literature!" "You have not lost your talent from those days." "How about this," "I'll invest in a magazine for you," "I've already thought of a name." "'Men Need to Show off.'" "You will be the editor."
Yuan Hua looked at Qiu Ya, then at Zhang Yang, feeling a bit out of place, awkwardly smiled and said nothing. Zhang Yang looked at Qiu Ya, and Xia Luo leaned against the chair with a relaxed smile.

Xia Luo raised his glass and said: "Cheers to the first time we meet." After speaking, he raised his glass and drained it in one gulp. Yuan Hua also emptied his bottle in one go, while Zhang Yang and Qiu Ya sat on either side, watching the two with their eyes full of disdain.
Yuan Hua holding a hat said: "Let me tell you, I really regret it." "I was so naive back then." "Xia Luo, the truth is that I'm still haunted by the time Chen Kai insulted Winter Mei."
Yuan Hua: "What did you say?" Everyone looked at Zhang Yang, waiting for his response.
Yuan Hua said: "Maybe I talked too much, I thought you all knew."
Xia Luo said: "It's okay, Yuan Hua. I just want to get a simple understanding. Continue."
Yuan Hua: "Actually, it's no big deal." Winter Mei agreed to go into the small woods to protect you, but I shouted myself hoarse, but I couldn't change her mind to protect you."
The two turned their heads to look at the unconscious Chen Kai on the ground. Zhang Yang said: "Chen Kai's family had some influence, making Winter Mei's family compensate."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Wang Xiaobing laughed and said: "You look a lot more like him."
Huang Dage smiled and said: "What's the matter? Speak."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Brother, this is the situation" "My girl is sick and waiting for money to have surgery in the hospital" "I'm afraid that if the prices go up, I won't be able to get a job."
Huang Dage said: "I don't think you're unable to get a job. You just don't want to work anymore, do you?"
San Er patted Wang Xiaobing's shoulder and said: "Isn't that right?"
San Er said: 'Kneel down'
Wang Xiaobing said to San Er: "San Er, don't make trouble" "Go buy two packs of cigarettes"
San Er said: "Brother, I have some here." "You, you smoke first"
Huang Dage said: "Get lost, this is not your business. Go away." San Er, wearing sunglasses, waved his hand and said: "Wait a minute."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Brother, take care."
Huang Dage said: "You know the rules here. If you want to fight, you have to cripple. If you want to punish, you have to pay money."
Wang Xiaobing also said: "Big brother, I also have some problems here." "I lost my case."
Xu Decai said: "Yo"
Wang Xiaobing touched the man's head and said: "You don't look like someone who works at a newsstand. A journalist, right?"
Wang Xiaobing stood up and said: "Brother, he's not a journalist."
Xu Decai said: "If you really want to fight, someone will die here today."
Huang Dage said: "If you dare, let him go." "Damn it, tell me, what are you here for?"
Xu Decai said: "It's one thing to beat us, but stealing my case?" "Don't go too far."
Huang Dage asked: "Who hit you? Where?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "On the street."

Huang Dage said: "My people never fight in the street" "They won't steal your things" "If you get beaten up, go to the police" "The same goes if you lose your case" "I can't help you" "I won't take care of it"
Xu Decai said: "My brother already paid the protection fee."
Huang Dage asked: "What is the protection fee?"
Xu Decai said: "That's called."
Wang Xiaobing said: "That's called a management fee."
Wang Xiaobing said: "I paid the management fee."
Huang Dage said: "Oh my, you thought this was the underworld? This is a logistics company, understand? Do you understand what a logistics company is?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "I'll try it on."
Huang Dage said: "Do you think it's easy to do this job on the street?" "We should talk about affection, righteousness, civility, and manners."
Wang Xiaobing replied: "Yes."

Huang Dage said: "Rules." "Do you think I like to raise the price?" "Is it easy for us brothers to live?" "There's pressure to have a place to live, to eat, to use water and electricity," "all kinds of pressure." "Everything else is going up in price." "Can I not raise it?" "Am I not embarrassed if I don't raise it?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "No, no, no, I'm sorry."
Huang Dage said: "If we don't raise prices, there's no future in what we do."
Wang Xiaobing laughed and said: "Let's go."
The crowd clapped and said: "He's absolutely right."
Huang Dage, with a fierce expression, slapped Wang Xiaobing and said: "Listen to me" "In consideration of your being a fellow townsman, I'll let you off this time" "Get lost."
Wang Xiaobing took the cloth and said: "Thank you, Brother Huang."
Huang Dage took a puff of his cigarette and said: "Come back" "I'll borrow it" "Take it"
Wang Xiaobing said: "Brother, this, this isn't right."
Huang Dage said: "If I tell you to take it, you take it."
Huang Dage said: "Take it, take it, take it, take it."
Huang Dage said: "Listen to me" "Take this money" "Cure your daughter's illness" "If your daughter's illness is not cured" "I'll beat you every time I see you" "Do you hear me?"
Xu Decai said: "Go, go, go."
Wang Xiaobing took the money and said: "Thank you, thank you, sisters."
Huang Dage said: "You'd better go."

movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.text: Lei Luo was shot and fell to the ground. The others shouted: 'Don't run, stand still, don't run.'
A man in a suit said: "Lei Luo killed Dingye, didn't he"
The old man holding the hat said: "Yes, Lei Luo killed Dingye!" "Yes, yes, I saw it with my own eyes."
The scene shifted, and someone shouted: 'Lei Luo killed Dingye'
The three of them sneaked down the stairs and cornered a group of people, saying, 'Listen up,' 'No one is allowed to let Lei Luo escape,' 'Stay sharp.'
The group chased after them, shouting, 'Lei Luo killed Dingye, don't run!'

At this moment, A Hao walked into the courtyard, casually glanced at Lei Luo, and then walked straight past him. Lei Luo, who was originally sitting on a chair, immediately stood up and chased after him, but A Hao had already disappeared around the corner.
The group of people chasing after Lei Luo shouted, "He's here, don't run! Lei Luo killed Dingye," "He's here, don't run! Catch him!"

The man in the suit was shot in the leg. He used the wall as a support to jump up, but was shot again, falling to the ground. Lei Luo, who was hiding in the alley, saw the man in the suit fall and immediately ran towards the back door of the grocery store. The drug dealer who was chasing Dingye and Da Wei also rushed into the alley.

The man in the suit shot Lei Luo in the abdomen, Lei Luo fell face down, the man in the suit took the gun from Lei Luo's hand, and shot Dingye in the back of the head. Dingye fell face up, the man in the suit looked at the two fallen men, turned around, and leaned against the wall.

The group of people chasing after them quickly caught up. Xiao Wei and Da Wei hurriedly ran towards the staircase, with the others hot on their heels. Xiao Wei grabbed the handrail and swung down, with Da Wei following suit.

A Hao, who had just rushed out of the house, was about to go back to help, but was blocked by the oncoming crowd. In a moment of urgency, he picked up a wooden stick and swung it at the approaching crowd. The stick broke in half, and A Hao, in a panic, grabbed a rope hanging nearby and swung it around.

The leading Dingye swung his knife horizontally, cutting the tendons of the first person's hand. The first person instantly fell to the ground. The next person in the line was a middle-aged man. Dingye swung his knife horizontally again, cutting off the middle-aged man's left hand. The crowd behind him instantly rushed forward.
Lei Luo, holding a samurai sword, charged into the building. The people hiding inside scattered in panic. Lei Luo swung the samurai sword and chopped off the tongues of two men who tried to escape.

Lei Luo, who was about to run, was kicked by Dingye and fell against the wall. The pursuing people caught up, and Dingye pinned Lei Luo against the wall, mercilessly stabbing him. Lei Luo cried out in pain, "Bro, bro, A Hao, A Hao"
The roller shutter door slowly descended, and inside the room, Lei Luo said to A Hao: 'A Hao, ah, the signal flare's gone; I can't call for help, I can't reach the outside.'
A Hao urged, 'Go, go quickly.'
At this moment, Lei Luo and A Qi arrived at the rooftop. A Qi looked up at the window on the opposite roof and immediately climbed up using the external pipes and wires.
At this moment, A Qi climbed over the wall and came to the back door of the house. He first checked the back door, then opened the iron gate and went inside.

At this moment, Lei Luo and Da Wei, who had been locked in a room, were rescued by Dingye and A Hao. Dingye dragged Lei Luo inside, and A Hao carried Da Wei in. The families of the two were left behind, with the children covering their eyes and crying.

At this moment, A Qi was still beating Dingye. Lei Luo took the opportunity to escape. A Hao immediately shot and killed A Qi, then carried Dingye on his back and ran towards the other end of the alley.

A Qi said: "Over there, chase them." The two groups started fighting, and the burly men were knocked down one by one. Seeing this, more burly men came running. A Qi and Xiao Wei blocked the door, and Da Wei and A Hao stood at the entrance of the alley, holding weapons and ready to fight.

movie101_7021829520667705869_900_1080.text: The girl said: "South Korea is my birthplace" "There was no food at that time" "Run"
Yinmei Mao said: "My mother abandoned me, left me. My sister was very young and needed someone, she held her and left, held her and left. She was always missing me, always missing me!"
Yinmei Mao said, "My Gaga is my mother-in-law." "I don't understand!" "Mother-in-law is Gaga (Hubei dialect)."
Yinmei Mao said, "Gaga would look for me, search everywhere. Without Gaga, I would be lost."
Yinmei Mao: "I followed her, I followed her, I don't know how old I was, I, don't, don't know, I don't know how old I was when I fled."
Yinmei Mao said: "All I knew was she was my mother. She looked at me, I looked at her, she couldn't help herself, nor did she have a father."
Yinmei Mao said: "Once she went back," "she returned to my birthplace (South Korea)," "that train," "the train left from such a high place."
Yinmei Mao continued: "I cried on the spot, people above were looking at us, throwing food for us to eat. We picked it up and ate, mom cried."
Yinmei Mao said: "I didn't know (what had happened), if there was food, I would eat it fiercely." The iron door of the house was rusted and old.
Yinmei Mao said, "Koreans coaxed me,""They said Japanese were going to build a factory, a sock factory,""it seems to be in July, in Hankou."
Yinmei Mao said: "The position of the Japanese," "They locked Koreans and Japanese together."
Yinmei Mao:"That's a door, all doors, they were locked inside. Once locked inside, they couldn't get out. Everyone stood against the wall, someone stood at the door."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Yuan Hua: "It ended up costing Winter Mei's family a lot of money. I heard her mom even had to sell the house."
Xia Luo looked at Qiu Ya and asked: "Do you know about this, Qiu Ya?"
Qiu Ya said: "Yes, I'm aware of it. You were busy with the rehearsal for the Spring Festival Gala at that time, I didn't want to distract you."
Xia Luo asked: "Do you know about this as well, Zhang Yang?"
Zhang Yang laughed and said: "Bro, whether I know or not, I'm uncertain." Xia Luo helplessly picked up a bottle of wine.
Xia Luo sighed and took a sip of his wine, saying, "It's all in the past now."
Qiu Ya smiled and said: "Come on, let's all have a drink."
Zhang Yang said: "Yes, it's been so long since we've seen our old classmates." "Come on, let me pour you a drink." "To drinking, to drinking."
Xia Luo kicked the chair angrily and said: "To hell with drinking!" After saying that, he stormed off, leaving Yuan Hua and Qiu Ya looking at each other in bewilderment.
The scene switches to the villa, where Winter Mei is standing by the window, looking at the heavy rain outside. She opens the window, takes a sip of wine, and contemplates something.

Winter Mei, wearing a bathrobe, sat by the window with a fishing rod. He thought to himself: "Winter Mei ah, where are you now?" "We're not together anymore, and yet I still owe you such a big favor." "Back when we were together, I never let you live a good life." "The two of us crammed into a 40-square-meter little house." "A 40-square-meter house."

The next day, Xia Luo drove to the old building where he used to live. He parked the car at the entrance and walked into the yard, where Old Man was sitting on a stool with a dog. Xia Luo asked, "Old Man, is it Winter Mei's family that lives in apartment 322 upstairs?"
Old Man: "Ma Dong what?"
Xia Luo shouted: "Winter Mei"
Old Man asked: "What about Dongmei?"
Xia Luo: "I'll give you money, just let me go."
Old Man: "Ma what Mei?"
Qiu Ya says: "Alright, Old Man, you just keep cool."
Old Man raised his hand and said: "Alright then."
Old Man said: "Alright then," as Qiu Ya walked away dejectedly.
Old Man: "Have you earned a single cent since graduation? All you do is drink every day and laze around at home. You're wasting away."
Old Man: "What do you know, this is my dream."
Old Man: "What dream?"
Yuan Hua stood at the door, and the neighbor asked, "Who are you looking for?"
Yuan Hua said: "Is this Winter Mei's place? Sorry, looks like I've got the wrong door."
Xia Luo stopped walking, turned around to look at the two of them, and said: "If the money is gone, it can be earned again, but when a person is gone, everything is gone."
The woman pointed at Yuan Hua and said: "You're Xia Luo."
Yuan Hua looked at the couple and said: "If you've been together for a long time, don't waste all that little passion on fighting. Go on, make a baby while the iron is hot!"
Winter Mei said: "Let's make one, let's make one." "I'll take your auspicious words!"
Old Man: "I'll close the door for you."
Zhang Yang opened the door and said: "Let's have twins." Xia Luo was amused by this and closed the door again.
Old Man asked: "Who are you looking for?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_1020_1200.text: The scene shifted to outside the Paramount Studio in Shanghai, where neon lights were shining, and the streets were bustling with people. The car that came to the door stopped in front of the cinema.

The scene shifts to outside the nightclub, where a group of scantily clad women stand by the roadside, trying to tempt passersby into entering. A man in a suit got out of a car, and a woman said: 'Stop, stop, stop! Brother, I'll take you for a good time.'
Fang Jie got out of the car and walked towards the girls. One girl said: "Come on, come on! I've booked the second floor! Come down! Relax a bit."
Fang Jie asked the girls who were about to go out, 'Where are you going?'
On a stormy night, a few cars with their headlights on were driving on the road. The first car slowly stopped at the entrance of a European-style building.
The scene shifts to the entrance of the club, where several cars drive out in succession. The guards at the entrance bow in greeting, and a large group of people is seen standing outside the club.
The car stopped in front of a nightclub, and Tang Hexuan and Fang Jie got out of the car one after another. The bodyguards respectfully greeted them as they stepped out.

Tang Hexuan took off his hat as a gesture of respect, and the others followed suit. After paying their respects, the group walked into the hotel. The interior was lavishly decorated, with crystal chandeliers hanging from the ceiling and luxurious marble walls. The hotel exuded an air of opulence and grandeur.

Fang Jie walked up to Tang Hexuan and said: "Dad, that Ye Fatty was too ruthless this time! The bastard wants to kill me straight in jail! He even dares to stir things up! Should I make him disappear?"
Tang Hexuan looked at Fang Jie and said: "Fang Jie, it's good you're back. How do you know it was Ye Fatty? Why are there so many people in the yard? Dismiss them all."
Fang Jie said: 'I won't disband them.'
Tang Hexuan looked up at Fang Jie, then down at him, and finally spoke.
Fang Jie looked at Li Zihao with a smile in his eyes, then turned and left the room. The night fell, and the villa was brightly lit.
Li Zihao drove the car onto the lawn, directly crashing it into the villa's gate.
Li Zihao cursed and got out of the car, slamming the door shut.

Li Zihao, who had been hiding in the alley, saw this scene and slowly squatted down, clutching his chest. The heavy rain poured down on him, making it hard to see his face, but his trembling body revealed his inner turmoil.

Li Zihao lay on the ground, struggling to move, his body soaked through, the rain beating more fiercely against him. He propped himself up with his hands, trying to crawl forward, but his limbs felt like they belonged to someone else, utterly exhausted.
Fang Jie was drenched in the rain, standing in front of the prison door, unable to calm his emotions for a long time.

Li Zihao, drenched in the rain, looked up at the iron cage above his head, then lowered his head to pull the door of the cage. The heavy iron door, however, showed no intention of opening. Frustrated, he clenched his teeth and forcefully pushed against the door.

The rain was so heavy that it was hard to see clearly, and Li Zihao was also struggling to move forward. He stumbled and fell in a puddle, but after a brief shake of his body, he got up and continued to move forward.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3300_3480.text: The thug raised his hand and shouted, 'Come on, come on'
A Hao said: 'Haoge, you can't protect him.'
A Hao said: 'Don't worry about it,' 'Save me some face, save me some face,' 'Move aside, move aside.'
A Hao said while holding the hostage, 'You shouldn't protect him'
A Hao held Lei Luo hostage and said, "Don't come any closer, if anyone dares, I'll kill them, come on!"

A Hao said: "We came out to be loyal" "Lei Luo saved me in front of those British bastards" "Shouldn't I repay it?" "A favor owed is remembered for a thousand years" "Haven't your parents ever taught you guys?" "Tell me" "Tell me" "Today, leave a way out for Luo Ge" "I, A Hao, will surely repay you all."
A Qi shouted from upstairs, 'Repay your mom, not a single one left,' and then started shooting downstairs.
A Hao fired the last shell, and it exploded in the sky, lighting up the entire city.

A Hao held the knife with both hands, staring intently at the enemy in front. Lei Luo looked at A Hao with a face full of blood, unable to speak. The old man smoking a cigarette said, 'Fireworks, not flares'
A Hao rushed to the front, picked up a stick, and smashed it at the man in black. The man in black dodged quickly, and A Hao was hit in the head by the stick.
Gong Zai Keung and Piggy led the way, with Piggy looking around while walking. Gunshots echoed through the alley, and Gong Zai Keung carried Lei Luo, who had been shot in the leg, up the stairs.

Gong Zai Keung took the opportunity to grab A Hao's shoulder. A Hao turned back and forcefully pushed him down on the steps. Just as he was about to struggle, Lei Luo suddenly woke up, grabbed the key from A Hao's hand, and tried to escape.

A Hao took off his jacket and threw it aside, then took out a bamboo basket. As soon as he put it down, a group of people rushed towards him. He grabbed the basket and swung it, hitting a thug in the face. He then used the momentum to kick another thug. The thugs attacked him, but he countered with the basket, leaving them dazed.

A Hao, who had been knocked down, got up again, throwing punches at the people chasing him. He then used the momentum to kick away the thug blocking his way. The thugs behind him were knocked down one by one, and when another thug came from the front, A Hao kicked him in the chest, then used the momentum to leap into the air.
The two groups clashed, and the thugs were beaten badly.
A Hao kicked the assailant in the chest, sending him flying. He then punched another henchman, causing him to crash into a table and flee in panic.
Lei Luo was knocked down by a thug, and the others rushed to help him. The fight quickly spread, and the thugs' leader was also knocked down by A Hao.
The man said, 'Not afraid of death? Come on, come on, come on, you come too, you bastard, come on!'

movie101_7021874945990853151_1200_1380.text: Li Zihao, who had been knocked down by the wooden board, was drenched in the rain, leaning against the wall, gasping for air. The three children huddled together, looking at the man in front of them with pity.

Li Zihao was drenched in the rain, his messy hair sticking to his face. He leaned against the wall, looking up at the rain. At this moment, Fang Jie and his children were also drenched. The children, who had just woken up, were scared and hid in the corner. Fang Jie stood up and looked at the rain outside the window, his face full of worry.
Li Zihao leaned against the wall, his body gradually sliding down, and he fainted in the rain.
The ship docked at the pier, the bustling crowd dispersing.

Fang Jie continued singing: "Dragons produce dragons and phoenixes give birth to phoenixes", "The sons of mice will fight", "No, no mice", "I tell you", "Everyone on the Bund knows", "We are a perfect match", "You are a crow in the sky", "No, no crows", "You are a phoenix flying in the sky", "I am on the ground, this..."
The bodyguard said, "Young master," "Miss is coming."
Fang Jie asked, "Has she arrived?"
Fang Jie turned around and asked, "Is she here?"
Fang Jie turned around and slapped the man, saying, "Laugh, laugh."

Tang Qianqian and her sister Tang Qianqian disembarked from the ship. The streets of Shanghai were bustling with people. Fang Jie, who had just bought a newspaper, hurriedly ran through the crowd. He looked around but couldn't find Tang Qianqian. He ran back and forth through the crowd, looking for Tang Qianqian's figure.
Tang Qianqian got out of the car and greeted the crowd. A man said, "You're back."
Tang Qianqian: "It's been two years," "you haven't changed," "still the same heartless person," "who are these flowers for?"
Fang Jie held out the flowers: "These flowers are for you." Tang Qianqian smiled and shook her head, indicating she didn't want them. Fang Jie persisted, holding the flowers out to her.
Tang Qianqian took the flowers and said, "Thank you" "Let's hurry up" "I hope we're not late for the movie."
Tang Qianqian: "I've reserved the whole Cinema Palace, don't worry about being late."
Tang Qianqian: "I didn't expect An Affair to Remember to premiere earlier in Shanghai than in England," "I'm a big fan of Hepburn," "I think she's both beautiful and hot."
Fang Jie asked, "What the hell is that you're talking about?"
Tang Qianqian: "I found out you are really ignorant" "I won't say more," after saying this, Tang Qianqian got into the car.

Fang Jie stood up and waved his hand, signaling the driver to start. The driver cracked the whip, and the horses began to trot. Fang Jie sat upright in the front seat, watching the bustling crowd on the street.
Tang Qianqian smiled and said: "You are quite romantic now, you even arranged an antique carriage to pick me up."
Fang Jie: "Of course, who am I, I am Fang Jie."
Tang Qianqian handed the gift to Fang Jie and said, "Here is your gift."
Fang Jie looked at the photo and answered: "A dog."
Tang Qianqian teased: "Aren't you born in the year of the dog?" "Look at its appearance."

movie101_6973286990817002015_3480_3660.text: A Hao, holding a stick, walked down the stairs and looked around. The people behind him were closing in. He glanced at the people behind him and then ran towards the staircase.

The two men, using a long rope, swung A Hao onto the power pole at the end of the alley. With the help of the rope, A Hao kicked Lei Luo away, and the two men, taking advantage of the situation, tied A Hao up with the rope and took away his mobile phone.
A Hao was pinned down by two thugs, one on each arm, while another group of thugs attacked Gong Zai Keung. At this moment, Lei Luo and Fat Boy Chao arrived.

Fat Boy Chao said: "Your time has come, you traitor, I trusted you so much, and you betrayed me, you're going against me? Want to play the hero, is it? Want to play the hero, is it? I'll help you achieve that. Want to play the hero, is it?"
A Hao was pinned to the ground by two thugs, unable to move. Lei Luo shouted: 'A Hao'

A Hao was lying on the ground, barely breathing, and his eyes were rolling up. Lei Luo, with blood all over his face, stood up and walked towards him. A Hao rolled over and shot Lei Luo in the abdomen. Lei Luo fell to the ground, mouth full of blood.
Lei Luo, who had been shot in the head, was lying on the ground with his eyes half-open, blood gushing from his mouth. Gong Zai Keung walked over and said, "Dead cop."

Gong Zai Keung fired a shot at A Hao, and the brothers rushed out from the house. Lei Luo was lying on the ground, covered in blood. The brothers helped Lei Luo up and said, "Gong Zai Keung, Lei Luo bro, Lei Luo bro, Lei Luo bro, how are you? I'll take you to the hospital, come on."
Lei Luo weakly said, "A Hao..."
The underling replied: "Got it."
A man nearby said: "Call a car to the hospital, call an ambulance."
Piggy ran over and said, "A Hao..."
The scene shifts to a hospital. A nurse said, 'How did you end up like this?'

The doctor said, "The patient's leg bone is fractured in half, and the knee has shifted out of place. It looks like we'll have to amputate. Even if we can save his leg, he'll walk with an uneven gait and become a hunchback."

A Hao, who was shot, was floating in the river, and the screen gradually turned black. The next second, the screen was filled with the image of Ah Mui. The scene changed, and the image of Ah Mui appeared in the shattered glass. A Hao, who was shot, was floating in the river, and the screen gradually turned black. The next second, the image of Ah Mui appeared in the shattered glass again. A Hao, who was shot, was floating in the river, and the screen gradually turned black. The next second, the image of Ah Mui appeared in the shattered glass once more. A Hao, who was shot, was floating in the river, and the screen gradually turned black.
A Hao opened his eyes and looked at the ceiling, his mind in disarray, recalling the events that had transpired.
A Hao lying on the bed, turned his head to look at Lei Luo.
A Hao, who was lying on the bed, slowly opened his eyes and looked at Lei Luo. Then he raised his head to look at the ceiling.
He slowly stood up, supporting his head with one hand, looking at A Hao on the bed, and then reached out to touch A Hao's bandaged leg.
The scene shifts to a hospital room, where A Hao is having his leg bandaged.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Man, who was drenched in water, said: "Take that broom down" "I think this brother is not easy."
Driver said: "You guys are blessed in disguise."
Driver: "So, thank Brother Huang for me." "Thank you, I'm very ashamed."
Driver: "Roll it aside."
Bald Man: "The car you guys bought" "Was the previous owner called Wan Peng?" "You dare to buy his car" "Countless people are looking for him"
Driver said: "Hey, brother, what's going on? Can you clarify a bit?"
Bald Man said: "Go find out yourself."
Driver said: "Hey, bro" "You said, bro" "What are you doing, it hurts."
Man says: "Go and find that Wan Peng quickly."
Driver, grabbing his own hair in pain, said: "Ouch, this hurts."
The scene shifts to a small truck slowly stopping in front of the hospital. Xu Decai asks Driver: "The person you talked about, is he here?"
Driver said: "Wan, Wan Peng, no, not him, my daughter is here, I need to send the money to the hospital first."
Xu Decai: "Do you have a clue?" "How can this little money be enough?" "Go and find the box first" "Once you find the box, it will end all the problems."
Driver glanced at the box and then at Xu Decai, saying: "Brother, there is actually money in the box, right?"
Xu Decai said: "If there's no money in the box, you're not gonna look for it, right?"
Driver: "No, I just want to know whether you're looking for the box" "or helping your niece with treatments."
Xu Decai said: "Both."
Driver smiled and said: "Well, in that case," "why don't we make a written agreement or something?"
Driver quickly refused: "No, uh, well, no need, no need, no need." "Let's go, let's go."
Driver asked: "What are you going to do?"
Driver turned around and said: "Didn't you say that we needed to find the box?"
Driver said: "Go on, go on."
Driver got out of the car and shouted: "Bro, bro, bro." Then he walked up to Xu Decai and said: "When you see my wife and daughter later, can you please respect me a little?"
Xu Decai left, and Driver looked at the van, puzzled.
Driver, with Xu Decai and Doctor, walked out of the ward. Driver said: "Doctor, hello, I'm Wang Rui's dad, how is she doing now?"

Doctor: "Her condition is basically stable right now, and the child is also very strong. The hospital has thought of all possible ways. The most important thing right now is medicine for surgery, imported medicine. We have to rush and order it from abroad. This way we can reduce some risks. If you don't pay the day after tomorrow, it will be too late."
Doctor: "Got it, I understand."
Doctor, with a face full of confusion, looked at Xu Decai and said: "My memory, Xu Decai, we have had dinner together, I brought two of our female nurses from the department with me."
Xu Decai: "We never had dinner, you must be mistaken."
Doctor: "No way, how could I possibly misremember."
Xu Decai said: "I have a too common face, it must have confused you."
At this moment, a nurse called Doctor over and said: "Doctor, patient on bed 309 is getting fever again." Doctor put on his mask and walked away, and Xu Decai quickly pulled Driver to the side.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: The old lady who had just scolded Xia Luo was drying her clothes. She looked up and saw Xia Luo. Xia Luo quickly hid behind the door, but the old lady still saw him. She threw a basin of water at Xia Luo, scolding him loudly. Ma Dongmei was stunned, staring at the old lady.

The scene shifts to a residential compound, where the sun shines on the clotheslines outside the houses, and the laundry hanging in the air flutters in the breeze. Ma Dongmei is hanging clothes on the balcony, while Xia Luo is busy next to her.
Ma Dongmei was tidying up the house and said: "Come in" "Superstar" "You could've knocked or said something" "Let me tidy up this mess" "Our place is small, can't compare to your mansion"
Ma Dongmei replied: "There are no degrees in homes."
Ma Dongmei said: "Xia Luo" "Sit, sit down and talk."
Xia Luo walked a few steps forward and said: 'Ma Dongmei'
Ma Dongmei: "Huh?"
Xia Luo said: "Long time no see."

Ma Dongmei said: "I, I, I see you on TV all the time." "You, buddy," "You're so popular right now," "You're on every channel, you're on every channel," "It's gotten to the point it's totally annoying."
Ma Dongmei turned around and saw Xia Luo, smiled and said: 'This is the brick I used to film Sister Na, I always keep it, now whenever I see her sing, I want to hit her with it.'
Xia Luo said: "So, you've given up javelin?"
Ma Dongmei helplessly said: "I gave up a long time ago" "There was this one competition where I accidentally hit the referee with the javelin and was banned for life"
Xia Luo said unhappily: "Good that you've given up," "Constant practice would've given you thick arms."
Ma Dongmei replied: "Ah," "I'm working as a team doctor in sports school now," "and when I'm free, I give massages and cupping therapy to the athletes and all."
Xia Luo walked into the room and saw the chandelier, which made him think of Ma Dongmei. He turned his head and looked towards the door.

Ma Dongmei said: 'Right, you haven't eaten, right?' 'I'm boiling noodles in the pot, anise noodles, it's my unique skill.' 'You must have never tried it.' 'Let me serve you a bowl.' After saying that, Ma Dongmei happily went to cook.
Ma Dongmei said: "I've been wanting this for years,"

Xia Luo sat on the sofa, watching Ma Dongmei's figure with a smile. Ma Dongmei was barefoot on the coffee table, twisting her body. Xia Luo: 'Hurry up and eat the noodles, they're glopping up, finish them and then you can tune your old piano.'
Ma Dongmei sweeping the floor, said: 'I'm sick of eating anise noodles every day, even my sweat smells like anise.'
Ma Dongmei said: 'Well, do you see me being sick of it?' Ma Dongmei snatched the guitar Xia Luo was holding and threw it aside.

Ma Dongmei brought a bowl of soup to Xia Luo and said: "Here it comes" "Come on, hurry up" "Enjoy it while it's hot" "Xia Luo" "I always knew that you talk too much" "Just like when we were kids" "Whenever my mother cooked" "You'd certainly knock on the door" "Try it while it's hot" "I do not know if you'll like the taste"
He picked up the bowl that Ma Dongmei had just put down, the noodles still half-eaten. He picked up a chopstick of noodles and put it in his mouth.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: Lei Luo, with bandages on his head, looked at A Hao lying in the hospital bed and said: "I won't let it go just like that"
Lei Luo said: "You rest, I'm leaving". After saying this, he turned around and left.
A Hao, lying on the hospital bed, thought for a moment and shook his head.
Piggy was tied to a chair, with his legs shackled to a stool. His legs were lifted by someone nearby, causing Piggy to cry out in pain. Fat Boy Chao asked: "Piggy, when did you see me break his leg?"
Piggy said: "These few packages were found in the car, your car."
The boss said: "Are you playing me? I won't admit it even if you beat me to death."
Fat Boy Chao said: "I dare not kill you" "I still need to invite you for a Judicial milk tea."
Fat Boy Chao said: "Don't make such a joke, it could kill someone."
Piggy said: "That's what I want", then slapped Lei Luo hard, and Lei Luo was forced to drink the porridge.

Piggy stuffed the bowl of noodles into Fat Boy Chao's mouth and said: "Spend the night here tonight" "Until you fall down with a stomachache." Fat Boy Chao, with his mouth stuffed, could only grunt in pain.
Piggy said: "Still not talking? Then we'll leave first."
Fat Boy Chao was beaten to the point of kneeling on the ground, crying out: "I admit, I admit, I admit, I admit."
The camera switched to the hospital room, where Lei Luo suddenly sat up from the bed, then collapsed back onto it.
Lei Luo was lying on the floor in a pool of blood, motionless. The slippers next to the wheelchair were also soaked in blood, stained with a shocking amount of blood.
After a while, he staggered out of the ward, looked back at Qing Jie sitting by the window, then stumbled towards the nurse station, collapsing to the ground.

He crawled towards the door, but his legs wouldn't cooperate. He stood up shakily, leaning on the wheelchair, dragging his legs forward. At this moment, Qing Jie came out from the restroom, seeing Lei Luo like this, she couldn't help but stop and look at him for a while.

The scene shifts to the hospital, where A Hao is now a patient. He spread his arms wide, and Qing Jie pushed him. A group of people stood in front of him, with one of them holding a mountaintop in his hand.
A Hao and Lei Luo lit incense and placed it in the incense burner. A Hao said: "I've said, whatever I have, you have half of it."
After the two left, A Hao came to the grave of Yong Zhi and placed his walking stick. He pursed his lips, gazing at the tombstone.

At this moment, a plane flew over Lei Luo's head, and when he looked up, the plane had already passed. Lei Luo smiled faintly. At this time, a car stopped in front of the crowd, and two people got out of the car and walked towards the crowd.

A Hao said: "In 1965, Brother Luo really gave me half of the world" "He industrialized corruption in the police, the powder business, gambling business, and prostitution business" "Unified money collection, unified money distribution, no need for quarrels" "Those were the smooth years for both the underworld and legitimate businesses" "We made a lot of money, bought lots of property" "Some people say that Brother Luo has five billion in assets"

movie101_7021874945990853151_120_300.text: Li Zihao's body gradually sinks to the bottom of the river, his hands slowly falling, his face showing a painful expression, then he closes his eyes tightly.
He was bare-chested, with water pouring down from his wet hair into his eyes. He looked up at the sky, then down at the ground, feeling the rain as if he were reborn.

Li Zihao: "Torture" "It momentarily helps me forget the pain" "Forget those unforgettable memories" "The Bund of Shanghai only brings me pain" "The organization" "Hope" "Where is it" "Oh God, please help me" "I want to escape" "I want to end all this"

The three men in black walked into the courtyard in the pouring rain. Seeing Li Zihao hanging naked, they slowly approached. Li Zihao, with wet hair and water dripping from his body, looked down at them. Without any hesitation, he jumped into the water below.

Li Zihao was dragged back to the ground by two policemen, his hands and feet bound. He struggled desperately, but the policemen held on tightly, ignoring Li Zihao's screams for help. The policeman holding the flashlight even kicked Li Zihao's feet.
Li Zihao's powerful kick sent the men in black flying, crashing through the training ground's wire mesh.

Li Zihao bent down to dodge, but was hit by a club to the side, the iron chain on his body instantly became a weapon, and he struck back fiercely. The police were caught off guard and fell to the ground.

Li Zihao grabbed the police officer's arm and pulled it down, then raised the spiked club and struck it hard against the officer's head. The other officers, seeing this, rushed forward with their guns drawn. Li Zihao turned to face them, his expression fierce as he charged forward.
Li Zihao swung the iron chain, hitting the guard's head. The guard fell to the ground, and Li Zihao, with a mighty pull, broke the iron chain.

Li Zihao leaped up, kicking open the iron gate, sending the policemen behind him tumbling. Bare-chested in the rain, he fought back against the remaining policemen. Li Zihao grabbed the iron bars of the gate and hoisted himself up, breaking the gate open.

Li Zihao, with arms bound, could only retreat passively as the man in black approached. Li Zihao was pushed to the edge of the platform, his back against the wire mesh. He then lunged forward, grabbing the iron chain hanging from the ceiling and pulling hard.

Li Zihao was lifted out of the water by the iron chain, his body suspended in mid-air, his legs kicking the water surface, creating waves in the pool. The rain was pouring down on him, and the cold rainwater stung his face.
The seagull soars over the sea, with ships coming and going on the water. On the bustling bund, cars are speeding along, and people are hurrying to their destinations.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Teacher Wang turned around and said: "The teacher speaks without thinking."
Xia Luo picked up the wine bottle and said: "No problem, no problem." He drank the whole bottle of wine in one go.
The bride and groom said in unison: "Classmates."
Everyone stood up and said: "Congratulations, congratulations, congratulations!"
A man said: "We're all classmates, how about we send a representative to say a few words, Xia Luo?"
At this moment, Ma Dongmei walked in. Qiu Ya turned her head and saw Ma Dongmei, her face instantly beaming with a happy smile.

Xia Luo said: "Qiu Ya," "When we were in school," "I wrote you a poem; but before I could read it to you, I ate it." "But that's okay," "I wrote you a song," "At this moment," "I'll sing it for you," "I want to mark our relationship with a perfect question mark."
Xia Luo knelt on one knee and said: "Once is enough, I want to watch the end of the world with you."
Ma Dongmei shouted: "Xia Luo!"
Ma Dongmei walked into the wedding scene. Xia Luo looked up and said: "Ma Dongmei, why did she come dressed like this?"
Ma Dongmei replied: "Yeah."
Ma Dongmei said: "Xia Luo, didn't you tell me that you were going to sweep your mother's grave?"
Xia Luo closed his eyes and said: "What's wrong?"
Qiu Ya said: "Ma Dongmei, why are you here so late?" Ma Dongmei turned around, and Qiu Ya continued: "Xia Luo is drunk."
Ma Dongmei said: "Qiu Ya, I didn't even know you were getting married. I just came dressed like this, sorry about that." "Oh my, congratulations, congratulations, sir."
Qiu Ya: "This is my husband."
Ma Dongmei said: "Oh dear, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, sir." "Oh my, all the classmates are here, it's been so many years." "Oh, Teacher Wang, you’re here too, you're still alive!"
The bridegroom said: "Dongmei is here, have a seat quickly."

Ma Dongmei turned around and said: "No, I'm not sitting down, I still need to go with Xia Luo to her mother's grave." "You know, all these good events happened on the same day." "Xia Luo, let's go, let's go home."
Ma Dongmei said: "You go home first, I haven't finished my drink." Xia Luo said: "Your stomach is not good." "Stop drinking, let's go home and drink." "We have wine at home, let's go."
Xia Luo pushed Qiu Ya away and said: "I don't want to drink Royal Salute."
Ma Dongmei said: "You see, you've had a little to drink, isn't it just making the classmates laugh at you?"
Xia Luo shouted: "Who dares to laugh at me, Xia Luo?"
A man said: "No one's laughing at you, isn't that right?" "No one's laughing at Xia Luo at all, is that right?" "Go, go, go, go home, go home, go home, go home."
Xia Luo furiously said: "The last thing I fucking want to hear is you talking. Don't think I don't know, Qiu Ya’s first kiss was fucking taken by you."
Ma Dongmei said: "Let's go home." Then she turned and left.
Ma Dongmei turned around and said: "Xia Luo, am I treating you too kindly?"
Ma Dongmei: "Honey, let's not bother with them men."
Ma Dongmei said: "Get out of my way." "Qiu Ya is having a wedding here," "and you're singing and dancing around," "dressed like a feather duster." "What are you showing off for?"
Xia Luo said: "I earned the money myself." "I can wear what I want."

Ma Dongmei said: "You earned that money yourself? Do you feel proud, Xia Luo? From graduation to now, have you earned a single penny? For so many years, you've been lying at home all day, your limbs are practically atrophying from disuse."

movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.text: Tang Qianqian said, 'Look how much it resembles you'
Fang Jie pretended to be reluctant and said, "Alright, I'll reluctantly accept it, thank you."
Tang Qianqian asked, "By the way, how's my dad?"
Tang Qianqian replied: "He's doing well. He misses you a lot, just like I do."
Tang Qianqian: "Then why didn't he come to pick me up?"

Fang Jie replied: "He's at a meeting in the Administrative Council today, so he specifically sent me to pick you up. He should be waiting for you at home now. The situation in Shanghai is too chaotic these days, every day, the Suzhou River surfaces with so many bodies. Those people's faces are all decayed."

Fang Jie and Tang Qianqian were knocked down by the crate, but the box car was still moving forward. The crate was about to crash into the shop's display window, and the feathers inside scattered in all directions. The children and Li Zihao in the cargo area were unharmed. The crate was finally stopped in front of the shop's display window.

The Japanese soldiers on the second floor opened heavy fire towards the front line of the military police defense line, the military police were struggling to withstand the intense firepower, and the car that was originally carrying Tang Qianqian was also destroyed by the Japanese.
Fang Jie fired back at the pursuers, then carried Tang Qianqian and hid in a small car. Fang Jie fired at the enemies while protecting Tang Qianqian, and then drove away.

Fang Jie and Li Zihao were both knocked off the carriage by the impact, crashing onto the ground. The two people behind the carriage took the opportunity to grab the reins and dash away. Li Zihao, unable to regain his footing, tumbled off the carriage.

Li Zihao was also knocked off by the blast, tumbling down the alley. The rope on Tang Qianqian's hand was also pulled off, and she could only cover her head and scream as she fell. The carriage was overturned on the road, and the feathers from the broken sacks scattered all over the sky.

Fang Jie and Li Zihao were in a fierce chase, with Fang Jie shooting while running. Li Zihao, who had just jumped onto the carriage, was knocked down by a shot from Fang Jie. Li Zihao was seen hanging onto the back of the carriage, screaming in terror.

Fang Jie fired a shot at Li Zihao, then quickly got on a bicycle and rode away. The Japanese soldiers followed closely, but the streets were already in chaos, with civilians scattering in all directions and carriages overturned by the roadside.

The rickshaw driver was knocked out by the blast wave, and the rickshaw, out of control, crashed into Tang Qianqian. The shockwave from the explosion shattered the shop windows on both sides of the street, and countless rickshaws were overturned in the middle of the road.
Li Zihao, who was lying on the ground, quickly grabbed the fallen tram and the ropes on the ground, struggling to stand up. Fang Jie was also trying to pick up the fallen tram.

The sedan chair was speeding up, with Tang Qianqian sitting inside, holding her breath. Fang Jie was closely following in the car. The bustling streets were crowded with pedestrians, and the speeding car and horse-drawn carriage attracted onlookers. Li Zihao sat in the chair, calmly observing the surrounding chaos.

Tang Qianqian, who was sitting in the car, was thrown out due to the sudden stopping, and Li Zihao, who was holding onto the car door, was also thrown out. Fang Jie saw this and quickly got off the car to help them. The two were lying on the ground, and Fang Jie shouted, 'Run, run!'

Li Zihao, who was driving, didn't have time to brake and crashed through the obstacle, sending Tang Qianqian and the cargo onto a moving truck. The truck was moving so fast that Tang Qianqian was knocked off and landed on the ground. Fang Jie and Li Zihao quickly got out of the car to check on her.

Li Zihao was about to throw Tang Qianqian into the car, but the car started moving. The two of them fell onto the truck, and Li Zihao, unable to hold on, fell to the ground. Fang Jie, seeing this, raised his gun and shot Li Zihao in the leg.

Tang Qianqian was startled by the explosion, and the cigarette in his mouth ignited instantly. He hurriedly grabbed Li Zihao's collar, but his hands were pinned by the collar. The speeding car behind them was about to catch up. In a critical moment, Li Zihao pulled out a pistol and fired at the car behind them. The vehicle swerved to one side, and Fang Jie, who was riding a bicycle, was knocked to the ground. Li Zihao, who was driving the carriage, was also hit by a bullet and fell down.

Fang Jie was determined to catch up with Li Zihao, pedaling hard, and the gap between the two was getting smaller. Fang Jie rode into a narrow alley, and the thief also followed into an even narrower alley. The two bicycles were hanging in mid-air, upside down.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Wife turned around and saw the visitor, her face instantly turned ugly, she waved at Wang Xiaobing, Wang Xiaobing understood and said: "You've come?"
Wife said in confusion: "Huh?"
Wang Xiaobing took out the money from his pocket and said to Wife: "This, this is the money a big brother gave, take it for now." Wife took the money and put it in his pocket.
Xu Decai said to Wang Xiaobing: "You should go in later, they are just getting an IV."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Yes."
Wife said: "The kid was in so much pain last night that he couldn't sleep."
Wife was about to leave but turned back to look at Wang Xiaobing. Wang Xiaobing continued, "You’ve been working hard these past few days."

Wife said worriedly: "I'm fine. I wish I could take this pain for Daughter." Then turned to Xu Decai and Wang Xiaobing and said: "What should we do? We still need so much more money. That director came again yesterday. They said if we can’t raise enough, the surgery could be at risk."

Wang Xiaobing comforted his wife, saying: "It's okay, my dear, it's okay, I'm here. I will find a way for sure. No problem at all." Then he introduced Xu Decai beside him to Wang Xiaobing's wife, saying: 'Ah, this is Xu Decai brother I often talk about with you.'
Wang Xiaobing said: "Big brother."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Alright, alright, alright."
The nurse stood up and said: "Thank you."
Wife placed the lunchbox on the table beside the bed, Wang Xiaobing moved to the bedside, and Daughter smiled and said: "Dad, you’re here."
Wang Xiaobing said with a smile: "Daddy missed you." "Does it hurt?"

Daughter said: "It doesn’t hurt, daddy. I want to go home. I still have to go to school." Wang Xiaobing looked at his daughter and smiled, then glanced at Wife. Wife nodded at him, and Wang Xiaobing nodded in return.

Wang Xiaobing said: "Don't worry, daddy will get you home soon. Once we’re home, you can go back to school, we won’t miss any lessons. Look, daddy even brought your backpack for you. Look, English, Maths."
Wife said: "Now we can catch up on everything you’ve missed."
Wang Xiaobing said to Xu Decai: "Quickly find the box" "It will solve everything."
Wife said: "You can go if you have things to take care of." Wang Xiaobing looked at his mother, then lowered his head to look at his daughter.
Wang Xiaobing smiled and said: "My girl, don’t worry, you’ll be out of the hospital soon. You'll be home before you know it. Be strong, you’re dad’s bravest girl."
Daughter smiled and said: "Goodbye, Daddy." Wang Xiaobing happily left the ward, but Xu Decai had been waiting outside. He pulled Wang Xiaobing away from the doorway, and the two walked off together.
The boy, wearing headphones, took a bite of an apple.
The man in the white T-shirt kept calling out, "Yo, Yashi, Yashi."

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: A Qi said: "More than Li Ka-shing." After saying that, A Qi walked to the table, picked up the money, and put it in his bag. The scene then shifted to Sir Chow, who was still counting money, with paper money flying around him.

A Qi sat in the car, his hands were also shackled. He stared straight ahead, then lowered his head to look at the handcuffs. At this moment, the church bells rang, and the guests applauded. A Hao and Qing Jie walked arm in arm down the aisle, smiling happily. Sir Chow was also smiling happily. A Qi was handcuffed to the side of the road.
Lei Luo said: "This world is divided into black and white." "I am the biggest in white, you are the biggest in black." "Brother, let me say it again to you."

Lei Luo said: "All you see now in Hong Kong is governed by the British." "Even I can be killed by you." "But you can't kill British police." "If you can endure," "this world belongs to us two brothers."

Boss said: "Guys, we don't have a royal family in Texas." "The race club has specifically organized a Queen's Cup." "If we are confident," "I have the chance to shake her hand." "We must win this race."
Yan Tong said with a smile: "When the time comes, Boss will be the most majestic",
Yan Tong said: "Large and small chicken."
Yan Tong waved to the crowd, then led the group to the gambling table. Boss was holding a cane, and Yan Tong walked up to him.
Yan Tong said: "A Hao, dressed so handsomely," "are you coming to pull the lead horse?"
A Hao laughed and said: "No, I have a friend who has a horse, and it's going to run a race today, just to learn." "What was the horse called again?" "Dragon Pond rat, how is it?"
Yan Tong said: "The horse is as lame as you. Can it outrun the rat? This race, it's my Boss's 'Thunder' that has to win. Definitely win."
A Qi said: "Very well, thank you, thank you," "Hey, we need to supplement the bet, go quickly."

The scene shifts to a horse race, where Boss is narrating the action: "The last horse to enter the pen is number four, all horses are in position." "Today, let's wait and see who will emerge victorious." "Get ready, after the gates open, the first to rush out is 'Thunder'." "Ah, this horse is really great, it's a favorite and is already leading after a few steps." "Look, the second one is the 'Supreme Divine Steed'." "And there's 'Major Success', closely followed by 'Get rich soon'." "The one which is last but one is 'Must be red'." "Oh no, 'Dragon Pond rat' falls to the last place." "They're entering the straight road now, 'Thunder' seems to be winning, it’s been leading all the way and has pulled ahead by several lengths." "Oh no, trouble! 'Dragon Pond rat' has suddenly moved to the outer line and has surged forward, as if it was motor-powered, leaving all the other horses behind." "'Dragon Pond rat' is a big upset this time." "That's it, now crossing the line, 'Dragon Pond rat' is in first place and 'Thunder' is second."
Boss and Hunter were discussing work. Boss said: "My goodness, what the hell are you doing?" "How do you guys work?" "Both of you."
Hunter said: "Listen, listen, something has happened."
The scene shifts to the day of the horse race, where the crowd is bustling. Boss, accompanied by two beautiful women, walks out of the racecourse.

The scene shifts to the Hong Kong Horse Racecourse. Boss and Yan Tong are standing on the second floor, looking at the jockey in the starting gate below. The jockey is Liu Dong, and the race is about to begin.
Hunter said: "Do you know how much I earn in a month?" "I lost everything." "What do you want me to do?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_1560_1740.text: Li Zihao was driving the carriage, with Tang Qianqian and Fang Jie lying flat in the back. The carriage was about to collide with a car, but Li Zihao skillfully steered the steering wheel, avoiding the car at the last moment. The driver was still fearless, continuing to chase despite being exposed on the carriage.

Li Zihao, who had been shoved aside, grabbed the thug's shoulder and threw him into the tram. The thug, unwilling to give up, got up and swung his knife at Li Zihao. Li Zihao, with his superior martial arts skills, easily dodged the attack and countered with a punch that sent the thug flying.
Fang Jie, who had been observing from afar, saw the right moment and rode a bicycle at high speed, crashing through the blockade set by the rickshaw pullers. Li Zihao followed closely behind.

Li Zihao, who was about to open the car door, was pulled away by Tang Qianqian. He had to hold onto the front of the rickshaw with one hand and pull Tang Qianqian with the other.
