movie101_7021874945990853151_2640_2820.text: Owen said: "Even a salted fish has its moments of turning over"
Tang Hexuan pinched his nose and signaled to stop. Ye Qishan said: "Wait until the salted fish turns over" "that's when the soup will be cooked"

Fat Man in Disguise said: "Hey, hey, hey, hey" "You" "What are you guys doing" "We are all here to have fun" "Peace brings wealth, peace brings wealth". The fat man in disguise was very happy, patting his thigh.
Ma Shan said: "Don't forget that the French inspection team hasn't left yet" "Consul Owen's vote" "He wouldn't possibly give that to Boss Ye" "If he couldn't even keep his official rank intact"
Owen said: "We have discovered this assassination plot" "including the one against you" "it does have connections with an underground society."
Ma Shan thought for a moment and said: "The Blue Society."
Owen replied: "Yes, The Blue Society." After saying that, Owen stood up and bowed to Tang Hexuan.

Owen continued: "Don't forget, after the Japanese envoy was assassinated, you helped the Japanese purge the progressive students, your actions were ruthless, many members of the Blue Society were involved. If I were you, I would be very, very, very careful."
Lan Ruoyun picked up the glass, took a sip, and then put it down.
Li Zihao looked around the room, which was lavishly decorated but in disarray. Clothes were hanging askew, and the flowers on the table were wilted.
Lan Ruoyun was furious, and Li Zihao was at a loss for words.
Lan Ruoyun stood up and walked towards the door, her face expressionless. She reached the door and said: "I'll be right back."
Lan Ruoyun turned her head in surprise, looking at Li Zihao. Li Zihao said: "Ruoyun, you..." He wanted to say more, but found it difficult to speak with his heart full of anger.
Lan Ruoyun said: "What's wrong, are you scared that I haven't died yet"
Li Zihao said: "You sang very well, really well"
Lan Ruoyun laughed and said: "It's old choir skills", Li Zihao lowered his head, not daring to look at her.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: Lan Ruoyun looked at Li Zihao and said: 'Care for a drink? This liquor is really fine. More expensive than you could ever imagine.'
Lan Ruoyun picked up the glass, took a sip, then looked at Li Zihao with a challenging expression and said: 'Let's drink together.'
Lan Ruoyun said: 'Why, don't you want to drink with me?' 'We haven't been together for so long, surely we have much to discuss.' 'I'd like to hear it too.' 'So, let's have a drink together.'

Li Zihao said: 'I came today to return this to you.' Li Zihao took out a pocket watch from his pocket, inside of which was a photo of a couple. Lan Ruoyun's expression froze upon seeing the photo, and Li Zihao turned and left without saying anything.

Li Zihao said, 'I'm sorry, for the time I was in prison, I damaged it,' he took out the watch and showed it to Lan Ruoyun, 'I shouldn't have let you join the organization, nor should I have let you take part in that operation.'
Lan Ruoyun smiled at Li Zihao, then turned her head, picked up the wine glass on the table, and took a sip. Li Zihao frowned, watching her.

Lan Ruoyun said: 'You say shouldn't have,' 'shouldn't have let me join,' 'regardless of success or failure of this mission,' 'we were supposed to be together,' 'that's what you said, right?' 'We were going to get married in Beiping,' 'that's what you said, too, right?'
Lan Ruoyun said: 'Now all that's left is 'I'm sorry,' I'm sorry, I'm sorry.'
Li Zihao tried to calm Lan Ruoyun down, but Lan Ruoyun kept apologizing.
Lan Ruoyun cried and said: 'It's all my fault,' 'I'm sorry.'
Lan Ruoyun held Li Zihao tightly, as if afraid he would disappear the next moment.
Lan Ruoyun held Li Zihao's face and said: 'Ever since we met' 'You entered my life' 'And become my everything'
Lan Ruoyun said: "But what am I supposed to do after you leave me?" "What should I do?" Li Zihao's expression darkened, and he lowered his head, unable to bear looking at Lan Ruoyun.

Lan Ruoyun said: '"Now what do you want me to do?" "I always thought you were dead" "My heart died too" "But now you've come back" "How am I supposed to face you" "How do I face all this" "What on earth am I supposed to do?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.text: The scene shifts to the next day, the weather is clear, the birds are chirping, flowers are blooming, and the trees are lush. The snow has long stopped, and the world is a new one. Ma Dongmei came to the hospital to find Da Chun. Ma Dongmei: "Doctor."
Nurse looked at Da Chun and asked, "Why are you here again?"
Nurse shook her head and said, "No, I don't have the authority."
Ma Dongmei said: "Hey, Doctor," "could you please tell me how he is doing now?"

Nurse said, "The patient is not cooperating with the treatment. The situation is not very optimistic. It might be a matter of just a couple of days." Ma Dongmei looked at the seriously ill patient in the hospital bed, feeling a deep sense of helplessness.
Ma Dongmei forcefully opened the window and climbed in, shouting towards the room: "Xia Luo, Xia Luo, I came to see you with Da Chun."
Ma Dongmei said: "Da Chun, now it's just me here to see you." Ma Dongmei walked to the bedside and held Da Chun's hand, comforting him.

Ma Dongmei said: "Xia Luo, you know, relationships between people are quite funny. When we were kids, I liked sticking to you, playing house with you. I was the dad, and you were the mom. Later, you got together with Qiu Ya. That's when I realized I had fallen for you. And later, you became a big star, and I didn't dare to like you anymore. Over the years, you wrote so many songs."

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: Ma Dongmei, with a sobbing voice, says: "My limbs are about to degenerate," "I go out during the day to do cupping therapy for others," "I ride a tricycle at night," "I just thought I would save some money," "If I change to a motorcycle, I could save some energy," "But you're great," "You took apart everything," "You even disassembled my engine," "Xia Luo, ah," "When we got married, There were no ceremonies," "Just on the day we got the certificate," "You accompanied me to eat a meal of lamb spine," "Now what are you trying to show here," "Do you think what I am saying is too exaggerated," "come on,"
Ma Dongmei, seeing Xia Luo about to vomit, quickly held him back, saying: "Hold it in, hold it in for me"
Xia Luo was being pulled apart by two women, one of them said: "Why? Because I have to return it after wearing it."
Xia Luo, lying on the ground, said: "At this moment," "the last bit of dignity I had as a man is gone."
Xia Luo, running upstairs, said: "I no longer have to bother about what others think of me" "I must thank my wife" "She made me a textbook fool"
He then walked to the sink, turned on the faucet, and without even removing his dry clothes, he plunged his head directly into the running water. The icy cold of the water woke him up.
Xia Luo thought to himself: "Perhaps, it's fate that my life," "will always be a joke. I have never accomplished anything," "and the more saddening fact is, I have no idea what I want."

Xia Luo cursed: "Worthless", "Damn", "Worthless", "Worthless", he then vomited on the screen, leaned against the wall, and finally passed out on the toilet. In his sleep, he rolled to the side, and his head fell into the sink. He slept soundly with his mouth wide open, drooling and snoring loudly, and the sink was full of water.

He lifted his head from the toilet, his hair soaked with water, and his clothes were also wet. He touched his hair and stood up, the mirror behind him was already cracked. He looked at himself in the mirror, took a deep breath, and said, "Divorce."
Xia Luo opened the door, but the intense sunlight made him quickly raise his arms.

In his daze, he suddenly saw his entire life flash before his eyes. He stared at the boiling water in shock, his eyes wide open. He tried to recall his life, but the more he tried, the more confused he became. He remembered being in a classroom, surrounded by classmates.
Teacher Wang, with his back to the students, asked: "You stop right there" "Where is your mother"
Teacher Wang said: "Didn't I ask you to bring your mother here"
Teacher Wang pointed at him with the chalk and asked: "What did you just say"
Xia Luo looked at Teacher Wang and asked, "What on earth is going on"
Xia Luo, with a dazed expression, recalled the scene of teaching the Bible to the children.

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Driver, dressed in only underwear, walked over and said to Xu Decai: "Bro, you got a nice phone there, swiping back and forth like that."
Driver said: "Weibo, looking for the box."

Driver, in a bikini, wiped his head with a towel and said: 'Hey bro, where are you hitting? This is still useful, can you afford to pay for it if you damage it?' Then, as if in defiance, he started wiggling his butt in front of Decai, saying, 'Disgusting? Disgusting? Disgusting?'
Driver urged: "Go, go, go, go, get some sleep."
Driver said: "There are still quite a few problems."
Xu Decai, massaging his temples, said: "Two more days." "If we really can't find it," "I'm completely screwed."
Driver said: "Ah, bro, don't worry. We will find it. We must find it."
Xu Decai said: "You better not have done something seriously wrong without telling me."
Driver got up and said: 'Bro, what are you saying? I may lack money, but I don't lack morals.'
Driver, with a shy face, said: "You", then sat on the other side of the bed, deliberately leaving some distance.
Xu Decai said: 'Everything needs a reason, some basis. Why don’t people hit me? I’m a good person, but people chase you down and beat you like crazy. You must be pretending.'
Driver, sitting up, said: "What are you doing, are you going to sleep or not?"
Driver said: "Sleep, sleep."
Driver said: 'You're being inappropriate, don't you know?' After saying that, Driver lay down on the bed, turned over, and put his phone on his face.
After hanging up the phone, Xu Decai lay back on the bed with a satisfied smile.
Driver, lying on the bed, let out a long sigh. The scene shifted to him lying on his side on the bed, his legs constantly moving.
Driver said: "What's wrong?"
The woman said: "It's eight in the morning. Make sure you're fully awake first."
Driver asked: 'Who are you?'
Driver turned over and said: "Who I am doesn’t matter. Are you the one who posted on Weibo about looking for a box?"
Xu Decai asked: "Where is it?"
Xu Decai stood up and said: "Desheng Road, Room 1088, Desheng Building."
The person on the other end asked: "Who are you, may I ask your last name?"
The person on the other end of the phone said: "Once you're there, look for Mr. Bao."
Driver kicked Xu Decai and said: "Get up, get up, get up."
Driver, who was woken up, sat up abruptly and shouted: "What are you doing?"
Driver said: "Hurry up"

The elevator doors slowly opened, and the man in the suit walked out first, followed by the man in the shirt, leaving only the elevator and the woman in the long dress. The woman in the long dress looked at the man in the suit's departing figure, then turned her head to look at the man in the shirt.
Driver said: "Bro, this sounds so suspicious."
Xu Decai said: "You wouldn't understand with your IQ, huh."
Driver said: 'Here, bro, Donkey Search Co., Ltd.'
Driver pointed ahead and said: "Mule Donkey."
Driver, opening the door while speaking, said: "It's been unpacked, bro," "Why this name though?"
Xu Decai said: 'To make it easier for the fools to remember.'
Xu Decai said: "Bro, why are you cursing?"
Beautiful Receptionist said: 'Welcome! How can I help you two today?'
Xu Decai said: "We're here to see President Bao."
Beautiful Receptionist asked: "Are you here for President Bao?"
Beautiful Receptionist said: "Yes, we're here to find the box."

movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.text: Lan Ruoyun couldn't wait to kiss Li Zihao, but the sudden announcement made her stop. A staff member reminded her: "Miss Lan Ruoyun, the next performance is about to start. Mr. Tang Hexuan is waiting for you."
Fu Sheng walked up to Tang Hexuan and whispered something in his ear. The girls on stage had already noticed Li Zihao's anomaly. Lan Ruoyun pushed Li Zihao away and said: "I have to go."
Lan Ruoyun called out to him: "Li Zihao." Li Zihao turned around, and Lan Ruoyun couldn't help but kiss him.
Fu Sheng arrived at the lobby, where a dancer with a large feather fan was dancing. He looked around and then pushed open the door to the dressing room.
Fu Sheng said: "Miss Lan Ruoyun, it's your turn to go on stage." "Mr. Tang Hexuan is waiting for you."
Fu Sheng waved his hand, and the waiters nearby immediately stood up straight and moved to the center of the stage. Li Zihao looked at Lan Ruoyun on stage, who was passionately singing.
Fu Sheng stood up and said: "I'll go check on her." Fu Sheng stood up and walked towards the stage, saying: "I'll go check on her."
Li Zihao listened to the song, lost in thought.
The next day, the sky cleared, and the sun shone brightly. In the quiet streets of Pucheng, a boat slowly sailed by.

The scene shifts to the interior of Mr. Luo's house. Fu Sheng, with a face full of sweat, stands in the middle of the room, suddenly slapping Mr. Luo hard. Fu Sheng asked, 'Mr. Luo, why did you make her do this?'
Li Zihao, who was kicked to the ground, struggled to get up and looked at Mr. Luo, saying: "I knew you two would meet."
Li Zihao walked in front, while Mr. Luo followed behind, putting away his cane and saying, "Isn't this dangerous?"

Mr. Luo continued: "After that incident, her condition has been poor. Don't worry. Her only task now is to obediently stay by Tang Hexuan's side. However, it seems she's genuinely fallen for the old man."
Li Zihao nodded and said: "Yes, and you still keep her basic info on file."
Tang Hexuan said: "There's no choice. Given her current state, I'm afraid she might do something harmful to you."
Li Zihao walked up to Fu Sheng and said: "You mean harmful to the organization."
Mr. Luo said: "Without the organization, you think you could live such a free life, do you?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: A Hao angrily said: "Spread the word, if anyone dares to sell cocaine to my younger brother again, they will lose their hands and feet. Also, if I find out you're the one supplying him, we can no longer consider ourselves brothers."
Da Wei and Xiao Wei hurriedly said: "Understood, understood." Then they followed the two out of the room.
Qiong Jie walked over to A Hao and comforted him: "Calm down, calm down."
Piggy ran over and said, "Lei Luo, bad news."
Piggy asked, "What happened?"
Piggy said, "We've got trouble." "General Songchai from Golden Triangle just died from a stroke." "The one taking over is named Naimi."
A Hao walked out with a cane, shouting: "Piggy"
A Hao said: "Hao Ge, Brother Luo has been waiting for you for a long time."

A Hao walked over to Piggy and said, "Now Naimi is controlling all of Asia's heroin supply." "Luo Ge wants to negotiate with him as soon as possible." "In less than three weeks, all of Hong Kong will run out."
A Hao said to Lei Luo: "I want you to take a trip to Thailand," he gestured to one side. "Rose will go with you."
Lei Luo said: "I have someone who can get a message to General Naimi."
A Hao lowered his head and said: "You trust me that much, Luo Ge?"
Lei Luo: "Do I have a better choice, trust Fei Zai Chao?" "The split of the territories was the Brit's idea." "They're afraid you'll become too powerful." "They can't control you."
A Hao took out a pack of cigarettes from his pocket, pulled one out, and put it in his mouth. Lei Luo looked at him, then took a cigarette from the pack and placed it in his mouth.
A Hao lit Lei Luo's cigarette, and Lei Luo returned the favor by lighting A Hao's. They smoked together with satisfaction.
Lei Luo said: "Once the negotiation is done, I'll dominate the business." "You're not afraid?"
Lei Luo chuckled and said: "I am afraid, but what I fear more is that Ah Chao and Ah Rong will get there first."
Lei Luo took off his sunglasses and looked at A Hao seriously.

The scene shifts to a small boat in a small river in Thailand. A man in a suit and a woman in a small boat greeted A Hao's group. The small boat passed through the small river, and the small river was bustling with small boats coming and going, small traders selling things on the small boats, and the small river was lined with small two-story wooden houses.
Chai Jia said: "Such a small matter, it's a shame you had to make the trip yourself." "Come in and have a seat, come in and have a seat, please."
A Hao asked: "What are you looking at?"
A Hao: "Understood."
Chai Jia said: "Wow, the Thai guys are doing quite well."
A Hao said: "Take a seat, brothers." A Hao and his group sat down, and Chai Jia took out a cigar and lit it for himself.

A Hao said: "Hao Ge, things have been a mess in the Golden Triangle since General Songchai died. That General Naimi is a difficult man to deal with, he's driven away all the fixers, I can't get near him now, give me some time. Both Ah Rong and Ah Chao came to visit me early in the morning. I told them to go die."

movie101_6965768652251628068_780_960.text: Teacher Wang: "Xia Luo, you've got amnesia?", "Got amnesia", "Xia Luo, what's that?", "What's your last name?"
The next day, in the classroom, the students were having a great time. Teacher Wang and Yuan Hua were laughing together.
Teacher Wang said: "Xia Luo, let me tell you" "Don't pretend here, do you hear me" "Nobody’s got the time to waste on you here, you know that" "Go on, hurry up and find your mom" "Get out of here."
Xia Luo walked slowly towards the desk, his eyes fixed on the stickers, and leaned down to touch them.

The classmates around were all silent, only one girl in the back corner giggling. Xia Luo glared at her and slowly walked back to his seat, sitting down with a thud. He turned his back to her and said: "This dream feels so real."
Xia Luo was about to speak when Teacher Wang suddenly shouted: "Xia Luo" "Did I tell you to go back to your seat?" "How do you manage to disregard the teacher's words as if they’re nothing?"
Teacher Wang kicked him: "No laughing allowed", "Are you even listening when I talk to you?", "What are you wearing, looking all slovenly?", "Where is your school uniform?"
Xia Luo looked at Teacher Wang and said: "Who wears a school uniform to a wedding?"
Teacher Wang said: "Whose wedding are you attending" "Your mom is getting married again, right" "No laughing allowed"

Teacher Wang: "Who are you glaring at", "Who do you think you are, a donkey?", "It's okay if your mom doesn't come", "Handle your own issues", "Read out this love letter of yours", "Loudly, with feeling", "My dear who", "Who's your dear?"
Yuan Hua, who was being teased, was so angry that he punched Xia Luo. Ma Dongmei, who was nearby, was so scared that she ran out of the classroom, and the students around were laughing.

Teacher Wang pointed at Xia Luo and said: "Look at what you've done" "Invisibly, you've hurt how many" "Read it out" "Let the classmates listen" "How our class’s second biggest fool is ridiculously foolish"
Teacher Wang said: "You have the nerve to laugh," "Ranking first, are you proud?"
Teacher Wang stood up angrily and said: "I told you to read, did you hear me?"

Xia Luo, with a look of disdain, tilted his head back, and Teacher Wang, infuriated, slammed the textbook shut, only to be surrounded by a crowd of students who were ready to beat him up, shouting: "Hey, Nian, you dare to hit a teacher, you scoundrel."
Xia Luo said: "In my dreams, I could even let you bully me"
Teacher Wang angrily said: "Let me tell you" "You're done for" "You have no future left"

Xia Luo pointed at Teacher Wang and said: "Let go of me", "Talking about future with me?", "You rank us every day", "'Biggest fool', 'Second biggest fool'", "So we have a future?", "Let me tell you", "Even if we turn out to be good-for-nothings", "It’s because you've pushed us to it"
Yuan Hua shouted: "Ah"
Teacher Wang angrily said: "Big dummy Da Chun, what are you planning to do?"
Yuan Hua: "I don’t even know what I want to do"
Teacher Wang: "Xia Luo" "How could you hit a teacher?"
Teacher Wang angrily said: "Who just hit me?" He started looking for the person who hit him, but his searching was to no avail.

The fight broke out in the classroom, and the students were fighting each other in the classroom. Yuan Hua opened the door and went out, and the students stopped fighting upon seeing this. A student said: "Stop fighting, Yuan Hua has gone to tell the principal," the students quickly hid in their seats.

movie101_7021874945990853151_300_480.text: The scene shifts to a bustling street, where a black car is driving slowly. The car is filled with people dressed in suits and formal attire, sitting inside the car are the Japanese dignitaries who have come to visit the Chairman. The car slowly stops in front of the embassy.
On the bustling streets, cars came and went, and pedestrians walked by. The rain had just stopped, and the ground was still wet.

The car sped crazily, crashing into the grocery store's signboard, then directly ramming into the building. The people on the second floor opened their windows and fired down at the car, but the masked men had already taken out the weapons on the second floor, killing the two men on the car.

The man in the suit, unwilling to give up, grabbed a subordinate and leapt out of the window, crashing through the glass and sending debris flying everywhere. The people on the street looked up curiously. The man in the suit, holding onto the ladder on the roof, kept firing at the people on the ground, while the man with the submachine gun kept a lookout from his position.

The assassin, seeing this, immediately jumped up and fired a shot at Fang Jie. Fang Jie dodged the shot by leaning back, and the bullet shattered the glass of the second-floor window. The assassin, who was mid-air, failed to dodge in time and was hit by the glass shards. Fang Jie then turned and fired at the remaining two enemies on the street.

The scene shifts to the outside of the psychiatric hospital, where two sentries stand guard on either side of the main gate. The iron gate opens, and a car slowly drives in. The man in the passenger seat, wearing a suit, looks around as the car comes to a stop.

The truck drove into the factory, and the gate closed behind it. Inside the truck, the workers who had been taken away from the factories in the early hours of the morning were bound with ropes, packed tightly into the cargo area of the truck, with only a small amount of air allowed to circulate.

The prison guard took the key, opened the cell door, and the people inside the cell followed him out. The cell was small, with only a bed and a table. Fang Jie lay on the bed, and someone threw a knife at his feet. "Fang Jie, have a good journey."
Fang Jie slowly stood up, and a voice from outside the door said, 'Young Master, we are here to send you off today.'
The man in the vest was knocked down by a thug, but he got up and kicked one of them to the ground. The others rushed up, and the man in the vest used a knife to injure one of them.

Fang Jie, who had been beaten to the ground, suddenly stood up, grabbed the assassin's leg, and yanked him up. Then, with a powerful leap, he threw the man behind him. Fang Jie quickly grabbed the knife in the assassin's hand and slashed at his neck.
Fang Jie swung the axe at the man, but the iron door wouldn't budge. The man kicked at Fang Jie, who was holding the axe, and the axe flew out of Fang Jie's hand and shattered the window glass.
Fang Jie quickly gets up and continues to fight with the criminals. He knocks one of them to the ground and takes another's knife, aiming for the throat of the criminal in front of him.
The man in black, who had been lying on the ground, slowly got up, and the scene returned to normal. The man in black grabbed Fang Jie's collar and said, 'Have a good journey.'

Fang Jie's eyes were filled with determination. The police were closing in from both sides, but Fang Jie was completely unaware. He ran desperately, looking back as he ran. The police were getting closer and closer. Fang Jie ran into a dead end, with the police right behind him. He quickly grabbed a prison guard, pinned him against the wall, and took his keys. Fang Jie turned and ran, with the prison guard frantically trying to stop him.
The police officer who was shot yelled, 'Quick, he's upstairs, quick, quick!'
The police chase after him, but Fang Jie is one step ahead, entering a door and closing it.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: Chai Jia said: "Zao’er, Tianhua, Rong, and Achao all came looking for trouble with me, I told them to drop dead. I only work for your A Hao family, let's not talk about this for now, let's relax tonight and take a bath first."
A Hao squatted in front of Chai Jia and asked: "Do you know what’s most important in doing business?" The most important thing is to be credible!"
A Hao angrily said: "How much money did Hua Zi Rong give you? You scumbag! Go to hell!"

A Hao, who was knocked down by Chai Jia, suddenly got up and strangled Chai Jia's neck with a rope. Just as A Qi was about to draw his gun, A Hao was shot dead by Xiao Wei from behind. Then, Xiao Wei aimed at A Qi, but A Qi kicked the gun out of his hand. At this moment, two men in national costumes rushed in from outside, one of them holding a knife.

A Qi, who was kicked out of the house, was about to kick back at A Hao but was kicked to the ground by A Hao. Da Wei, who was holding a wine bottle, was knocked away by A Qi. The rest of the subordinates rushed to attack A Hao, but were all knocked down by A Hao.
A Hao, with a fierce look, bit the trigger guard of the gun, then bent down and pulled the trigger himself. The bullet hit Xiao Wei's left arm, causing him to fall to the ground.

The two quickly ran to the restaurant, and the people inside were still fighting back. A Hao picked up a knife and cut the arm of a man in a green shirt, then kicked the man in the face. The man in the green shirt clutched his waist and ran away.
Da Wei cursed: "Damn it, let's go!"
A Hao pointed at Chai Jia and said: "You had it all figured out how to deal with me, didn’t you? Having so many people here to welcome me!"
A Hao shouted: "I'm the fifth generation A Hao! If you dare, then make your move!"
The two people who were unloading goods on the shore immediately got on the boat and started chasing. They shouted: "Chase him, kill him, boss!"
A Qi shouted: "Xiao Wei". Then, A Qi pushed the steering wheel and jumped into the water, swimming towards Xiao Wei.
Da Wei said: "It hurts so much!"
Da Wei grabbed A Hao's collar and said: "It's okay, it's okay, your brother is here, it's all right." Da Wei took out a cigarette and lit it for A Hao, then took out a lighter and lit a fire for him.
Da Wei said: "It's okay, it's okay, I'm here, it's all right."
A Qi, who was hit in the chest, fell from the coconut basket, and A Hao looked at him with heartache.
Xiao Wei weakly said: "Brother Hao, take me home, take me home."
A Hao said: "You're blessed by the Bodhisattva""You'll be fine!"
A Qi held his hand and said: "It's okay!"
Da Wei shouted: "Big brother!"
Da Wei said: "Brother, I’m here!"
Xiao Wei, lying in the coconut basket, said: "Don't tell Grandma"
Da Wei said: "Good."
A Qi said: "I won't tell." Seeing A Qi's panicked face, A Hao quickly took out a handgun and shot him dead.

movie101_6965768652251628068_960_1140.text: Da Chun suddenly got up and ran towards Teacher Wang, who was hiding in the corner. Da Chun stood on Teacher Wang and shouted: "What are you doing?"
Da Chun raised his foot and said: "Teacher Wang, do you think my shoes look nice?" Teacher Wang was scared and did not dare to speak.
Xia Luo laughed and said: "What a great dream!" He even started to dance in his seat, looking very happy.
Qiu Ya looked at him with a smile, and the bell rang.
Qiu Ya was stunned, and the next second, Xia Luo kissed her. The students around started to cheer. Qiu Ya covered her face and ran out of the classroom, and the students followed her out.
The class was in chaos, and Principal and Director came in just in time. Principal saw Qiu Ya and asked: "Qiu Ya?"
Principal said: "Shut up."
Principal said: "This student, if you have difficulties or issues, you can tell me. Don't harm female students."

Xia Luo said: "I need to wake up from this dream" "or else it will turn into a nightmare." Xia Luo was suddenly pulled under the desk by a hand. The scene switched to a wedding scene, with the bride and groom throwing confetti into the air.
The water from the broken pipe sprayed all over Xia Luo's face. He looked up and saw the water droplets hanging from the ceiling, pondering for a moment.
Principal said angrily: "Don't use self-harm to threaten the teacher. You are giving up on yourself."
Xia Luo said: "I've had too much to drink" "I can't wake up" "Fine" "I'll stay with you a bit longer" "Zhang Yang, give me the fire."
Zhang Yang said: "I don't smoke; where would I get a lighter?" Xia Luo pulled out a brand-new lighter from his sleeve.
Principal saw Xia Luo lighting a stack of papers and quickly said: "What are you doing? Put out the fire!"
Xia Luo threw the book into the air and shouted: "Burn, my youth!"

The fire in the classroom grew bigger and bigger, and Principal, who was still in the middle of a lesson, had no reaction. Principal was still lecturing, but the students were already in chaos. Principal stood on the lectern with a gun in hand, and the fire had already reached the roof. Principal shouted: "Xia Luo"

The fire on the blackboard grew bigger and bigger, and Principal, who was sitting at the podium, was completely unaware of the situation on the stage. He was still immersed in the joy of his poetry. Xia Luo walked through the crowd and called out: 'Mom.'
Teacher Wang ran over and hugged Principal, shouting: "Principal"
The woman angrily slapped Xia Luo and said: "Are you crazy?" "Did you do all this?" "Principal, I'm sorry, I'm sorry." Then she grabbed Xia Luo's collar and said: "What do you want?"
Xia Luo held his mom's face and said: "Mom, I miss you" "Don't cry" "I don't want to see you crying even in my dreams" "I need to wake up" "or else my clothes won't refund"

movie101_7021874945990853151_3180_3360.text: Mr. Luo said, "Do you think you can escape from the prison without the organization knowing?"
Li Zihao said, "Why won’t you give Lan Ruoyun her freedom? She has sacrificed so much."
Mr. Luo said, "I did it for the safety of more people. Why didn't you contact the organization after the jailbreak?"
Li Zihao said, "Tang Hexuan watches me every day."
Mr. Luo looked around, then turned to Li Zihao and said, "Alright, let's follow this lead. So this opportunity for you is very rare."
Li Zihao was about to leave but was stopped by Mr. Luo. Li Zihao leaned in and whispered, "Okay, but I have one condition."
Mr. Luo said, "Go ahead."
Mr. Luo said, "After the job is done, destroy the files and send Lan Ruoyun away." Li Zihao's eyes were red but he remained silent. The next day, Li Zihao arrived at the mansion with his men.
The car slowly stopped at the entrance of the mansion. Li Zihao got out of the car, closed the door, and walked into the mansion with a stride.
Lan Ruoyun got out of the car, Li Zihao walked up to her and touched her arm. Lan Ruoyun looked up at him, then turned and walked into the hotel. Li Zihao stood there, watching her.

Li Zihao took the bag, looked at it, and then looked back at Lan Ruoyun. Lan Ruoyun turned and walked away, while Li Zihao stood there, looking at the bag and then at Lan Ruoyun's departing figure, with a complex expression.

Tang Qianqian's eyes were filled with anger and determination. She walked resolutely towards Li Zihao's former lover. The butlers and maids at the entrance stood neatly in two rows, but no one dared to stop Lan Ruoyun. She walked with her head held high and a determined gaze.
Tang Qianqian was stunned for a moment, then looked at Li Zihao with a piercing gaze. Li Zihao's expression was complex, and Tang Qianqian couldn't help but ask, "How come you two are together?"
Lan Ruoyun smiled and said: "Miss Tang, your father said he was busy," "so he had Li Zihao pick me up."
Tang Qianqian asked: "Is it just a simple pick up?" Lan Ruoyun nodded. Tang Qianqian continued: "Li Zihao, I forgot, I heard that you and he used to be good friends, right?"
Lan Ruoyun said: "I wouldn't say Li Zihao and I are good friends."
Tang Qianqian said: "If you're not good friends why do you address each other so intimately? I saw you with Owen yesterday coming out of Hua Mao Hotel, quite affectionate."
Lan Ruoyun looked at Tang Qianqian and said: "Do you think I've wronged your father?"
Tang Qianqian said: "That's not the case, I didn't tell him," "But I want to tell you," "Li Zihao," "You'd better stay away from him."
Tang Qianqian's words were like sharp daggers, piercing Lan Ruoyun's heart one after another.

Lan Ruoyun said: "Your father knows I went to see Owen," "He asked me to find him and discuss some things," "So you don't need to worry about that," "Nor do you need to bring it up with me in the future."

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Driver asked, "So, should I register alone?"
Receptionist said, 'Only you can meet our Boss Bao if it's just yourself.'
Mr. Xu said: "The phone call your Boss Bao made to me."
Receptionist said: "I'm sorry, that's our company policy. Please register. Ah, this person here."
Mr. Xu walked and called out, "Bro."
Mr. Xu asked, 'What's the matter?'
Driver replied, 'The two of them haven't registered yet.'
Mr. Xu asked, 'Who may you two be?'
Mr. Xu gestured with his hand: "Over the phone."
Wu Jiang said, "Oh."
Mr. Xu said: "So you are Boss Bao, right?"
Wu Jiang said: "No, Boss Bao is busy. I am his assistant, Wu Jiang."
Wu Jiang said with a smile: "That...'Boss Bao mentioned the box on the phone...' 'I'm the person who lost the box.'"
Wu Jiang said: "Oh, I understand, I understand. Don't worry. Take a breath first."
Wu Jiang said, "Here, please have some tea, please have some tea."
Driver took the tea and said: "Thank you, thank you."
Driver said: "Here's the thing. To better serve you, I think it's necessary to understand our company's history. Our industry first appeared during the Warring States period, more than 400 years BC."
Driver asked, "What does BC mean?"
Mr. Xu said: "BC means Before Christ."
Driver asked: "What does 'Before Christ' mean?"
Mr. Xu said: "It means 'Before Christ'."

Wu Jiang said: "Back then, there were constant wars." "A lot of nobles and royals." "They would feast one day, and the next day their country would be gone." "So they inevitably had to run around." "And in the process, some important things would get lost." "This thus gave rise to our finding industry."
Mr. Xu asked, "Mr. Wu, have you found my box yet or not?"

Wu Jiang said: "It will be found. Don't worry." "We actually want to do some publicity to build up a reputation." "So, we ask for your support and understanding." "Since Mr. Xu is in a hurry, I'll just skip the middle parts." "I'm talking about now."
Wu Jiang asked in confusion: 'Below?'
Wu Jiang explained: 'Now' means 'this moment'.
Mr. Xu apologized, 'Sorry, sorry, could you please bring your Boss Bao out?'
Wu Jiang said: "Well, I think..."
Boss Bao asked, "Which one of you is Mr. Xu?"
Mr. Xu said: "Boss Bao, let's cut to the chase. Have you found my box yet?"
Boss Bao said: "Very straightforward." "Where are you guys from?"
Mr. Xu asked: "Where is it?"
Driver said: "Bro, just say you're from Henan." "Why say Central Plains?"
Boss Bao said: "Henan is the Central Plains." "The Central Plains is Henan." "It's the same thing."
Driver asked, 'Bro, where are you from then?'
Boss Bao said: "As for me, well, let me put it this way." "I'll explain it to you properly."
Driver said, "Bro, he will explain properly."

Boss Bao said: "Your box, though it hasn't been found yet, I believe it will be found soon. Because before this, we used the American satellite positioning system, later found that it was only good for finding oil, not for finding boxes. So then we used the German satellite positioning system, which has made a lot of progress."
Mr. Xu asked, "Where are we at now with the search?"
Boss Bao pointed at the display screen and said, 'Within a 100-kilometer radius.'

movie101_6966492004553490981_1020_1200.text: David asked: "What?"
Man said: "You must expose MP Company's evil deeds" "and make them look as bad as possible."

The car that was originally driving past turned out to be a Mitsubishi. The driver was the man who had been watching the two in the restaurant. As soon as the car left the hotel, it was blocked by a golf cart. The driver didn't have time to stop and had to speed up to break through the barrier.
The car drove into the palace, and the two people in the electric cart followed closely. Meanwhile, JC climbed up a tree, and the palace staff didn't notice him.

At this moment, JC was lying in the bushes, holding binoculars. He took out his phone from his waist and pressed the record button. The phone was mounted on the binoculars, recording a live broadcast of the scene inside the building.

The scene shifts to a man holding a phone saying, "Mr. Peel, you mentioned on the phone before that you wanted more information about our bronze heads. We have brought this album for your reference. I'm sure it contains the data you want."

The person on the other end said: "Call me back when you get the message", JC hung up the phone, looked at the binoculars in his hand, and then continued to observe the movements of the police station.

The next day, Divid and Bonnie were sitting in the car, eating and looking at a tablet. Divid said, "Everyone in the world is sending gifts to the boss."
Divid said, "I'm watching. Let me know when you're ready."
The scene shifts, and Divid says, "We're ready," as the signal jammers are all set up in the car, and the man in the tree is busy adjusting the height and angle of the jammer to block the signal.

At this moment, a figure climbed up a tree in the distance. Divid said: "In five seconds." The man in black quickly moved to the front of the tree, only to find that the surveillance cameras inside the house were all turned off.

The surveillance showed that the two had successfully entered the hotel. The hotel's security personnel noticed their abnormal behavior and immediately notified the police outside the window, who then quickly arrived at the hotel.
The next day, the luxury car that Divid had prepared drove into the Palace of Versailles. Inside the palace, the reflection of the two people in the grand staircase was crystal clear.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: Lan Ruoyun said: "You just need to remember that your dad loves you."
Tang Qianqian asked Lan Ruoyun: "Do you love him?"

Lan Ruoyun looked at Tang Qianqian with a fierce gaze and said: "Tang Qianqian, I advise you to stay away from me. Stay away from here too, okay? You shouldn't be in Shanghai. You should hurry back to England."
Tang Qianqian's smile gradually faded. Lan Ruoyun walked past her, heading towards the car. Li Zihao frowned and sighed deeply.

At this moment, Li Zihao got out of the car and walked towards her. Seeing Li Zihao, Lan Ruoyun stopped in her tracks. Li Zihao looked at her with a stern face, and Lan Ruoyun was stunned, her eyes wide open.

Li Zihao, with his head down, didn't dare to look at her. Lan Ruoyun turned to look at him. Li Zihao slowly walked towards her, his eyes avoiding hers. Lan Ruoyun said, "This girl has fallen in love with you."
Lan Ruoyun said: "A single glance is enough. I know." Li Zihao turned his head to look at Lan Ruoyun, who was smiling at him.

Lan Ruoyun said: "Don't harm her the way you once harmed me." After speaking, Lan Ruoyun left, leaving Li Zihao standing there, watching her back. The sun shone through the window onto the church, illuminating the cross that stood solemnly in the center.
Tang Qianqian clasped her hands together and prayed: "Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name. Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done on earth."

The scene shifted to a rainy day, with the sound of rain falling like a mournful melody. The overcast sky seemed to mirror the somber mood of a statue in front of a church. The statue, with outstretched arms, appeared to be welcoming or embracing something. At this moment, Tang Qianqian, dressed in a long gown, walked slowly under the eaves, her figure appearing particularly delicate and fragile.
Li Zihao saw Tang Qianqian's serious expression and slowly walked up behind her, placing a comforting hand on her shoulder.
Tang Qianqian asked: "Li Zihao, what kind of person was my father really?"
Li Zihao said: "That's not important." "All you need to know is that he is your father and he loves you. That's enough."
Tang Qianqian said: "Maybe that kind of love is a misfortune."
Li Zihao said: "Perhaps it's a misfortune, or maybe it's a great fortune."

Tang Qianqian didn't respond to Li Zihao's words, but stared at the rain falling from the sky. After a long while, she took a deep breath, shrugged off Li Zihao's arm that was holding the umbrella, and walked down the steps alone.
Tang Qianqian said: "Li Zihao, I love you. No matter what kind of person you are, I love you. I'll say it again. No matter what kind of person you are, I love you."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5100_5280.text: A Hao said: "I brought some medicine for your army today, and also some top-quality Cuban cigars for you!"

A Hao looked at General Naimi, who was chewing on a cigar, and then at the people behind him. Seeing that no one was going to speak, he had to turn around and leave. General Naimi then said to the people behind him: "Come on, please take a seat."
A Hao walked up to General Naimi and said: "Please take a seat."
General Naimi said: "A Hao, I heard you've come from afar. If you need my goods, name your price."
A Hao said: "General, you're straightforward and to the point. General Somsak used to charge me 3,500 per kilogram. I'll add 400 for you, 3,900. That's it."
General Naimi said: "3,900? Someone here has already offered 6,000 per kilogram." A Hao said: "6,000? This market can't take it! Impossible!"
General Naimi said: "A Hao, it's no use talking now. They have already come to the door with a deposit."
Rose placed the box in front of General Naimi, who took a puff of his cigar, and A Hao put away his cane and stood up.
A Hao placed the bamboo box in front of General Naimi, then bent down to take out a small wooden box from the bottom of the box.

A Hao said: "Hua Zi Rong, you're the one who offered 6,000? You really deserve to die! Do you have so much money to give away? This treacherous dog, selling me out today, will sell you out tomorrow. You shouldn't do business with these people. I, A Hao, am trustworthy. I guarantee that if you cooperate with me, you will be satisfied, General."

At this moment, a drug dealer brought in a box of drugs. A Hao looked at the drug dealer and said: "Don't bring in more drugs." Then he turned to General Naimi and said: "General Naimi, we've made a fortune." Suddenly, a drug dealer rushed in with a knife and stabbed A Hao in the back.

General Naimi pressed the gun against A Hao's head and said: "So you're playing behind my back, huh? You think you're in Hong Kong? This is Thailand! You can go to hell if you want to bargain with me!"
General Naimi looked at the tape recorder on the table, where the voice of Little Pumpkin came through: "Daddy, lots of brothers took me and mommy to ride the carousel. When are you coming to play?"

A Hao took out a family photo from his bosom and showed it to General Naimi. General Naimi looked at the photo in A Hao's hand, then at the photo on the floor, and finally at the photo in A Hao's hand.
A few days later, A Hao walked out of the camp with a cigar in his mouth, followed closely by his two companions. He put on his sunglasses and stared directly at the front.

The scene shifts to the night market in Macau, where the neon lights are dazzling. In a dimly lit bar, a man is dancing with two women, one on each side, while Fat Boy Chao is performing on stage. The man lifts one of the women onto his shoulders, spinning around, and then sets her down.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3540_3720.text: Li Zihao stood still under the umbrella, his expression growing sadder and sadder. He lowered his head, unable to bear looking up. Fang Jie walked past him, his face showing a hint of helplessness. Tang Qianqian rushed out from the law firm, her hair wet and sticking to her cheeks, looking anxiously at the two of them.

Tang Qianqian, with wet hair and clothes, looked utterly disheveled. She hurriedly took the umbrella from Fang Jie and ran off, while Fang Jie stood there, watching her go, feeling a pang of pity but not knowing how to speak to her.

Li Zihao took out a cigarette, lit it, and started smoking. Fang Jie looked up at Li Zihao, then lowered his head to light his own cigarette. The two of them stood there in silence, neither wanting to start the conversation.
Fang Jie said sternly, "You can touch any woman in Shanghai, just not her."

Li Zihao stood under the umbrella, feeling very wronged. He lowered his head, not daring to look at Tang Hexuan. The scene shifted to Tang Hexuan's home, where Tang Hexuan was pouring tea for a guest and said, 'Please.'
Gao Tian said: "Since Mr. Tang Hexuan can cooperate with us sincerely," "there's no need for you to worry about Director Hua's matter."
Tang Hexuan, who was smoking, looked at Gao Tian with a smile, and Gao Tian stood up.
Gao Tian watched Tang Hexuan leave, then turned to look at Fu Sheng who had followed him inside. The two of them stood in the room, quietly looking at each other.
Gao Tian said sternly: "However, I hope there will be no further incidents that harm the Great Japanese Empire."
Tang Hexuan glanced at Gao Tian, who nodded in response. The two tacitly agreed to put aside their differences for the time being and left the room.
The heavy rain outside did not dampen the spirits of the workers; the courtyard gates were opened, and several cars sped out in succession.
The scene shifts to Fu Sheng, who is also a suspect in the case, getting out of a car at the entrance of the hotel, followed by four bodyguards.
Tang Hexuan instructed: "Have Zhao Yan bring some sandalwood incense to rid oneself of that distinct Eastern smell."
Fu Sheng replied, "Yes."
The phonograph was playing music, Tang Qianqian was drinking whiskey, and when she saw Fang Jie come in, she quickly hid the glass behind her and asked, "Why are you here?"
Tang Qianqian, feeling shy, turned her back to Li Zihao and said, "I want to drink with you."
Li Zihao, who had changed into a suit, just hung up his coat and heard Tang Qianqian say, "It's late." Li Zihao walked over to the bed, took off his coat, and threw it on the pillow.
The woman holding the wine glass said, "Do you want to drink together? I can really hold my liquor."
Tang Hexuan replied, "No thanks."
Tang Qianqian tilted her head and said, "You're no fun."
Tang Qianqian stood up and walked towards the door, while Li Zihao remained sitting on the sofa, staring at the chessboard and pondering his next move.

Li Zihao sat on the sofa, staring at the chess pieces in front of him, lost in thought. At this moment, Tang Qianqian, dressed in a long gown and wearing sunglasses, walked leisurely from the bedroom to the living room, picked up a chess piece, and posed dramatically in front of Li Zihao.
Tang Hexuan and Fang Jie exchanged a glance and got up to leave.

Base Man pointed at Plaid Shirt Man and said: "I was asking him."
Plaid Shirt Man quickly stopped him, and Base Man said: "What's mine is his, we are one and the same, we are brothers."

Li Zihao held a scalpel in one hand and a cotton swab in the other, standing by the window, burning the drug on a small bottle with a lighter. He turned around and looked at the body on the bed, then began to cut.
Li Zihao lowered his head and said: "Brother" "I don't want you to end up like me" "Rootless in life" "With no place to be buried in death"
The scene shifts to Tang Qianqian sitting on a swing in the yard, singing, "A sparrow has one head." "Two eyes rolling around." "Two wings and two legs."
Tears welled up in her eyes, she closed her eyes and shook her head, trying hard not to cry. She bit her lip, but the sobbing still came.
Li Zihao stopped in his tracks, stood still, and stared at the direction where Tang Qianqian was leaving.
The scene shifted, and Fang Jie was lying on a luxurious bed in a dimly lit room. He opened his eyes and gasped for breath, his face covered in bruises.
The scene shifts to a rainy day, with a line of people holding umbrellas standing outside the Tang family shrine. Li Zihao is solemnly waiting with a flower pinned to his chest.

The three siblings stood solemnly in front of the wreaths, their eyes filled with tears. The rain began to fall heavily, and the mournful wailing of the rain-soaked funeral procession echoed through the air.

The scene shifts to the funeral. The sky is overcast, and the sound of thunder echoes. The mourners walk in the rain, each holding an umbrella. Li Zihao, dressed in a dark suit, is surrounded by bodyguards. He turns his head to look at the rain.

Li Zihao held the door for Fang Jie to get off the car, then closed the door. The rain-soaked bodyguards stood at the entrance with their umbrellas. The hearse slowly drove away, and the rain-soaked Fang Jie stood in the rain, watching the direction the car was going.
The scene shifts to a heavy rain pouring down on the street. A black car slowly stops in front of the funeral parlor. A person holding an umbrella steps out of the car.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: A Hao was knocked to the ground, and the car was blown to pieces.
Rose looked at Lei Luo, and suddenly the phone rang. Lei Luo's expression changed, he stood up and walked towards the bedroom, and A Hao came out from the bedroom.
A Hao came out and said: "So late, Brother Lei Luo"
A Hao said: "Yes, I just wanted to tell you that I've submitted my resignation letter. I'm leaving for Canada tomorrow."
A Hao poured a glass of wine and said: "Have a safe trip"
Lei Luo said: "Let's go together""Not just for yourself""But for Ah Qing and the two kids too"
A Hao angrily said: "You came in the middle of the night just to tell me this?"
A Hao, leaning on a cane, slowly sat on the sofa and said to Lei Luo: "I know you're not happy"

Lei Luo stood up and said: "No need" "You haven't been happy with what I've been doing these past two months, right?" "You blew up his car, I had people stop him" "You ambushed at the police station" "I had someone whisk him away" "Do you know why?" "If an English cop died, both you and I would be in trouble. Do you understand?"
Lei Luo, with a face full of disdain, picked up the glass of wine from the table and said, "You're a good loser."
Lei Luo said: "I've received word, the ICAC will move against me in two weeks" "Yan Tong will take my place" Without me, no one can help you. But you should know, I'm doing this for your own good."

A Hao, after hearing this, sat up from the sofa, looked at Lei Luo for a while, then said: "You're doing this for my good". After saying this, he picked up the photo from the table and threw it on the ground, then continued: "I’m the tumor, that’s what you gave me."
Lei Luo said: "That's not how you count brotherhood... I've already handled quite a lot..."

A Hao angrily said: "You can’t forget, it was you who told me to go to Thailand" "Because of that, my brother Little Wei got killed" "Now my own blood brother lies in the hospital" "turned into a vegetable"
Lei Luo said: "I didn't expect it to turn out like this. I'm not a god, I can't control everything."

A Hao said: "That's where you’re right, you can't control everything" "Life, we can’t control. Death, we can’t control" "Between life and death, I can control what I’m able to, I can choose my own path" "I call the shots"
Lei Luo said: "So, in the end, it boils down to you saving my life and me ruining yours, right? As long as I'm alive, shoot me, it’s fine to kill me with a single shot, come on."
A Hao raised the gun and said: "Alright, if you were good to me, you wouldn't have planted a needle by my side."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3060_3240.text: Woman said: "You may pay attention to our new collection. These three European style designs. The price is a bit more reasonable than before. The design is a bit more innovative than before. If you two are interested, I can give you further discounts."

Woman said: "What's wrong with you, didn’t the manager mention this to you?"
Woman said: "We don't have boxes here, only cabinets."

Xu Decai turned back and said: "Hey, these two, these two haven't registered yet."
The scene shifts, and the man in black arrives at the hospital lobby. A doctor came out and said: "Oh dear, gentlemen, have you made an appointment?"

Xu Decai grabbed the doctor's collar and said: "You fraudster, what's your bloody relationship with this donkey."
The middle-aged man said: "You, come over here, I think you are nothing but a stupid donkey."
Middle-aged Man grabbed Driver and said: "Hey, sir"
Xu Decai, who was just about to leave, suddenly remembered someone in the room and turned back to greet the person: "Oh, hello there."
Driver walked into the room and said: "Oh no, they have moved everything away"
The receptionist said: "Call security." The receptionist glanced at the man and said: "What are you looking at, pack your things and leave."
Receptionist was a bit surprised and said: "Ah, changing again."
Driver, carrying a bag and a box, entered the office. Xu Decai said: "The cleaning is strangely thorough, just finished cleaning didn't you?"

Driver, holding a phone, said: "Bro bro bro, look, little turtles, five thousand each, do you want any? There's more." He then turned and tidied up the office. Xu Decai, who was watching the monitor, walked over to look. Driver continued: "Tidy up, keep tidying, come on."
Driver said: "Yay" "Ah, bro" "Isn't this 01?" "These few holes are all here" "Ah, these fraudsters" "They are too awesome, really?" "So" "They are making movies"
Receptionist said: "Don't hit him, don't hit him."
The security guard pushed the man away and said: "You demon."
The security guard dragged Driver away, saying: "Go, quickly."
Receptionist laughed and said: "Welcome to visit us again next time."

Driver said: "Bro, shall we," "How about we do a stunt show here," "To attract some attention," "Maybe this will solve our problem," "Bro," "Hasn't everyone encountered difficulties," "We will lower our heads and yield when encountering difficulties, right?" "Who can avoid troubles, bro?"
Driver said: "Xu Decai, I've been looking for you everywhere, can I trust you with my life?"

movie101_6966492004553490981_1560_1740.text: He climbed up the wall using the decorative elements, and just as he was about to break the glass, he heard footsteps behind him. He turned around and said: 'See how you can chase me' 'Why are there some more'

The well-trained hedges in the park formed a natural fence, a man-made stone arch, and a star-shaped sundial. The well-groomed hedges were neatly trimmed into various shapes, like animals, standing in the park, it was a harmonious blend of human and nature.
The person on the other end said: "I'm in the southeast of the castle" "Tell me how to get there"
The camera switches to Teammate and others watching the surveillance footage. Teammate said: "There's a big maze in front of you." "Don't go in there at all costs."
He ran out of the maze, panting heavily, and said, "I think I'm already in the middle."
Teammate asked: "Can you fly out"
Teammate: "The runway is not long enough"
The man said: "I have to try even if it's not enough," "One bean two grains of rice," "That exit is you."
Teammate said: "Hey, does feudal superstition work?" The Doberman still followed closely behind.
The person chasing after him said, "Stop talking and find the exit for me."
The man said, "You have to fly so that we can see you." The man was still chasing after him, and he had to keep running. At this moment, he reached the exit of the maze.
The two of them ran back and forth in the maze, desperately trying to escape. The black-clad men behind them were relentless, closely pursuing them.
The Doberman ran wildly in the maze, and soon after, JC also ran into the maze with a gun in hand, shouting loudly.
The Doberman stopped chasing and looked at him. JC said: 'Not chasing anymore, do they have myopia?'

He looked back and saw the Doberman charging at him, so he quickly turned and ran. The Doberman, running in circles, couldn't catch up with him. In a hurry, he ran into a dead end, and the Doberman blocked his way.

The bodyguards behind quickly got up and chased after him, but they were also equipped with parachutes. As soon as they saw JC, they pulled the chute and flew away. Teammate said, 'I see, I see, he's airborne.'
The scene shifts to Teammate and others watching the monitor, seeing JC fall again. Teammate said: "He fell again."
The Doberman jumped up, and JC quickly hugged its head. The Doberman stuck its head into his chest, and JC said: "The runway is not long enough"
He ran wildly in the maze, accidentally letting the two dogs get away. The two dogs ran after him, and JC hid in the maze.
The two dogs ran towards JC, who was still eating the leaves. The dogs barked at the sound, and JC immediately spat out the leaves in his mouth. Teammate said: "What's that sound"
JC said: 'I'm pretending to be a dog.' He bit off the leaves on the bag, and the nearby Doberman dogs drooled at the sight.

He looked back at the two hedges and then at the two dogs, quickly stood up, and ran towards the direction of the hedges. The two dogs charged at him, and he desperately swung the rope in his hand, trying to escape. But the rope pulled him closer to the top of the hedge, and he was desperately trying to break free from the pull of the rope.

The Doberman bit JC's arm hard, and he quickly rolled over to avoid it. The Doberman ran towards Teammate, who was running ahead, and bit his shoulder. Teammate screamed in pain and ran away, with the Dobermans relentlessly chasing him.
The Doberman bit his hand, and he quickly said: 'Wanna bite?' Then he squatted down and said: 'Lie down,' 'Be good, be good,' 'Don't move,' 'Be good,' 'Go.'
Teammate said: "You speak Chinese to a French dog"
JC said: "I wonder too that it can understand Chinese" Two dobermans ran out from the hedge, and JC quickly dodged them.

movie101_7021874945990853151_4440_4620.text: Ye Qishan was the first to step out of the car, braving the pouring rain to walk towards the mansion. The bodyguards followed closely behind, holding umbrellas for Ye Qishan, while Fang Jie stood aside, watching Ye Qishan's back.
Ye Qishan walked under the umbrella with his head down, his face full of anger. The bodyguards held umbrellas for him, and they entered the banquet hall one by one.

Ye Qishan walked into the main hall, where the portrait of Mr. Wu was solemnly hung, surrounded by wreaths. He looked at the people standing on both sides, then turned to look at Tang Qianqian standing by the wreath. He then walked to the center of the hall, with the mournful cries of Tang Qianqian and Fang Jie in the background.

Ye Qishan said, "Old brother, are you pretending to be dead?" "You old fox." "Nothing you do can be trusted." "Not even your death can be believed." Ye Qishan walked towards Tang Qianqian and said, "Unless we lift this coffin lid and have a look."

Ye Qishan walked to the front of the coffin, opened the lid, and looked at the body inside. The face was badly disfigured, half of it swollen and blackened from the blood. Ye Qishan closed the lid again.
Fang Jie said, "Old brother, how did you end up like this?" "Who did this to you?" "Not only did they hit you, but they even bombed you."
Ye Qishan frowned deeply. Li Zihao said, "He's already burned to this extent. Show some decency."
Ye Qishan looked at the coffin and said, "Old brother, without you, what are we going to do in Shanghai Bund?"
Ye Qishan walked to the center of the hall with a smile, then said to Tang Qianqian: "Qianqian, take your uncle's advice and get married soon. Why not become my concubine?"
Fang Jie said, "Old brother, I can't bear to see you go."
Ye Qishan said angrily, "Why so much nonsense? Kneel down for me."
Li Zihao and Fang Jie exchanged glances and rushed to the wedding scene. Li Zihao knocked a waiter to the ground and was about to pursue the couple when he was grabbed by the groomsmen.
Ye Qishan was shot dead by Tang Qianqian from behind. Li Zihao, who was walking past, heard the gunshot and turned back to look. Fang Jie was still kneeling on the ground, motionless.

Ye Qishan struggled to get up, only to be pressed back down by a raised gun barrel. Fang Jie's eyes were cold, his expression grim, and his body slightly trembling. Ye Qishan stared at Fang Jie, his face twisted with hatred.

Ye Qishan said, "I, Ye Qishan, crawled out from a pile of corpses." "Only dead people have ever pressed on my head." "You two want to play heroes, huh?" "Fine, I will show you." "There have never been heroes in Shanghai Bund." "Only gangsters." "I, Ye Qishan, am the biggest gangster in Shanghai Bund." "Today, you got the best of me."
Ye Qishan turned his head and said, "Old man, don't blame me for not giving you face."

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: A Hao said: "Rose, put down the gun." "Tell Lei Luo what your name is." Rose put down the gun reluctantly, and A Hao looked at Lei Luo.
The scene shifts to a memory, in which A Hao says: "My name is Ah Hua." Young A Hao hands a bowl of soup to Qing Jie.
A Hao said: "Her name is Ah Hua; I raised her." "I sent her to Thailand and Taiwan for training." "By your side." "Someone so capable." "You, Lei Luo, wouldn't waste such talent, would you?"

Lei Luo said: "Alright." "Turning an abused little girl from the old buildings of Kowloon City into a rose, impressive." "But don’t think I don’t know." "Do you know what it means to turn a blind eye?" "Placing a needle by my side." "Do you even consider my feelings?"
A Hao said: "Do you even consider my feelings?" "If Rose wasn't by your side, I would have already been dealt with."
Lei Luo turned around and said: "A Hao ah..."
Lei Luo stood up and said: "I'm leaving."
Qing Jie said, "The two kids won't sleep; they insist you go up and accompany them."
A Hao said: "Alright, I've said what I needed to say. Let's end this here," Lei Luo slowly walked towards A Hao.
Lei Luo pointed at A Hao and said, "You really upset me tonight."
A Hao pointed at Lei Luo and said, "Ah Hua, help me see Lei Luo out."
Lei Luo stood up and said: "No need. I want to try the feeling of not having a needle by my side." Then he turned to Rose and said: "Watch them closely," and then walked towards the door.
Qing Jie came over with a blanket, covered A Hao's legs with it, sat down next to him, and noticed his pale face. She asked worriedly: "Get me two headache pills."
Qing Jie stood up and said, "Okay."

The driver parked the car in the courtyard of the guesthouse, and the family of five walked towards the house. The driver opened the back door and the children got out of the car. A Hao said to the driver, "Hey, weren't we meeting at the airport?"
Piggy ran over and said, "Something big happened." "A Hao is going after Hunter tonight."
A Hao's wife, sitting in the car, saw her husband's troubled expression and softly called out, "Honey."
Lei Luo got out of the car and said to Piggy: "I only trust Ah Zheng." "Help me find Ah Zheng right away." "This is evidence of Hunter's corruption." "Have Ah Zheng give it to the ICAC."
Piggy said: "Alright, got it." "Lei Luo, is that all?" "Do you have any other instructions?"
A Hao's wife and sister were sitting in the car, silently watching everything in front of them.

A Hao hugged his wife tightly, while the children nearby were frolicking. At that moment, Rose's inner sadness was completely released. She buried her head in A Hao's shoulder, crying out her feelings.

movie101_7021874945990853151_4620_4800.text: Li Zihao slowly lowered his gun, and Ye Qishan walked up to him with a smile, saying: "Good job" "Go". Ye Qishan's men quickly brought a black sedan chair and Ye Qishan sat on it with a smile.
Ye Qishan walked to the center of the courtyard, turned around, and said to the people behind him: "Useless."
Ye Qishan said, 'I'm sorry, boss.' Ye Qishan and his men bowed and escorted Fang Jie out of the door. They quickly got into the car, with Ye Qishan sitting in the back seat, fuming with anger.
The scene shifted to a rainy day in Shanghai, with mournful music playing and rows of people holding black umbrellas standing on both sides of the street, leading to a church.
Tang Qianqian sat in the church, her hands clasped together, praying earnestly.

The three of them rushed into the church, with Tang Qianqian already inside. She was sitting in the church, hands clasped together, eyes tightly shut, praying devoutly. Fang Jie placed the umbrella on the side and turned to leave.
Fang Jie threw the marriage certificate on the table and said: 'Ye Qishan is blatantly coming for us.'
Li Zihao said: "The election for President Hua is tomorrow. He's putting on an act."

San Ma said: "We must attend the position of President Hua" "Otherwise, we can't explain it to the other factions" "We have to go" "That old ghost Ye Qishan will definitely provoke us" "So we must attend" "But Ah Hao should go"
Li Zihao suddenly burst into the room, panting heavily. He said, 'Young master, young master! The young lady has been kidnapped. Two of our branches have been taken over by Ye Qishan's men.'
Li Zihao said: "What's the point of having a meeting now?" "Brothers, follow me."
Li Zihao stood up to stop him, saying: "Calm down."
Fang Jie retorted: "All you know is to keep calm." "How could Tang Qianqian fall for someone like you?"
Fang Jie said: "Calm down," "Calm?" "What about Tang Qianqian?" "Just watch her die?"
Fang Jie let go of his hand, thought for a moment, and said: "Before Ye Qishan takes over, nothing will happen to Qianqian. Acting rashly will play right into his hands."
Fang Jie lowered his head, took the gun, and pointed it at Li Zihao, saying: "Your eyes are filled with fear."
Li Zihao said: 'Fear helps us stay calm. He's forcing you to act now, to wipe us all out in one fell swoop. Once you act, all the factions will side with him.'
Fang Jie shouted: "I'm asking you, what should we do about Qianqian?"

San Ma stood up and said, 'A Jie, stop fighting. Listen to me. Tang Ye treated me well. My people are your people. Today if he Ye Qishan insists on forcefully dealing with things, then let's turn his plan against him.'
Fang Jie's eyes were filled with determination. Li Zihao's gaze was full of regret. The villa at night was especially quiet, and Fang Jie was still calculating the day's accounts.
Fang Jie asked: "Brother, can we trust that San Ma?"
Li Zihao asked: 'What do you think?'

movie101_6966492004553490981_1740_1920.text: The car door suddenly opened, and a pair of black leather boots stepped out. The black-clad figure raised its arms and leaped into the sky. It turned out that the upper body of the black-clad figure was connected to a mechanical device that allowed it to fly. The three dogs ran to the edge of the roof and then jumped down. JC flew over the maze and disappeared into the distance.
CoCo, holding luggage, said: "I'll call you later"
Pierre patted his shoulder and said: "Okay."
The bodyguard saw this and shouted: "Security, security, security, go check out the situation."
The parachute slowly descended, and JC landed safely. He looked around and said, "I finally made it out!"
DAVID instructed: "Leave the rest to Simon, notify him."
BONNIE, while removing the parking ticket, said: "He doesn't like it when I talk." "You notify him."

The car sped along, and the surrounding bushes were swiftly swept past. JC ran through the bushes, following the car to a fork in the road. The car stopped at the intersection, and JC looked at the car. CoCo rolled down the window and shouted, "Martin!"
CoCo, who was driving, saw this scene and quickly rolled down the window, shouting: "Martin, what are you doing?"
Simon said: "I don't know you."
CoCo asked from inside the car: "The person in the old castle just now, was it you?"
JC said: "Koko, you got the wrong person."
CoCo said: "Wrong person, still calls me Koko, it's definitely you."
Simon shouted from inside the car: "Be careful driving."
The tires skidded on the road, and the car spun out, with JC still hanging on. CoCo shouted, "It's you!"
Simon yells: "Don't grab me, let go."
The two men who jumped out of the car landed and started walking forward. One of them said: "How could you steal things?"
Simon said: "I... I don't know what you're talking about."
The bodyguard said, "We got had, they know each other."
The bodyguard angrily said: "That's ridiculous, let's get out of here, let's get out of here."
CoCo said to JC: "Let go first, look at the road while driving."
CoCo said: "So you still say it wasn't you."
JC frantically waved his arms and said: "It's me, it's me."
CoCo, angrily, said: "Why would you do this?"
JC replied: "It's hard to explain to you right now."
At this moment, JC was swinging in the air, and the RV suddenly hit a bump. The shaken JC shouted: "Watch out!" Then he quickly climbed up to the RV.
The RV driver, seeing this, floored the gas pedal, lifting the front of the RV. JC was flung into the air, and the umbrella opened automatically, allowing him to safely land on the ground.
CoCo asked: "Are you okay?"

CoCo said: "I'll find you in the boat." After speaking, CoCo drove away, and JC, who was still in the water, had no choice but to follow. He swam towards the shore, and after emerging from the water, he immediately walked towards the forest. After searching for a while, he finally found the target vehicle.

Simon, who had been tracking the car, received the message from JC. JC said: "Simon, I'm at your six o'clock, nine above." Then, Simon saw JC running out from the woods on the left side of the road. He immediately floored the gas pedal and drove straight towards the woods.
The parachute slowly descended, and JC landed on a small hill beside the road. He looked at the car behind him, then at the car in front of him, and finally looked up at the sky.

With a strong pull from the rope, he was yanked off the cliff and into the air. He was screaming in terror as he flew over the cars, and then he was yanked back, crashing heavily onto the roof of the car.
Simon patted the car and said: "Where's the other head?"
Simon replied, "CoCo took it." Simon then took out a bull's head from the bag.
CoCo stood up and said: "You're not like a journalist" "Who are you really?"

JC sat down and said: "Me, I actually have two identities, I am the president of the International Non-profit Promotion Association of precious cultural relics such as gold, silver, copper, iron, ceramics, calligraphy and painting"
CoCo asked in disbelief: "What? How have I not heard of this organization before?"
JC asked, "Are you sure you know all the names in the world?"
CoCo asked, "What's wrong?"
JC replied: "Of course, return it to the Chinese government."
Simon: "Sounds good." Simon parked the car, and the others got out. Simon said: "Be careful, let's go."

movie101_6973286990817002015_600_780.text: A Hao grabbed Da Wei's collar and lifted him up, but Da Wei grabbed A Hao's left leg and wouldn't let go. A Hao turned around and kicked him down.

A Hao was surrounded by people wielding sticks and stabbed at him. He dodged quickly, and the people behind him were not so lucky, suffering blows to their faces and bodies. Someone shouted, 'Go on, go, chop, chop him, chop, chop him.'
A Qi said, "This is bad, really bad." Seeing A Hao fighting alone was no match for the numerous thugs, A Qi rushed over to help. The two of them fought desperately, but it was hard to hold them off.
A Hao said, "That curly-haired one can really fight."
A man wielding a stick said, "Screw you, Little Wei." The two of them fought together, with A Hao throwing punches at the people around him.
A Qi was kicked out of the building by Da Wei, crashing heavily to the ground. Lei Luo watched from the rooftop, laughing heartily.

A Qi, who had been knocked down, suddenly got up, picked up a fallen stick, and swung it at the opponent. The stick was instantly split in two, and the opponent was knocked down. A Qi then picked up a nearby shoe and threw it at the opponent. The shoe was split open, revealing a piece of paper inside, which turned out to be a secret letter.

A Hao and his group were fighting with the thugs, but they were outnumbered. At this moment, the police suddenly arrived. The thugs raised their sticks to surrender, and the group looked at the police in confusion.
Hua Zi Rong said, "Big Brother, we're surrounded, you go first, I’ll hold off those cops for you."
Hua Zi Rong said, 'Good brother.'
Hua Zi Rong said, "Let's go."
The scene shifts to Lei Luo's side. The uncle asked, 'Who called the riot police?'
The police officer shouted, "Fire!"

At this moment, A Hao and his group were walking down the street. Suddenly, a grenade was thrown at them. A Hao threw it back, and it exploded near the police. Seeing this, A Hao shouted, "Take them down!"
The police chased them into an alley, and Da Wei, seeing a way out, wanted to turn around and run, but was stopped by A Hao. Da Wei shouted, "Hey, don't come any closer!"
A Qi said: "Whose side are you on?"
A Qi threw down the stick and said, "Which side are you on?"
Hua Zi Rong said angrily, 'Which side, tell me, why do you ask when I'm asking you?'
Hua Zi Rong said, "Oh, you guys are with Big Gray Bear, I'm the top horse of Big Gray Bear, Hua Zi Rong."
A Hao threw the knife in his hand to Hua Zi Rong and said, 'You little punk,' 'You almost got me killed.' Hua Zi Rong said, 'How would I know some blind fool threw the bottle?'
A Qi shouted, "Own people, own people, own people, own people."
Hua Zi Rong said, "Cover your mouth."
The police, equipped with gas masks, rushed into the alley and sprayed tear gas into the crowd. The thick gas quickly enveloped the crowd, and the people on the street fell to the ground.
The police immediately put on their gas masks, and Hua Zi Rong and his men also took out their prepared masks and covered their noses and mouths.
The people in the alley had no time to escape and were mercilessly shot by the police.
The police kept striking the crowd with batons, and the gas from the canisters spread rapidly, causing the crowd to kneel on the ground.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Zhao Bing, looking at the two men in the distance through the glass, quickly dialed Xu Decai's number. Xu Decai said: "Sorry, I couldn't make it."
Zhao Bing asked: "What's going on?"
Xu Decai said: "We need to talk in person."
Zhao Bing said: "I have something very important right now.""You can't come to me."
Xu Decai said: "I've lost both my ticket and passport, and there's no time to replace them. You have to help me!"
Zhao Bing, looking at the bag, said: "How could you be so careless?"
Xu Decai said: "I was robbed, and I don't even know who did it, and furthermore," Xu Decai said while walking.
Xu Decai said: "Alright."
Xu Decai, while rowing the boat, called the person he trusted the most in the world, but the other party still didn't answer. So he had to call the next best option.
Zhao Bing said: "Oh."
Zhao Bing, leaning against the glass cabinet, said: "Are you okay then?"
