Ye Qishan: "Thank you, thank you, everyone, please take a seat" "Thank you all" "Today you honor my event, Ye's" "As long as I, Ye Qishan, have a bite to eat" "You all seated here will have a bite to eat" "Now, to confer the honor on the new chairman, Mr. Ye Qishan"
Ye Qishan lit the fuse with a smile, the bright sparks flew out, and the audience cheered.

Fang Jie, who had just rushed into the cargo hold, was forced to hide by the explosion. The explosions continued, and the cargo hold was obliterated. Ye Qishan and his subordinates had to abandon their posts and retreat.

Fang Jie, hearing the noise, quickly hides behind a wooden crate. After a while, the thugs leave, and Fang Jie takes the opportunity to sneak out. Fang Jie finds the place full of smoke, and hears someone saying, "Tell me where is Tang Qianqian"
Ye Qishan: "Where is it, kid?" "Even if you kill me, you won't be able to leave here."
Ye Qishan was shot in the leg, Fang Jie asked Ye Qishan while holding him: "I am asking you where is Tang Qianqian"

Fang Jie grabbed Ye Qishan's coat and dragged him out of the room. The enemy's firepower was fierce, and the two had to run through the factory. The explosives on the second floor were detonated, and the factory was instantly engulfed in flames. The two continued to run, with the factory collapsing behind them.
The bodyguard said, "Get up!" "Come with me!"

Tang Qianqian pushed the door open and entered the room, only to see Ye Qishan standing by the window. She quickly turned around and rushed towards the door, but Ye Qishan blocked her way. Tang Qianqian shouted, "Stop!" and ran towards Ye Qishan.

Fang Jie, carrying Ye Qishan, ran into a narrow corridor. A group of people with guns shouted, "Over here!" and opened fire. Fang Jie hid behind a wall, shooting back at the pursuers, while Ye Qishan struggled to stand.

Ye Qishan and Fang Jie were still in the corridor, dodging bullets and taking cover. The firepower of the bodyguards was fierce, and Ye Qishan had to rely on Fang Jie to dodge the bullets while waiting for an opportunity to turn the tide.
Ye Qishan's men were still searching for Tang Qianqian, but Ye Qishan had already hidden Tang Qianqian in a secret room. The secret room was undetected, and the underlings left after searching.
Ye Qishan cursed angrily, "Damn it, a bunch of incompetents!" The man in black immediately opened the door, Ye Qishan walked in with a gun, and Tang Qianqian hid inside the wardrobe, peeking out.

Tang Qianqian, who had been hiding under the coffin, slowly emerged. She looked around cautiously and then stood up. Ye Qishan, who had been watching her the whole time, suddenly pulled out a gun and aimed it at her forehead.

Tang Qianqian, who had just rushed out of the room, was pulled back by Ye Qishan. He was shot in the left arm and fell to the ground. Tang Qianqian struggled to get up and said, "Get up," then helped Ye Qishan up.
Fang Jie, carrying a bag, entered the interior of the factory and shot the thugs in the corridor. Fang Jie shouted, "Fall back," and the thugs retreated.

movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Coco said: "People always think that what's gone is precious."
Jia Fu Lian said: "Yes, that's right" "A chicken head."
Jia Fu Lian said: "That's why I asked you to come here." JC said: "Is that true?"
Jia Fu Lian replied: "It's been here since I was born."
JC looked at the item and said: "This could be considered stolen goods, right?"
Jia Fu Lian asked: "What did she say?"
JC looked at Coco and said: "She said the stairs are beautiful."
Jia Fu Lian bowed and said: "Oh, thank you."
JC said: "I'm leaving." He then left.

Jia Fu Lian said: "He is my great-great-grandfather," "her grandfather," "he returned from overseas many years ago," "he always wanted to go to sea again to find his first mate," "but he couldn't raise the funds for the voyage," "later his son, my grandmother's father," "organized an expedition team," "to search for that ship called Not-fire," "but he never returned," "he just mysteriously disappeared," "I heard that some bronze heads are in your possession," "or perhaps you know something about my great-grandfather."

Fu Hao said: "I don't care about any of it, bronze heads, tokens, diamonds, none of these can see the light of day. The only thing I want to get back is that painting. They've stolen my stuff, worth over a billion dollars."
Shou Xia said: "If you had agreed earlier, to install an infrared security system then."
Fu Hao said: "That was my mistake."
Shou Xia said: "No, I promise you I will."

Fu Hao said: "If you don't bring back the painting" "I will kill you." Fu Hao's threat scared Shou Xia so much that he ran out of the room in tears. Fu Hao closed the door and laughed heartily. He thought he had won, but he didn't expect a surprise.

Jia Fu Lian said: "This is my childhood rocking horse" "It was painted by my great-great-grandfather when he came back from overseas" "This was the environment around him when his ship was wrecked" "Feel free to have a look" "I'll go and pour some tea".
Fu Hao: "Thank you." Everyone looked around the room, Fu Hao pointed to a place, and said: "Here."
David walked over to Coco and said: "Sorry, we need to discuss some private matters."
The three of them huddled together, whispering, "What about the manuscript?"
David said: "Best to pretend to stay for two days, steal it and then leave."
Coco said: "No, at least make a fake head to switch with the real one."
David said: "To make a fake" "You need data" "Professor Guan has the data" "Find Coco".
JC said: "Don't ever mention stealing in front of her," "she won't help us."
The man in black asked: "Then what should we do?"
Coco excitedly ran over with a scroll and said: "Look, it's Lang Shining's 'Autumn Hunting.'"
Jia Fu Lian asked: "Is it valuable?"
The butler walked in and said: "Old things are certainly valuable."
Jia Fu Lian joked: "My grandfather's chamber pot is also very valuable."
Jia Fu Lian exclaimed: "So the painting really exists."
Jia Fu Lian turned back and said: "I thought it was burned up."
Jia Fu Lian holding a teapot said: "In the year 1860, my great-great-grandfather sailed on the Not-fire to China," "fought a victorious battle," "this is one of the spoils he brought back."
Coco holding a picture frame said: "You must mean the looting of the Old Summer Palace" "It happened during the Second Opium War, remember?"
Jia Fu Lian replied: "That depends on one's perspective."
JC turned to look at Coco and said: "She's right", "The corrupt Qing government executed diplomats from Britain and France", "which became an excuse for the war."
Coco said: "Are those the reasons for two industrial nations to join forces to invade an agricultural nation?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_6720_6900.text: Lei Luo and Piggy walked towards the stairwell, Lei Luo holding a gun in his right hand, and Piggy holding a pistol in his left hand, both at the ready. They cautiously advanced, and as they neared the stairwell corner, they suddenly heard the sound of a door closing.
Lei Luo and Piggy were searching for A Hao in the narrow corridor, with Piggy holding a gun and constantly saying: "Don't run."

Lei Luo, who had been quietly observing from the laundry room, saw the man in the suit holding a gun and immediately understood his intention. He quickly hid behind the clothes rack and observed his next move.

Lei Luo, hiding behind the curtain, saw the enemy's gun pointing at him, so he pulled out his gun and aimed at the enemy on the right. Unexpectedly, the enemy on the right dodged and aimed at Lei Luo's back. In a critical moment, Piggy took the opportunity to shoot the enemy in the back.
Piggy and Lei Luo were still shooting at each other, Yan Tong was hit and fell to the ground, Lei Luo was shot dead, and the screen gradually turned black.
Piggy, clutching his chest, fell backward: "Damn" "I've been hit" "Lei Luo brother" "Leave a spot for me" "I want to be with you in the next life" "Lei Luo brother"
Piggy, lying on the ground, said: "I'm scared."
Lei Luo looked at the unconscious A Hao, gently touching his forehead.
Lei Luo held his face, recalling the past when his wife left him, and he was alone, without any support.
Lei Luo dragged Piggy out of the alley.
A Hao cautiously approached, but Hunter arrived in time to block his way. The two faced off in the narrow alley, with A Hao aiming his gun at Hunter.

A Hao was shot in the leg and fell to the ground. Seeing this, Hunter quickly ran over to him. A Hao picked up a gun from the ground and hid behind a cement block. Peter and Hunter kept shooting at each other.
A Hao was hiding behind a wall, constantly reloading his gun. Seeing that the enemies were still relentless, he had to keep shooting back.

A Hao, who had just rushed to the second floor, was pinned down by a thug on the stairs. Peter, who had just been hiding on the first floor, was forced to retreat step by step. He hid behind a wall, loaded his gun, and suddenly burst out, forcing the thug to retreat.
Hunter, holding a gun, said: "You should go back to where you came from" "A Hao" "I'll kill you."

A Qi was shot and fell, Hunter took the opportunity to take down two more enemies. Peter was knocked down by an enemy, A Qi seeing this, dropped his gun and ran to help Peter. He held Peter down, trying to save him.

A Qi, who had been shot in the abdomen, rolled over and lay on his back. Blood continuously gushed out from his mouth. A Hao, who was on the stairs, saw this and dropped the iron rod in his hand and ran over.

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Xu Decai, who was about to slap the dog, was pulled back by the window. Wang Xiaobing was still ringing the bell and shouting: "Waiter! Waiter!"
Gou Sheng walked into the restaurant and asked, "Where is everyone?"
Wang Xiaobing turned his head and said: "That stare is quite intimidating."
Da Ma shouted: "Cui Hua, Gou Sheng!"
Cui Hua asked, "What do you want to eat?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "A big bowl of beef noodles, extra meat and vegetables." Then he turned to Cui Hua and asked, "Hey, what are you looking at?"
Cui Hua tilted her head and asked: "Anything else?"
Wang Xiaobing looked around and said: "Nothing else to eat," "What's going on," "What kind of attitude is this," "Where's the young girl?"
Cui Hua pointed at the noodles and signaled Wang Xiaobing to eat. Wang Xiaobing said, "Are you crazy?" and continued eating alone after picking up a chopstick.
Xu Decai walked to the counter and saw Da Ma sleeping on the side, even snoring. He opened the refrigerator and grabbed two bottles of beer.
Xu Decai turned around, picked up the calendar on the table, and pointed to the date on it. He said, "Last year's calendar." He then walked to the window with his suitcase and looked outside.
At this moment, three people arrived at Lao Da's grocery store. Lao Da asked, "Who owns the car with the dog outside? Huh?" Lao Da came out from inside, and the three were instantly startled.
Lao Da turned around and said: "Not enough to eat? Who owns the car with the dog outside?"

At this moment, Cui Hua suddenly appeared, glaring fiercely at Wang Xiaobing. Da Ma and Wang Xiaobing's mother also glared at him fiercely. Wang Xiaobing shouted, "It's mine," and was kicked down by Cui Hua, yelling, "Oh my mom!"
The man in the blue shirt patted the man in the green shirt and said: "Should we just do it? Don't you know what teamwork is?"
Da Ma asked: "Bro, what are you doing?"
Da Ma said: "Go fight outside, don't break my stuff."
Lao Da pointed at them and said: "Don't make me lose hope." "I don't want to hurt innocent people." "And I have professional ethics."
Da Ma said: "Hey, I've got a bad temper; I don't believe you."
Xu Decai gripped the handle of the cane tightly, watching the two people fighting, and said: "Cowards."
Lao Da said: "You're making me lose hope." "I don't want to make a scene." "Who are you talking about?" Lao Da closed the shop and walked outside.
The man in the red shirt walked up to Lao Da and said: "Big brother, I suspect he, he is talking about me."
Lao Da said: "You don't have to suspect; he is talking about you." Lao Da patted his shoulder and then turned to leave.

Xu Decai kicked the man in the chest, and the man in the red shirt immediately turned to hit Xu Decai, but was knocked down by Xu Decai. Xu Decai then punched the man in the face, and the man in the red shirt said: "Don't keep hitting my nose."

The scene switches to a restaurant where Xu Decai is chasing Wang Xiaobing. The restaurant is in disarray, tables and chairs are overturned, and the waiters are scared and hiding. A waiter said: "Bro, catch. Why didn't you catch it?"
The boss took off his shirt, revealing a tattoo on his arm. Da Ma saw the tattoo and screamed, "Everyone get out of here."

movie101_7021874945990853151_5340_5520.text: The bodyguards shouted, "Retreat, retreat, retreat."
The group of people behind were still shooting crazily, Fang Jie and Ye Qishan quickly ran up the stairs, but the bullet holes on the wall were already too many.
Ye Qishan said, "Everyone stop firing."
Fang Jie turned and ran, Ye Qishan chased after him, and the servants downstairs were still fighting.
Ye Qishan said, 'Don't waste your energy, you can't escape.'
Ye Qishan struggled to get up and said, 'Save your breath, want to end up in a wheelchair?'

Fang Jie was shot in the leg and fell to the ground. Ye Qishan rushed up and fired another shot, hitting Fang Jie in the shoulder. The two grappled, and Ye Qishan took the opportunity to grab Fang Jie's gun. Fang Jie fired a shot at Ye Qishan's head, but Ye Qishan ducked and grabbed Fang Jie's wrist.

Fang Jie stabbed at Ye Qishan, who dodged the attack and grabbed Fang Jie's wrist. Ye Qishan's subordinates rushed in with guns, and Fang Jie used the knife to slash at Ye Qishan's abdomen. Ye Qishan dodged again, and Fang Jie, seeing an opportunity, stabbed fiercely, only to have the knife knocked away by Ye Qishan.
Fang Jie then turned to face Ye Qishan, who was coming at him with a knife. Ye Qishan swung his knife at him, but Fang Jie dodged and countered with a punch to his stomach.

Fang Jie was about to leave with the bag when Ye Qishan grabbed his leg. Fang Jie used force to break free and kicked Ye Qishan in the chest. Ye Qishan got up and threw a punch, which Fang Jie blocked with his hands. Ye Qishan then kicked at Fang Jie's face, but Fang Jie dodged with a somersault.
Li Zihao was knocked down by Ye Qishan. Fang Jie rushed to help but was thrown aside by Ye Qishan. Li Zihao picked up the gun from the ground and aimed it at Ye Qishan.
The man in black pressed against the window, shooting back at the crowd, when a young man suddenly rushed forward, shouting, "Fire!"

Fang Jie swung a punch straight for Ye Qishan's face, but Ye Qishan dodged it with a swift back move. Then, Ye Qishan grabbed Fang Jie's arm and punched him in the stomach. The bodyguards behind Ye Qishan each held an axe and a gun, aiming at Fang Jie.
Tang Qianqian climbed up the wall using the colorful lights. She reached the window but couldn't open it.
Tang Qianqian climbed out of the window, standing on the external corridor, using the rope to steady herself, and looked down to see Ye Qishan being dragged by Li Zihao.

Ye Qishan and Fang Jie were still fighting in the hallway, while Tang Qianqian was hanging from the balcony outside, listening to the two arguing, her hands tied to the top of the banner above the door.

Ye Qishan grabbed Tang Qianqian's hand just in time, and the two of them grabbed each other's arms tightly. The shop sign was pulled down by the impact, and the glass on the second floor shattered. The two of them were hanging in mid-air, Ye Qishan was hanging half outside the window, and Tang Qianqian was hanging half outside the banner. Ye Qishan was holding Tang Qianqian's hand with all his might, his knuckles turning white.
Li Zihao grabbed his right hand, pulling him down, then quickly rolled to the ground. He immediately got up and grabbed the assassin's leg, throwing him onto the coffee table.

The man in the suit suddenly got up and swung a hammer at Ye Qishan. Ye Qishan dodged and grabbed the man's neck, choking him. The man struggled and broke free, throwing Ye Qishan to the ground. Ye Qishan got up and grabbed the man's leg, pulling him back. The man kicked Ye Qishan away, and Ye Qishan got up again, throwing the man over his shoulder.

Ye Qishan, holding a gun, rushed into the living room, but was immediately shot dead by the drug dealer who had just fallen from the stairs. The drug dealer then turned and shot at Li Zihao, who was hiding behind the sofa with Fang Jie. Li Zihao fired back, but the drug dealer was already lying on the ground, clutching his chest.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6900_7080.text: A Hao, seeing the dying A Qi, let out a sigh of relief, while Hunter walked over to the control panel, turned the switch to the off position, and the iron cage slowly rose.
A Qi, with blood at the corner of his mouth, looked at A Hao with a smile in his eyes. Then, blood spurted from his mouth, splattering on the wall. A Hao, seeing this, showed a look of terror.

A Hao, with a fierce look in his eyes, gritted his teeth and pulled the trigger. The bullet flew through the air and landed precisely in the palm of Hunter's raised hand. Lei Luo, seeing this, immediately drew his gun and aimed at A Hao. Lei Luo shouted, "Drop the gun!"
A Hao, who had been shot in the leg, was struggling to climb up the iron frame on the wall. Seeing Lei Luo opening the door, he quickly tried to escape but was shot in the leg, causing him to fall.
A Hao, seeing this, was terrified and quickly pressed down on A Qi's body. Lei Luo, who had been hiding behind the wall, saw that neither side seemed to be able to move and slowly lowered his gun.
A Hao, panting, looked at A Qi and then at Lei Luo, feeling a deep sense of guilt.
Lei Luo said: 'A Hao, I'll take you out.' A Hao, who was kneeling on the ground, forcefully pulled the gun from the corpse's hand, then stood up and looked at Lei Luo.
A Hao kicked Lei Luo away, then turned and pulled up the weak Lei Luo from the ground, saying: "A Hao, A Hao."
A Hao, seeing the body on the ground, immediately turned and ran. He ran to the rooftop, opened the door, and went inside. Lei Luo, seeing A Hao enter, quickly closed the door.
He then ran to the back of the corridor, crouched down, and looked through the broken window on the roof. Sure enough, he saw Lei Luo and his men searching for him.

At this moment, the door of the courtyard suddenly opened, and a man in a suit holding a gun slowly walked out. Seeing Hunter on the rooftop, he immediately raised his gun and aimed at him. As Hunter was about to leave, the shot rang out, and he fell to the ground.
A Hao, who had been hiding in the shadows, suddenly pounced, grabbing Hunter's leg and throwing him to the ground. In the struggle, A Qi's gun fell to the ground.
A Hao, who had just shot, walked towards Hunter. Seeing this, Hunter quickly crawled towards the gun on the ground. When A Hao reached out to grab him, Hunter kicked him away.
A Hao kicked Hunter and said, "Damn you! Damn you! You can't kill me, I'm a British police officer, you should look up to me, you fisherman," then kicked him again.
Hunter, gasping for breath, said: "My country, we built this place," "We educated you," "Without me, you are still a damn fisherman!"
Hearing the noise, A Hao rushed over and shouted, "A Hao!"
A Hao said: "Fate and life are predetermined." After saying this, A Hao slowly stood up, while Lei Luo hurriedly picked up the gun from the ground.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: Zhao Bing, dressed in a beautiful gown and wearing a pearl necklace, stood in front of the mirror in the restroom, vomiting. After she finished, she looked at herself in the mirror with satisfaction.
Zhao Bing took off her coat and sat opposite Xu Decai. A waiter brought over two drinks and asked: "May I offer you two our special cocktails?" "May I?"

The waiter brought the cocktail and said: "Very well. This cocktail is prepared for you. It's called 'Flame of Love.' You see its red color? It's reminiscent of a rose in the dark night. So passionate, so brilliant."
The waiter brought a drink and said: "This one is for you. It's called 'Emerald Green.' The green of the emerald symbolizes the vigorous vitality of love, full of hope. Please enjoy slowly."
The waiter brought the dishes and asked: "Don't you want to try it?" Zhao Bing ignored the waiter and picked up the cocktail cup, took a sip, and started to chew on the lime.
Xu Decai, with a drink in hand, sat down opposite Zhao Bing, staring intently at her.
Xu Decai, with a furrowed brow, stared at Zhao Bing and said: "I didn't expect you to do something like this to me."
Zhao Bing said: "Do you know what I've given up" "to have what I have today?" "I simply cannot afford to lose."
Xu Decai said: "So, you can afford to lose me?"
Zhao Bing said: "I gave you the opportunity to leave" "It's your own failure to take it" "It's fate" "If you were me, would you let me go?"
Xu Decai said: "I would try to find a solution."

Zhao Bing said: "Don't try to be so noble. I don't believe a word you men say. If you were truly willing to sacrifice for me, you wouldn't have come to me at this time. If you really had no ulterior motives, you would not have copied that USB flash drive and taken it away; you would have destroyed it right then and there."
Xu Decai's eyes were filled with disgust. He sneered and said: "I've finally seen you for what you truly are, Zhao Bing. You are a villain."
Zhao Bing looked at him and said: "Are you judging me?" Zhao Bing glared at him and demanded: "What right do you have to judge me?" "What kind of person are you?" "Don't you know yourself?"
Xu Decai said: "In these ten years, I've never done anything that wronged you. I even thought about... being together with you."
Zhao Bing said: "Do you really have feelings for me? If it weren't for that girl leaving you ten years ago, would you be with me, huh? Don't think I don't know why you're with me."

movie101_7021874945990853151_5520_5700.text: Li Zihao's words left Tang Qianqian stunned. The gunshot came from behind the door. Fang Jie quickly pulled out a gun and said, "Rush over."
Fang Jie fired back at the enemies, protecting Ye Qishan while trying to buy time for the arrival of Tang Hexuan.
The bodyguard said, "Hey, no more bullets huh? I'm going to kill you."

Li Zihao fired a shot, startling everyone. He then slowly walked into the smoking room, looking around. Seeing that no one was paying attention to him, he casually closed the door. Tang Qianqian, who had been hiding behind the door, was still scared, holding the gun with both hands.
The waiter said, 'Get on.'
Fang Jie came out from the room, took off his hat, and said, "You're too late."
Fang Jie fired back at the two bodyguards, then turned and shot Ye Qishan in the leg. He then bent down, pulled Ye Qishan up, and said, "Get up!"
Li Zihao was hit by a bullet and staggered backward, crashing into a chair. Fang Jie quickly pulled down the curtains, then opened the window to help Li Zihao escape.

Li Zihao turned and saw the bodyguards rushing into the room. He quickly hid behind the door. The bodyguards split into two groups, one upstairs and one downstairs. The bodyguards upstairs opened fire first, and Li Zihao shot the door lock. The bodyguards downstairs broke in. Ye Qishan struggled to stand up, and Li Zihao shot him in the abdomen. Tang Qianqian tied Ye Qishan to the chair with a rope.
Ye Qishan cursed, "Damn it, kill me then, you two bastards." "Don't even think about leaving here alive," "especially you, Fang Jie, you little wimp."
Li Zihao wiped the blood from Ye Qishan's face and said, "I don't like people cursing my brother"
Ye Qishan, with a mouth full of gauze, tried to escape, but Li Zihao held onto him tightly.
Tang Qianqian saw the bomb strapped to Ye Qishan's chest and quickly dodged. Li Zihao lit the fuse and said, "Let me go."

Fang Jie kicked open the door, Li Zihao shouted, "Let me go!" Fang Jie kicked the gun out of Li Zihao's hand, and the subordinates rushed in with their guns. Ye Qishan was tied to a chair, with a gag in his mouth, unable to speak. Fang Jie kicked open the door to the smoking room, walked in, and the subordinates immediately fired warning shots.
Fang Jie, who had just rushed out of the building, narrowly avoided the explosion. The glass door was blown open, and he staggered out in disarray.

Li Zihao, who had been shot, was still unwilling to give up. He picked up a dagger and lunged at Tang Qianqian. Just as he was about to stab Tang Qianqian, Tang Hexuan fired a shot, hitting Li Zihao's vital area. The assassin who had been shot thrice in a row lost his strength and fell to the ground. Tang Hexuan, exhausted, sat on a chair, holding a handkerchief to his mouth to wipe his blood.
A sudden explosion occurred at the cinema, and the crowd was shocked and said, 'Look, why did an explosion happen over there,' 'What happened?'

Li Zihao and Fang Jie got out of the car, and the car drove into the narrow lane. The newspaper reported that the Japanese army had occupied the northern part of Shanghai, and the next day, Tang Hexuan and Fu Sheng were reading the newspaper in their house.
Tang Hexuan smiled and said, 'Fu Sheng'
Tang Hexuan replied, "Present."
Tang Hexuan said, "It's our turn to clean up."
Fu Sheng said, 'Sir, you are always one step ahead.'
The scene shifts to a rainy night. A convoy of cars arrives at the hotel's main entrance. The cars quickly drive away, and the scene returns to the hotel's interior.
Fang Jie: 'Bro, why did Fu Sheng call us this late?'

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: The woman retorted: "In the eyes of those industrial countries, China is indeed a strong country."
A man nearby chimed in, "Yeah, back then our Qing government considered itself as the Celestial Empire."
The man steps forward and asks, 'Are you helping me or her?'
The man turned around and said, 'Of course, I'm helping you. And then?'
The man: "What?"
Mr. Tang asks curiously: "And then what?"
The woman answers, "On the way back, they encountered a storm." "The ship was destroyed."
Coco: "The stolen items were too many and too heavy." "This is retribution."
The foreign woman asked the man beside her: 'What did she say? Can you speak English?'
Coco turned around and said: "I don't speak English."
Coco: "I didn't say that was unfortunate" "I said he deserved it."
The woman retorted: "He deserved it? That's too heartless." "He went to China on a national mission." "It was his duty as a soldier." "Fortunately, he was saved by a passing Chinese merchant ship."
Coco: "Heaven really didn't open its eyes back then."
The woman looked at him and asked, "What are you saying?"
The man replied, "She said thank heaven he came back."
Coco: "Clearly, that wasn't what she said." "But I still appreciate it."
Coco: "You're welcome."
Coco rolled her eyes and put the certificate back in her bag, saying, "What are you doing?"
Coco: "I'm taking it back to China."
Coco pulls the man and says: "This is my home" "You cannot take things at will."
Coco: "Your ancestors took this painting without asking, just like over a hundred years ago." The three were stunned by this revelation. Coco angrily pushed past the two and stormed out.

The man in the middle quickly intervened, "Coco," "Coco," "Coco," "Well, well, that was a long time ago." "Just like back then if a woman wore little, someone might throw stones at her." "Not at you, at her." "Sorry."
Coco stepped forward and said, 'What are you apologizing for? Don't be a doormat. The ones who should apologize are them—'
The man asked, "Did she say anything?"

Coco turned around and said: 'I don't need you to translate for me. Have you all forgotten? Over a hundred years ago in our country, they burned, killed, and looted. Just over a century ago, you came to our country to plunder and kill. Even a hundred years later, these are painful memories for the Chinese people.'

The woman nodded and said, "That's right. I've studied history, and no matter how you interpret it, those events did happen. Sometimes we can only justify it with unreasonable reasons, like in those days, the strong were always right."
Mr. Ip: 'We can't judge past mistakes by today's standards. Even now, the strong rule. You need to be strong enough for others to reason with you.'
Coco: "Alright, I begin to understand her thoughts." "Sorry." "In the end, these things all belong to the bank now." "They are of no value to me." "If I could, I would give them to you."
A foreign man said: "Isn't it true that you just wanted to get into this fort?" "It wasn't easy to get here," "We'll stay with you for two days then leave." "How about a cup of tea?"
Coco: "Since you're here,"

movie101_6973286990817002015_7080_7260.text: Lei Luo said to A Hao: "A Hao, don't push me. Those around us, all our brothers and sisters, died for us, none left. Shooting him won't bring them back. Give yourself a chance. Give your son a chance. Give Ah Jing a chance."
A Hao slowly raised his head, his eyes red and tears streaming down.
Lei Luo slowly raised the gun, aiming at A Hao. A Hao looked up in fear, wide-eyed, while Hunter clutched at his chest, struggling to breathe.
Lei Luo stood up and walked to A Hao's front, looking at him intently. A Hao was also looking at him, and Lei Luo said: "You're a good brother."

movie101_7166164445343941151_4860_5040.text: Yang Shan was full of youth and vitality, her figure dancing gracefully under the sunlight. Xu Decai and the workers watched her from below, their eyes following her movements.

Yang Shan stood up, stretching out her arms to feel the gentle sunlight through the gaps. She closed her eyes, savoring this moment of freedom and happiness. The sunlight was warm, the leaves were vibrant, and the flowers were in full bloom. The world was pure and beautiful.

Yang Shan stood on the rooftop, raising her hands high, looking down at the construction workers below. The workers looked up and smiled at her, thinking she was one of them. Xu Decai and his entourage arrived at the construction site, where the workers were all wearing helmets and safety gear.
Xu Decai looked around, and the singing instantly stopped. Xu Decai turned to the people around him and said: "Turn off the music."
Xu Decai turned on the car radio, and the melodious music began to play. Yang Shan's father and Yang Shan walked towards the dance floor.

The foreman, seeing this, quickly tried to calm him down, but Xu Decai remained unmoved. Meanwhile, Yang Shan inside the house, having confirmed that Xu Decai was indeed inside, turned and left contentedly.

The next day, Yang Shan went to the door of the house where the perpetrator lived. After touching the door and feeling reluctant to leave, she turned to the landlord beside her and said, "Let's move."
Xu Decai signaled the workers to move aside, then walked to the front and looked around.
Xu Decai looked up at the poster, which featured his photo alongside the words: 'Comedy King, Renfeng, the King of Light Humor'.
Xu Decai watched the departing Yang Shan, his eyes gradually becoming firm. He knew he needed to let go, but it was hard. In the end, he decided to give up, turn around, and leave.

The excavator moved to the side of the house, the bucket was lowered and the roof was destroyed. The entire house was in a mess, the walls were cracked, the paint was peeling off, and the tiles were broken. The camera moved inside the house, the bed and table were overturned, the walls were cracked, and the tiles were shattered.
The camera panned around the room, everything was as usual, but the artificial flowers on the handrail were slightly swaying.

The scene shifted to the rooftop where the ring was placed. The ring fell off the rooftop and landed on the bus where Xu Decai was working. Xu Decai got into the driver's seat and drove away, leaving the ring behind on the bus.
Yang Shan asked: 'Where did you go just now, why did it take so long?'
The driver, after listening, said: "I had some things to do." After saying that, he turned around and left.

The driver asked: "Where to?" The man in the passenger seat was silent, so the driver turned his head to look at the road ahead. At this moment, a motorcycle caught up from behind and passed the truck. The man in the passenger seat took out his phone and unlocked it with a password. The phone screen showed a text message from Yang Shan.

The car sped forward, and suddenly, the vehicle's speed wobbled. The car wobbled and came to a stop. Li Zihao, who had just fallen, was lying on the ground. Li Zihao, unwilling to be caught, reversed the car, ramming into the police car behind. The two in the back seat took the opportunity to jump out, but were quickly pulled back in by the front passenger seat, which was still firmly gripping Li Zihao's neck.

Fang Jie, seeing the other car coming head-on, quickly grabbed the steering wheel and tried to wrestle with Li Zihao for control. The two cars collided head-on, and the oncoming car swerved to the right, narrowly avoiding the two vehicles.

Pirate Captain commanded: "Squat down, quickly, understand?"
Pirate Captain said: "Don't do anything stupid and no one will get hurt."
Pirate Captain shouted loudly: "The ransom is fixed at five hundred thousand, you guys sort it out."
Pirate Captain: "Well said," then everyone started clapping.

Everyone: "Well said"
Pierre said: "If no one ransoms these three women, it's fine, we'll keep them"
The crowd applauded and said: "Well said"
Pierre said: "Let me tell you something, we are not with them, my boss is willing to give you whatever you want, he is rich, these guys want me to fight you, but I refused."
Pirate Captain said: "Take them away!"
The three men in the back row knelt down and kowtowed, saying: "Thank you!"
Pirate Captain angrily said: "What are you doing on my island"
Pirate Captain said: "My hat!"
Pirate Captain asked: "Tell me, what are you doing here"
Simon said: "I don't understand."
Pirate Captain said: "Mandarin."
Pirate Captain grunted in agreement, and Divid gestured for him to go ahead.

Pirate Captain said: "Barbecue?" "Use this" "What are you using this for"
Divid translated: "Mini microwave."
Pirate Captain said: "You think I'm stupid? This is a metal detector. What are you searching for? Alright, if you don’t want to tell me, I will find out myself. Take those women away."
The woman grabbed the approaching hand and said: "Don't touch me."
Pirate Captain suddenly pulled the pin and shouted: "Get down!"

The paintball guns in the hands of the two were quickly exhausted, and the wall behind them was riddled with holes. The parrots in the cage were also shot down by the paintballs. The tourists who were not in the cage had no place to hide and could only lie on the ground, watching helplessly as the parrots flew away with the paintballs. In the end, only a few tourists were left standing.

The walkie-talkie signal came from the dense vine-covered wall. Everyone was stunned, looking at each other. Pirate Captain, who was smoking nearby, took a puff and said: "It wasn't me who pressed it"
Simon shouted: "Watch your direction"
Simon, who had just escaped, was tackled to the ground by Divid. The cannonball hit the wooden hut, causing it to shake. Simon hurriedly got up and said: "Boss, are you okay?" "Don't move."
The mercenary who was knocked down got up and charged at Simon, but Simon knocked him down with a punch. Simon turned to see another mercenary coming at him and quickly dodged to the side.
Pierre raised his hands and said: "Forgot to tell you, our guns have no bullets"
Pierre said: "We'll be fine as long as we don't move."
The man in the white hat raised his hands and said: "Yes"
Pirate Captain was knocked to the ground, and the gun fell into the water. The henchman quickly picked up the gun. Pirate Captain shouted: "Don't let him get the gun"
Pirate Captain said: "Okay."
The mercenaries raised their hands in surrender, but then JC and Simon pounced on the nearest one, with Simon kicking him in the head and JC punching him in the face.
Pierre, who was about to strike with a machete, was kicked away by JC. He rolled several times before getting up, only to be kicked through a wooden stake by JC again.

movie101_6991751088659497479_1800_1980.text: Mr. Wu and Xiao Dou were tied to chairs in a small room, with various shackles on their hands and feet. Mr. Wu was looking under the table for something.

At this moment, Cang Zi was sitting in front of the stove, cutting something in his hand with pliers. After finishing, he threw the object into the stove. Mr. Wu and Xiao Dou were sitting on the other side, with their hands and feet bound. They were struggling to break free from the chains, but there was no key to unlock them.
Mr. Wu was tied to a chair with iron chains, while Xiao Dou and Cang Zi were also tied to the bed and desk respectively.
Mr. Wu and Xiao Dou are struggling to break free from the chains. Mr. Wu crawls towards the window, trying to escape through the glass.
Xiao Dou kicked open the door, Mr. Wu aimed at the newcomer, Cang Zi, who was approaching, and Xiao Dou covered his head with a blanket.

Mr. Wu and Xiao Dou were tied to the same tree, with Xiao Dou struggling to break free. Cang Zi sat in the room, staring at the vibrating phone. He picked it up to check, only to see it flashing with a red light. Cang Zi handed the phone to Cao Gang, who was eating sunflower seeds.
Cang Zi: "Mm," "Ah," "Understood."
At this moment, Cang Zi brought a group of people over and said: 'Your boss said to add chains and locks,' 'Use all of these.'
Xiao Dou: "They are all locked up."
Cao Gang: "They are all locked up," Cao Gang leads the way, with Cang Zi and Manager Zhang following behind. Cao Gang kicks open the door to a room and gestures for Cang Zi to enter.
The scene shifts to Cao Gang opening the safe in the room, and the police said, "A call just went out ten minutes ago."
Cao Gang: "What number?"
Cao Gang: "It should be the customer service of a bank."
Cao Gang: "Check the roadside surveillance again."
The scene switches to the police station, where Cao Gang is watching the surveillance footage. Cao Gang asks: "Can you see the car plate?"
Cao Gang: "The plate is blocked."
The person on the other end of the phone said: "Manager Zhang"
Mr. Wu asked: "What's the situation?"

The scene shifts to the police station, where a policeman says, "Just went to the victim's house but it was a wild goose chase." "The main lead now is the suspect's vehicle which is still being screened." "The modus operandi is the same - it can be combined with the Kong brothers' case for investigation."
Cao Gang: "Your old adversary."
Cao Gang: 'I've come across them twice.'
Xing Feng: "Sit down and tell me about it."

Xiao Dou: "The suspect is named Zhang Hua," "who was just released from prison a little over a year ago." "His accomplices," "are mainly prison friends he met during his sentence." "They pulled off two incidents recently."
Zhang Hua approached Second Brother Kong and said, "Second Brother Kong, right?" "We are police." "Could you help us with the investigation?" "Can you cooperate with us, brother?"
Second Brother Kong: "Okay, come."
Second Brother Kong: "Can you cooperate with us, brother?" Second Brother Kong and his men were checking the two's pockets.
Kong Laoda: "Alright, let's do as you say." "Okay, okay."
Cao Gang: "Kong Laoda, I understand how you feel." "But you can't rush this," "you know we have to take it slow."
Kong Laoda shouted angrily: 'Can you guarantee my brother will comes back alive?'
Xing Feng: "We have to cooperate on this."
Kong Laoda: "What kind of cooperation do you mean" "You sound uncertain"

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Wang Xiaobing shouted: "In, everything can be sold but not kidney, I am still fighting, planning to have a boy, no, two boys"

Xu Decai glanced at Wang Xiaobing and said: "What are you doing?" "Look at you, making a mess, the car is all dirty." The small truck finally entered the factory, and the workers were busy unloading goods at the dock.

Wang Xiaobing said: "Bro, bro, hey, bro" "See that topless man" "He's been in the number for three years" "He's vicious when he fights" "No one here dares to mess with him" "And the one next to him, the one with the head like a rooster's comb" "His name is Li Hai" "A martial character in Beijing Opera Troupe"
Xu Decai looked at him and said: "OK, OK, did those two do it?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "Why should they kill me with a butcher knife, they are big shots."
Xu Decai asked in confusion: "How did you offend them?"

Wang Xiaobing explained: "This is what happened. Recently, the fare for this trip to the provincial capital increased by a thousand yuan. I didn't raise mine, but maintained the original price. I wanted to get more business."
Xu Decai said: "Aren't you asking for trouble?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "What do you mean trouble? I was making money." "Brother, you better talk less," and then the two got out of the car.
Li Hai, smoking a cigarette, said: "What are you guys doing?"
Wang Xiaobing smiled and said: "Apologize apologize apologize"
Li Hai said: "What apology?"
Xu Decai said helplessly: "We got beaten and they stole our suitcase"

Wang Xiaobing said: "Yes yes yes, let me tell you." "My daughter is in the hospital." "So I went ahead to ask some old friends for money." "But he pretended not to know me." "That made me quite angry." "Then I went to eat something." "While eating, a bunch of guys came over and started hitting me."
Li Hai said: "I'll give you 10,000 yuan."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Hit me."
Li Hai said: "Looking for trouble, aren't you?"
Wang Xiaobing looked at the shirtless man and cried, saying: "No, no, no, I came here to apologize myself."
Li Hai said: "Okay, come with me."
Wang Xiaobing smiled and said: "Thank you, brother."
Li Hai said: "Hey, this is not an apology"

Wang Xiaobing looked at the two people in front of him with a helpless expression, then the scene shifted to a dimly lit room where a group of people were playing mahjong. A man in a white tank top stood up and put a ring on his hand.
Huang Dage laughed and said, "Haha, haha."
The man in the yellow shirt said: "Hey, big brother wins."
The ladies around started clapping and singing along.
The man in the pink shirt said: "Hurry up and bring out the money, quickly, quickly."
The man said: "I won the last round and you haven't given me my money yet"
Huang Dage said: 'Big brother, I have no change.'
The man in the gray T-shirt said: "Three yuan, three yuan, very clear."
The monk said: "Isn't it just three yuan?"
The man in the yellow shirt slapped Huang Dage and said: "What's wrong with you, get lost!"
The man in yellow clothes said: "Smoke a cigarette"
Huang Dage cursed, 'Damn, are you lighting a cigarette or starting a fire? Get lost!'
At this moment, a burly man with sunglasses threw a coconut at Huang Dage and said: "Huang Dage, you're really handsome."
Huang Dage said with a smile: 'Big brother.'
Wang Xiaobing, holding the cigarette, said: 'Oh, Huang Dage, you look even more handsome.'
Huang Dage said: "Yeah, it seems like I hear some dialect."
Huang Dage said: 'Alright.'
Huang Dage said: 'Yeah.'
Huang Dage said: 'Alright.'
Huang Dage said: 'Hey old fellow'
Wang Xiaobing said with a smile: "Then it's easy with Huang Dage."
Huang Dage said: "Damn, why are you carrying a broom? What's this about?"
The boss, wearing sunglasses, said: 'Hey, who let you guys in?'
Wang Xiaobing said: "My name is Wang Xiaobing, I'm a freight driver in this market, I, I came to apologize."
Huang Dage laughed and said: "You take me as Lin Xiangru, don't you?"
The man with sunglasses said: "Well, you're much more like that."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1800_1980.text: The scene shifts to a street, where Zhang Dan and Xiao Bao get off the bus. Zhang Dan pats the man's shoulder who was leaning against the bus and said: "Thank you."
The scene shifts to the entrance of a Chinese restaurant in the shopping mall. Zhang Dan and Xiao Bao enter the restaurant, and the restaurant's attendant comes out to greet them before walking away.
The scene switches to a dimly lit restaurant, where a man is watching TV. The TV is showing footage of a murder case. The man says: "Good to see you back" "Kong is waiting for you"

The two knocked on the door, but there was no response. They looked at each other and then went to the neighboring room. Through the crack of the door, they saw King Kong inside, so they turned and left.
Zhang Dan: "Uncle Gang" Zhang Dan walked into the room, and the two hugged each other excitedly.

Zhang Dan: "I've been waiting for you for a long time", Zhang Dan and Xiao Bao came to King Kong's tattoo shop, Zhang Dan handed a bag to King Kong, King Kong opened the zipper, inside was a large amount of cash
King Kong: "I knew it""I won’t go wrong if I trust you""Good". After saying this, King Kong walked out of the room with a smile
Zhang Dan picked up a bottle of paint and asked: "What's this"
King Kong: "It's just a pastime""So that you have something to do after retirement"
King Kong: "Are you little Taiwan", "Are you still cooperating"
Xiao Bao: "Uncle Gang"

King Kong: "You've worked hard." King Kong praised Xiao Bao while taking out a piece of paper from the safe, which contained the secret recipe for the golden tortoise shell. After closing the safe, he turned around and saw the two of them standing behind the table.

King Kong sat down and said: "Before you have an accident""I know you wanted to quit the underworld""It's really helpless to ask you for help as soon as you come out""This check should've been given to you a few years ago"
King Kong: "Rest assured" "It's very safe"
Zhang Dan looked at the piggy bank, then at King Kong, and said: "It's a bit less, because I took out a little bit of money from it". After saying this, he knocked over the piggy bank.
King Kong: "I made this." King Kong handed a wooden doll to Xiao Bao.

Zhang Dan: "After you were in jail", "I was a lookout all the time", "I wanted to find out the person who was shipping the 'Eye of the Forest'", "and I found him". Zhang Dan picked up a wooden doll and continued: "It's this little guy", "I opened his clothes", "and found a note in his pocket".
Xiao Bao covered his mouth and asked: "Is that a tongue?"
Zhang Dan: "Yes"
Zhang Dan thought for a moment and said: "So it was your doing according to the talk on the street"
King Kong: "There are rules to be a thief""I don't kill""But I can ask someone else to""The money spent was worth it""I consider you as my son"
Zhang Dan asked: "Do you know who called the police?"
King Kong chuckled and said: "There are some people you can't guess" "Don’t guess randomly" "Want to know"

movie101_6991751088659497479_180_360.text: President Cheng waved and said, "No problem, no problem" as he walked away, leaving Mr. Wu and the girls to awkwardly continue their walk.
President Cheng hugged Mr. Wu and said, "Alright, alright, ah, thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you."
Mr. Wu apologized, "Sorry, sorry."
President Cheng quickly grabbed Mr. Wu and said, "If you take a photo now, when will you finish?"

Zhang Hua: "They're out," Zhang Hua said, turning his head to look at Xing Feng.
Young Miss: "I'll do it, I'll do it, I'll do it" "Give the flower to them."
President Cheng came over with flowers, President Cheng said: "Study well at home"

President Cheng: "Let me take care of it"

President Cheng pointed at Mr. Wu and said: "That's right, we're from the city's criminal investigation team. Uh, your car is involved in a hit-and-run case, please cooperate and show your driver's license, okay?"
Mr. Wu: "That's impossible" "I rarely drive, I’m not used to driving on the left."

Mr. Wu: "Of course, I've gone through the procedures. Can I see your police ID?"

Mr. Wu looked up and said, "Days go by quickly."
President Cheng: "Days go by quickly, no time for feelings."
Another man asked, "That's not right. Isn't traffic accidents handled by traffic police?"
President Cheng: "Comrade" "You just said you're from the city bureau" "Which division?"
The man in the fur coat said, "If you have any doubts, we can verify it at the station. Everything will be clear, right? Before that, I hope you can cooperate, okay?"
Mr. Wu: "I'm not very familiar with your procedures" "I'm just making a call, 110."
President Cheng: "What's that supposed to mean?" "You’re not cooperating?" "You think being a celebrity lets you off?" "Cuff him up"
Mr. Wu: "What are you talking about?"
The man in the fur coat shoved Mr. Wu into the car and said, "What do you mean, what do you want to do, don't move, okay?"
Mr. Wu was grabbed by the collar by Zhang Hua and said: "How can you police enforce the law like this?"
The thug pointed a gun at Mr. Wu and said, "You're obstructing official duties, stop talking or I'll arrest you too, understand?"
The surrounding crowd quickly surrounded Mr. Wu, and someone shouted: "Take him away"
The two quickly restrained Mr. Wu, "Don't move, okay?"

The scene shifts to a taxi driver speaking into a walkie-talkie: "Zhang Hua squad, we'll bring the person back and verify soon." The taxi driver, Zhang Hua, heard the message and immediately drove in the direction indicated by the walkie-talkie.
Mr. Wu asked, "You're not police, are you?" Zhang Hua, with a smile, shook his head.
Mr. Wu was pinned down in the back seat of the car, unable to move, and said, "This is kidnapping," as a hand holding a knife approached Mr. Wu's face.
"Would you believe me if I said no?" Mr. Wu asked while driving.
The screen goes black, and the film title 'Saving Mr. Wu' appears.
The scene switched to Zhang Hua in the interrogation room saying, "The situation is as such, pretty much what you guys know. If there's anything different, my version is the correct one."
Zhang Hua: "Impressive, acting as police"
Zhang Hua retorted, "Why not? Mr. Wu has also played a cop"

movie101_7026623602615452196_180_360.text: Zhang Dan replied: 'I'll just walk.'
Pierre replied: "Of course," "having been there for five years," "of course," "you'll miss the fresh air."
Zhang Dan said: "Freedom feels so good."
Pierre said: "Getting out of jail doesn't mean you're truly free."
Zhang Dan nodded and said: 'Yes', 'Same for both of us.'
Pierre nodded, Zhang Dan left, and Pierre went to his car, took out a walkie-talkie, and said: "Keep a close watch on him."
At this moment, Zhang Dan was walking alone on a country road. He walked through the fields, passed the gas station, and then arrived at the airport.
At this moment, Zhang Dan was drinking coffee at the gas station's convenience store, secretly observing the situation. A mother and her daughters were playing nearby.

Zhang Dan glanced at the phone, then put down the coffee and answered the call. Female Police Officer was secretly taking pictures inside the car with a professional camera, and Zhang Dan was in the frame. Female Police Officer immediately turned off the camera.

Female Police Officer used the camera to lock on the location of the grocery store, then quickly got out of the car and ran to the gas station. A helicopter was flying in the sky, and Female Police Officer looked up at it.

The gas station attendant said: "Female Police Officer, your car..." Female Police Officer looked up and saw a crushed Red Bull can on the lawn, with the gas station attendant's words echoing in her mind: "Your car..."
He walked into the shop, and the glass door shattered at his feet. He looked around the shop, which was filled with various treasures.
Pierre said: "Pretty smart. No need to tamper with the alarm. I guess you hacked into the wireless system directly before committing the crime and remotely turned off all the surveillance cameras."
Pierre asked: 'Did you get any fingerprints?'
The subordinate replied: "No, officer."
Pierre said: "You're good."
Pierre said: "That's why you could wear this necklace. I hope we can cooperate."
Pierre asked: "Where did he go?"

Zhang Dan said: "To hell with you. You know I didn't do this. Do you have any evidence?" Zhang Dan, who was kneeling on the ground, suddenly stood up. He took a silver kettle from the table and sat down, pouring the water from the kettle all over his hands.
Pierre took the cup and said: "Thank you. We found your fingerprints at the crime scene. Enough to put you behind bars."
Pierre bent down and asked: "Where did he go?"
The scene shifted, and a helicopter appeared in the clear blue sky.
The helicopter carrying Zhang Dan flew over the sea and mountains, on board were Lao Mo and a man in a spacesuit, the latter leaning out of the cabin to take photos with his phone,
Zhang Dan, wearing a helmet and with a parachute on his back, jumped out of the helicopter with a few people.

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: Duchess Tuo Chen grabbed Zhu Er's hand and said, "Get on the horse, quickly!" The three of them mounted their horses and set off.
Inside the room, Purple Marquis was packing his luggage. Mulang Shenjun came in and asked, 'Marquis, you're leaving?'
Purple Marquis said: "Yes, Drunken Hero and Master Qingkong have already left. There's nothing much for us to do here. By the way, there's something I need to tell you."
Fang Baoyu said: 'Tell me.'
Purple Marquis walked up to Fang Baoyu and said: "I know you have always wanted to know about your background."
Fang Baoyu said: "You’re going to tell me."

Purple Marquis said: 'Yes, but there are some details that still need to be clarified. Your mother’s name was Bai Yanzhu, the number one heroine in the martial world. She was brave and decisive, admired by many in the martial world. However, because of her personality, she didn't easily pay attention to many people. Until one day, your grandfather met an outlander hero outside Qingping Manor. His name was Huo Feiteng. It was at this time that your mother also met this outlander hero. However, your grandfather was strongly opposed to this relationship.'
Fang Baoyu asked, 'What happened afterward?'
Duchess Tuo Chen pulled the curtain aside and asked, "How about it, did you find Da Zang?"
The flower girl said: 'As per your order, we went to the bamboo forest but hadn't reached it yet.'
The flower girl said: "We saw flames reaching the sky."
Fang Baoyu said, 'Upon closer inspection, it turned out that the Taoist priests of Wudang had burned down the house. There wasn’t a single shadow around.'
The flower women all picked up their swords and rushed out the door. Huyan Dazang stopped them: 'Stop.'

The leader of the Feather Guard, Huyan Dazang, swung his sword at Purple Marquis, but he was no match for him. He was forced to retreat repeatedly. Seeing this, Huyan Dazang's subordinates used their long swords to pin him down.
The two were evenly matched for the time being, and Zhu Er was already starting to feel the effects of the poison. Zhu Er waved her hand and said, "Step back."

Duchess Tuo Chen was furious, and the four people were about to fight with her when suddenly gunshots rang out. Bullets flew towards them, and in the chaos, Zhu Er was hit and fell to the ground. Seeing this, Huyan Dazang quickly picked up Zhu Er and said, 'Zhu’er, let’s see where you can run.'

The scene shifts to the outskirts of Luoyang city, where Wang Dian and his entourage are riding horses. The leader, Wang Dian, is dressed in splendid attire, but his expression is grave as he rides with his subordinates. Suddenly, he stops and takes out a handkerchief to wipe the blood from his mouth.
The letter read: 'As long as Bēn Yuè is captured, Marquis Zi Yi will obediently go to Baiyun Temple.'
Huyan Dazang said: 'I really hope my wounds heal quickly. Once they do, I’ll head to Baiyun Temple as soon as possible.'
Huyan Dazang said: "Zhu’er is very safe with Wang Dian. I think even heroes can’t resist the beauty’s charm."

movie101_7026623602615452196_1980_2160.text: King Kong said: "Maybe you don't really want to know."
Zhang Dan said: "I want to know."

Zhang Dan said: "It's your fiancée, Amber." Hearing this, King Kong nodded in acknowledgment. Zhang Dan looked at King Kong with a knowing expression, then turned away and chuckled. Seeing this, King Kong also chuckled along.
Zhang Dan laughed and said: "I have to accept it" "Can I make a big score before I retire?"

King Kong said: "Of course, there's a lot of value in combining 'GAIA'. It’s money you can't spend in several lifetimes." "Now we just need the 'Spring of Spirits'." "But this time you really need to think it through." "No more mistakes."
Zhang Dan's smile gradually faded, and he turned his head away in disappointment.

King Kong holding a doll, said: "Carving these dolls, I learned something." "Because we all start from little dolls." "How they look affects the fate of all the dolls." "It's really interesting." "This is destiny."
Zhang Dan looked at King Kong and said: "Understood, tell me the plan."
Xiao Bao, walking in front, said to Zhang Dan: "Now that you have King Kong's check, wouldn't it be better to retire?"
Zhang Dan smiled and said: "How to say?" "Greedy, love for money."
Xiao Bao: "Money is useless when you're dead." "Besides, do you really believe it was Amber who betrayed you?" "You were going to retire for her in the first place."

Xiao Bao said: "She's a good person and I'm the bad guy." "Can't lie for a lifetime." The two walked side by side, with Xiao Bao looking at Zhang Dan and then turning his head away. A large truck passed by, and the two quickly dodged to the side.
Xiao Bao said: "Don't look, we're being followed." "Split up."
Xiao Bao: "Alright, see you in a bit." After saying this, Xiao Bao left with Zhang Dan. The scene shifted to the tram, where a figure suddenly appeared in the crowd.
Zhang Dan got on the subway, looking around for Amber. He turned left and right, and the subway was full of people. He looked down and took out his phone to search for Amber's information.
The scene shifts to a subway car where Zhang Dan, after navigating through the crowded passengers, suddenly spots Amber.

Zhang Dan looked at Amber in surprise. Amber took off her hat and took out a necklace from her pocket. Amber said: "Hand it over." "Forest's Eye", "Wing of Life", "Tingting's necklace." "Who knows what else you stole."
Zhang Dan said: "So you too think I'm a thief, right?"
Amber stepped forward and said: "If you're not a thief, why did you go to jail?"
Zhang Dan said: "You never gave me a chance to explain. It's been five years, you never came once."
Amber said: "I don't want to hear your explanation."
Zhang Dan asked: "Then why are you here?"
Amber said: "Because I'm working with the police to catch you." "This time, if you go in, you will never come out."

Simon extended his hand and said: "I mean my shoe," "Is there gold in this tree?"
At this moment, Simon suddenly shouted: "Found it, found it, bag it."

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Kong Laoda turned around and said: "Can't you hear?" "They are here for the money" "I can afford that money" "You want a million, right?" "I'll give them two million" "That's it" "You guys don't have to deal with this anymore."

Cang Zi: "No!"

Mr. Wu replied: "I have been." "I was a soldier in the south, and then I went to Hong Kong."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: Mulang Shenjun said: "Your mind is lost."

movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.text: Zhang Dan looked at Amber and said: "Stop following me." Then he turned and left.
Amber, who was sitting in the last seat, stared blankly ahead. The vehicle started moving, and the street lights outside the window gradually illuminated.

Pierre clicked the send button, and the pop-up window showed 'Transmission Complete.' Amber looked at the screen in disbelief. Pierre sighed and looked at the screen. The first photo that popped up was a selfie of Zhang Dan and Amber.
Pierre said: "Interesting." He took the wanted poster and looked at it while saying: "We have a suspect. His name is Ah Cang."
Pierre looked at the photos on the computer, and suddenly a female voice came from the other end of the computer: "Enough" "Try this one."
Amber, after finishing the inspection, sat down in the chair, and the screen showed a necklace and a pendant, Pierre said: "GALA"
Amber looked at the computer and saw a photo of Xiao Bao. She said: "That's him." "Do you know him?" "I met him before." "He's quite handsome."
Xiao Bao took the listening device and said: 'This is quite clever. Should we inform King Kong to suspend the operation?'
Xiao Bao shook his head and said: "No."
Xiao Bao said: "Why?" "We might be watched."

Ye Hong pushed Xiao Bao away, and Xiao Bao said: "I was just trying to help." "I didn't expect you to be so sensitive."

Ye Hong smiled and nodded, the scene switched to a boundless sunflower field, with two cars driving on the country road through the field. The leading car was driving steadily, while the car behind occasionally let out a low roar.
Zhang Dan answered a call while driving: "Rest stop." He then parked the car in a sunflower field and ran in, tearing through the flowers as if nothing could stop him.

Xiao Bao took off his sunglasses and said: "I'll pass."
Xiao Bao said: "Actually, it's not good for women to hold their urine." "But I already considered that." After saying this, Xiao Bao turned around and got off the car.
Xiao Bao took out a pink portable urinal and showed it to Ye Hong, who asked in confusion: "What is this?"
Xiao Bao explained: 'This allows women to pee outdoors. You can stand and pee just like men. How about that? I can accompany you.'
Ye Hong turned around and said: "Are you sick?"
Zhang Dan ran to the jeep, picked up a paper airplane from the back seat, and asked: "What's that?"
Zhang Dan said: "A device that will allow her to pee standing up."
Zhang Dan started the car and asked: "Is it useful?"
Ye Hong took the paper cup and said: "Oh no, pervert."
Zhang Dan shouted: "Little Purple!" The driver quickly turned around, but it was too late.

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Mr. Wu said, "Is this to protect yourself or what"
Zhang Hua said, "Protect yourself," then looked into Mr. Wu's eyes and asked, "Should I trust you or not?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: White Water Holy Mother: "Thank you for your hard work, healing my wounds must have depleted much of your qi."

Mulang Shenjun said: "That's true, but tactics are still important, just follow my lead when the time comes."
The scene shifts to the palace, where Wang Dian is very pleased with the performance of the three foreign women and invites them to continue performing.

Originally, we wanted to decide through a contest of martial arts, but the Demon Cult meddled, and now they have surrounded Baiyun Temple, intending to launch a deadly attack on our Central Plains martial community."

movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.text: The jeep stopped in the forest, and Zhang Dan got off the car.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: Pierre: "They have already stolen the other components that make up GAAH." Charlie: "See."

Ye Hong sighed and said, "It's not the wine's fault" "It's this place."

Charlie smiled and said, "Not only do I understand wine," "but I also understand life." "Let me introduce myself." "I'm Rocherli, this winery is mine."
Charlie: "I've heard of your reputation." "I produce wine review magazines." "I'm Rose, a wine reviewer."
