When they got close enough, JC activated the thrusters and flew up from the ground, but the enemy was already prepared. They raised their guns and shot at him. JC dodged the bullets while flying, and the vehicle drove into a dead end. Zong Sheng asked, "What is that?"
The mercenary's escape route was cut off, he desperately tried to overtake the vehicles on the narrow mountain road, but was still hit by a truck and sent flying.
The team member who received the message said, 'He is there.'
The soldiers behind him were already at the foot of the mountain, and the special police had also stood up from the ground.

The enemy's line of sight was blocked, but they could be seen through the trees. The enemy convoy was still advancing, and the motorcycle-riding Simon was getting closer to the enemy. The enemy convoy was still advancing, and the motorcycle-riding Simon was getting closer to the enemy.

The enemy, not giving up, tried to overtake on their motorcycles. JC, lying on the ground, used the roller skates on his feet to move, dodging the enemy's motorcycle. Then, with a swift turn, he positioned himself parallel to the enemy's vehicle. As the enemy sped up, he kicked off the ground with his left foot and slid back, stepping on the enemy's motorcycle and hanging onto the handlebars.

The enemy, unwilling to give up, continued the pursuit on another motorcycle. Swerving into a curve, the bike's speed wobbled, and the enemy, losing balance, tumbled off the bike. Lying on the ground, the enemy turned to see the bike sliding towards them, hastily getting up to avoid it.

The enemy, not willing to give up, kept pursuing. Seeing that the enemy was about to catch up, JC quickly accelerated and took a sharp turn. Using the motorcycle's rear wheel as a pivot point, he stepped on the brake and slid to a stop, skimming the ground at a sharp angle. The enemy, unable to brake in time, crashed into the guardrail and fell off the road.

The fully armed JC in the front suit quickly turned around, bent down, and grabbed the handlebars of the motorcycle. He then lay on the ground and shot forward with his legs, causing the enemy to fall.
The motorcycles entered a curve and lost control, swerving into the wall. The soldiers on the trucks cheered and shouted, "Fire!"

The two men in black, having failed to capture JC, quickly gave chase. They crashed into the wall and fell to the ground. JC, having already entered the tunnel, saw the two men in black crawling behind him. He ran faster and faster, and the two men in black, not wanting to lose sight of him, followed faster and faster.
The helicopter suddenly turned, and the two were thrown out. JC was flung into a net, and Simon was pulled back by the helicopter.
Simon, anxiously, asked, "JC, are you all right?"
Simon shouted, "Go!"
Simon said, "Let's go."
The helicopter pilot tried to make contact with JC, saying, "Hello, are you there?"
Zong Sheng said, "JC, It's Zong Sheng. Have you found the 'Rose'?"
Simon replied, 'I'm on vacation.'
Zong Sheng said, "I have a new business for you, are you interested?"
Simon said, 'Tell me the price.'
Zong Sheng said, 'Zodiac heads from the Old Summer Palace, have you heard of them?'

The scene shifts, and the helicopter carrying the two slowly approaches the dam. As the helicopter gets closer to the dam, the movie title 'Twelve Zodiacs' appears in the middle of the screen, followed by the film being produced by Jackie Chan's company, Jackie Chan Films.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3420_3600.text: Mr. Su: "I'm here, where are you?"
Xing Feng: "Go to the big pine tree in the middle of the lobby""I left something at the base for you""Don't be afraid, it's just an envelope"
Mr. Su, seeing this, quickly hid behind a trash can nearby and made a phone call saying: "Hua Zi should not be here"
The officer pointed at the monitor and said: "The target isn't at the scene, he's gone to the Fourth Ring Road."
Mr. Su answered the phone and said, "No, he's not here"
The man on the other end of the phone said: "I remembered wrong." "It's in the trash bin next to you." Mr. Su, furious, threw the phone to the ground and stomped on it.

Mr. Su: "What on earth do you want?" Mr. Su, who was shopping, heard his daughter's voice and immediately called the courier to pick up the package. The package was left under a streetlight, addressed to Mr. Su. He picked it up and opened it to find a few bills inside.
The scene switches to the security room, where a man says: "Adjust the surveillance of the south gate."
The scene switches to the police station, where a police officer says, "From 10 a.m."

The scene shifts to a monitor screen in the police station, where a man in black is watching the surveillance footage. The man in black says: "Zoom in on this image," and the image zooms in to show a taxi parked on the side of the road.
The scene shifts to the kidnapper's car, where the kidnapper is making a phone call saying: "Drive in the opposite direction from the suspected vehicle, look for any recently rented houses nearby."

The scene shifts to Xing Feng who is on the phone saying: "The car that Hua Zi took has been located." "There's no surveillance where he got out," "but someone saw him deliberately show the license plate when he changed cars." "He should be heading into the city."
The man in the passenger seat continues: "This area only has about ten rental houses, and there is also a small courtyard overlooking the orchard."
Mr. Wu instructed: "How about you guys?" "Don't alert these houses first."

The scene shifts to a man standing on a rooftop, observing the surroundings with binoculars. He saw a man in black running towards the distance. The next second, the man in black was grabbed by the collar and thrown against a tree by the man with the binoculars, who then approached and bound the man's hands and feet.
The criminal said: "Mr. Wu, for your sake, I ran more than two miles"
The man asked, "Didn't you drive?"
Xing Feng said: "Hua Zi said, don't touch the car during the day," "It's quite clean, no need to wash it," "Right?"

The scene shifts to Mr. Wu and his henchmen, who are tied up in the carriage, with a man saying: "Go ahead and eat. Hua Zi asked us to buy it for you. Don't worry, we'll see you off when you leave." Mr. Wu and his henchmen sit in the carriage, eating apples with chains on their wrists. The scene shifts again to Mr. Su, who is at the bank counter, pulling out a wad of cash from his pocket.
The scene switches to Mr. Su's side, Mr. Su says: "This is a hundred""There's been no call for so long""Is my brother in danger"
Xing Feng said: "No problem, Mr. Su. They're likely to take the ransom at night." Xing Feng answered confidently.
The man on the other end of the phone asked, "Have you withdrawn the money?"
The man replied, "Yes."
The police officer pointed at the screen and asked, "What denominations?"
The courier pointed to the computer and said: "There are no five hundred yuan notes, only one hundred yuan notes"
Mr. Su said into the phone: "I will call you in the evening"
The police officer looked at the map and said, "He's in the Third Ring Road. He's very close to us"
Xing Feng whispered, "Looks like he's casing the place during the day and will take the money at night"
Xing Feng said to Mr. Wu: "Let's put out more people to find this car."

The scene shifts to a room where a man is lying on a bed, being treated with fire cupping therapy. A man in a coat walks in, holding a knife in one hand and a match in the other, lighting the cups and placing them on the man's back. The man says, "Get up. I'm a cop. Look carefully. Sit up."
Xing Feng asks, "What's your name?"
Xing Feng and his men rush into the hotel, shouting: "Stop!" "Stop!"
The policeman said, "Kneel down."
Dong Zi, with his bare upper body and hands cuffed behind his back, said: "I just arranged for two cars for Dong Zi." "I don't know anything else."
Xing Feng asked: "Does Dong Zi have a phone?"
The Boxer, bending over, said: "Sometimes he does, sometimes he doesn't."
The man in black said sternly: "Let's not play games." "What are you inquiring about train fares for?"
Xing Feng came out and said: "Mr. Wu showed it."
Xing Feng asked in confusion: "What?"
Xing Feng opened the door and said: "It seems like he's planning to run away."

movie101_7026623602615452196_3960_4140.text: Ye Hong said: "Thank you." Ye Hong smiled and pulled back her hand. On the surveillance screen, the positioning of the signal jammer was displayed. At this moment, Zhang Dan was still spinning in the air.
The scene shifted to a library, where a round skylight was opened, and a person was seen hanging upside down from the edge of the skylight.

The scene shifted to a dimly lit room, where a faint light came from under a stone door. The camera slowly zoomed in, revealing a hidden passage inside the stone door. Security Guard, wearing a party hat, was among the first to crawl in. Following him were Xiao Bao and Ye Hong.
Xiao Bao said: "I've located Ye Hong's position." "It's in a private room." Security Guard and Xiao Bao quickly ran to the surveillance room. Security Guard excitedly said: "Found it!"
Xiao Bao was about to activate the switch when Security Guard suddenly rushed in. Security Guard pinned Xiao Bao against the wall and tried to strangle him.

The scene shifts to the interior of the research institute, where the surveillance displays show that the data has been successfully intercepted. The institute's staff are in a state of panic, and Xiao Bao, having infiltrated the institute, quickly locates Ye Hong's location based on the information received.
Security Guard pressed the switch, and the floor immediately dropped down, trapping Zhang Dan's feet. Xiao Bao, who was about to rush in, was pulled back by Security Guard.
The bald man took out a taser from his waist, and a flower was stuck on his waist. The taser was thrown, and the bald man fell to the ground.

Xiao Bao was knocked down by a chair thrown by Security Guard. He quickly got up and ran to the monitor to check the situation, but the data on the screen showed that all the video feeds were offline.

The scene switches to a room where Zhang Dan is hanging upside down in mid-air, with a laser grid set up below. Xiao Bao, wearing a helmet, descends from above, looking at the circular platform below.
Xiao Bao, covering his face, said: "That scared the hell out of me."
Charlie asked: "What happened?"

Xiao Bao said: "It's a long story,' 'Quick, go inside." Xiao Bao lay on the table, looking at the two of them. Zhang Dan had no choice but to enter the room first. As he descended the stairs, he couldn't help but look back at the room's decor.
Ye Hong asked: "Do you see every woman as a gift?"
Charlie said: "Of course not."
Ye Hong asked: "What is it?"
Charlie said: 'Like you,' 'the owner of a gift.' Ye Hong smiled and leaned back, and Charlie laughed and pulled her into his arms to continue dancing.

At this moment, Xiao Bao was observing the situation in the ballroom through a monitor. Suddenly, the image on the monitor flickered and the scanner failed. Xiao Bao said: 'Scan failed,' 'Let's try again.'

At this moment, Xiao Bao was sitting in front of a monitor, looking at the surveillance footage. He then turned his head to look at the man in black sitting next to him. The man in black also looked at him. Xiao Bao nodded at him, and the man in black nodded back. In the dance hall, Ye Hong walked briskly towards Charlie, her gaze fixed on him. She then walked up to him, put her hands on his shoulders, and danced with him. The two danced back to back.
Ye Hong asked: "What is the gift?" Ye Hong was still persistent in trying to get the gift from Charlie. Then, the two started to dance closely together.
The scene shifted to a nightclub, where Charlie was dancing with Ye Hong. Charlie said: "Would you like to return home with me?" "With the Spirit Spring?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: Woman asked: 'So, is it or is it not?'
Da Zang said, 'If I didn't like you, I wouldn't be around you all the time.'
Woman asked, 'Do you like me before I lost my memory, or after I lost my memory?'
Da Zang pondered for a moment and said, "I like both"
The scene shifts to the beach, where Fang Baoyu is sitting on the sand, eating, and Ben Yue, carrying food, walks up to him. Ben Yue says, 'You take it, we are already full'

Fang Baoyu frowned, looking at Ben Yue with a complex expression. He seemed to be thinking about something, but didn't know how to start. Fang Baoyu said: "I thought that you would never talk to me again."
Ben Yue said: "Fang Baoyu, I know, you were forced to go to Zhu'er's room in Baiyun Temple."

Ben Yue: "Wang Dian's plan was seen through by the Holy Mother" "so that night" "when you were practicing" "the Holy Mother hid in the shadows" "used her skills to confuse your mind" "she meant to send you to my room" "but ended up sending you to Zhu'er's room"
Fang Baoyu asked: "How do you know all this?"
Ben Yue said: "The Holy Mother and I are very close," "to ensure my survival," "she told me everything."
The scene shifts to the next day, Fang Baoyu and Ben Yue walk to a small inn. Fang Baoyu says to Ben Yue: "It's too hot, let's go inside and rest."
Fang Baoyu said: 'Oh, my guests, please come in, sit here.' Fang Baoyu and Ben Yue exchanged a glance and sat down. Waiter brought over the tea set, refilled the tea, and then retreated.
Waiter asked: 'What would you like to order, my guest?'
Fang Baoyu replied: "Anything will do."
Waiter said, 'Ah, just a moment,' and then he left with a kettle.
Ben Yue, who was sitting aside, saw the two of them drinking and couldn't help but stand up and step forward to stop them, saying: "Wait, don't drink yet"
Fang Baoyu was puzzled, and Ben Yue withdrew their hand. Fang Baoyu asked, 'What's wrong?'
Fang Baoyu said, "Look at his boots" "they obviously belong to an imperial official" "We can't stay here for long, let's leave quickly" "You go to Fengbo Pavilion ahead" "I'll follow shortly"
Ben Yue said: "Okay, be careful." Then she turned and left.

Ben Yue, who was originally by the side, was pulled by Fang Baoyu and had to follow them. The moment Ben Yue entered, the atmosphere in the room instantly became awkward. Seeing this, the waiter immediately brought in steamed buns and said: "My guest, your bun is here"

movie101_6966492004553490981_4980_5160.text: He saw the figure of the delivery man in the surveillance video, then the two men picking up the package. He stared at the screen for a long time, then turned off the TV and walked towards the living room.

He picked up the phone from the table, glanced at it, then picked up the wallet next to it, sat on the sofa, and slowly opened the wallet. He took out the ID card inside, put the wallet back, and stared at the ID card in his hand.

The scene switched to a photo of a family of three hugging together, with the mother smiling at the camera, and the words 'Happy Family' written on the photo. Bonnie looked at the photo, his eyes reddening.

Bonnie rushed into the room and said: "CoCo said" "Her younger brother disappeared when he was following people from MP company after photographing at Long Tou Liu" "It is definitely related to the MP company"
Bonnie looked at the phone and said: "All I see are trees." "Where's the evidence?"
Bonnie said excitedly: "We search for it." "You are not a person without compassion."
Bonnie looked at him and said: "I empathize more with you." "Do you really want to be like this?"
Bonnie said excitedly: "It's his fault that we are in this situation." "We can't stand each other anymore."

Bonnie said: "What do you mean you can't stand each other?" "Do you have body odor or does he pick his nose in public?" "Don't give up so easily without trying." "You two adults are worse than a child." "At least she wrote a letter." "What have you done?"
Bonnie, tearing the paper in his hand, said: "We are destined to fail."
Bonnie took the letter and read: "Failure, losers find excuses, winners find ways."
Bonnie, agitated, said: "Stop bothering and quickly save the person. It'll be too late."
Bonnie said: "It's easy to promise to help someone, but how do you help?"
Bonnie said: "You said it." "Don't give up before trying."
The phone rang, and JC answered: "Hello, JC"
Zong Sheng said: "Hello, Zong Sheng."
Bonnie asked: "What's up?"
JC held up a piece of paper and said: "I just found that painting of the Rose"
Zong Sheng said: "Great, come over right away."
Bonnie said: "This is how."
Zong Sheng said: "I did."
Zong Sheng said: "The address of the MP company I told you is real." "I'm not lying to you."
Zong Sheng looked at the coin, JC said: "Okay, I trust you. But the matter about Long Tou has always been with MP Company. We can never get it, can we?"
Zong Sheng said: "How would I know?" "Why would I lie to you after all these years of partnership?"
Zong Sheng said: "No, why would I lie to you?" "You" "What are you going to do?"

Zong Sheng was lying on the ground, and the two of them poured sulfuric acid onto his face. Zong Sheng said: 'This is the most powerful sulfuric acid in the world that I made for you. Did you ever lie to me?'
Zong Sheng said: "Yes" "I've been lying to you from the start". After speaking, Zong Sheng sat up from the ground, smiling smugly.
Zong Sheng said: "I already told you" "Don't" "What are you dropping on me" "Rock" "Rock salt" "Wow, truly impressive."
The scene shifts to the underground cellar, where Michael says: "Going through all this trouble just to meet me directly is to avoid paying the middleman's commission?"
Michael said: "These people are all vampires." "This time, Zong Sheng deceived us about the Long Tou matter."
Michael, holding the wine, said: "You can't entirely blame him." "The Long Tou was always with us." "I even forgot about it."
The man in black said: "Forget it. In our line of work, lying and being lied to is already a habit."
Bonnie asked: 'Where is the Rose?' As soon as the words were spoken, Zong Sheng took off his jacket, and Bonnie took the newspaper from his hands.
Zong Sheng said: "If it's fake, I wouldn't bring it to you."
Michael said: "I still need to verify it."
Michael said: "It can't leave our sight."
Michael said: "Okay"
The door opened, and Michael walked in confidently, saying: "We are ready, let's begin."
Michael said to the woman: "Please verify this for me."
Michael reached out to JC, but JC said: "I can't fake this in a few minutes." Bonnie took the deed from Michael's hand and handed it to JC.
Michael said to Zong Sheng: "Test this," "Wait a moment."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.text: Fang Baoyu was about to counterattack when the table was overturned by Mulang Shenjun. He hurriedly dodged the blade and kicked one of the assassin's legs, causing him to crash through the wall. The other two quickly got up and charged at Fang Baoyu with their blades drawn. Fang Baoyu dodged left and right, and in a moment of urgency, he grabbed a kettle from the table and smashed it towards the three.

Fang Baoyu kicked one of the guards in the face, then used his elbow to hit another one in the chest. He then used his knee to hit another guard in the face, and kicked another guard in the neck, sending him flying.
Fang Baoyu was about to leave when several people attacked him simultaneously. He quickly dodged and fought back, kicking one of them away. The others were no match for him and were quickly defeated.
Hearing this, Mulang Shenjun turned around, his eyes flashing with determination, and said, "Even if you kill them all, you still won't stand a chance."
Fang Baoyu's eyes were sharp, and he seemed to see something. The soldiers quickly surrounded Mulang Shenjun, and one of them said: "You should recognize these weapons, shouldn't you?"

Fang Baoyu's eyes were filled with murderous intent, and Mulang Shenjun's expression was extremely serious. Mulang Shenjun said: "Drop the knife." Fang Baoyu's eyes were locked on Mulang Shenjun's face, his expression firm and eyes filled with determination. Mulang Shenjun's eyes were also resolute, and he did not comply with the order.
Fang Baoyu's hand trembled slightly, then he forcefully placed the sword on the ground.
A soldier reported: "Master, the person is here."
The scene shifts, and the person in charge says: "You may leave now."
The two children ran out of the room, and Mulang Shenjun looked at Duchess Tuo Chen with a puzzled expression.

Mulang Shenjun looked at her, his eyes revealing a hint of understanding and sympathy. However, as a woman with a violent temper and unpredictable moods, he knew it was not easy to deal with her. So he turned around and went back to his room.

Duchess Tuo Chen looked at Mulang Shenjun with a face full of grievance, Mulang Shenjun reached out to wipe away the tears on her face, but she dodged. He then lifted his sleeve, letting her rest her head on his shoulder.
Duchess Tuo Chen was taken aback, but seeing Mulang Shenjun's expression, she had no choice but to comply.
Duchess Tuo Chen, moved by his words, stopped crying and looked up at Mulang Shenjun. She said, "Tuocheng, I never imagined I would meet you here."
Duchess Tuo Chen, with tears in her eyes, looked down at her own hands and then raised her head to look at Mulang Shenjun, shaking her head and saying: "Don't touch me, who the hell are you?"
Duchess Tuo Chen's expression suddenly became serious. The scene shifted to Mulang Shenjun's room, where he stepped on the iron pendant under the bed with his foot, preparing to break it.

Ben Yue, with tears in her eyes, looked at Mulang Shenjun. Mulang Shenjun also looked at her with a face full of regret. At that moment, a small stone fell from Ben Yue's sleeve, and without thinking, she stepped forward to pick it up. After picking up the stone, she looked up at Mulang Shenjun with a face full of grievance.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4140_4320.text: At this moment, Xiao Bao was observing the dance of Charlie and Ye Hong from a distance. The moment he saw the two move closer, he turned on the recognition software. The display showed a 99% match. Xiao Bao said: "Alright, we can part ways now."
Ye Hong said: "I'm going to the restroom for a bit." Charlie's smile instantly froze, and his eyes became red.

Ye Hong, feeling helpless, took out a tracker from her bag and threw it into her mouth. The signal from the tracker instantly transmitted her location. Charlie, hearing the alarm, ran downstairs, leaped over the railing, and arrived at the stairway at the entrance of the ballroom. He stopped at the stairway, waiting for the right moment.
The subordinate received the message, checked the signal receiver, and reported: "The spider is on the move."

Zhang Dan and Xiao Bao, having infiltrated the ball, took separate actions. Zhang Dan, donning a wolf mask, blended in with the guests, while Xiao Bao, in a monkey costume, stole a laser detector from the ceiling.
At this moment, Zhang Dan was in the secret room, having set the program to automatically unlock the door. The door opened, and the iron wolf dog entered.
The two looked at each other from afar, Xiao Bao's thoughts returned to reality, and he recalled the scene of the ball in the surveillance video.
Charlie and Ye Hong arrived at the scene, and the bodyguards dispersed. Charlie hid in the hall, watching the situation inside the room. Xiao Bao said, "Ye Hong is in trouble."
Zhang Dan looked at the necklace and said: "Quickly transmit the fingerprint over."
Zhang Dan said: "Quickly." Xiao Bao lowered his head and began to input the password.
Charlie said: "Everything is fake."
Pierre: "Check your vault." Charlie looked at Ye Hong, Ye Hong looked back at him, and then he lowered his head to speak.
Zhang Dan said: "It seems like there's no problem."
Pierre looked at the screen calmly and said: "Your treasures were stolen right under your nose."
Xiao Bao said: "They're coming up."
The bodyguards were all dispatched. The broadcast continued: "Charlie has lost all his subordinates. The enemy has taken control of the battlefield."
Charlie led a group of people to rush to the stairwell, Xiao Bao stood in front of the display screen, with only 25 seconds left, he compared his own fingerprint with the one on the screen.
Charlie said: "You fall back first", Charlie led the way, with his subordinates closely following behind.
The scene shifts to a man in black gloves, with a large amount of data projected on his hands. Xiao Bao asked: "What about Ye Hong?"
Zhang Dan said: "Cut the crap" "If you don't leave now, you won't be able to"

Charlie and his men arrived at the exhibit hall, and the security personnel immediately reported to Charlie. Charlie ordered: "Find them." The security personnel quickly assembled and prepared to conduct a search.
Ye Hong was about to play the piano when Xiao Bao burst in. He immediately crouched and took out a gun to restrain her. Ye Hong's hands were handcuffed to the piano keys.

movie101_6991751088659497479_3600_3780.text: Xing Feng: "Call Xing Feng and let's go right away." Xing Feng immediately called the police, and the police arrived at the bus station in a timely manner. The police searched the bus thoroughly, but Xing Feng and Dong Zi were nowhere to be seen.
Dong Zi got off the bus, pushed through the crowd, and shouted: "Dong Zi"
Xing Feng and Cao Gang, who were behind Dong Zi, ran to the front and started fighting with the kidnappers.
Xing Feng shouted: "Blind Ya," and Dong Zi, who was running, fell to the ground.

Xing Feng was suddenly hit from behind by a large hand and then violently thrown against the wall. Dong Zi, who was nearby, was knocked down as well. Xing Feng, who was getting up, was kicked in the head by Cao Gang and fell to the ground.
Xing Feng ran towards the gate, but Cao Gang was already there. He jumped over the fence and got away, and Xing Feng also climbed over the fence.

Cao Gang asked: "Where's Hua Zi?"
The man replied: "I don’t know. I really don’t know."
Cao Gang: "But let me tell you," "Hua Zi always carries a hand grenade with him." "He’s always ready to die with you guys." "If you guys see him," "just shoot."
Cao Gang said: "Stop the nonsense."

Li Jiehui asked: "Orchard, what kind of orchard?"
Li Jiehui: "He doesn’t know that."
Manager Zhang: "I need to call more people from other squads for this." "We have to have enough manpower." "The main force is looking for cars in the city, others should go check out the farmhouse."
Xiao Dou said: "It's been so long and still no news." "Make a call and ask."
Xiao Dou: "Hua Zi changes his SIM card every time he makes a call," "the police don’t know his number."
Chao Zi: "You know quite a lot."
Cang Zi: "He’s been through so many police performances, how can he not know."
Xing Feng asked: "Have you watched any?"
Mr. Wu: "Have watched"
Mr. Wu asked: "How was his acting?"
Mr. Wu laughed and said: "Not bad," "I think you should take more roles as kidnappers if you get a chance."
Mr. Wu said: "Kidnapper, alright, if I get a chance, I’ll really use you as a reference for the role," Chao Zi asked: "Then do you think I have a chance to become a big star?"
Mr. Wu, looking at the bound Mr. Wu, said: "You have a chance," "You have a chance."
The police said: "Using the target's last known location as the center," "within a radius of three kilometers."
The scene switches to Cao Gang's side, where Cao Gang is on the phone saying: "There’s no progress on my end. I haven’t found the target yet."

The police said: "Near his mother's house." "Haven't found the target."
The scene shifts to the police car: "Squad 6 hasn't found the target."
