The police said: "Squad 3 is still searching. Haven't found anything."
Xing Feng drove the car furiously through the streets, cursing as he drove: "Where the heck is this grandson hiding?"
Manager Zhang: "This punk is within our circle," "everyone look closely," "surely we can find him."
The New Year's Eve bell is about to ring, and the hustle and bustle of the city is about to begin. The sun is about to set, and the sky is gradually getting darker.

As dusk fell, the sky gradually darkened. Xing Feng was still on the road, heading to the next destination. In the car, Xing Feng said: "I've checked over a dozen residential areas in this sector. How about I check the roads?"
Xing Feng: "There are a lot of our people on the road, just look around the residential areas." "Listen to me."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: Fang Baoyu said: "They will kill us at dawn" Hearing this, Ben Yue lowered his head in fear.
Ben Yue said: 'Fang Baoyu, are you afraid?'
Fang Baoyu said: 'Facing death, who isn't afraid?' 'However, what I feel more is unwillingness' 'I feel I've let many people down' 'First of all, I failed my grandfather since I couldn't avenge him.'
Fang Baoyu said: "And I also failed the Purple-Robed Marquis" "betrayed his expectations of me" "the person I wronged the most is you" "I promised them" "I promised them everything"
Ben Yue said: 'No, I can't let you do something foolish, you can't become a lackey of the court, you can't work for the Wood Wolf God.'
Bai Sankong pushed the door open and walked in. Fang Baoyu and Ben Yue were tied up. Bai Sankong said: 'I am your grandpa.'

The scene shifts to a forest, where Shitai, Zhu Er, and Huyan Dazang are walking along a small path. Zhu Er, who is usually aloof, today seems to be in a good mood, walking beside Shitai with a smile.
Shitai said: "Alright, this is where we part ways, I wish you both much fortune and long life." Shitai clasped his hands in a salute and turned to leave.
Zhu Er called out: "Shitai!" Shitai turned around, eyes filled with tears, and hugged Zhu Er.

The scene shifted, and the three of them were walking in the woods. Suddenly, Shitai stopped and turned to leave. Huyan Dazang and Zhu Er exchanged a glance and quickly drew their swords, ready to fight.
Zhu Er shouted: "Shitai!"
Huyan Dazang and Zhu Er arrived just in time. Huyan Dazang pointed his sword at Wang Dian and said: "Stop, take one more step and I'll kill her in front of you all."
Huyan Dazang asked: "Shitai, are you alright?"
Shitai said: "No, no."
Huyan Dazang said: "Wang Dian, what do you want?"
Wang Dian looked at the soldiers, then at Zhu Er, and said: "Kill him and I'll release this old nun."
Huyan Dazang said: "Zhu Er has lost her memory, the poison has been neutralized, she won't listen to you anymore."
Huyan Dazang said: "Zhu Er, have you really lost your memory? You don't remember me?"
Wang Dian laughed and said: "You can't fool me," "quick, kill that Huyan Dazang now."
Shitai said: "Dazang, remember my last words."

movie101_7026623602615452196_4320_4500.text: At this moment, Xiao Bao was tinkering with the piano, while Ye Hong was secretly observing from the shadows.

The mechanical spider, controlled by Xiao Bao, moved around the room. It crawled under the bed, under the curtains, and even under the chandelier. It moved with great speed and agility, much faster than a real spider.
At this moment, Xiao Bao was tinkering with a remote-controlled spider, which crawled forward two steps and then stopped. Xiao Bao asked in confusion: "What's going on?"
Xiao Bao looked at the monitor and said: "The tycoon's dog bit away our spider."
Xiao Bao said: "There's not much time left, think of a solution quickly."
Big Black Dog, having regained its senses, spat out the electronic lock and chewed it to pieces. Xiao Bao said, "Big Black Dog, I'm sorry, you forced my hand."
Big Black Dog, seeing the mechanical spider about to catch up, turned and ran. The mechanical spider, however, was agile and managed to dodge Big Black Dog's attack while catching the key.

The scene shifted to a high-tech safe. A laser lock aimed at the center of the safe door. A mechanical insect crawled onto the laser lock. It climbed up to the laser sensor and triggered it. The laser locked onto the mechanical insect, and the insect was crushed by the laser.
The laser beam was precise and swift, instantly locking onto the steel plate. The welding robot activated, emitting a bright laser that melted the steel plate.
Charlie picked up a glass of wine, took a sip, and then placed it back on the table.
Pierre said to Charlie: "Mr. Luo" "That police officer is in a hurry to see you" "Saying it's an urgent situation."
At this moment, a middle-aged man walked up and said: "Mr. Luo."
Ye Hong, who had been quietly observing from the side, was shocked by the scene. He didn't know that the bomb had been planted on the dance floor.
Ye Hong walked to the center of the dance floor, touched her face, and said: "Handsome, your old friend is here again."
Zhang Dan said: "Xiao Bao, we're out of time."
The safe door was cut open, and the circuit board inside was electrified, with current flowing through it.
Charlie turned around and saw Ye Hong, Ye Hong was also looking at him, their eyes met, and Ye Hong said to Charlie: "Weren't we supposed to follow the rules?"

Ye Hong said: "So don't fall in love with me, go." After saying this, Ye Hong turned and left. The outside of the castle was surrounded by a large number of motorcycle-riding bodyguards. They rode in a circle and then split into two groups.

The motorcycle driver was wearing a helmet, and his face was not visible. He sped out of the castle and turned into a small road. The car driver was getting anxious, and Ye Hong was also getting worried. The motorcycle driver looked back at the car while driving.

At this moment, a black car sped towards them. The two people on the tower saw this and immediately fired a warning shot. The shot landed right in the middle of the car's hood. The car swerved to the right, and Xiao Bao and Ye Hong ran out from the side of the tower, heading towards the car.

On the other side, Xiao Bao was riding a motorcycle at high speed, heading towards the castle on the hill. The motorcycle kicked up a cloud of dust as it sped along the path. A car was following the direction of the motorcycle, heading towards the fork in the road.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: Teammate asked: "Would you mind if we take a look around?"
The foreigner said: "I didn't expect there to be such a large verification center hidden underground at the winery."
The female security guard replied: "It's a forgery center, with tens of billions of transactions every year." "They have the final say on everything big and small."
Teammate suddenly stopped and said: "Hey, isn't this the painting that was stolen from the European museum at the beginning of the year?" "It's very well done."
Security Guard said: "Don't underestimate these artists" "They are all masters" "It's a pity they only become famous after they die" "Pay more attention to upstairs."
Teammate asked: "What are these people doing?"

The man in the striped shirt continued: "They polish and sand the porcelain," "soak it in manganese dioxide solution," "then further process it," "making it look like it's hundreds of years old." "The Chinese paper has many layers," "all of which can be peeled off." "This is an authentic piece," "when opened, both of the two pieces are genuine."
The man in the striped shirt said: "That's not one in five or six."
The two people inside the room heard the commotion outside and quickly opened the door.
Teammate asked: "What about...that one?"
The man in the striped shirt said: "That's silk" "They can't separate it" "So they sell a long painting in parts" "One in six, one in eight"
Teammate said: "I'm amazed they came up with this"
The expert said: "Antiques excavated in small pieces" "Reconstructed based on archaeology" "True top, fake bottom" "Fake top, true bottom"

The scene shifts to the lab, where a group of people are busy. A man in a suit says: "Then they use x-rays to make the brand new porcelain look like it has a history of thousands of years all of a sudden."
The woman smoking a cigarette said: "This is really complicated." "How many real ones are still on the market?"
JC said: "Ninety percent are fakes"
Teammate looked at the departing figure and said: "Poor rich people"
Security Guard: "Over there."
At this moment, a man ran over and said: "Hey, you guys" "I found your son" "He's fine" "He's fine". Then he turned and left.
JC looked around and said: "It's one of Nine-headed Bird's people"
Teammate turned around and asked: "Wow, what is this?"

Security Guard: "This" "High-pressure low-temperature combustion" "Simulating the carbon emission process" "Specifically deceiving antique experts" "This technology isn't well researched yet" "The process of adding fuel and catalyst can only be done manually" "They really dare to do this."
Teammate looked up and said: "Is such a crude equipment dangerous?"
Nine-headed Bird looked at his phone and said: "All frauds are dangerous". Suddenly, he heard a noise behind him and quickly hid his body.
Nine-headed Bird said: "Nice to see you, JC". Teammate and JC looked at each other in confusion. Nine-headed Bird continued: "Aren't you going to talk?"
Nine-headed Bird said: "Don't be like that"
Woman asked: "Who is he"
Nine-headed Bird introduced: "He is JC, a big-shot in this industry."
Woman said: "Reputation is sometimes not reliable"
Teammate asked: "Are you colleagues?"
Teammate followed and said: "We are not the same, we wouldn't do what he does."
Nine-headed Bird said: "What? Don't be so smug. Whatever you can do, I can do better." JC grabbed the bottle of red wine and ran up the stairs, followed closely by Teammate.
Teammate followed behind and said: "Nine-headed Bird, you stole a Buddha statue from a temple in Southeast Asia"
Nine-headed Bird said: "Yes, those people thought it was done by their neighbor country."
Security Guard continued: "A war broke out at the border and thousands of people died"
Woman: "People will die eventually". After saying this, Woman walked past JC.
Nine-headed Bird said: "That's their problem"
Teammate turned around and said: "You are the scum of our line of work"
Nine-headed Bird smiled and said: "The last person who said that to me has already gone west."
JC: "Really?" He walked while cursing, "Scum."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: Shitai said: "Remember what I just said."

Zhu Er shouted, "Don't do it Shitai". Dazaang was caught off guard and was knocked to the ground. Shitai took the opportunity to attack, but Dazaang quickly got up and fought back. The three of them were evenly matched for the time being, and Dazaang was forced to retreat.

Dazaang was surrounded by a large number of enemies, but he didn't panic at all. He first used his elbow to knock down the soldier in front of him, then quickly dodged the incoming sword. He grabbed the long sword with his foot and kicked it towards the enemy. The sword flew back and pierced through the enemy's back. Seeing this, a villager ran towards the fallen enemy, only to be knocked down by Wang Dian with a single sword stroke.

Dazaang's sword was kicked away, and Wang Dian took the opportunity to kick him several meters away. Wang Dian, holding the sword, looked at Dazaang and said, "Do you know you have killed a kind monk?"

Dazaang, seeing this, quickly stepped forward and kicked Wang Dian away. Then, he swung his sword at Zhu Er, but Zhu Er blocked it with his own sword. Dazaang, seeing Wang Dian lying on the ground, said to Wang Dian: "Wang Dian, you are going to die."
Wang Dian said: "Not so easy", and then he was kicked to the ground by Dazaang, struggling to get up.

Wang Dian's sword was as sharp as a tiger's tooth, and his skills were as solid as a rock. He was able to parry Dazaang's attacks repeatedly. Seeing that he was unable to defeat Wang Dian, Dazaang resorted to a trick and kicked the long sword out of Wang Dian's hand. Unexpectedly, Wang Dian kicked the sword back into Dazaang's hand.

Dazaang swung his sword horizontally, cutting off the arm of the Wang Dian who was holding the long knife. Then he cut down the other's sword with a vertical slash. Wang Dian was knocked to the ground, but he didn't give up, raising his long knife and shouting, "If the heaven doesn’t take you, I will!"
Wang Dian weakly said: "Wait." Zhu Er, unwilling to let Wang Dian die, stood up and looked at him.
Shitai cried out: "Zhu Er" "Zhu Er" "Please beg him to save dad please" "Please beg him, Zhu Er"

Zhu Er said: "I remember you are my dad, I also remember how you killed grandma with a sword. Now you don't even spare Shitai, you are not human at all, you do not deserve to live. Your life, your life, will only bring more harm to others."
Wang Dian, with his last breath, said: "Zhu Er, please beg him for mercy for the sake of our father-daughter relationship."
Zhu Er said: "You killed grandma with your own hands, what family are you talking about?"
Zhu Er walked forward with a worried expression, and Dazaang called out to Zhu Er.
The scene switches to Mulang Shenjun pouring a cup of wine and placing it on the table.
Bai Sankong said: "I told you, if anything happens to Baoyu, I won't let you go. Your men are all mediocrity. It would be easy for me to kill you."
Mulang Shenjun said: "Bai Sankong, you've always been dedicated in your work for the court. Is it worth it to ruin your future for a mere Fang Baoyu?"
Bai Sankong said: "Baoyu is my only family, even though I have wealth and influence, and hold a high official position."

movie101_7026623602615452196_4500_4680.text: Xiao Bao picked up Ye Hong and ran towards the forest. The special police behind were all at a distance, waiting for the right moment. Xiao Bao ran through the forest with Ye Hong, and suddenly stopped. He looked around and then jumped into a pit.

Xiao Bao drove the off-road vehicle, stepped on the accelerator, and crossed the trench. The bodyguards who couldn't dodge were knocked down by the vehicle. Zhang Dan and Ye Hong exchanged glances and quickly left.
The police were closely pursuing them, and the off-road vehicle reached a road. The car behind swerved to avoid hitting them, and the road was lined with motorcycles on both sides.

The two men in black were still weaving through the narrow mountain roads, with the tire tracks kicking up dust on the road. The man in black on the motorcycle was holding a gun, ready for battle. The car that was following them closely suddenly appeared in the rearview mirror. The man in black quickly turned around and shot the car, causing it to swerve and stop on the road. The car that was blocking was forced to stop by the oncoming car.
The truck sped even faster through the dirt roads, with the men in black closely pursuing in their cars. The truck entered a forest, with the men in black following closely behind on motorcycles.
At this moment, the car of Pierre and Amber arrived. As the car turned a corner and slowed down, Zhang Dan and Ye Hong immediately noticed it. Zhang Dan shouted: "Wait a minute!"
Pierre said while driving: "I won't kill him."
Zhang Dan, who had been waiting at the entrance for a long time, saw the group approaching and immediately drove off. Amber, who was sitting in the passenger seat, looked at the group in confusion.
The enemy's searchlights swept over, and Xiao Bao drove Ye Hong through the woods, with the enemy closely following behind.
At this moment, a motorcycle drove out of the factory. Amber and Pierre saw the motorcycle and their expressions became serious. Pierre quickly started the car and followed closely behind.
The convoy split into two groups, with the black-clad people in the rear speeding up to catch up with the convoy. They rode through the forest and reached a clearing.

On the other side, Xiao Bao and Ye Hong were still chasing each other. Xiao Bao was riding a motorcycle, with Ye Hong holding onto his waist. They were both speeding down the road, with the SUVs trailing behind them. The two motorcycles were also in pursuit, but they were gradually getting closer to the SUVs.
Amber, who was driving, saw the two people ahead and immediately braked. Zhang Dan lost control of the motorcycle and fell off. The two people behind shouted: "I can't swim!"

At this moment, the enemy's vehicle reached the riverbank. Xiao Bao, who had just emerged from the water, reached out and grabbed the enemy's leg. The enemy's vehicle, now stuck in the mud, could only watch as Xiao Bao dragged the driver out of the water and threw him onto the shore.

On the other side, Pierre was driving with Amber and the others on a small road. The opposite group of people was searching for their position. The two cars passed through the small road and reached a river. Suddenly, a figure emerged from the water on a jet ski.

Pierre got out of the car, holding the door with one hand and raising a gun with the other. He walked towards Zhang Dan, who was lying on the ground, clutching his shoulder where he had been shot. Pierre approached Zhang Dan and said, "Don't move, kneel down."
Pierre took off his helmet and threw it on the ground, staring at Zhang Dan and said, "If you dare, kill me."
Pierre said: "You think I won't dare to try." Zhang Dan laughed loudly. Pierre immediately fired a shot into the ground.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Zhang Hua looked up and said, "What don't I dare to act? I once played a cop. By the way, which movie was that?"
Cao Gang said, "That's irrelevant. Where did you hide Mr. Wu?"
Zhang Hua tilted his head and said, "I don't know."
Cao Gang: "Is this fun for you?"
Zhang Hua smiled and said, "No, it isn't."
Zhang Hua said: "If it's not fun, then shut up." "Huazi, look at your abilities."
Zhang Hua: "If you're that good, find it out yourself."
Zhang Hua: "Tough, aren't you?"
Xing Feng walked over and said, "I'm not tough. You're the tough one. Go ahead, hit me."
Zhang Hua: "Go ahead if you have the guts."
Cao Gang: "Huazi believes you're not a petty thief." "A smart person wouldn't mess with themselves."

Zhang Hua looked at the two people in the car, Cao Gang and Xing Feng, with a face full of shame. He then walked into the restroom, and Xing Feng, who was washing hands, suddenly noticed the surveillance camera on the corner of the ceiling.
Zhang Hua: "How did you catch me?"

The scene shifts to the police station, where Zhang Hua is being questioned by Cao Gang. Zhang Hua, with a swollen face, keeps mumbling, Cao Gang glares at him fiercely. Zhang Hua lifts his head to look at Cao Gang. The police officer beside him translates: "He says he doesn't know."
A policeman nearby said: "Chief Zhang, he's been checking his watch."
Zhang Guozheng said, "We don't have much time left. Mr. Wu should still be alive."
Xing Feng: "He's not dead, right?"
Zhang Hua replied: "Yes"
Xing Feng pointed at Zhang Hua and said, "It's different if he's alive." "We've given you the chance, think carefully."
Zhang Guozheng: "According to the usual pattern, his accomplices are watching and waiting for his signal."
A policeman behind Zhang Guozheng said, "Zhang Hua's phone has always been one-way communication. Only outgoing calls. We turned it off now."
Cao Gang said, "They must have agreed on a specific time."
Xing Feng: "Since we’re here, let’s be sincere. When will your men get the signal?"
Zhang Hua: "Nine o'clock."
Xing Feng: "Nine in the morning or nine at night?"
Zhang Hua: "At night?"
The scene switches to a clock, with a man asking, '"What will happen in an hour and a half?"
Cao Gang: "According to the rules."
Cao Gang: "Tell us, what are the rules?"
Zhang Hua said: "Kill"
Zhang Hua: "I just want to achieve my goal." "I do what I want to do." "If I think you should die, then you die." "If you shouldn't die, then you live."
Xing Feng pointed at the clock on the wall and said, "You're planning to stick it out like this, aren't you?" "I'll tell you, we're at this point now."
Xing Feng said, "I need to think hard if there's even a glimmer of hope."
Cao Gang: "Your only hope is to atone for your crimes."
Cao Gang walked in and said, "All of Huazi's stuff is here."
Everyone gathered around the bags, and Cao Gang said, "These were found on him and in his car."
Zhang Hua looked up at Cao Gang and said, "Can I ask for another condition?"
Cao Gang: "Go ahead."
Zhang Hua: "I help you rescue Mr. Wu," "and you set me free."
Cao Gang: "You really don't know how to talk, do you?"
Zhang Hua said: "Sure I do, that's just what I think" "If I live, we all live" "If I die, we all die together"
Xing Feng pointed at Zhang Hua and said, "I've always considered you a reasonable person."
Zhang Hua said: "You should know that when you caught me, I was already dead." "I'll never make it." "Adding on all my guns, I probably deserve to die several times over."

Cao Gang took out the guns from the bag and laid them on the table, saying, "These three guns were found in his trunk." "These two pistols and the flash-bang are on him." "Another was found at his wife's place."
A man said, "Why kidnap? He should just go straight to Diaoyu Island."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Bai Sankong: "Even if I have wealth and power, what use is it without him?" Mulang Shenjun took a sip of wine, looking at Bai Sankong with a complex expression. Bai Sankong continued, "If you don't agree with me, we can part ways, and you'll be the one to regret it."

The soldier reported: "Report, sir, Fang Baoyu, he says he wants to see you." Bai Sankong was somewhat puzzled, but he did not ask further. In the main hall, Zhu Er was burning incense, and Huyan Dazang was grinding medicine. Both seemed to be preoccupied with other thoughts.

Zhu Er, who was arranging offerings on the table, heard this and sighed lightly. She walked over to sit beside Huyan Dazang and said, "Do you blame me for regaining my memory long ago but never telling you?"
Huyan Dazang: "I knew it a long time ago; I just didn't say it."
Zhu Er asked in surprise, 'You knew?'
Huyan Dazang said, "That night in the grass hut, your words and actions already gave it away."
Zhu Er asked, 'Then why didn't you expose me?'

Huyan Dazang said, "Because during this period, these have been the happiest days since we fell in love. I stayed away from the tumultuous life of the martial world and led a carefree life of planting and tending crops. I didn't want to ruin this harmony."
Zhu Er said, 'I also cherish everything here. But it's all over now.' Zhu Er looked around the room, filled with mixed emotions.
Huyan Dazang said, "I've made up my mind." "I want to find the Nine Treasured Swords as soon as possible to fulfill my master's wish and leave the martial world."
Zhu Er said, "But finding all nine treasured swords is bound to be extremely difficult."
Huyan Dazang said, 'I know. Recently, I've heard of a place in southern Sichuan called Jiange that has the remaining six swords. I wonder if you would come with me.'
Zhu Er said, 'From now on, no matter where you go, I will never leave you. Even if it's a dragon's den or a tiger's lair, I will accompany you through it.'

Huyan Dazang's smile gradually faded, and he looked at Zhu Er with a hint of confusion. The scene shifted to Mulang Shenjun's residence, where Fang Baoyu said, 'I came to see you to ask you to release Ben Yue.'
Mulang Shenjun said, 'Alright, I assume your grandfather already told you that if you want to see Ben Yue, you must bring the heads of Ziyi Hou and Baishui Shengmu in exchange.'
Fang Baoyu said sternly, 'Don't even think about it.'
Fang Baoyu: "Do you have any other choice?" Fang Baoyu's words left Mulang Shenjun with no choice but to agree.
Zhu Er, who had been hiding in the nearby woods, saw this scene and was so surprised that she couldn't speak. She murmured, 'Isn't that Eight-Armed Divine Ape Li Ziyuan? Why is he here?'

Huyan Dazang: 'I'll take advantage of the chaos to capture him and ask.' The soldiers were still in a tough fight, and the appearance of the masked man only added to their woes. He was like a dark shadow, moving swiftly and striking with his sword, causing chaos among the ranks.
Fang Baoyu pointed the sword at Mulang Shenjun and said, 'Tell me, where is Wang Dian? Don't try any tricks.'

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: Pierre said, "Don't mess around," "Think about it, Amber."
Zhang Dan: "You brought her just for this" "You are smarter than I thought"

Pierre slowly lowered his gun, and Zhang Dan turned to look at the two cars driving towards them. The car in front made a turn and splashed water all over the place, while the second car was getting closer.
Amber, sitting in the car, watched as Pierre walked further and further away. Eventually, she drove off in the opposite direction.

The scene shifts to a forest road, with Zhang Dan driving Amber's car, heading towards the cabin in the mountains. On the way, Zhang Dan received a text message from Amber, reading: "I'll wait for you at the usual spot, come quickly."
Amber, with tears in her eyes, was driving when Zhang Dan suddenly looked at the rearview mirror. Amber asked, 'What are you looking at?'
Zhang Dan: "No, I can't understand" "You suddenly saved me and made me feel" "Maybe there's still a chance for us"
Amber said: 'Can I be with a thief?' 'A leopard can't change its spots'
Zhang Dan said, "I need to find the person who wronged me." "Without GAIA, he won't show up." "If he doesn't die, I won't have peace."
Zhang Dan, who had been driving, noticed the blood on their hand and asked, "Are you okay?"
Zhang Dan: "I'm fine" "But you're in trouble now" "You're an accomplice"
The scene shifts to a car speeding through the forest. On the edge of a cliff, three people are standing. One of them shouted, "Hey!"
The two reached the top of the mountain, Xiao Bao and Ye Hong were carrying bags and running, with King Kong following behind them, asking, "Are you okay?"
Ye Hong replied, "I'm okay"
Ye Hong said, "There’s only one left."
Zhang Dan turned around and said, "You go with them first. I'll follow soon."
Ye Hong said, "I won't go with you"
Zhang Dan said, "Listen to me," "I need to talk to Uncle Gang." "I'll come back and explain after I'm done, okay?"
Zhang Dan said, "Go ahead."

Amber said, "I'm here," and then turned and walked away. The mysterious men followed Amber, and as they walked, they looked at the people standing in the open space. At that moment, a car was seen driving towards them from a distance.
King Kong approached and said, "Zhang Dan," "you wouldn't forget your uncle because of this woman, would you?"
Zhang Dan looked at King Kong and said, "What you want is in my hand"
King Kong extended his hand and said, 'Give it to me'

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: Nine-headed Bird said: "Scum."
Nine-headed Bird laughed and said: "I don't even need to leave this couch to kick your ass"
After hearing this, JC smiled and put down his bottle, saying: "Let me see"
The two sat facing each other, neither willing to back down. They both kicked off their chairs, and the situation became tense. The two slowly approached each other, their eyes locked.
The two of them bounced back and forth on the sofa like billiard balls, and then Nine-headed Bird was hit by a sofa cushion thrown by JC. JC said: "You lost"
Nine-headed Bird: "I'm still holding on". Then he lifted his leg to kick towards JC, but was blocked by the sofa. After several exchanges, Nine-headed Bird was kicked to the ground.

The two quickly hid behind the sofa. As soon as they turned around, they were surrounded by the men in black. They stood on the sofa and grappled with the men in black, trying to wrestle the gun away. The men in black were no match for them and they were forced back.

The two quickly got up, Nine-headed Bird wanted to continue the fight, but JC grabbed his arm and threw him a meter away. Then, Nine-headed Bird kicked towards JC, but JC blocked it with his leg. Afterward, Nine-headed Bird kicked towards JC's chest, but JC grabbed his leg and threw him a meter away.
Nine-headed Bird said: "You're really something, JC". Then he tried to use the same trick again, but JC cleverly dodged and kicked him away.

The two continued to grapple, with Nine-headed Bird attempting a sweeping kick to JC's back, but JC countered by grabbing his ankle and slamming him onto the sofa. The two then started fighting on the sofa, with Nine-headed Bird trying to escape to the other end but being pulled back by JC. In a moment of urgency, Nine-headed Bird kicked at JC's head, but JC grabbed his leg and slammed him onto the coffee table. The two wrestled to the ground, with Nine-headed Bird landing on JC's back.

The two of them were pushing each other back and forth, neither of them could get close to the other. Then, Nine-headed Bird found a way, he jumped up and stepped on the sofa, then jumped down and stepped on the sofa again, stepping on the sofa and moving forward. But as soon as he got up, he was kicked back by JC. The two of them were pushing each other back and forth, neither of them could get close to the other.

Bonnie, who was nearby, was so angry that she knocked over the water cup in her hand. Then she kicked the gun-wielding bodyguard in the chest. The bodyguard, losing his balance, fell to the ground. As he tried to get up, he was kicked in the head by Bonnie, sending him flying onto the sofa behind him.
The cushion under Nine-headed Bird's body was kicked out, and he fell to the ground. The two of them laughed and gestured at each other.
Nine-headed Bird's underlings were about to step forward, but Nine-headed Bird stopped them with a wave of his hand: "Enough"
Michael said to the bodyguards: "You can go now""Enjoy your vacation."
Michael: "Okay, goodbye"
Bonnie turned around, thought for a moment, and then went to the second floor to find the security guard. The guard was bringing food for him. When he saw the guard, he asked: "What are you doing?"
Michael walked to the opening of the ventilation duct and said: "Just checking out these pieces of furniture"
Nine-headed Bird said: "Crude forgery"

Michael stood up and said: "If you two want to fight, go outside, okay? This is authentic, be careful." The two stood up and walked outside. Michael said to them: "Wow, roses" "Position at eleven o'clock" "Get it sorted and then leave. We'll move it later."
Michael walked over to Nine-headed Bird and said: "Old rules""You'll get your money tomorrow"
Michael walked up to them and said: "Your asking price is too high. We will discuss it when my dad comes."
JC looked at Michael and said: "I can give you a discount, but I want three people."
Michael asked in confusion: "What?"
JC turned to look at the three students and said: "The three students locked up there"
Michael looked at the contract and smiled, saying: "I don't understand what you mean"
After saying that, he walked towards the door, but two bodyguards stopped him.
The bodyguard said: "That will prove I'm right", then turned to look at Michael.
Michael said: "Then go prove it if you can"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: Man said: "I really don't know. I was ordered to wait for him in South Chuan for a month, but he never showed up."
Fang Baoyu asked: "Whose orders?"
Man replied: "Of course, it was the order of the chief."
The prince asked: "What is the relationship between Wang Dian and the Forbidden Guards?"
Man said: "I really don't know that."
Fang Baoyu: "Huyan Dazang."
Fang Baoyu turned around and said: "Zhuer."
Huyan Dazang returned with the wine, sat down, and asked, "Why did you bring wine?"

Huyan Dazang: "Since I came to the Central Plains, I have been solely focused on seeking the sword, and often thought we would have a fight. I didn't expect to be fighting alongside you today, it’s delightful. Cheers."
Suddenly, there was a loud crash, and Fang Baoyu rushed out of the inn, only to see the three people inside the house standing still, with no sign of anyone having left.
Fang Baoyu: "At dawn tomorrow," "at the fortress gate," "Ben Yue's blood will be spilled on the yellow sand," "Mulang Deity."

The scene shifts to the military camp, where a wooden platform stands in the center, with a long table in front of it. On the platform, Ben Yue is tied to a wooden stake with ropes, her hands bound above her head. Below the platform, a soldier brandishes a large knife, aimed at Ben Yue's body.

The scene shifts to Mulang Shenjun drinking a cup of tea, his expression serious. He had just put down his cup when he saw the two approaching, and his gaze became even colder. Ben Yue was still tied to the cross, looking extremely miserable.
Ben Yue: "Baoyu, don't come over! Don't come over, Baoyu!"
Mulang Shenjun's eyes were sharp, he looked at Zhu Er and said: "You are really loyal, coming here together to die."
Fang Baoyu: "I’m asking you one last time, will you release the person or not?"
Mulang Shenjun asked: "What do you think?" The three siblings of the Protectorate, Fang Baoyu, Huyan Dazang, and Mulang Shenjun, all had determined looks in their eyes.
Fang Baoyu and Mulang Shenjun leapt into the air, their swords colliding in mid-air. The force of their clashes caused the ground to shake.

Fang Baoyu saw Mulang Shenjun's wife and children in the crowd and rushed forward, Mulang Shenjun quickly blocked him. The two of them fought together with the guards, and Fang Baoyu was still in the middle. He was about to get stabbed by Mulang Shenjun's sword.
Fang Baoyu's sword was knocked flying by Huyan Dazang's long whip, and in a flash, half of his body was severed.
Bai Sankong leaped, lifting Huyan Dazang, and smashed him heavily onto the ground. Huyan Dazang got up and continued to fight with Bai Sankong.

The two fought back and forth, with neither gaining the upper hand. The advantage kept shifting, and at that moment, Mulang Shenjun used all his strength to block a strike from the bald man, but was still kicked to the ground by the latter.
Duchess Tuo Chen was shocked by the scene before her eyes. Mulang Shenjun and Fang Baoyu fought evenly, with neither gaining the upper hand.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.text: Xiao Bao asked: "Did you bring the money for the goods?"
King Kong laughed arrogantly, extended his hand, and said: "Give me the goods"
Amber turned around and said: "No, if you give it to him, you won't get another chance."
Zhang Dan looked at the two of them and said: "Bring it here quickly"
Ye Hong, who had been secretly observing from a distance, suddenly pulled out a gun and aimed at Zhang Dan, saying: "He is talking to me"
Xiao Bao said in shock: "Ye Hong, what are you doing"
Ye Hong, with a gun pointed at Pierre, said: "He invited me first"

Zhang Dan, with a grim expression, looked at King Kong. Seeing that Zhang Dan had no intention of shooting, King Kong smiled smugly. At that moment, Zhang Dan's subordinates surrounded them. Zhang Dan said to the bodyguards: "Take her with you"
Zhang Dan turned around and saw the helicopter slowly approaching. He signaled to stop the helicopter with his eyes.
The police cars were driving in a convoy, escorting the convoy to the helicopter.
Amber, unwilling to be caught, took the opportunity to escape from the police, and King Kong, who was driving, said to Amber in the car: "Don't betray me when you get in""She is in my hands"
The helicopter landed, and King Kong said: "Xiao Bao, Spider."
The car continued to plummet, and the two men inside were still fighting. The car was about to crash into the forest below.
The police cars slowly surrounded them, and Pierre shouted at them: "Hands up, lay on the ground, immediately"
Zhang Dan, seeing Amber's state, said to King Kong: "Go first, we have to find her."
The police officers behind were still searching, Xiao Bao asked: "What about you"
Zhang Dan said: "Just jump."
Pierre, seeing this, also jumped off the cliff. The police immediately surrounded the edge of the cliff.
The scene shifts to a police station, where Xiao Bao is handcuffed to a table in an interrogation room. Zhang Dan walks in and says, "Still refusing to cooperate and confess?"
The scene switches to a police station, where a man sits in an interrogation room, and a Pierre comes in to inform: "You have five minutes"
King Kong said: "Okay," and then pushed the door open.
The scene switches to a police interrogation room, where Xiao Bao is sitting at the table, and Zhang Dan comes in asking, "Where is GAIA? I know it's in the hands of your chief King Kong."
The security guard said: "Go have a rest"
Inside the interrogation room, Zhang Dan was sitting opposite Pierre. Pierre asked, "Where is he?"
Zhang Dan replied: "I don't know"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: Li Jiehui said: "Okay then."
Li Jiehui asked, "Have you eaten?"
Guo Zi said, "Not yet."

Guo Zi paced back and forth in front of the car, occasionally glancing at the missing person notice from the previous day. The notice stated that the person had been kidnapped 17 hours ago. Guo Zi got into the car, started the engine, and the missing person notice was pasted on the dashboard. Guo Zi drove towards the agreed location.
Captain General replied: "Got it, I'll be right there."
The police officer said, "This is Xing Feng, I've spotted the suspect's vehicle."
Captain General asked, "Is there anyone in the car?"
Captain General said, "No, but we didn't have prior knowledge of this kiln, and we're not clear on which building he lives in."
Captain General said, "Okay, our people will be there soon."
The scene shifts to a taxi driving on the road, and then to a window where someone asks, "Do you want it, do you want it?"
Captain General replied, "Hold on, I'm thinking."
Mr. Wu asked, "Do you want it? Do you want it?"
Mr. Wu asked, "Brother Cang, after winning the money this hand, are you still going to gamble?"
Brother Cang, eating instant noodles, said, "That's my life."
Da Wei asked, "Which one should I play?"
Mr. Wu said, "I don't know this very well, I'm not familiar with it."
Brother Cang, eating skewers, said, "Go with your gut, go with your gut, go with your gut."
Mr. Wu pointed to one of the cards and said, "This one."
Da Wei said, "A pair of kings."
Da Wei said, "A bomb, huh," "three, four, five, six, seven," "pairs of tens, huh."
Da Wei said, "What's going on, what's going on"
Mr. Wu asked, "What kind of cards are those, how would I know about a bomb?"
Da Wei turned to Mr. Wu and said, "You don't know about a bomb? Didn't you once play the God of Gamblers? Is that appropriate?"
Mr. Wu said, "Is it interesting to talk like that? I played a cop, did I arrest you, right?"
Brother Cang said, "Shuffle."

The scene shifts to the street, where a man wearing an earpiece is watching the group play cards. He reports to his companion: "Shuffle." The companion immediately reports back to Mr. Wu. Mr. Wu, who is squatting behind the car, hears the sound of shuffling cards and immediately hides in a nearby car to observe.
Captain General said: "Hey Chao, where are you?" "Ah, okay, hurry up."
The camera switches to the taxi driver's perspective: "Brother, that shot at Dong Zi today was accurate."
Mr. Wu said: "I thought you forgot." "Don't forget to treat me to a meal, huh?"
The person in the car said: "Thank you."
Captain General said: "Alright, let's discuss the situation here."

The scene shifts to the inside of a car, where someone says: "Hua Zi is definitely going down to withdraw money today. There's only one exit from this community. We'll set an ambush in the courtyard and take him down directly when he comes out."
Mr. Wu said, "This environment is too complicated, too many people, and Hua Zi has a gun. More importantly, he has grenades."

At this moment, Mr. Wu also arrived at the agreed place. He looked around but did not see anyone. He turned and walked a few steps, still no one. So he turned back and walked away. As he walked, he looked back, and suddenly someone grabbed his neck.

At this moment, Guo Zi, who had been waiting outside the snack bar, saw the commotion and immediately rushed over. He saw Captain General and Da Wei fighting fiercely, so he quickly hid behind a parked car to avoid the fight. Guo Zi ran to the snack bar entrance and saw Captain General and Da Wei grappling on the ground. He picked up a brick from the ground and threw it at them. Captain General and Da Wei quickly got up and ran away.

Guo Zi and Captain General hid behind a car, while Brother Cang hid behind an electrical pole, all three of them constantly watching the front and constantly shooting forward. The battle was intense, and Cao Gang had to call for backup.

The drug dealers on the second floor saw the situation and quickly opened fire. The car was riddled with bullet holes, and the three people on the car were thrown out by the powerful blast. The drug dealers on the second floor were also blown away, and the fruits on the roadside stand were scattered by the blast.
Li Jiehui turned and walked out of the room, saying, "You have a better handle on the situation on-site. If there is danger to the public, do not engage inside the community."

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: Li Xiaoran said: "It's not a duel, it's a beating."
Huyan Dacang drew his sword and struck Li Xiaoran's neck. The brothers shouted: "Let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go."
Zhu Er asked: "Why did you kill him?"
Huyan Dacang looked at Zhu Er and said: "Didn't you want to kill him just now?"
Zhu Er said: "I didn't mean for you to kill him! That's not what I meant! How am I supposed to explain this to others?" Zhu Er tried to stop him, but he broke free and asked: "Where are you going?"
Huyan Dacang said: 'I have other things to do. I helped you kill him. You helped bandage my wound. We owe each other nothing.'
Zhu Er said: "What do you mean, owe each other nothing?" "Everyone saw you kill him for me." "What am I supposed to do? What should I do?"
Huyan Dacang looked at Zhu Er and said: "He deserved to die."

Zhu Er pushed Huyan Dacang out the door and said: "I'm going to follow you. You have to help me explain. You killed the person. It has nothing to do with me. Otherwise, people will think I'm your accomplice."

Purple Marquis read the letter aloud: "My Lord, upon reading this letter, I fear my days are numbered. I have no other attachments in this life. I only leave my daughter Bai Yanzhu's son. I earnestly request that the Lord take him in and pass on martial arts to him."
Servant clasped his hands and said: "I hope the Lord will grant this wish."
Purple Marquis looked at the woman and said: "Your grandfather wants me to take you as a disciple."

Servant said: "Hurry and bow to your master." Fang Baoyu hurriedly bowed. After the servant left, Fang Baoyu whispered to Servant: "I've never seen such a rude master before." The two of them exchanged smiles. Meanwhile, Zhu Er was still worried about Li Xiaoran. Li Xiaoran was sitting under a tree, fanning himself with a hand fan, while Zhu Er stood behind him, gently wiping his forehead.
Zhu Er sat down and said: "The sea breeze is strong here, we must be near the sea."
Zhu Er asked: "What are you planning to do?"
Huyan Dacang was silent for a while, then said: "You should leave."
Zhu Er said: "How many times do I have to tell you, you killed Li Xiaoran," "I have no way to survive if I go back."
Huyan Dacang said: "I'm going to a duel this time." "My life is uncertain." "Thank you for taking care of me these past few days." "Please, go back."
Zhu Er said worriedly: "If you keep fighting like this, one day you'll die."
Huyan Dacang lowered his head and said: "To die for the way of the sword, I have no regrets."
Zhu Er asked: "What about your family?"
Huyan Dacang said: "I have no family."
Zhu Er said: "Surely you have friends who are worried about you."
Huyan Dacang lowered his head and thought for a moment, then said: "Friend?" "Speaking of friends, you're the only one."
Zhu Er stood up and said: "I won't let you leave."
Huyan Dacang said: "If you keep talking, I will kill you too."
Zhu Er, seeing Huyan Dacang's determination, angrily said: "You would even kill friends."
In the room, Brother Wang stood up and said: "My Lord, I presume you are already aware of my request."
Purple Marquis said: "I'm sorry, Brother Wang, I no longer concern myself with the matters of the martial world."

Brother Wang said: "But this concerns the honor and disgrace of the martial arts world in the Central Plains." "The one renowned as the best swordfighter, Purple Marquis," "isn't willing to fight for the justice of the martial world?"
Purple Marquis said: 'Brother Wang, to be honest, I really don't enjoy the days filled with fighting and killing, moreover, what if I were the best in the world at martial arts.'
Brother Wang said: "I would like to show the Marquis something."
Brother Wang turned his head and said: "Please, Marquis, come out of retirement."

movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.text: After hearing this, JC looked at Michael and said: "I will prove it." Then he ran forward.
Michael: "Stop him!" The bodyguards chased after him, and as he reached the second floor, he was cornered by the bodyguards. He quickly ran upstairs.

The security guards chased after him, and as he ran, he grabbed the railing and jumped to the other side. The security guards followed closely, and as they turned the corner, JC immediately jumped to the other side. The security guards were one step too slow, and one of them even fell off the railing.
The security guards swarmed up, and in the ensuing fight, JC grabbed the railing and flipped over, landing steadily on the opposite platform.

The bodyguard who was knocked down by a punch was kicked by JC off the platform. He fell from the second floor to the first, and then rolled from the edge of the first-floor wooden planks to the ground.
At this moment, a man in a suit walked out from the other end of the ventilation duct. He was holding a gun and shouting, "He's here. Surround him." The security guards immediately surrounded them.

The men in black were chasing after him relentlessly, so he quickly ran up the stairs and entered a lab. Fortunately, the glass door was strong enough to withstand a blow from a knife. However, the men in black were numerous, and soon, one of them broke the glass door and rushed in.

The two men in black were still chasing him, and in a pinch, he kicked over a nearby table leg and darted towards the glass door. A security guard blocked his way, and in a moment of urgency, JC knocked the guard to the ground with a chopping motion.

The security guard was caught off guard and was knocked out by JC. He slid down the railing and then leapt down the stairs. The security guards were everywhere, and as soon as JC turned, he was surrounded.

The underlings were no match for JC, who kicked them away with a single foot. The crowd quickly dispersed, and the underlings who came to support were also defeated. The three people on the second floor watched the scene below with indifference.
Michael said: "JC, what have you proven now?"
Bonnie, seeing the security guards rushing over, quickly jumped down from the second floor. JC, who was being attacked, used the wooden crate to block the security guards' path.

The robbers scattered in panic, and the two seized the opportunity to escape. The police chased after them, and the workers who had been scared away by the fight returned. The two stood there, panting heavily.

The two immediately started fighting with the security guards. A guard who was about to rush upstairs was knocked down by a kick from JC. Two guards holding guns tried to surround him, but JC grabbed one of their guns and smashed it into the other guard's face. The other guards hesitated to attack after seeing this.
Bonnie said: "I soothed a bit of my rage."
Bonnie, seeing Jil's skill, was stunned. Michael said to the bodyguard: "Nine-headed bird, figure something out."

Jil said: "Let's see how capable you are", Jil immediately rushed forward, throwing a punch at Bonnie, but was dodged and countered with a kick to the chest. Jil was sent flying due to the kick, and then was kicked to the ground by Bonnie.

The two were evenly matched for the time being, neither gaining the upper hand. Jil kept attacking, but Bonnie kept defending. Eventually, Jil's attack forced Bonnie to retreat to a chair. Bonnie tried to use the chair to turn the tide, but Jil kicked the chair away. The two continued to grapple in the hallway outside, with Jil gaining the upper hand and throwing punches and kicks at Bonnie.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.text: Zhang Dan said: "I know how to find him" "Without me" "You won't be able to find him"
Pierre asked: "What about Amber?" Zhang Dan did not answer, just stared at the monitor. Pierre looked up at the monitor, and Zhang Dan followed his gaze, looking in the direction of the camera.
Zhang Dan said: 'I need to leave here first, rescue Amber, and then deal with King Kong. If we let King Kong escape this time, after he sells 'GAIA', we will never be able to find him again, never.'
Pierre asked: "Why should I trust you?"
Pierre asked: "Do you have any other choice?"
Pierre thought for a moment and said: "The only condition" "Bring back 'GAIA'."

Zhang Dan stared at him with fierce eyes, and Pierre, who was used to dealing with criminals, was not afraid of Zhang Dan's current expression. He sat down and stared at Zhang Dan, who was handcuffed, and suddenly Zhang Dan's handcuffs made a sound. Pierre looked at Zhang Dan's hand, and Zhang Dan immediately understood what was happening.

The scene shifted to dawn, with the camera circling a towering statue. The statue, with a sword in one hand and a shield in the other, stood resolute. The city of Kiev lay quietly at the foot of the hill.
The scene shifts to an abandoned factory. The factory is dilapidated, with broken walls and overgrown weeds. Two cars stopped in the open space, and a man got out of the car.

The scene shifted to a warehouse, where Amber was tied to a chair. A man in a suit slowly walked down the stairs, while Ye Hong leaned against a wooden box, sipping from a bottle. The man in the suit reached the bottom of the stairs and looked at Amber.
King Kong walked over to the table, opened the briefcase, and inside was a diamond necklace, which was the same one Ye Hong had admired in the store.
King Kong took out his phone from his pocket, and Ye Hong leaned against the door frame, watching him. The previously quiet and uneventful scene suddenly became lively.
King Kong said: "The buyer has arrived" "Keep an eye on her"
Ye Hong, who was drinking by the side, put down the bottle and followed him, saying: "Uncle Jiang, I'll be right there."
King Kong said: "Sharper." The image on the monitor became clearer and clearer. Zhang Dan took out his phone and pressed the play button.
Zhang Dan handed the walkie-talkie to Xiao Bao and said: "I'll go up. You stay here."
Xiao Bao asked: "Hey, about Ye Hong" "So what exactly is our plan now?"
Zhang Dan said: "Plan B." Zhang Dan looked out the window and saw that the signal jammer had already been set up. Xiao Bao frowned, and the live broadcast suddenly stopped.

Xiao Bao looked at the camera, then raised his head to look at the walkie-talkie hanging on the ceiling. He took the walkie-talkie and went to the woods outside the hotel. He cut the vines on the fence with a knife and pushed open the gate.

Zhang Dan arrived at the agreed location, where a mysterious person was waiting. He quickly drew his pistol, but the other party calmly said: "Hi." The mysterious person was tinkering with a signal jammer on the roof of the vehicle.
Xiao Bao, who was about to close the door, suddenly turned around and asked, "Why?" "Why did you choose King Kong?"
Ye Hong replied: "He saved my life. There are many things we just can't choose."

movie101_6966492004553490981_5700_5880.text: The security guard, using the advantage of the long stick, kicked towards JC's knee. Taking advantage of the guard's off-guard moment, JC punched the guard in the face and then kicked him away. The guard, rolling on the ground, quickly got up and charged at JC with his stick. JC, using the rolling carpet as cover, slipped away while the guard was stuck under the carpet.

The men in black were beaten to the ground. JC threw the medicine box aside, stood up, and the two pills on the table bounced into his mouth. He looked around and said, "He's over there, get him. You're not going anywhere."

Bonnie quickly caught up, and the two engaged in a fierce battle. Despite being outnumbered, Bonnie managed to hold his own, his punches and kicks as swift as lightning. He grabbed Jil's leg and pulled her to the ground.

Jil looked up at Bonnie on the railing above, then extended a hand to signal her to descend. After receiving the signal, Bonnie carefully stepped down from the pillar, while Jil quickly moved to support her. Together, they managed to get down safely.

Jil, who was originally standing on a wooden box, saw Bonnie charging and immediately jumped down to the ground. Then, she kicked the iron pole next to her. Bonnie, who was climbing the pole, was directly kicked to the ground. Then, she ran towards the other side, but was blocked by the security guards. She tried to run towards the vase, but was blocked by a net. She was caught by the security guards and taken away.
Nine-headed Bird said, "That's not fair! Ganging up on one person is despicable. A one-on-one fight is the true measure of fairness."

Bonnie and Jil were still fighting. Jil kicked at Bonnie, who blocked it with his arm. Jil then grabbed Bonnie's leg and threw him to the ground. Seeing that Jil was about to counterattack, JC quickly rushed over. He grabbed the enemy's legs and threw them to the ground. The enemy grabbed his waist and threw him over.

The two of them cooperated seamlessly, knocking down the last security guard and successfully protecting the secret recipe. After the battle, JC stood in the research institute, looking at the three precious urns.

The henchman, seeing this, quickly ran to the side to start the second plan, using the drill to break through the pipe and insert the gun into the water pipe. The water pipe, now under pressure, started spraying water out from the broken pipe.
The men in black scattered in all directions, and the gauges reached the critical point. The glass tube in the instrument exploded instantly, and the people in the room fled in panic.

The bodyguards, seeing the situation was bad, ran towards the door, but the entrance was blocked by a large trolley. So they had to run to the other side, but they were still attacked by JC. Then, JC grabbed one of the bodyguards and threw him towards the trolley. The trolley was knocked over and the bodyguards quickly took advantage of the situation to run away.

The bodyguards, who were originally standing in a line, immediately scattered in all directions. Seeing this, the man in black quickly hid under a table. JC jumped over the table and kicked one of them in the chest, then picked up an umbrella and spun it around before throwing it at the man in black.

The security guards were all knocked down by the umbrella. In the blink of an eye, all the guards were lying on the ground. JC kicked away the security guard holding the umbrella, and the umbrella flew towards the security guard lying on the ground. The security guard was hit by the umbrella and fell to the ground. The glass shards from the shattered security guard's body also pierced the umbrella.

The bodyguards, wielding long sticks, formed a circle and rushed towards him. JC spun a single stick with both hands, then used the momentum to jump up, stepped on the stick, and kicked the bodyguards in the chest, sending them flying.

The bodyguards, who were originally numerous, were now reduced to a few individuals. However, even these few people were no match for JC. They were all knocked down to the ground. The remaining bodyguards picked up their weapons and charged at JC, who was unarmed at the moment. He dodged and retreated continuously, looking for an opportunity. Finally, one of the bodyguards missed their swing and accidentally hit a light bulb hanging from the ceiling, causing it to shatter.

The bodyguard, seeing his companion fall, raised his club to strike at JC. JC dodged and then lifted a picture frame to block the next attack. The bodyguard pushed the frame aside and kicked at JC, who dodged and kicked away the studio light behind him.
Suddenly, he choked on the water and staggered to the door, where he turned back to look at the photo on the wall. He quickly walked over and said, "Wow, so ugly."

movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.text: Xiao Bao said: "There's too much evidence beyond our control." The two of them climbed to the top of the abandoned factory, looking at the dilapidated walls, which were already covered with weeds.
Zhang Dan, who had been hiding in the shadows, cautiously surveyed his surroundings, then moved to a nearby wall and pressed against it, carefully checking every corner.

Zhang Dan turned around and saw the wine bottle placed on the table. He walked over to it, squatted down, and carefully examined the bottle. The liquid in the bottle had long gone, and it was filled with some kind of powder.

He took off the mask, revealing a realistic face underneath. He compared the two faces and found they were exactly the same. He then took off the third person's mask, and after comparing, found that this face was completely different from the other two. Zhang Dan was stunned, and suddenly, a black liquid flowed from the bottom of the mask.
Zhang Dan was puzzled, but he had to follow the clues one by one. He looked at the hollow wooden doll, and the number zero on it. At this moment, King Kong appeared behind him.
King Kong said, "The world speaks of balance." "Everything has cause and effect." "There's cause, then there's effect." "There's me, then there's you."
Zhang Dan smiled and said, "It's been five years. Haven't I given you enough?"
King Kong said: "How can you use the word 'repay' with family?" "Then, how would you repay her?"
King Kong said: "Great, everyone is here. A family reunion."
King Kong said: "Alright, I'll tell you. The matryoshka doll behind you, it's a remote bomb. The sensor is in 'GAIA'. Once our deal is done and 'GAIA' is one kilometer away, it will explode."
King Kong, with a sinister laugh, turned around and walked away, saying: "This is the chance I'm giving you to 'repay' her for a lifetime." Amber looked at King Kong with disdain.
Ye Hong pointed the gun at Xiao Bao and said: "Guard here and don't let them play tricks. I'll call you when the deal is done. Wait for me downstairs, understand?"
Ye Hong looked at Zhang Dan with a smile in his eyes, King Kong patted his shoulder, and then he walked towards Amber.

Ye Hong and Xiao Bao were forced to slowly back away, while King Kong and Zhang Dan walked towards them with guns. The two groups approached each other under the watchful eyes of their respective subordinates.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4380_4560.text: Fang Baoyu jumped up and kicked at Mu Lang, but Mu Lang dodged with a flip. Mu Lang counterattacked with a flying kick, and Fang Baoyu blocked it with his arm. Mu Lang kicked up sand, and Fang Baoyu was knocked back several meters.
Mu Lang was about to approach the tied-up Ben Yue, but was blocked by Fang Baoyu who suddenly flew over. The two were evenly matched and it was hard to tell who had the upper hand.
Mu Lang was not weak either, he spun around and cut down the long sword of Fang Baoyu with one slash. Then he slashed at Fang Baoyu's neck, but Fang Baoyu dodged cleverly.

Mu Lang's gaze softened slightly, but he still did not show any signs of backing down. He looked at Fang Baoyu with a determined look, and then turned to look at Ben Yue. At this moment, Ben Yue was already in a difficult situation, and his weapon had been cut in half by Fang Baoyu's sword.

Mu Lang picked up the sword from the ground and pointed it at Fang Baoyu. Fang Baoyu was shocked and dodged backwards, but was still hit by the sword and flew towards the wooden stake. Ben Yue's sword was also sucked into the magic rope.

The sword stuck in the ground seemed to have some magical power, attracting all the soldiers around it. They surrounded Fang Baoyu and swung their swords at him. Fang Baoyu was not afraid at all, he drew his sword and cut the rope connecting the wooden stake to the sky, and in an instant, the two were back on the ground.

Yan Zhu took the opportunity to escape, but was pursued by a large group of soldiers. Purple Marquis used his sword to hook onto a soldier's shield, spinning in the air and slashing at the incoming soldiers.
Purple Marquis was also entangled by several soldiers, his sword skills diminished, and he was forced to retreat.

Yan Zhu swung her sleeves, and the soldiers who were just standing in place were cut into pieces. The soldiers in front of her were also knocked down one by one. Ben Yue was shocked by the scene in front of her.

Bai Sankong used his sword to block Huyan Dazang's attack, then lifted him up with a shoulder throw and kicked him away. Yan Zhu swung a long ribbon, wrapping it around a guard's neck and yanking him over.
Yan Zhu landed and looked at Purple Marquis fighting fiercely, feeling a sense of familiarity.
Purple Marquis rushed to ask: "Yan Zhu, Yan Zhu, are you alright?"

Mu Lang jumped down from the eaves and tried to attack Yan Zhu, but was blocked by Purple Marquis in mid-air. Mu Lang was furious and used all his strength to push, but Purple Marquis used his palm to stop him.
Mu Lang and Ben Yue were also knocked down by the incoming soldiers. Seeing this, Fang Baoyu shouted to the others: "Quick, kill them."
Fang Baoyu said to Huyan Dazang: "Go"

The guards outside the city were still unaware of the situation inside. They were ordered to rush into the city and catch up with the fleeing group. The group ran into a dead end, with the guards right behind them. They had no choice but to release their arrows and flee for their lives.
The flower girls were scared and scattered in all directions. The flower girl who was chased by the demon fox yelled: "Stop!"

Duchess Tuo Chen leaped down from the pavilion, walked towards Mu Lang, and the guards put away their weapons. Mu Lang looked at her with a smile, but Duchess Tuo Chen showed no expression and walked straight into the house.
Duchess Tuo Chen rushed into the abandoned horse stable, and Purple Marquis also followed. They found Yan Zhu collapsed on the ground, and Purple Marquis shouted: "Yan Zhu"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: Xing Feng said: "This neighborhood is not suitable for capture."
The scene shifts to a bedroom, where a magazine featuring explicit illustrations is left open on the bedside table. A woman lying in bed said, "Can you stop putting this here every time?"
Xing Feng: "What"
Chen Chen, in a frantic struggle, snatched the phone from the table and threw it away, saying: "Give it to me."
Chen Chen struggled and said, "Let go."

Zhang Hua said: "Such a mood killer." After getting up, Zhang Hua went to the bathroom, washed his hands, and put the gun on the medicine rack. He looked at himself in the mirror, exhaled, and leaned against the wall.

Guo Zi walked to the back of the car, pulled out a hidden camera from the spare tire, and pressed the record button. The hard drive was spinning rapidly. He then pressed the play button, and the footage began to play.
Guo Zi walked to the front of the car, bent down to lift the mat on the rear left wheel, and found nothing. Meanwhile, Chen Chen was being intimate with a man and asked, "Will you come back?"
Chen Chen: "Come back"

Chen Chen said: "If you die, I won't give birth to your child."

Chen Chen pushed Zhang Hua away and grabbed the clothes from his hand. Zhang Hua was stunned, then grabbed Chen Chen's hair and pushed her towards the bed. Chen Chen struggled desperately, and Zhang Hua laughed and walked out of the room. The two of them laughed and talked as they left the house and got into the car. Xing Feng was observing the traffic flow on the road. Guo Zi was driving and making a call at the same time. The police were all mobilized to capture the suspect.

Xing Feng glanced at the rearview mirror and saw Chen Chen's reflection. He pursed his lips and then closed his eyes to rest. The car continued to speed along the road.

The person on the other end of the line, Mr. Su, said: "You don't need to tell me the location first. I want to see my friend Mr. Wu."

Guo Zi: "No problem."

movie101_7026623602615452196_5400_5580.text: King Kong walked into the room with a group of people, smiling as he walked up to White Bearded Old Man and said, "Hello."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Yan Zhu, seeing the person in front of him, was stunned and said: 'Yan Zhu.'
Yan Zhu said: 'Purple Marquis, am I about to die? I really didn't expect my father to still be alive.'
Purple Marquis said: "You will be fine, trust me, you will be fine."
Yan Zhu, who had been rescued, was still in a faint. Seeing her daughter, Bai Sankong couldn't help but ask: "Yan Zhu, is it really you?"
Purple Marquis said: "Do not come any closer."
Purple Marquis said: "She is really my daughter."
Bai Sankong, seeing the long sword in his hand, was stunned. Purple Marquis asked: 'What are you doing here?' 'So the Swordsman of Qingping is indeed not dead.' 'What do you want?'
Bai Sankong said: 'I am here to find my daughter.' 'I want to talk to her alone.'

Bai Sankong said: 'Purple Marquis, please step out for a moment.' After saying this, Purple Marquis left the room, leaving Bai Sankong and Yan Zhu alone. Yan Zhu, who was originally sitting, also knelt down.

Bai Sankong said: 'Yan Zhu, why?' 'Why would you rather hide your identity and live as the Great Demon Whitewater Saintess of the martial world,' 'than reunite with your family?' 'Than acknowledge me?' 'Does it mean you can even abandon your son?' 'Why is that?'

Yan Zhu said: "Why?" "Don't you know why?" "When I was at my wit's end, Whitewater Saintess saved me." "I know she is denounced by everyone as a demoness." "But she treated me as her own child. And you?" "You used despicable means" "to separate me from Huo Feiteng, the love of my life, and let him die tragically outside the pass." "Was what you did meaningful? Was it meaningful?"
Bai Sankong took out a wooden box from his bosom and placed it in front of Yan Zhu, saying: "If you still recognize me as your father," "then you should recognize Fang Baoyu too."
Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, looked at Bai Sankong. Bai Sankong stood up and left, leaving only Fang Baoyu standing in front of Yan Zhu, asking: "What did you say?" "You are my mother?"
Yan Zhu said: 'I am Fang Baoyu.'
Fang Baoyu asked: "Purple Marquis, is this true?"

Purple Marquis said: "Yes, she is your mother. I wanted to tell you earlier, but there was never a good opportunity. Now that the enemies are at the gates, if I don't tell you now, there may never be another chance. This is also your grandfather's wish."
Fang Baoyu said: "No, it can't be. It absolutely can't be."
Yan Zhu chased after Fang Baoyu, saying: 'Fang Baoyu, no, Fang Baoyu.'
Purple Marquis held Yan Zhu back and said: "Calm down."
Da Zang said: "Now that your family is reunited, I congratulate you all."

Then you met Zhang Dan. Been in the business since then. Legend has it you're a Virgo virgin. From the way you speak, unmistakable."
The next day, Zhang Dan walked out of the hotel with a serious face, not even bothering to look back. Ye Hong said in the car: 'Did you really think I wouldn't do my homework before coming?'
Xiao Bao: "If you did your homework," "you'd know my reputation in the hacker world," "alright?"

The host said: "The show starts now."

The scene shifts to a woman wearing a fur coat, pushing open a door and walking towards a group of people holding signs that read 'Stop animal cruelty.' The woman in the fur coat was none other than Ye Hong.
Zhang Dan came down from the second floor, saying, "Everyone get ready."
Zhang Dan took out a piece of paper from his pocket, with written on it: "any higher, I'll buy it." He confidently walked downstairs, with the crowd below eagerly bidding for the auction item.
The auctioneer announced the next item, saying: "Next up is the highlight of this auction. Miss Tingting, please."
The auctioneer said, "With her unique," "Wings of Destiny."

Zhang Dan and Xiao Bao were watching the auction on the big screen. The latter was live-streaming with his phone. Zhang Dan used augmented reality to lock the necklace displayed on the screen. The security personnel at the scene were also receiving updates.

At this moment, Xing Feng was driving with Brother Cao in the passenger seat. Xing Feng saw Zhang Hua across the street. He honked the horn, but Zhang Hua ignored him. Xing Feng got out of the car and ran over. Zhang Hua saw him and immediately ran away.

On the other side, Xing Feng was observing the situation on the street and then made a call to Captain General saying, "Captain General, it's feasible now, shall we proceed?"

Xing Feng put on his headphones and said, "Hey, Brother Cao, if anything unexpected happens to me later..."
Xing Feng replied, "Unexpected my foot, you just think about taking him down convincingly."

Zhang Hua turned around and saw the two men who had been eating hot pot earlier. They were now paying no attention to him, engrossed in their conversation. He looked at them for a long time, feeling a sense of loss and regret. At that moment, a familiar car appeared behind him. He turned to look and saw Captain General's car slowly approaching.
Captain General shouted, "Who is that woman? I'm asking you. Who is she?"
Captain General said, "My colleague, my colleague."
Captain General said, "I insist on toppling it over" "What colleague?" "Then why didn't you answer the phone?" "What's her name?"
