The man said, "What's the name" "I'm asking you who" "Why should I" "Don't touch me." Xing Feng rushed forward and pushed the man, and the two started fighting.

The police arrived in time and subdued the two. Zhang Hua was pinned face down on the ground, while Mr. Su was being handcuffed. The police kept shouting, "Police, don't move," "Let go," "Don't move." A policeman frisked Mr. Su, who resisted desperately. The policeman pressed Mr. Su face down on the ground, and Mr. Su kept struggling.
Xing Feng said, "This grandson"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: Purple Marquis turned to Da Zang and said, 'Da Zang, this matter also concerns you. Please don't leave yet.'
Da Zang said, 'I am from Penglai, this family matter has nothing to do with me.' Yan Zhu, hearing this, was stunned, and Da Zang took the opportunity to embrace her.
Yan Zhu, looking into the distance, said, 'That swordsman Huo Feiteng died under your master's sword.'
Da Zang asked, 'What evidence do you have?'

Yan Zhu, looking at Da Zang, said, 'Have you forgotten I once inquired about your background? You even told me. You said your master is Gongsun Liang of the Northern Penglai Celestial Sect. Your father and your master both prized their swords. Your father entrusted you to your master on his deathbed, correct?'
Da Zang replied, 'Yes, my master told me everything. He said he met my father in the Central Plains.'
Yan Zhu stepped forward and said, 'You said the jade pendant you carry is the only thing your father left you, right?'

Yan Zhu, holding back tears, said, 'The jade pendant is Huo Feiteng's family heirloom. You've always treated it as a talisman. Back in the day, he gave it to me as a token of affection, and I gave it to you on the day you turned one month old. The eagle tattoo on your back is exactly the same as Feiteng’s. I don't know how your master took you to Penglai, but I know you are the child of Feiteng and me. You are my child.'
Da Zang turned his head and said, 'So according to you, my master is my father's killer, Baoyu is my brother, and you are my mother. Impossible, I won't believe it.'
Da Zang, seeing the two about to collide, hurriedly stepped forward to separate them, then stood by Yan Zhu's side, comforting her with his eyes.
Yan Zhu was taken aback by this sudden move, but seeing the determination in Purple Marquis's eyes, she could only close her eyes and lean on him.
Bai Sankong's fingers danced lightly on the strings, and before long, a tune was born.
Mulang Shenjun said, 'Bai Sankong, you're in quite high spirits today.'
Bai Sankong, with a smile, beckoned to the young girl, who then stepped forward. Bai Sankong continued, 'May I have the honor of hearing you play a piece today?'
Bai Sankong replied, 'The ancients played the zither for their own amusement, not for others. I’m just playing by myself today. However, I know you appreciate good music, sir.'

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: Ye Hong was taken away by Zhang Dan, and Yurik and his men were ready to fight at any time.
King Kong and his men were still shooting. Zhang Dan, with his back to them, was holding Ye Hong's body. King Kong said: "He killed her without a word."
King Kong turned around and said: "You're all incompetent" "What's the use of keeping you here?"
Zhang Dan let go of the woman and stood up saying: "What do you consider us to be?"
King Kong: "What do you consider me then?" "I raise a dog" "I throw something and it retrieves it for me" "You leave me for a bitch" "I have my rules for keeping a dog."
Zhang Dan pointed at King Kong and said: "These are your rules, not suitable for me."
King Kong asked: "Why don't they suit you?"
Zhang Dan said: "Translate it for him."
King Kong said: "No need for translation."
The female subordinate asked: "Doesn't he have a younger brother?"
King Kong said: "Ignore what he said."
Zhang Dan asked: "Did his younger brother mysteriously disappear five years ago?"
King Kong pointed the gun at Zhang Dan and said, "You're still talking."

Zhang Dan said: "Five years ago, I helped him steal the 'Eye of the Forest'. On the way of escape, there was a boy from Eastern Europe who attacked me and stole the 'Eye of the Forest'. Then he was killed by him."
King Kong asked: "So what's the problem?"
Zhang Dan said: "The problem is" "His younger brother was that Eastern European guy" "Did you know that?"
Zhang Dan said: "He not only killed him, but also cut off his tongue."
Zhang Dan looked at Yurik and said: "The tattoo on his tongue is identical to yours."

King Kong was so angry that tears almost came out, saying: "I really didn't know that guy was your brother, ok?""He stole my stuff, killing him is only right""It's the rules of the jungle""You respect the rules, right?"
Zhang Dan pointed at King Kong and said: "You are the one who doesn't respect the rules."
King Kong stood up and said: "The Eastern European guy was arranged by you, you also killed him."
Ye Hong, clutching her chest, knelt on the ground and said, "You shot me."

Ye Hong: "This is the question I should be asking you, right?" Zhang Dan slowly raised the gun, pressing it against King Kong's forehead. King Kong stared at him without flinching. Zhang Dan's eyes were determined, but there was a hint of hesitation.

The mysterious person revealed their identity as King Kong's father. He said that he was in a dangerous situation and needed to come to the restaurant, asking Zhang Dan to bring someone to pick up his body. He also mentioned that King Kong betrayed him. Memories came flooding back, King Kong was shot and injured by a car in the past.

The scene shifts to a flashback, Yurik recalls the day of the incident, a car bomb was detonated on the street, and a young boy was killed. Yurik recalled seeing the boy's eyeball being stolen by someone. The boy's eyeball was placed into a can and given to Yurik.
The mechanical arm was slowly activated, extending two sharp claws. The moment it touched Amber, it scanned her entire body. Zhang Dan watched Amber nervously.
King Kong: "Dare you to shoot, shoot then." Amber was forced to activate the tracker on the gun. The signal from the tracker was sent to the distant control panel, which triggered the alarm.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: Supervisor said, 'I'm just here for the fun.'
Bai Sankong said, 'However, since the Supervisor has said so, if I don't give face, it would be too disrespectful.'
Supervisor, with a smile on his face, watched the master intently.
The two gazed into each other's eyes, and then Bai Sankong began to play the zither.
The two looked at each other, their eyes filled with determination. Bai Sankong's fingers moved faster and faster on the lute, and before long, the strings snapped.
Supervisor said, 'Bai Sankong, using this much force, aren't you afraid of destroying this ancient Song Dynasty zither?'
Bai Sankong said, 'Unexpectedly, it seems even you, esteemed sir, understand zithers.'

Supervisor said, 'The satin patterns on the zither face must be snake belly stripes, right? It should be from the Tang or Song Dynasty. Bai Sankong, using such a precious zither, must have a high level of mastery.'
Bai Sankong said, 'Supervisor, you truly are an expert. Come, come, let me play a tune.'
Supervisor said, 'Bai Sankong, be careful, if you destroy this zither, it would be a great pity.'

Bai Sankong said, 'It won't come to that.' Just as Bai Sankong was about to place his hand on the lute, Supervisor grabbed it and then struck his head with the flat of his hand. Bai Sankong was stunned, and Supervisor took the opportunity to snatch the lute away.
Supervisor, with a swift move, forced Bai Sankong to retreat to the edge of the platform. Then, with a flick of his sleeve, he pushed Bai Sankong off the platform.
Bai Sankong was about to strike with his knife when Supervisor swiftly dodged. Then, Supervisor launched a counterattack, and Bai Sankong was forced to retreat.
The two were evenly matched for the time being, and after several exchanges, neither could gain the upper hand.
Bai Sankong, seeing this, was extremely angry. He put down his sword and asked, 'What, Supervisor, do you want to leave?'

Bai Sankong said: 'Courting death.' As he spoke, Bai Sankong swung his long staff, aiming at Supervisor's head. Supervisor, however, leapt into the air, spun around, and landed on the staff, blocking Bai Sankong's strike.
Supervisor said, 'Bai Sankong, I have already mastered the Ultimate Unyielding Technique. You can't hurt me; take your playing to the King of Hell.'

Bai Sankong, seeing this, quickly got up and swung his guqin like a weapon, using it to block the sword in Supervisor's hand. Then, he used the strings of the guqin as weapons, entangling them around Supervisor's neck.
The two were still on the platform, Bai Sankong's eyes were extremely serious, his pupils suddenly contracted, and he was ready to attack at any moment.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6240_6420.text: At this moment, the two were in a stalemate, neither daring to relax. The ground was getting closer and closer, and they were both preparing to land. Jil, who had no other choice, suddenly extended a hand and pushed against the monster's head. The monster, caught off guard, was directly knocked out, and Jil landed safely on the ground.
The three of them were falling in the sky, and the coach suddenly took out a dragon head from his arms, then jumped down from the sky with the other two.

At this moment, the team members behind him were already at a height of 100 meters. They formed a line and were ready to execute the plan. The last team member kicked Jil, and he was also forced to abandon his previous trajectory.

At this moment, the two were completely separated, and the only thing connecting them was the dragon head ornament on the helmet. JC, with the dragon head ornament, flew towards Jil, while the other person was desperately trying to catch up.
At this moment, the other three members of the Blue Lake team also reached the altitude set by JC. After throwing away their parachutes, they quickly gathered around the three people behind JC.

The two people who were originally 10 meters apart, after several rounds of rolling, had become less than 3 meters apart. The man in black reached out to grab the man in white, but was shaken off again.
The man in the yellow suit, JC, was also thrown out. In mid-air, the two were circling each other, with the man in the black suit preparing to tackle him.

At this moment, the two were in a free fall. The strong wind whistled past their ears, and the sound of the wind in their ears was so loud that it drowned out their thoughts. In the sky, the two were tumbling and spinning, their bodies rotating hundreds of times in the air.
Unexpectedly, the parachute did not open, and the two were about to fall from the sky.
The two were still entangled in mid-air, with Jil trying to grab JC's leg but only hitting his arm. JC adjusted his posture and kept kicking at Jil, who was struggling to hold on.
The two people in the sky were fighting, Jil suddenly opened his eyes and shouted: "Wake up, wake up, go save her."

The two were still entangled in mid-air, with JC taking the initiative to grab Jil's leg and kick him away. Jil, with his back to the earth, saw the parachute opening above his head. He looked up and saw the fiery lava and thick smoke below. He quickly pulled the rope to activate the parachute, but the rapidly approaching lava frightened him into unconsciousness.

The female reporter inside the plane exclaimed: "The dragon head is out of hand and is falling towards the volcano crater." The pilot quickly turned the plane around. The two people outside the plane were still fighting, and the female reporter inside the plane was filming the scene with a camera.

The plane flew over the clouds and suddenly dived down. JC, who was holding onto the plane, was pulled out due to inertia. He quickly let go of the plane and deployed the parachute. In the sky, the powerful engine of the plane was shut down, and the plane fell from the sky like a rock.

The instructor, seeing this, quickly stepped forward, bent his legs, and spread his arms to stabilize his fall. Unexpectedly, the falling speed of the hard hat was too fast for him to react. The hard hat smashed through the cloud layer and towards the ground.

The female reporter continues: 'They have reached the minimum altitude for opening parachutes,' 'but none have opened theirs yet,' 'the situation is very critical.' The parachutes of the four individuals deployed in succession, slowly descending.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.text: Mu Lang's eyes were fierce, and he swung his knife at Bai Sankong. Bai Sankong blocked with his hand and then kicked Mu Lang away.
Bai Sankong said: 'I'm old, can't do it anymore. Didn't expect to lose to Mu Lang.'
Yan Zhu said, 'Grandpa, stop talking, just lie down and rest.' Bai Sankong was lying on the bed, with his right hand on his beard, motionless.
Bai Sankong said: 'Baoyu, it’s all Grandpa’s fault, for doing so many wrong and bad things.'
Bai Sankong said: 'Can you forgive Grandpa, Yan Zhu, come over here.'

Yan Zhu looked at the dying Bai Sankong, her eyes filled with reluctance, but she couldn't speak a word. She then turned to look at Mu Lang, Baoyu, and the other two, all of whom were silently watching her.
Yan Zhu said, 'Stop talking, let the past be the past, from now on, we should live well.'

Bai Sankong said: 'Alright, the family will live well.' Bai Sankong's hand trembled as he reached out to Yan Zhu. Yan Zhu trembled as they grasped Bai Sankong's hand. Bai Sankong weakly said: 'My daughter.'
Mu Lang and Baoyu were both extremely angry, glaring at each other. Yan Zhu was extremely anxious, and the situation became increasingly tense.

The soldiers behind him kept coming, but they all fell into the trap. Mu Lang swung his sword, and the broken swords of the soldiers were everywhere on the bridge. The soldiers who couldn't cross the bridge kept falling. Mu Lang looked at the soldiers who had crossed the bridge, and the commander who had appeared before was staring at him with a smirk.
The soldiers, holding weapons, surrounded Mu Lang. Mu Lang stood in the center, calmly drawing his sword. With a single swing, he broke the spears in half.

The guards, seeing this, circled around and stabbed at him with their spears. Mu Lang, though surrounded, remained calm. He sidestepped to avoid the guards' thrusts and then leaped into the air, forcefully stomping on two of the guards' spears.

The two were evenly matched in their skills, and after several exchanges, they were still tied. At this moment, Mu Lang saw an opportunity and slashed at Baoyu's neck. Baoyu quickly dodged, and the two continued to fight back and forth on the wooden platform. Mu Lang's moves became more aggressive, forcing Baoyu to retreat.

The two were evenly matched for the time being, with neither gaining the upper hand. Mu Lang's moves were swift and precise, while Baoyu's attacks were more forceful. The battle was intense, and at one point, Baoyu even managed to injure Mu Lang.
Huyan Dazang, seeing Mu Lang's superior martial skills, also joined the fight, swinging his broadsword at Mu Lang.
The wooden door broke open, and the soldiers on the bridge began to retreat in panic. Mu Lang said, 'I knew you would come.'
Huyan Dazang, wielding a long knife, leaped onto the wooden platform, his eyes blazing with murderous intent. Mu Lang, with a calm expression, drew his sword and said, 'I won’t let you die.'

movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.text: The news reported: "Earlier, we captured the fourth parachutist," "but couldn't identify him." Everyone recognized him as Martin, but the news anchor couldn't hear clearly, and the crowd shouted: "Martin!"
CoCo said in disbelief, "How could it be him"
Martin said: "You are the wingless bald eagle," "Don't dream of defeating me."
The female reporter excitedly said: "This mysterious person has no parachute." "What does it matter if he grabs the dragon head"
Martin, with tears in his eyes, watched as the two people he loved the most were about to crash into the earth. He spread his arms and flew forward with all his might, trying to intercept them.

The volcano continued to spew out thick smoke, and the parachute in Martin's hand was still not deployed. Martin's face showed a fierce determination as he gritted his teeth and pulled the cord of the parachute.
Martin was instantly sent flying, crashing hard to the ground. The inflated suit was compressed instantly, and the backpack was hurled into the air, then fell back down.
Martin was thrown out of the aircraft, tumbling down the slope, and then rolled over and got up, continuing to run forward.
Martin tumbled down the slope, and everyone was stunned by the scene before them. Jia Fulian was also stunned, and then she started crying loudly.

Martin rolled and crashed into a big rock, then continued to roll, tumbling all the way to the bottom of the valley. The valley was wide and the slope was steep, but Martin still dared not stop, rolling all the way to the foot of the mountain.
Martin rolled down the slope, and the suit also fell apart, with the helmet and glasses scattering on the ground.
Martin's nose had started to bleed, and his glasses had fallen off. He looked at the other members of the research team in panic, then collapsed to the ground.
Martin staggered to his feet, his eyes gradually turning red. He looked at the chopper in the sky, then collapsed to the ground.

The plane landed safely, and the press conference was in full swing. CoCo was sitting among the crowd, looking extremely worried. Jia Fulian was also very anxious, holding her chest and pacing back and forth in the conference room.
Martin walked over, picked up the bronze dragon head from the ground, and looked at it with great delight.
Martin was lying on the ground, and a man stepped forward, placing a dragon-head object next to him, saying: "It's yours, brother, you really are something."
Martin struggled to lift his head and saw the two men who had just shot at him. He then turned his head and saw the helicopter that had been shot down by the men.
Martin, lying on the ground, struggled to turn his head, only to see several helicopters flying away into the distance. He then weakly closed his eyes and mouth, lying flat on the ground.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Xing Feng said, "He pulled the safety pin out."
The scene shifts to the police station, where Manager Zhang is watching the live broadcast. The police officer says, "Alright, I got it," "I'm in position," "I have two guns and a grenade on me."

The camera switches to a door with a sign that says, 'Baby Sweet Dream.' The camera pans left, and a woman says, 'Hello, we're from the property management. There's a water leak downstairs from your apartment, could you please open the door for us to check?' The woman then enters the room and closes the door.

Police 1 said, "She's feeling unwell so Liu Yun and the others sent her to the hospital." Police 1 and others took away the informant, and then the police officer handcuffed Zhang Hua to the chair.
Xing Feng locked the interrogation room door and said, "Zhang Hua, what do you think""Ready to give it a last shot, is that it?"
Xing Feng said, "I didn't think you'd actually pull it off. When you walked towards me, I thought you were a labourer."
Cao Gang stood up and said, "Can you stop talking nonsense and say what you need to say?"
Xing Feng said impatiently, "Can you speak properly?"
Zhang Hua said with a smile, "I didn't expect you'd be a better actor than me."

Xing Feng interrupts Zhang Hua and says, "I'm telling you Huazi, if you want to talk one-on-one, then stop beating around the bush. Where are the hostages?" Zhang Hua, who is sitting on a chair, suddenly stands up in anger. Before he can react, the time is up and the door opens automatically.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.text: Zhang Dan slowly raised the gun and aimed it at King Kong. After a tense standoff, Zhang Dan slowly lowered the gun and said: "It's in your hands now."

Zhang Dan turned to King Kong and said: "Spiders in position." He then activated the mechanical spider. "Three, two, one."

The signal jammer's light flashed, and the three men in black who were just talking to each other suddenly fell to the ground. The three men in black who were just talking to each other suddenly fell to the ground, and the two subordinates behind Yurik quickly killed them. The three men in black who were just talking to each other suddenly fell to the ground, and the two subordinates behind Yurik quickly killed them.

King Kong shouted: 'Stop!' 'Stop!' 'Come out!' 'You two traitors, come out!' 'I'll kill you!' 'Hand over the "GAIA" to me!'

King Kong and his group immediately counterattacked, hitting Zhang Dan's right shoulder. The two of them fell to the ground, leaning against the wall, unable to move for a while.

Zhang Dan and Ye Hong leaned against the tank, both panting heavily. The heavily armed King Kong was on guard, and the scattered bullets lay quietly on the ground. The two of them exchanged a glance and then turned to leave.
King Kong, who had just thrown the bag into the car, ran to the back of the car with the suitcase. The car door opened, and he threw the suitcase inside.
The two drove off in a car, leaving the thugs behind.
The two of them then opened the hidden door and rushed out. Seeing the two escape, King Kong immediately gave chase, with the rest of the people following closely behind.

King Kong sat in the car, smiling triumphantly. Suddenly, he felt uneasy, leaned forward, and pressed the button on the armrest. A box with a face on it appeared in front of him. King Kong shouted: "Stop the car!" "Stop the car!" The car suddenly stopped.
The explosive sound startled King Kong in the car, and the screen showed the explosive sequence that had been prepared in advance, with the explosive module successfully activated.
Xiao Bao: "Bang"
Zhang Dan put down his hand and said: "The old fox died because of his own greed"
Xiao Bao: 'Now the "GAIA" is gone,' 'I want to see how you'll get out of this.'
Zhang Dan took out a necklace made of rare stones from his pocket and said: "Look at this."
Zhang Dan: "What?"
The scene shifts to the carriage of the moving train, where the robbers are still in a giddy mood, reveling in their spoils. Zhang Dan holding a diamond necklace says: 'Why are you always like this?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_5280_5460.text: Fang Baoyu and Da Zang looked at each other, and Mu Lang suddenly swung his sword. The two hurriedly blocked, only to see Mu Lang leap into the air, about to strike.
Fang Baoyu and Mu Lang fought each other, with Mu Lang trying to stab Fang Baoyu's back.
Fang Baoyu was not to be outdone, he kicked up his long robe and charged at Mu Lang. The two of them fought back and forth, with Mu Lang being pushed back repeatedly.
Fang Baoyu was not to be outdone, he leaped into the air and spun three hundred sixty degrees, then came down with a sword strike from above, which Mu Lang blocked with his sword.

Fang Baoyu's sword technique was extremely fast, making it difficult for Mu Lang to defend. He then used a feint to make Mu Lang think he was going to attack from above, but actually attacked from below. Mu Lang had no choice but to kneel and counterattack, forcing Fang Baoyu to retreat.

Da Zang's blade was as swift as a shooting star, and his body was like a swallow, darting left and right. Mu Lang's swordplay was as light as a butterfly, and his moves were like a tiger, sweeping left and right. The three of them were evenly matched, neither able to gain the upper hand.

Mu Lang, seeing this, was not to be outdone. He spun around several times, his body seemingly detached from the ground, and the momentum carried him straight towards Fang Baoyu. Fang Baoyu, with a flick of his sleeve, sent Mu Lang flying. After the dust settled, Fang Baoyu stood alone on the stage, his figure majestic.
Fang Baoyu's move was powerful, and Mu Lang was forced to retreat.

Mu Lang and Fang Baoyu both leaped onto the broken plank, and in an instant, their long swords clashed fiercely. Seeing that the long sword of Mu Lang was about to strike Fang Baoyu, Da Zang quickly stepped forward to block.

Fang Baoyu and Da Zang stood on either side of the steps, with the soldiers behind them forming a human wall. The two of them leaped into the air, their swords flashing like shooting stars. The soldiers on both sides could only raise their spears to block, but they were still cut down by the two. The soldiers below the steps were also affected, their spears breaking into two and falling to the ground.

Mu Lang and his two subordinates were extremely skilled in martial arts. They ran forward with a light step, like tigers descending from mountains, their movements like a well-orchestrated symphony. The three of them were unstoppable, their momentum like rolling waves, their attacks like hidden arrows waiting to be released. Even the soldiers guarding the city tower couldn't help but admire their heroic bearing and majestic aura.

Mu Lang's face changed instantly, and he immediately drew his sword to a defensive stance. The two faced off, but neither dared to make the first move. Suddenly, two soldiers attacked Fang Baoyu from behind. Both Fang Baoyu and Da Zang quickly reacted and seized the opportunity to knock them off the platform.

Fang Baoyu, who had been stabbed in the chest, suddenly pulled out a short dagger from his sleeve and stabbed it into Mu Lang's abdomen. The two of them fought to the death, and in the end, Mu Lang was killed by Fang Baoyu.
Fang Baoyu, who had been hiding nearby, saw this scene and immediately got up to take action. But Mu Lang, with a casual flick of his wrist, made the long knife in his hand sparkle.
Mu Lang, seeing that his scheme was about to be exposed, drew his sword and walked towards Da Zang.
Mu Lang, holding the sword, slowly approached Fang Baoyu, who was lying on the ground, his eyes filled with panic. Seeing the blood on the ground, Mu Lang's expression changed.

Fang Baoyu was stunned, his eyes wide with disbelief. Mu Lang's blade was already mere inches from the prince's neck. Da Zang, in a moment of urgency, drew his sword and aimed for Mu Lang. The blade was about to strike when Duchess Tuo Chen intervened.
Mu Lang and Duchess Tuo Chen stood back-to-back, forming an impenetrable formation.

Simon: "Shehe (Harmony)"
Coco replied: "World peace" "JC suggested four names" "I chose"

Mr. Liao pointed at Jia Fulian and said: "Sister-in-law"

The police car arrived at Zhang Hua's location, and Xing Feng asked Zhang Hua: "This place looks familiar, right?" "Tell me, how many people are in the house?"

The scene shifts to the entrance of the bathhouse, where police cars are parked with their lights on. Zhang Hua and his group are standing at the door, looking at the people coming in. The two exchange a glance and then sit down inside.
Xiao Lei and Cang Zi exchanged a glance and then split up. The wall had a wanted poster for the two. Cang Zi left first, while Xiao Lei stuck to the wall, moving along the road's edge.

Zhang Hua, who was hiding in the dark, saw the police arriving at the scene. He quickly crawled back into the sewer. The police arrived at the KTV, surrounded the parked cars, and started inspecting one by one.

The scene shifts to the police car, where Zhang Hua is explaining to the crowd gathered around: "We investigated the three courtyards that match the criteria of an apple orchard. Currently, the target is locked on the one halfway up the hill. Our current location, the resort, is about 300 meters away from the target."

"You're a kidnapper, if caught, you'll be sentenced to ten years" "If you kill the two of us, you'll be a murderer" "Death penalty, is it worth it" "You kill us" "In the end you'll either be shot by the police" "or by Hua" "Is it worth it?"

Xing Feng: "Turn off all walkie talkies."

movie101_6967711402819584543_2100_2280.text: Godfather was busy wiping the medicine bottles while occasionally glancing at the door. The sound of the door opening confirmed his suspicion, and he immediately stopped his work and looked up.

At this moment, Godfather was sitting in the barber's chair, with a look of disdain on his face. Outside, Middle-aged Policeman and Drug Dealer were watching intently. Godfather, sensing something was wrong, turned his head and saw Middle-aged Policeman and Drug Dealer outside. He immediately stood up and looked at them in surprise.
Godfather said: "Take him down." Godfather turned around and instructed the nurse.
Drug Dealer remained silent, and Godfather continued: "Go on."
After finishing, he took a deep breath, stood up, and walked towards the door. Godfather kept staring at him until he left the room.

Middle-aged Policeman walked into the barbershop and threw the scissors directly at Godfather. Godfather dodged the scissors, and the scissors shattered the glass. Middle-aged Policeman picked up a stool and smashed it towards Godfather, who dodged it by leaning back.
He then went to the bathroom, lifted the toilet lid, and peered inside.

At this moment, Drug Dealer was also cleaning the toilet. He took off his rubber gloves and threw them into the toilet. Just as he was about to put his hands into the toilet, he heard a gunshot from outside. He immediately grabbed the toilet lid to protect himself.

Middle-aged Policeman fired first, breaking the bottle on the shelf. Drug Dealer quickly took out a gun, but Xiao An's father was already hiding in the bathroom. The two of them were at a disadvantage, so they hid and waited for Xiao An to come out.
At this moment, Godfather suddenly pulled out a gun and fired at the police. Middle-aged Policeman quickly returned fire, and the two began to exchange fire.
Godfather's head slowly lifted, eyes closed, a pair of glasses hanging on his nose, a smile on his lips, as if he had just fallen asleep.
The scene shifts to the rooftop of the insurance company, where a figure broke in through the window.

He carried Xiao An out of the room, not daring to stop even for a moment. When he reached the stairwell, he finally breathed a sigh of relief. The drug dealers upstairs were still searching for his trace. After confirming there was no danger, he quickly ran downstairs. Xiao An woke up and saw the room door had been smashed open.

At this moment, a police car was parked at the entrance of the alley, with two policemen standing by the car. After observing for a while, Drug Dealer decided to take Xiao An and leave this dangerous place.
He held Xiao An in his arms and walked up the stairs, looking around as he ascended. He reached the top and turned to look down the corridor, then turned to look in another direction.

Middle-aged Policeman held Xiao An in his arms, walked to the edge of the rooftop, and then leaped down. He didn't forget to glance back at the police car before quickly running back to the room with Xiao An.

He took Xiao An and ran out the door, directly onto the rooftop. Looking at the high building opposite, he carefully moved to the edge of the rooftop. Xiao An was looking down in fear, while he kept a watchful eye on the surrounding environment. He then moved to the other side of the rooftop.
Middle-aged Policeman found some white powder on the toilet. He picked some up on his finger, sniffed it, and then rushed out of the bathroom, retching violently.

The two of them were running frantically through the narrow alley, with no one knowing where to go. They could only run forward, and then they arrived at a dead end. They had no choice but to run back the way they came.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: A Lian asked: "What about my happiness?"
Shen Mo poured water and said: "Come come come" "I'm sorry, Mr. Jia" "Today is special, I didn't take good care of you."

Du Yu was busy in the kitchen, constantly creating delicious dishes. He skillfully chopped the ingredients and stirred them in the pan. As night fell, Du Yu lit the lights outside the shop, making the shop appear warm and inviting.

Shen Mo and Jia Zong stood up to toast with the guests, while the flambeed dish was brought to the table. Shen Mo and Jia Zong then sat down, and the lively atmosphere of the restaurant was once again ignited.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Lin Lin came back to the room with the documents, Mo Han was already fast asleep, she sat at the table, put the documents on top of the book, and started to read them carefully.
Mo Han said, "This music is so nice. Lin Lin, I think I should go back. Living here is not very convenient. You need to work and take care of me."

Lin Lin said, "Don't get your wires crossed. I'll be fine right away." Mo Han was already fast asleep, snoring loudly, completely unaware of Lin Lin's actions. Suddenly, a pen was thrown at his head, waking him up. He frowned and looked up.
Mo Han said, "Lin Lin, I need to go to the bathroom. Can you help me up?"
Lin Lin said, "Okay." Lin Lin put down the pen, stood up, walked to Mo Han's bedside, and prepared to help him up.
Lin Lin sat down next to Mo Han, took the hem of his shirt and began to read silently.

Mo Han sat on the bed, clutching his chest, unable to move. Lin Lin supported him as they slowly stood up. Just a few steps, Mo Han's chest suddenly tightened, and he knelt on the ground, gasping for air.
Lin Lin said, "Be careful, you go back to bed, I'll call the guard to bring the urinal in."
Mo Han said, "Ah, no need, I just didn't walk too well. It's okay now."
Mo Han was still holding Lin Lin's waist, like a dancing couple, moving towards the door. Lin Lin opened the door and Mo Han stepped out, then closed the door.
Lin Lin said, "It's here."
Soldier said, "Miss Lin Lin, I brought some porridge for Secretary Yang."
Lin Lin said, "I'll take care of it."
Soldier said, "Oh, let me, let me, it's hot, I'll do it."
Soldier was tidying up the room, and Lin Lin rushed in, saying, "Hey, don't put it there. How could you be so clumsy? Get out quickly."
Soldier said, "Yes, yes."
Lin Lin, hearing the noise, quickly ran to the door, opened it, and snatched the documents from Mo Han's hands.
The next day, Lu Xiao came to the barracks to find Mo Han. Through the binoculars, they saw Lu Xiao approaching and stopped the guard at the door.
Lu Xiao picked up the phone and asked, "Where did he say he was going?"
Lu Xiao said, "Said he was going to buy a gift for Miss Lin Lin."
Lu Xiao hung up the phone, picked up another one, and said, "Follow that man with the surname Yang immediately."
Soldier said, "Do you remember the book I asked you to buy last time?" "Yes, I'm fine now." "Room 305 at the Fokai Hotel, tonight at seven." "Don't worry, I'll be on time."
Soldier hung up the phone, opened the door, and walked out. He saw a rickshaw passing by and quickly walked over.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: The scene shifts to a restaurant, where Shen Mo is advertising to Yao Zong and others. Shen Mo asked, 'Aren't you tired?'
Shen Mo said, 'Let's go shopping.' Xiaoli Ma was pulled by Shen Mo, and they both stood on one leg, holding hands.
Shen Mo watched the departing car, then turned back to Xiaoli Ma and said, 'Tired, really tired.'
Xiaoli Ma said with a smile: "Help me get straightened up."
Xiaoli Ma, wearing a hat and holding a pair of high heels, walked up to Shen Mo and sat down next to him.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: Lu Xiao, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally felt relieved after seeing Mo Han and Lin Lin together. He turned and left, taking his position as a protector for Lin Lin.

Mo Han asked: 'Why does it have to shatter?'
Lin Lin said: "In times of chaos, who can guarantee that a tiny pendant won't be destroyed?"
Mo Han said: "Then it should be well protected."

Lin Lin said: "Could you help me put it on?" Mo Han took the beaded necklace and carefully fastened it around Lin Lin's neck. Lin Lin shyly lowered their head, and Mo Han, with great care, held Lin Lin close, both lost in the beautiful memories of the moment.
Mo Han said: "For a long time, I felt like the most unfortunate person in the world, always unable to move on from the past, afraid to love again for fear of falling back into a life's abyss."
Mo Han looked at Lin Lin and said: "Let the past be the past."
Mo Han said: "You only live once, cherish it."

Lin Lin looked at the necklace and said: "You gave me a gift." "Can I take you out for a meal?"
Mo Han said: "Today, huh"

Mo Han said: "An old friend, we've grown up together."

Lin Lin, shyly covering her face, got up and ran away, leaving Mo Han sitting there, bewildered.

Lu Xiao watched their departing figures, a mix of emotions welling up inside. After a while, he turned his head to look at the watchtower, then turned back to stare at the empty street, a feeling of helplessness and regret surging to his heart.

Mo Han's brows furrowed tightly, his face covered with sweat. He stared intently at the letter in his hand, his emotions fluctuating again and again. He knelt down heavily, glaring fiercely at the brothers who were beating him.

Or, if there's still money left unspent, I could help you with that."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Mo Han's face was covered with sweat, and he was panting heavily. He looked at Lu Xiao with a determined look in his eyes. Lu Xiao struggled to stand up, pulled out his gun, and pointed it at Mo Han.

Yu Xuan said: "The moment 4321 relayed to you the password he received, we tried to decode it."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Yu Xuan said: "I only gave you messages, but realized the translations were incorrect, so you must go back immediately and find the correct password."

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Che Linlin said: "Strange, then where have I seen you before?"

They believe in 'pacifying internal turmoil before dealing with external aggression.' Surely you have heard of this, Colonel."
Yang Muchen smiled and said: "So from this perspective, whether Japan is good or bad has nothing to do with us. Our greatest enemy at present is the Communist Party."

Yang Muchen raised his glass and said: "Come, Miss Che Linlin, let's drink to that." Yang Muchen raised his glass and clinked it against Che Linlin's empty cup. Che Zhenshan was stunned, and Yang Muchen quickly grabbed the bottle and filled his own glass.
Che Linlin picked up a leaf and said: "Mr. Yang Muchen knows nothing at all. They say ignorance is no sin."
Che Linlin said: "Whether he knows or not doesn't matter. What matters is that he's a heartless Japanese lackey."

Che Zhenshan said: 'He is just conveying the will of his superiors.' 'A person cannot always control their life in this world, can't your father be the same way?' 'Che Linlin, I think that Mr. Yang Muchen is a very talented man.' 'And a favorite of Director Bai, his future is limitless.'
Che Linlin said: 'What does that have to do with me?'
Che Zhenshan said: "Che Linlin, you're not young anymore. You can't live in the past forever. You need to think about yourself. After all, we still have to live, don't we?"
Che Linlin said: "My affairs are none of your business."
Che Zhenshan said: 'Why are you so stubborn?' 'I'm just looking out for you.'
Che Linlin stood up and said: "If you truly care for me, you would immediately drive that Mr. Yang away for me."
Che Zhenshan said: 'He is sent by Nanjing, how dare I drive him away?'
Che Linlin said: "That..."

movie101_6967711402819584543_300_480.text: Father looked out the window and said, "A car is prepared outside", "Let's leave and go far, far away", "I'm all ready".
Xiao An looked at Father's face, full of reluctance, but still reached out to grab his arm.
Xiao An let go of Father's hand, but Father grabbed it back. Xiao An turned around and tried to break free, but Father pulled her back. Xiao An looked at Father and said, "You want to kidnap me too."
Xiao An looked at Father's outstretched hand, then withdrew her hand and turned to leave. Father stood there, watching Xiao An's back.

The screen goes black, and the title 'Murder' appears. The scene shifts to a car driving on a road at night. The car passes through a forest and then stops by the roadside, with buildings visible in the distance.
The car sped through the suburban streets, passing by various houses and buildings, all of which were lit up with lights.

At this moment, the perpetrator's car arrived at a T-junction. Turning left would lead directly to the residential area, while turning right would take them to the outskirts. The perpetrator naturally chose the latter. Little did they know, a police car had been lying in ambush there for a while. The two cars drove side by side for a while before the perpetrator suddenly accelerated and rammed the police car.
Young Police Officer pulled the trigger, and the man in the car fell silent. Young Police Officer then opened the car door, and the man slowly got out.
He then took out the parts of the surveillance system from the box, and found a set of keys inserted into one of the pipes. He picked up the keys and looked at them.
He looked at the bullet in his hand, his expression complex. He put the bullet back in its place and continued to watch the two in the room.
At this moment, a figure flashed in front of him. Young Police Officer turned his head and saw someone hiding behind a large truck. He immediately turned around and walked towards the other side.

Young Police Officer, who had been waiting under the truck for a long time, saw the opportune moment and immediately pounced. He crawled under the truck as quickly as he could, first getting his head and hands in, then carefully maneuvering his entire body into the truck's cargo area.

Young Police Officer was still pushing the cargo truck. He was getting more and more impatient, his face serious. He didn't even care about the sweat dripping from his forehead. Young Police Officer suddenly stopped, he looked at the cargo truck, then at the warehouse, and finally turned around and got off the truck.

movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.text: Xiao An stood still, staring at him without saying a word.
The scene shifts to a year ago, when Xiao An was still in high school.
Dad stood there, stunned, watching him leave.
Xiao An said: "Dad, I'm fine now." "I'm happy." "Isn't this enough?"
Dad said: "I don't want you to be happy. I want you to live."
Xiao An said: 'I will stay alive.' 'Aren't I living just fine?' 'All these years.' 'Mom was also cared for by him.'
Dad said: "Don't mention him." "What caused all this?"

Xiao An said: 'But everything has already happened.' 'There's no going back.' 'We will leave Myanmar someday.' 'If that day comes, I hope Dad will leave with us.' 'But until that day comes, I don't want to change anything.' 'I got used to it.'
Dad looked at Xiao An, his lips quivering slightly, but his eyes were filled with confusion and helplessness. He said, 'I can't understand.'
After hearing this, Xiao An's eyes were filled with tears, and she turned her head to look at Dad.
Xiao An said: 'Try to understand me, I will try to make him a good person.'
The screen goes black, and the third chapter, 'The Daughter,' begins.

Xiao An sat in front of the podium, her eyes filled with deep contemplation. She seemed to be thinking about something, her eyes gradually moistening. After a while, she forced a smile, as if she had made some sort of decision.
The scene shifts to a restroom, where Xiao An is holding a pregnancy test, with two lines indicating a positive result.
The scene shifts to a small room where several people are mixing drugs. They are all wearing masks, handling the drug powder with great care.
The scene shifts to a small room where several people are sitting around a table, each wearing masks. They are methodically packaging white powder into plastic bags.

movie101_6991751088659497479_720_900.text: Captain General replied: "These guns are not just for kidnapping."

The scene shifts to the interrogation room, where Xiao Dou asks, "When was this person kidnapped?"

Captain 3 replied: "Didn't ask."

Xiao Dou said: "The car belongs to someone else."

Xiao Dou replied: "Just borrowed."
Xiao Dou: 'Borrowed.'
The person in black replied: "Just to take a ride."
Xiao Dou said: "You are joking around me with a borrowed car."
Xiao Dou replied: "She's just a sex friend, and her boyfriend is rich."
The man with sunglasses, smoking, said: "You depend on her, don't you?""Why don't you have her come out?"
Xiao Dou replied, "I don't have her number."

The scene shifts to the bathroom, where a man in a sweater is lying on the ground convulsing. Captain General asks, 'Is the person still alive?'
Zhang Hua: "We're together."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Shen Mo was putting trash in the bin and said, 'Hey, sis, we meet again.'
Xiaoli Ma said, "What bad luck, shouldn't have gone out today. Is there another way home?"
Du Yu said, "Little Shen Mo, didn't you see Xiaoli Ma carrying so many things? We're all neighbors, lend a hand and help carry it over."
Shen Mo said, "Come on, Xiaoli Ma, let me help you."
Xiaoli Ma said: "No need."
Qi Qi said, "I'll give you a chance, take mine."
Shen Mo took the bag and said, "Keep the balance."
Shen Mo said, "Thank you."
Shen Mo said, "Thank you, thank you. Just put it here, right here."

Shen Mo pulled Lan Lan into the house and said, "Everything is nice in this community, except for the many rooms, the toilets that don't work well, electrical circuits and pipes that are aging, a lot needs to be replaced."
Lan Lan asked, "How do you know that?"

Shen Mo said: "I often come here to deliver food, I'm familiar with the property management. A lot of the rooms, things don't work well, I've fixed them myself. Is there anything broken at your place? Might as well fix it now that I'm here."
Qi Qi said: 'Our Li Jie has fixed everything. These little things are no problem for her.'
Xiaoli Ma chased after them and said, "Don't chat with unreliable folks. Hurry upstairs and get things organized."
Lan Lan stood up and said, "Bye-bye."
Shen Mo said, 'We're neighbors, just shout if you need help.' The two of them laughed and closed the door.
Shen Mo walked into the ward with a serious face. Xiaoli Ma followed him and asked, "Um, are you afraid of cockroaches?"
Shen Mo crawled under the bed with a flashlight, ready to take action.
Shen Mo crawled out from under the bed and asked, "Where was it before?"
Xiaoli Ma said, 'There, there, there.' 'Lift the carpet, that side, over there.'
Shen Mo got up and said, 'Nope.'
Shen Mo came down from the second floor, saw the book Xiaoli Ma was looking at, and said, 'Sis, you perform so well, just relying on this book?'

Xiaoli Ma said, 'Enough of that. Fifty-five yuan, money wasted. Sis’s success today, let me tell you, is because of my talent and hard work. Besides, you're so young, why don't you do something more serious instead of fooling around all day?'
Shen Mo was startled and quickly said, 'Sorry, I forgot, you have a problem in your head.'
Shen Mo said, "I'm learning acting, too."
Xiaoli Ma said, "Aren't you just left with the last three months? Why waste that time?"

Shen Mo said: 'Actually, when I was very young, my parents passed away. I grew up with my aunt. My aunt has a strong personality, married three times, and as far as I remember, it’s just continuous transfers, moving, fighting, and running away. I often wonder why I can't be like other kids.'
Shen Mo sat up and said, 'Why do we only live once? There are so many things that there's not enough time to do, so many emotions that we never get the chance to feel.'
Shen Mo looked at the receipts and said, 'I think, maybe acting can make up for these regrets, to experience different lives. If that's the case, three months will be enough.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Lin Lin said: "But I was wrong, why did you hide that you have a fiancée, why didn't you tell me earlier, you can say directly if you don't like me, I didn't force you, you shouldn't lie to me."
Lin Lin, touched, said: "I don't need your gratitude"
Mo Han shouted: "Lin Lin! Lin Lin!" Mo Han quickly caught up, but Lin Lin suddenly stopped and turned around.
Lin Lin, with tears streaming down her face, said to Mo Han: "Yang Mo Han, we are now even." "You leave immediately, leave 101 Group immediately." "I never want to see you again."
Mo Han chased after Lin Lin and called out: "Lin Lin!"
Lin Lin said: "Let me go!" Mo Han tried to strangle Lin Lin, but Lin Lin broke free.
Lin Lin said: "Why are you doing this" "Why are you doing this"
Mo Han said: "Things are not what you think"
Mo Han said: "Follow me, trust me."
Mo Han, seeing Lin Lin's miserable state, felt a deep sense of guilt. He stepped forward, gently wrapped his arms around Lin Lin, and held her tightly, comforting her silently.

Mo Han's sudden action left Lin Lin speechless. She tried to resist, but Mo Han held her back firmly. The heart-shaped necklace around her neck was a testament to her love for Mo Han. Lin Lin struggled to break free from Mo Han's grip, but as she turned, she saw the anxious look in Mo Han's eyes.
The two arrived at the room, Mo Han opened the door and looked around, Lin Lin asked: "Where is the person"
Lin Lin said: 'Yeah, how is it gone' Lin Lin was pacing back and forth in the room, looking out the window, Mo Han was also looking out the window, with a worried expression.
Lin Lin said: "You are lying to me"
Mo Han said: "No, he was here just now" "Look, the light is still on" "I really didn't lie to you" "I really met with the fellow villagers" "I want to sell the tobacco soil"
Lin Lin said: "Then why did you lie to Lu Xiao"

Mo Han said: "I know he likes you" "So I dare not offend him" "You also know that the Nanjing government just issued last month" "Temporary Regulations on the Prohibition of Smoking and Drugs" "If Lu Xiao knows that I sell tobacco" "I"
Mo Han was deeply moved, heaving a long sigh, and said: "I am telling the truth".
Mo Han asked: "What's wrong"?
Lin Lin said: "Nothing, let's go."
Lin Lin angrily stormed out of the room, leaving Mo Han standing there, stunned. After a while, he too stormed out, slamming the door.

The scene switches to the military police headquarters, where two officers are walking and talking. One officer said: "Commander, that kid surnamed Yang is too out of line, he has a woman at home and still wants to take advantage of Lin Lin, what the hell is this."
Lu Xiao asked: "How do you know" "Have you been to his house"

movie101_6967711402819584543_3360_3540.text: He lifted his middle finger, wiped it on his shirt, and then dropped a few drops of blood onto the white powder. The blood spread and absorbed into the powder.

She held her youngest son in her arms and was about to go downstairs when she heard the loud explosion from the office next door. The powerful blast sent debris flying everywhere, and the roof of the neighboring building was completely blown off. The remaining two children were also blown away by the blast.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: The leader turned around and said: "Still the woman who has seen him."
Lu Xiao said: "No, that Yang kid told me himself."
The group leader said: "Since you haven’t seen it with your own eyes, is there any conclusive evidence?" "Merely on Mo Han's word, you're so readily convinced. Isn’t that a bit improper?"
Lu Xiao said: "Group leader, why do you always side with him?"

The group leader said: 'Whether I am siding with him or doing this for Lin Lin, you should be clear in your heart. Ever since Mo Han arrived, look how happy Lin Lin has been. It’s as if we’re back to our childhood days. That’s more important than anything.'
Lu Xiao said aggrievedly: 'Ever since that Yang guy came, I haven’t had a single good day.'
The group leader said sternly: "Lu Xiao, a soldier should be competing on the battlefield, not competing in jealousy. Look at yourself."
The scene shifts to the home of the battalion commander, where Mo Han is waiting for Lu Xiao to return, pouring a glass of wine, constantly looking at his watch, worriedly looking towards the door.
Mo Han: "What’s wrong with you, not a word for so long?" "You must be bothered by something, you." "You are always so suspicious, always overthinking."
Mo Han was the first to snap out of it. He casually placed the wine glass on the table and began to speak.
Mo Han said: "Lin Lin, life is short. Who doesn’t want to fall in love passionately, who doesn’t want to spend a lifetime with the one they love?"

Mo Han said: "But we happen to live in such times, having today doesn’t guarantee tomorrow. We can hardly ensure our own lives, who would dare to touch love so lightly? Maybe right now, outside the window, someone is aiming a gun at me."
Lu Xiao and his men burst in, Lu Xiao said: "See, what did I say, confess in front of Lin Lin." "Did you go on a date with your fiancée that day or not? Speak."
Mo Han said: "What if I tell you no, would you believe me?" Lu Xiao, infuriated, walked over and slapped Mo Han.

Lu Xiao said angrily: "You’ve got quite a stiff mouth, huh? If not the fiancée, then who are you sneaking around meeting with? The Communist Party? Do you dare admit it? If you dare, I’ve got the guts to put a bullet in you, right here."
Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao, why should I admit anything to you, what are you to decide?"
The officer angrily said: "Brothers, beat him to death for me."
Mo Han was knocked to the ground again. Lin Lin shouted angrily: "Get out."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3240_3420.text: Xiaoli Ma clasped her hands together and said: "I think" "You should not be too pessimistic" "You must believe" "In this world" "Miracles can happen"
Shen Mo turned around and said: "Hey sis, why don't you teach me how to perform?"

Shen Mo was sitting on the floor reading a book, with his feet propped on the coffee table. He looked up and saw Xiaoli Ma and Lan Lan bringing over a bag of snacks. He got up and left the room.
Lan Lan asked: "Hey, Xiaoli Ma, is Shen Mo the one who had a nosebleed for you last time, isn't he? He's a nice guy, isn't he?"

Du Yu said: "Come on! Come on! I'll sit."
Du Yu said: "Xiaoli Ma, ah, when the boss is not here, I'm in charge, cheers! Cheers!"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Lu Xiao, with a furrowed brow, said: 'Lin Lin, he is a man engaged to be married, what are you to him anyway?'
Lin Lin said: 'Even if I were a piece of rotten meat, I wouldn't let a fly like you linger on me. Get out.'
Lu Xiao said: 'Fine, Yang. You're lucky this time. We'll see about that. Let's go.'
Lin Lin, with tears streaming down her face, fired the gun at Lu Xiao. The loud noise startled her, causing her to fall to the ground. She cried and leaned on the table, her heart in turmoil.

Mo Han, who was originally lying on his back, turned to his side and saw Lin Lin sleeping beside him. He gently propped up his upper body with his elbow, looking at Lin Lin who was sound asleep, with a face full of worry.
Mo Han sat on the edge of the bed, looking at Lin Lin's sleeping face, and couldn't help but gently caress her cheek. Then, he held Lin Lin's hand and fell into contemplation.
Mo Han looked around, not daring to move, and then began to pack his clothes hastily.

Mo Han, who was originally sitting on the edge of the bed, saw Lin Lin's sleeping face and couldn't help but gently caress her hair. Then he slowly got up, tiptoed to the other side of the bed, and sat down in the chair by the table.
He then took out the delicate baby clothes he had prepared earlier. After careful examination, he furrowed his brows, not recognizing the picture at all.
Mo Han, who was originally planning to take a shower, saw the thick manual on the sink and picked it up out of curiosity. The cover read 'Daily Study of the Chairman'.
He flipped through the book, which contained the annotated original text of 'A Dream of the Great West' by Lu Xiao, along with introductions and prefaces from various authors.
Mo Han, who had been silently waiting for Lin Lin to fall asleep, finally got his chance. He tiptoed to Lin Lin's bedside, ready to fulfill his wish.
Mo Han, while rummaging through the cupboard, found a piece of clothing and said: 'Ah, I'm looking for clothes.'
Lin Lin replied: 'Looking for clothes? They're in the bathroom. You were sick last night, I was exhausted.'
Mo Han said: 'Then I'll be going back first.' He then got up to leave, but before exiting the room, he looked at Lin Lin again. Seeing no reaction from Lin Lin, he finally left the room.
Lu Xiao, pressing the phone, said: 'Please connect me to 4321, please connect me to 4321 once more.'

Lu Xiao listened to the voice on the phone, his eyes gradually moistening. He quickly wiped the tears from the corner of his eyes, but the tears had already fallen. Lu Xiao put down the phone, tears streaming down his face.

movie101_6967711402819584543_3720_3900.text: At this moment, Driver and his entourage arrived at the pit. Seeing the situation, Driver signaled to his men to put away their guns. Drug Dealer, who was still in the pit, looked at Driver and said, "This has nothing to do with him," "Let her go,"
At this moment, Drug Dealer was trembling and looking around, while Xiao An stared at him with a cold face. Then, he said to Driver: "Consider it as I'm begging you."
Drug Dealer, with a swollen face and bloodstains on his clothes, struggled to stand up from the pit, then stumbled towards Xiao An.

Drug Dealer, who was covered in blood, staggered to his feet, nearly falling into the pit. He struggled to stand and then fell back into the pit, struggling to climb out while Xiao An watched from the side.

At this moment, Xiao An's eyes were filled with tears, her pupils dilated, staring intently at the front. The drug dealer behind her was holding a gun, but he was not the focus. The man in the pit struggled to stand up, his hands supporting his weight as he turned around. Blood flowed from his forehead and lips, and his clothes were soaked with blood.

Drug Dealer, exhausted, leaned against the pit's edge and said, "Let her go." Driver looked at the pit, then at the kneeling Drug Dealer. Drug Dealer knelt down and grabbed Driver's trouser leg, pleading, "I beg you".
Driver angrily kicked Drug Dealer, and the nearby Driver also furiously beat the worker. Xiao An, seeing this, shed tears of heartache.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: The scene switches to Hong Zichen who is still in the attic, having hung up the phone.

As for your identity, I'll keep quiet, but you'll need to provide me with information, and I'll pay you extra for it. How about that?'

movie101_6967711402819584543_4080_4260.text: The doorknob of the cell door turned, Killer was standing outside, poking his head in to look at him. Older Brother turned around, glanced at him, then looked back at the door.

In the pitch-dark room, a faint light shone through the peephole of the door. A pair of eyes stared intently at the door. Inside, Killer was bent over, panting heavily.

The scene shifts to the door of the house, which slowly opens. Killer, with his head down and showing no signs of life, stands inside. Older Brother points the gun at him, and the two stare at each other.
