The boss said: "Twenty"
The boss said: "It's so cheap, gutter oil, isn't it?"
The boss said angrily: "Screw you, go do your work."
Shen Mo, carrying a lunchbox, said while walking: "Where was I?"
The boss agreed: "Deal."
The boss, while throwing things, said: "Stop nagging, unload the truck."
Shen Mo walked to the counter and said: "Sister-in-law, you know how sick our dog has become."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: Lu Xiao, who had been waiting outside for a long time, saw Little Eyed Man and quickly turned to hide. When Little Eyed Man walked past, he stared intently at him. Little Eyed Man, sensing something unusual, looked up and around but didn't see Lu Xiao. Lu Xiao, who had been hiding, suddenly rushed out, and Little Eyed Man was taken aback.
Little Eyed Man, who had been waiting outside for a long time, saw the girl leave and immediately followed. Lu Xiao and Mo Han also emerged from behind the wall, watching their backs.
He looked around, but there was no one in sight. Suddenly, a gunshot echoed from not far away. He quickly turned around and ran in the direction of the sound.
Mo Han and Che Linlin were still searching for Little Eyed Man, but they didn't see him. Seeing the man lying on the ground, they immediately ran towards him.
Mo Han, who had been waiting outside for a long time, heard the conversation and immediately hid in the alley behind the door. His expression became solemn, and his heart began to sink.

Lu Xiao said: "Please connect me to 4321. There's an urgent matter at home pushing me to return. A distant cousin is coming over to help with my business. At 3 PM tomorrow, she'll be at Ruifuxiang Silk Store making a qipao, wearing a chicken-heart-shaped agate pendant around her neck. Bring the account book and make sure to contact her proactively."
The scene shifts to a tailor shop, where Che Linlin and Mo Han are picking out fabrics. Che Linlin picked up a piece of blue fabric and asked Mo Han, "Mo Han, do you think I look good in this?"
Che Linlin put down the fabric and said: "This one looks a bit old."

The clock on the wall pointed to 5 o'clock. Mo Han looked at the clock, then at the fabric in the tailor's hands, and finally at the fabric in Little Eyed Man's hands. He then asked, "Is this one pretty?"
Mo Han said: "Why don't you choose the red one?"
Mo Han said: "I actually wanted to choose the red one at first, but I was afraid you wouldn't like it."
Lu Xiao said: "You look the best in red."
Little Eyed Man asked: "What happened?"
Mo Han asked: "Really?"
Mo Han said: "Boss, I'll take this one."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Alright, please wait a moment."
The shopkeeper said, "Miss, would you like a necklace? Pure gold, we can negotiate the price. Just take one."
Mo Han said: "Che Linlin, don't bother with him."
Mo Han said, "It's ready."
Mo Han said: "Let's go"

Che Linlin, dressed in a simple cotton-padded jacket and wearing a crown of flowers in her hair, looked back at the man in front of her with a smile, then left the room with Lu Xiao. The man, holding the fabric, watched their backs, full of admiration.
At this moment, Lu Xiao and Che Linlin were strolling in the ancient city. Che Linlin was holding Lu Xiao's arm, and Lu Xiao was looking around at the ancient city. The two of them were very happy.
Lu Xiao: "Che Linlin, I think that one looks pretty good. Come over and take a look." Mo Han took Che Linlin to the shop to pick out clothes.
Mo Han looked at the two of them and said: "Let's go for now, we'll come back another day. Let's go."
Che Zhen Shan rushed into the house and said, "Lu Xiao, do you have a death wish?" "Che Linlin is my daughter."

movie101_6967711402819584543_4440_4620.text: Younger Sister said aggrievedly: "Just a little thing." "There's a pervert teacher in our school." "Actually trying to take advantage of me."
Older Brother:"What?" "Someone wants to take your cheap, what cheap do you have to take?"
Younger Sister: "I won't say anymore"
Older Brother: "Hurry up"

Younger Sister said: "I will fight with him" "Scratching his face into a mess" "Finally managed to escape" "Only to find out after escaping" "I left my sunglasses at his place" "That's my new sunglasses, I saved for a long time to buy" "I just went to him and asked" "He even did not give me back" "And scolded me"

Younger Sister said: "Then I told my boyfriend""The boyfriend went to find him""When he comes back I asked him where are my glasses""He said sunglasses broken""Buy a new one later""I think it's ok""Buy another one later""Do you know it""He lied to me"

Younger Sister: "He lied to me" "He gave my glasses to another girl!" "That girl is a melon babe" "Wearing my sunglasses and shaking it in front of me" "How could I not hit her?" "This matter" "On the surface is a security issue" "Actually is a relationship issue"

Younger Sister, with a pained expression, tried hard to suppress the discomfort in her body. She pursed her lips, her eyes filled with tears, and her expression turned aggrieved. She glanced at Older Brother, who was staring at her, and then lowered her head again.
Older Brother said: 'You are just a melon babe', Older Brother looked at Younger Sister with disdain and turned his head away.
Older Brother: 'Let's go', and with that, he pulled off his cape, revealing his true face, which was that of a mentally unstable person.
The scene shifts to the night, with the two sitting in a restaurant. Middle-aged Policeman says, 'This one, I'm still regretting it.'

Middle-aged Policeman: "Should have let him trade his daughter back" "It would have been better if I didn't have to work overtime that day" "I heard a sound" "The sound of the shoe coming off" "I later pleaded for him" "Explained the situation" "But he still got sentenced to ten years"
The scene shifts to a restaurant, where the middle-aged Policeman says to the young man: "Wish your action goes smoothly" "So that the innocent don't have to be hurt"
Younger Sister asked: 'Where is he now'
Older Brother replied: 'In a dental clinic.' 'Working for others.'
Dentist finished, turned to Older Brother and said: 'Rinse your mouth'
Older Brother, who was lying in the chair, suddenly sat up and said, 'Thanks'
Dentist: 'You're welcome'
Dentist, after finishing his work, walked towards the sink, and Older Brother asked, "Do you work this late every day"
Dentist paused his actions and said: 'It depends on the patient's condition'
Older Brother asked, 'What time do you open in the morning'

movie101_6992521335159292452_1260_1440.text: Jiang Feng said: "What I saw in my memory"
Officer Lei turned his head and said: "Great writer" "Don't kid around with us police officers" "Are you making up stories from the news?"
Jiang Feng said excitedly: "I'm telling the truth"
Jiang Feng was panting heavily, Officer Lei leaned in to look at him, and Jiang Feng said: "Take a break" "Wait for your family to bail you out."
Jiang Feng said: "Why don't you guys believe me""That flower room is big and noticeable"
Jiang Feng: "Okay, okay, okay."
Officer Lei said: "And there are many wooden carvings inside" "One of the carvings isn't even finished yet"
Officer Lei stood up and left the interrogation room, closing the door behind him, and said: "Can you look into Li Huilan's friends"
Officer Lei walked out the door, leaving Jiang Feng alone in the interrogation room. Jiang Feng looked at the sun outside the window, then at the empty space across from him.
Jiang Feng, who was still in pain, vaguely recalled what Younger Sister had done that night. Younger Sister called the police from the village.
Woman: "Mom, what are you doing"
Officer Lei: "No calling the police" "It's too embarrassing if this gets out"
At this moment, Younger Sister knocked on the door outside, shouting: "Honey, open the door." Jiang Feng's Wife said: "Leave, my sister doesn't want to see you."
Jiang Feng said: "Wife" "I'm wrong, let's go home" "Wife" "I'm holding a knife in my hand right now" "If you don't come out, I'll chop off my fingers, wife."
Woman, pulling Jiang Feng's hand, walked up to him and said, 'Honey.' Then she caressed his cheek and gently pushed him onto the sofa.

Younger Sister, holding the door, said: 'Sis, you can't go out, sis.' Younger Sister held the door tightly, not letting Woman leave. At that moment, Man, who was squatting on the ground, looked up and asked: 'Are you okay?'

Woman's Mother turned to leave, but Woman quickly stepped forward to stop her and said: "Mom" "I know I didn't do well in the past" "I will definitely change in the future", Woman's Mother sat down on the sofa, and Woman stood behind her with a guilty conscience.
The scene shifts to the living room, where Man suddenly stands up and says, 'Let's go home.'
Man slowly raised his head to look at Woman, and the two gazed at each other. Woman said: "Why are you still staying here"
Younger Sister said: "Don't mess around"

The two sat in the car, Man said: 'Let's go', Jiang Feng looked at the anxious Woman in the passenger seat, handed him a bag of ice, and then drove away. The anxious Woman sat in the passenger seat, staring straight ahead, while Man sat in the driver's seat, his eyes filled with anger.
The scene shifts to a desolate alley. Man drives the car out of the factory, and Woman in the passenger seat says to Man: 'Can you slow down please'
The scene shifts to 1992, in a car, Woman pleads with Jiang Feng: "I beg you" "I was wrong, I am sorry" "Can you let him get off first" "If not, please let him get off."
Jiang Feng shouted: "Car, car" and drove off in a sedan.
The car sped forward, splashing mud on the road. Woman shouted: "Will you listen to me from now on?"

The car sped forward, leaving a trail of tire marks on the ground. The car drove onto a ramp by the river, the car's front wheels were about to leave the ramp, and the car was about to fall into the river, but the car stopped in mid-air, and the car landed steadily on the opposite shore.

The car was about to fall into the sea, Jiang Feng and Woman were about to reunite, and the young Jiang Feng in the flashback was hiding in the grass, holding his breath and waiting for the right moment.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: Du Yu shouted: "Is a pervert!"
Du Yu stood up and said: "I'll go get the money."
Shen Mo said: "It's okay if you quit" "but don't relapse" "otherwise I won't let you go."
The two left, leaving Shen Mo alone, who continued practicing. He remembered the words Du Yu had said before: 'You're wasting your talent.'

The scene shifts to a small car speeding along the road. A man is driving a tractor loaded with firewood, and Shen Mo, who is sleeping in the vehicle, suddenly wakes up. He lifts his head and sees the vehicle has run over a speed bump, causing him to fall off the vehicle.

The scene shifts to the lawyer explaining to Shen Mo: "The accident was caused by evasion, a tractor driving against traffic, but there was no collision, so we can't hold them accountable, and we can't confirm the tire incident, I have put a lot of thought into this for your brother."
Shen Mo said: "Stop it" Shen Mo stood up and left, while the mother behind him comforted him.

Shen Mo monologues in his mind: "Maybe Du Yu is right, I am also guilty, this is my punishment, it's soon over, for this perfect, finale performance, I have to hang in there, but I wonder, should I also have some parting words."
Shen Mo, who was eavesdropping, immediately turned around after hearing the sound, quickly pulled out his phone to turn off the recorder, and then leaned against the wall to calm his racing heart.

Shen Mo sat on the stairs, examining the severely injured middle finger on his left hand. He gently stroked it, then lifted his head to look at his own hand, and finally covered his face in despair, crying loudly.
Shen Mo, who had just returned home, was walking gloomily in the hallway. Suddenly, he saw Yao Zong coming out from a room with a bag in hand.
Xiaoli Ma, surprised, said: "Shen Mo" "What are you doing here this late at night?"
Shen Mo continued: "Sis, it's too dark here at night, I've been looking for a long time, and I don't even know which apartment is yours."
Xiaoli Ma threw the wig at Shen Mo and said: "Cut it out, you're really funny."
Shen Mo ran to the second floor, knocked on the door, and said: "Sis, I need your help with something, as long as you sign the endorsement contract, you will get 100,000 yuan right away."

Xiaoli Ma said: "No problem, I won't charge a cent, I'll do the endorsement for you for free, But Shen Mo, we should have conscience, and take the right path, do you want to learn acting? I'll give you this opportunity"

The scene switches to the shooting site, where Xiaoli Ma and Shen Mo are advertising products. Xiaoli Ma said: "Do you want insomnia? Do you want diarrhea? Do you want infertility? Do you want to be thin and pale like me?"
Shen Mo continued: "Lishen diet pills" "You will see the effect immediately"
Everyone in the office heard Yao Zong's words and shouted: "President Yao Zong!"
Yao Zong and the others watched the live stream and saw Shen Mo say: "What I'm losing is not weight, it's health,"
Shen Mo said: "Lishen diet" "Kills health."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Che Zhen Shan said excitedly: "How can she be a communist? You have to take responsibility for what you said!"
Lu Xiao said: "Commander, do you think I want to believe it? But it is the truth."
Che Zhen Shan: "Enough, stop." Che Zhen Shan walked up to Lu Xiao and said: "Bring that communist to me immediately." "I want to ask him myself."
Lu Xiao: "Yes, I'll go right away."
Che Zhen Shan's expression suddenly turned serious, and he quickly picked up the phone to call Lin Lin, saying: "Linlin, come to my place immediately."
Mo Han walked up to Yu Xuan and said: 'For safety reasons, I've secretly taken care of 4321.'
Yu Xuan glanced at Mo Han, turned around, and rummaged through the drawer, pulling out a small notebook. Yu Xuan: "The code you mentioned, is it this version or this one?"
Lu Xiao walked in, saluted, and then removed his hat, saying: "Commander, that communist is dead."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Lu Xiao, Lu Xiao, you really know how to act."
Lu Xiao asked: "Do you suspect that I did it?"
Che Zhen Shan said: "Small-minded." "Adding insult to injury, framing others." "Isn't that enough for you?"
Lu Xiao knelt on the ground and said: "Commander, I've followed you for over ten years."
Che Zhen Shan: "Enough, stop acting. Considering your years of service with me, I'll spare your life for now. Your career as my adjutant ends here."
Lu Xiao stood up and said: "Commander, are you really this heartless?"
Che Zhen Shan: "I've been lenient enough. Get out."
Lin Lin stopped him from leaving, and asked, "Don't go. Let me ask you. This afternoon at three, did you go to the silk shop to rendezvous with a communist?"
Lu Xiao turned to Lin Lin and said: "Fine." "You don't admit it." "Let me ask you," "why did you kill our informant yesterday evening?"
Lin Lin asked: "You were following me?"
Lu Xiao said: "I was following that informant. He said Yang Mohan is a communist."
Lin Lin said: "Yang Mohan, huh, Lu Xiao, do you think what you did would make me fall for you? You miscalculated."
Lu Xiao said: "Fine, why did you kill that informant? Are you trying to protect Yang Mohan and your comrades?"
Lin Lin: "It's simple, he was working for the Japanese."
Lu Xiao said in disbelief: "How can it be?" "Commander, I never thought it would be like this." "If Linlin is not a communist," "then Yang Mohan must be."
Che Zhen Shan angrily said: "Get out." Che Zhen Shan's subordinates were all stunned by his words, not knowing what to do.
Che Zhen Shan looked at Lin Lin leaving, then turned to Lu Xiao and said: "Lu Xiao, is Mohan good to you?"
Lin Lin replied: "Pretty good."

movie101_6967711402819584543_480_660.text: The car was lifted, and the underneath was thoroughly inspected. Young Police Officer, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally came into the repair shop. He walked slowly, head down, to the oil-stained tire at the entrance. He picked up a wrench and started tightening the screws on the tire.

Man with a Buzz Cut was hunched over, fixing a tire. Young Police Officer approached and said, "Need a repair?" Man with a Buzz Cut didn't look up, just fiddling with the tire. Young Police Officer, seeing he wasn't responding, stepped forward and said, "Are you okay?"
Man wiped his hands with a towel and said, "It was here just now, seems to have gone over there."

Young Police Officer said nothing and walked out directly. Man watched him leave, sighed, and then turned to go back inside, but just as he reached the door, he saw a photo of Yongzhi on the table. He picked it up and looked at it for a long time before putting it back where it was.

The scene shifts, and Young Police Officer arrives at the pork processing factory. The weather is overcast, and the factory's large fans are rotating rapidly, stirring up dust from the factory, which is carried by the wind and turns the sky grey.

The scene shifts to a gas station, where a young police officer walks briskly inside. The gas station has a somewhat dilapidated look, with a large open space and a few tables and chairs randomly placed. The young police officer walks straight through the open space towards the inner room.

Young Police Officer, who had been leaning on the table listening to the conversation between the police chief and the captain, immediately went to the water dispenser in the hallway to eavesdrop on their conversation.
Young Police Officer, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally turned off the fan and walked out of the stairwell.

The man in the blue shirt was lying on the ground, his bloodstains spreading on the tiles. The two kittens were frantically trying to escape, but there was no place to go. The man in the white shirt was still immersed in the sorrow of losing his son.
The man who was sitting on the stone bench with a suitcase was Young Police Officer. Seeing the man in front of him, Man quickly stood up and walked towards him.

Man took the suitcase from the table, stood up, and looked at Man with a Buzz Cut. Man with a Buzz Cut nodded, and Man, with the briefcase in hand, walked towards the door. Man with a Buzz Cut closed the door and left. Man took the suitcase and wheeled it away.
The scene shifts to the next day. Young Police Officer, carrying two large bags, walks down a desolate corridor. He stops in front of a door, turns to look around, and then looks back at the door.
Man looked up at the stairs, then lowered his head to look at Young Police Officer, and finally reached out his hand.
The moment the door closed, the smell of iron and rust hit Young Police Officer's nose.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: The car was at the edge of the pier, The Long-Haired Woman was driving and cursing, 'You treat me like garbage, wanting me to die, to die! Today, right in front of your family, in front of him, I knelt on the ground and you didn't even look at me. Are you satisfied now?'

Jiang Feng said: "Are you satisfied now?" "Tell me," "Will you dare to leave me again?" "Answer!" Jiang Feng's body gradually fell, and memories flooded back. The Long-Haired Woman's eyes were filled with tears.
The next day, Shen Hanqiang was walking through the archive room, looking through files. At that moment, Officer Lei came in with coffee and asked, "Whose files are you looking for?"
Officer Lei replied: "Li Huilan."

Officer Lei, holding a drink, walked over and said: 'Shifu, do you really believe what Jiang Feng said? Li Huilan wasn't drowned at all. Don’t forget, he hit the hospital director; maybe the surgery did mess with his brain.'
Officer Lei asked: "Is Jiang Feng a well-known writer?"
Officer Lei said: "I'll calculate it for you."
Officer Lei said: "Really?" "Then why would a famous writer come to the police station and lie?"

Officer Lei said: "Publicity, definitely for publicity. Nowadays, celebrities do this all the time. If they can't make entertainment news, they make social news. He must be coming out with a new book."
Shen Hanqiang smiled and asked, "When is the new book coming out?"
Shen Hanqiang smiled and said, "I don’t know."
Officer Lei said: "I'm looking for your Captain Shen Hanqiang."
Officer Lei looked at Shen Hanqiang and said: "I haven’t…"
Officer Shen Hanqiang said: "Uncle, I'm sorry, could you please wait outside for a moment, just a moment."
Officer Lei said: "Captain Shen Hanqiang."
The officer said: "I have an urgent matter."
The police officer said: "Mr. Jiang Feng says he wants to see you."
Shen Hanqiang said: "I understand." The officer nodded and left. Shen Hanqiang took out a wallet from his pocket and handed it to Officer Lei.
Officer Lei said: "Understood."
Jiang Feng sat at the table, his head in his hands. The police asked: "According to your story, the killer not only murdered Li Huilan but also an unknown woman. Is this a serial killer?"
Jiang Feng said: "Yes."
Officer Lei said: "But you just said Li Huilan was drowned." "Now you're saying the killer murdered two people?" "Did the ending of the novel change?"
Shen Hanqiang asked: "What's the phone number?"
Shen Hanqiang said: "Yeah."
Jiang Feng said: "Didn’t you say you saw Li Huilan calling home? What’s the number? You can’t remember a single digit?"
Jiang Feng said: "Let me think." He paused for a moment, then said: "9." "9."
Officer Lei looked up at Jiang Feng and said: "I'm not done yet."
Jiang Feng said: 'How could I remember that clearly?'
Shen Hanqiang asked: "When did you have your memory surgery?"
Jiang Feng said: "On Friday, the day of the shooting incident."
Officer Lei took the business card, Jiang Feng continued: "Alright then, I'll go back and think things through carefully, I'll contact you once I have a clear understanding."
Shen Hanqiang said: "Officer Lei, detain him."
Officer Lei looked at his watch and said: "Ah," then turned to look at Shen Hanqiang.
Jiang Feng said in surprise: "Huh?"
Jiang Feng said: "I'm here to provide you with clues. Do you believe me or not?"
Officer Lei said: "You don't believe what I say."
Officer Lei looked up and said: "I believe you."

movie101_7052960987330118151_3960_4140.text: Ma Xiaoli looked at the computer and said: 'Ah, how far is it from being a goddess to a ghost?'
Shen Mo: "Eat this, it's just a step away"
Ma Xiaoli said: "Bro, look at me, I took AiLiSheng weight loss pills, do I look slim?"
Yao Zong said: "Slim, enough, really."
Yao Zong looked at the computer and asked the young man beside him: "What are you laughing at?"
Yao Zong, who was walking by, overheard this conversation and stopped to listen. Yao Zong said to the phone: "This guy didn't sober up from drinking last time, what's going on?"

Lao Chen was in the middle of a call when he suddenly felt a sharp pain on his chin. He quickly picked up a tissue from the desk and pressed it against his chin. Yao Zong was in a car on the other end of the phone.

The scene switches to Shen Mo's company, where the phone rings. Shen Mo answered the call and heard the voice on the other end say: "Are you Yao Dezhi, the legal representative of Trustworthy Pharmaceutical Company? Listen up! This is the City Industry and Commerce Bureau. Someone reported that your company is involved in producing and selling fake products. Please bring your company's relevant documents to our bureau tomorrow morning for inspection. No time? We can handle it over the phone. Then give us your company's documents, product details, registration accounts, and other relevant information."
Yao Zong said: "Rest assured, we strictly abide by the law and are not afraid of inspections. Please hold on."
Yao Zong, while dialing, said: "It's the Bureau of Industry and Commerce." "Answer whatever they ask you."
Shen Mo: "Oh,"
The young man in the blue shirt took the phone and said: "Hello, it seems I can't stay in this place anymore."
Yao Zong: "Yes, yes, yes, oh right, right, right."
Yao Zong: "Hey, Lao Chen"
Lao Chen: "Old Yao, old Yao, listen to me! I got scammed over the phone. My silly wife transferred money to someone else's 'safety account'."
Yao Zong, after listening, said: "Are you that naive?" "Such a small trick can fool you?" "Why not me?" "I don't care about that." "Give me the money right away."
The man in the blue shirt said: "Yes, the account number is 6220801702."
Jia Zong, excitedly holding Shen Mo's shoulder, said: "My dear Xiao Shen, you're my idol. You earned two deals in one morning, you're the lucky star of our company. Here, this is yours."
The scene shifts to the next day, with the sound of a boat's horn coming from the harbor. Shen Mo and Ma Xiaoli were on a small boat heading to the pier.

Yuan Pengjun arrived at the small boat, where the boatman pointed to a sun-drenched spot on the deck. He walked over, flipped open a wooden box beside it, and took out a thick stack of cheongsam shorts.
Yuan Pengjun took out a bank card and some photos from the bag.
The scene switches to the street, where Lan Lan and Yuan Pengjun are walking. Lan Lan, in high boots, follows Yuan Pengjun while carrying a suitcase. Yuan Pengjun said: "I am the first."
Yuan Pengjun, seeing this, said: "Yes, yes, yes, I am the first. Are you Japanese?"
Yuan Pengjun said: "Miss, I am a Japanese overseas Chinese, new here." "Could you please tell me where this address is?"
Lan Lan said: "Ah, I know, I know," "It's just, it's just over there," "Oh my, let me take you."

movie101_6967711402819584543_660_840.text: Man closed his eyes, recalling the past.
He knocked on the door, but there was no response. He knocked again, still no answer.
He crouched down to pick up the tools he had dropped, then stood up and looked up at the chandelier in the corridor. After a long thought, he made up his mind.

The intercom in the hallway suddenly rang, but there was no sound coming from the intercom. Man looked at the intercom in confusion, then turned his head to look at the hallway. After a moment of silence, he turned around and left with his suitcase.
Chapter 1, The Dog, begins. Little Q is walking in the hallway with Xiao Q following behind.
The scene shifts to a man wearing safety glasses, who is cutting something with a saw.

He then took out a small bag and poured out several finished products, each about the size of a one-centimeter-wide sausage. He was meticulously checking each one, his movements slow and methodical, as if he was reluctant to miss a single piece.

He tore off a small piece of the medicinal paper, moistened it with saliva, and carefully placed it in the hollow of the yoke bead. After pressing it firmly, he withdrew his hand and fell into deep thought.

The scene shifts to the small dog returning home alone, barking and calling, "Feng Feng." Fang Feng walked into the corridor with Little Q, stopped in front of a door, and Little Q stopped too. Fang Feng said, "Come back."
The scene shifts to a dimly lit corridor, where a woman is calling out, "FengFeng", "FengFeng".
The woman said, "Go in." The woman opened the door and gestured for the dog to go in first.

The dog ran to the door, hesitated for a moment, then turned and ran back. The dog barked incessantly at the door, but the man inside ignored it. The dog stood at the door and barked, "Feng Feng come back."

The girl walked down the corridor with little Q. When they reached the stairwell, little Q suddenly stopped and looked back at Man. Man looked at little Q with a puzzled expression, then turned his head to look at the girl. The girl looked back at him with a smile.
The camera pointed at the man in the leather jacket, who was now squatting on the ground looking for something.

Man's eyes were filled with confusion and helplessness. The room was plunged into darkness again, and Man continued to sit at the table, staring at the computer. The chandelier on the ceiling flickered intermittently, casting a cold, eerie atmosphere over the room.
In the bathroom, little Q watched Xiao Bai's retreating figure. When she came out, she immediately jumped off the toilet.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Station Hill said: "If you're going to go with him now,"
Lin Lin asked: "What about him?"

Station Hill waved his hand and said: "Nothing much, you go first." Lin Lin saluted and turned to leave. Station Hill watched Lin Lin's back as she left, then turned on the desk lamp and began writing in his diary.

Station Hill said: "Just received an urgent call from the master" "saying there are three important communist underground members" "who will be escorted to Nanjing today" "having lunch in my department" "For safety" "I command you two to go and meet them" "You can't make any mistakes" "Understand?" "If there's a problem" "no one is immune" "Especially Lu Xiao" "Whether your adjutant status can revive" "depends on your performance this time"
Lu Xiao said firmly: "Station Hill, I promise to complete the task."
Station Hill, with a serious face, said to Mo Han: "Mo Han, this is the first time I have given you a task, I hope you won't let down my trust in you."
Lu Xiao responded: "Yes, Station Hill." Then, he arrived at the entrance of the Anti-Japanese Village Office, stood at the door for a while, and then walked into the office.

Lu Xiao, who was originally standing outside the pharmacy, saw the girl and immediately hid behind a wall. After waiting for the girl to leave, he went to the pharmacy and said, "I'll come back another day to pick up the two missing packs of medicine."

Lu Xiao, who was on guard outside the pharmacy, heard this and recalled his own observation that day, stating to Station Hill: "I saw him enter that pharmacy with my own eyes, his behavior was quite suspicious."
Station Hill looked at him and said: "What can that prove"
Station Hill said: "It proves that he must have gone to send a message."
Station Hill asked: "What do you plan to do?"
Lu Xiao said: "I hope that Station Hill will put Mo Han under house arrest."
Station Hill asked: "Is it necessary?"
Station Hill said: "Station Hill, if there is a problem with the transport at noon, is it on him or me, it's not clear."
Station Hill said: "Lu Xiao, you are really like a monkey, you are really smart."
Station Hill said: "Station Hill, do you agree?"
Station Hill said: "Do you think I want you to leave the adjutant position?"
Station Hill said: "Thank you, Station Hill." "Lu Xiao swears to complete the mission."
Station Hill looked up and said: "If there is a communist interception, must capture alive."
Mo Han answered firmly: "Yes."
Mo Han was walking and suddenly heard Station Hill say: "What, I'm not needed anymore, why?" He was stunned for a moment, then quickly turned and walked away.
Mo Han ran over and asked: "Station Hill, why didn't you use me anymore?"
Station Hill said: "Mo Han, come, sit sit sit, sit," "No need at all."
Mo Han asked: "What do you mean?"
Station Hill put down the teapot and said: "There is no communist escort to Nanjing. There are only a few guards from the regiment in that vehicle."
Mo Han asked: "Then why did you do this"
Station Hill said: "Just want to test Lu Xiao."
Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao."
Station Hill said: "He first suspected that you were a communist." "Then it was Lin Lin." "Who knows next he might suspect me."

movie101_6967711402819584543_840_1020.text: Crazy (Animal) stood obediently in the bathroom while Policewoman Sister sat on the toilet with a mask on. She looked up and met Crazy (Animal)'s gaze.

At this moment, Policewoman Sister came out of the bathroom, barefoot on the floor, and slowly walked towards the hallway. When she reached the middle of the corridor, she took off her slippers and continued to walk forward. At this time, the sound of a dog came from the room at the end of the hallway.
At this moment, Policewoman Sister was walking outside. She stopped in front of a door, her eyes were slightly red, and she looked very exhausted.
After a while, Policewoman Sister came to the door, hesitated for a moment, then turned and went upstairs.

Crazy (Animal) ran towards the stairs, Policewoman Sister hurriedly called out to him. Policewoman Sister opened the iron gate, but Crazy (Animal) didn't wait for her and ran out. Policewoman Sister said, "Sit, sit."
After a while, Policewoman Sister still stood at the door, hesitating whether to go in or not.
Policewoman Sister was startled by the visitor. When she turned around, she found that the visitor was That Man. Policewoman Sister was stunned for a moment, then quickly closed the door.
That Man looked at Policewoman Sister's feet, and Policewoman Sister looked down to see that his/her toes were painted black.
Policewoman Sister shook her head, indicating that she didn't know. That Man looked at her with disappointment and asked, "Where are your shoes?"
Policewoman Sister was startled by his words. She didn't expect that the man in front of her would be so serious. She lowered her head and started whistling again.
Policewoman Sister said, "It, it keeps barking. Do you have a dead rat in your house?"
That Man looked at Policewoman Sister, then at Crazy (Animal). Policewoman Sister nodded. That Man said, "I'll check."

After a while, Policewoman Sister took Crazy (Animal) out for a late-night walk. She put on her slippers and walked slowly with Crazy (Animal) in the corridor. At this time, Crazy (Animal) was already very tired, but Policewoman Sister still took him out.

At this moment, Policewoman Sister rushed into the theater, looking for the person who had just called her. She squeezed through the crowd and found the person she was looking for. The person was practicing the violin.

The scene shifts to a group of women standing on a stage, each holding a piece of paper, and reading aloud: "Due to the warming weather in Europe, migratory birds have delayed their southward flight." "Just as the faint dawn light streams through the window." "Ah, my beloved one." "Why don’t you come sooner?" "Ah, my beloved one."

movie101_7052960987330118151_4140_4320.text: Yuan Pengjun and Lan Lan pressed the elevator button, and after a long wait, the elevator arrived. Yuan Pengjun turned around and said to Lan Lan: "The elevator is about to go."
Lan Lan turned around and said: "Oh, goodbye"

Yuan Pengjun, who had been waiting outside for a long time, saw Lan Lan go back inside and immediately took out a sniper rifle from his bag, carefully assembled it, and then aimed the barrel at the door gap.
Yuan Pengjun stood by the window and set up a telescope to observe the building opposite. Through the telescope, he could see the movements of Lan Lan and Xiao Wei inside the building.
Xiao Wei, while walking, said: "What should we do," "He Dachang will definitely not let us go," "But we have no money," "Where can we go?"

Yuan Pengjun, with a gloomy expression, inserted the bank card into the ATM, entered the password, and the screen displayed that there was only 50,000 left in the account. He was stunned, and the ATM also issued a warning that the card was counterfeit.

Du Yu was overjoyed, having successfully hacked the game platform, and even gave Xiao Wei a thumbs up. On the other side, Shen Mo was transferring money via the computer, with a file name that read 'He Dachang's corpse photo.'

The scene shifts to a clinic, where a patient with a blood transfusion bag is being pushed in. A man in black holding a bank card stands at the door, but the doctor at the clinic says, "There's no money in your card."
He Dachang was at the clinic, Yuan Pengjun was at the ATM, and after withdrawing money, he looked around, then walked out of the bank with a puzzled expression.
Shen Mo, seeing Yuan Pengjun coming out, quickly slipped the camera into the gap between the ATM and the wall.

The doctor's words hit Shen Mo hard. He looked at the phone, then at the delivery guy, and finally at the hospital room. The delivery guy, holding the phone, answered the call and discovered the phone number displayed was 13910000001.
The next day, Yuan Pengjun was woken up by a phone call from Du Yu. He looked at the caller ID and, after a moment of thought, decided to answer the call.

In the darkness, Yuan Pengjun was carefully weighing the mushrooms and other ingredients on the scale, pouring the appropriate amount of ingredients into the experimental apparatus, carefully observing the subtle changes in the apparatus, and comparing them with the data in the book.

He lit the burner on the flask and slowly heated it. The liquid inside the flask began to boil. He wiped his hands with a towel and waited patiently. The liquid gradually turned into a gas and was absorbed into the flask.
Yuan Pengjun took out a small bag from the drawer, carefully opening it. Inside was a white powder. He sniffed it, and a smile spread across his face.
Xiao Wei and Du Yu took out the candies they had prepared earlier and put them into their mouths. They both leaned back in their chairs, waiting for the onset of numbness.
Yuan Pengjun, who was originally smiling, immediately became serious upon hearing the doorbell, and Lan Lan, who was being strangled, also stopped struggling.
Lan Lan said: "Hi," "I thought you might not have eaten yet," "This is my favorite cake," "I really like this cake."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: Officer Shen said: "I suspect that you're involved in this case" "Cooperate a bit"
Officer Lei walked out while saying: "Master, Jiang Feng is talking nonsense" "Why are we keeping him?"
Officer Shen said: "Look at Li Hui Lan's home phone number" "Read it out loud." Officer Lei took the note, read it twice, and then tore it off.
Officer Lei looked at the numbers and said: "0909914" "914". Officer Lei looked up and said: "Master, this is just a coincidence."
The man in the white shirt was Jiang Feng. He was standing in the middle of the room, with a police officer on one side and a translator on the other.
Jiang Feng: "There's a new guy, bro, what did you do?"
Officer Shen asked: "Is this your first time in here?" Jiang Feng nodded.

The man said: "Your first time, huh? Then I need to enlighten you. What if they bully you next time you come in? Right? Do you know what this is for? It's specifically for those drug addicts. Once they are in here, they use all means to hurt themselves. There are many ways. There's stabbing with bars, there's pulling out rings and swallowing, Once in the south city, I encountered a woman. It was amazing. She hid needles in her hair and swallowed them. The police were all scared."

The man said: "This shitty place" "All kinds of people are here" "There are robbers, prostitutes, men who visit prostitutes, fighters, arsonists, and thieves" "Bro, you still haven't told me why you're in here."
Officer Shen said: "Fighting"
The man laughed and said: "Fighting?" "You got beaten, didn't you?" "You're not that kind of person," "I'm very accurate in reading people." "You don't have that thing in your eyes."
Jiang Feng asked: "What kind of thing?"
The man in the vest slowly stood up and walked towards Jiang Feng. He leaned close to Jiang Feng's face and asked: "Have you ever seen a murderer's eyes?"
Officer Shen looked at Officer Lei, then turned and walked away. Officer Shen's inner monologue: "Officer Lei, don't be so stubborn, I have a date tonight, okay?"
Li Hui Lan: "Ignoring me now? I didn't even want to chat with you, I've been talking all by myself." Li Hui Lan turned and sat down.
Officer Shen said: "Stop." "Zoom in on this." "This is Jiang Feng." "Who's this guy?" "Zoom in."
Officer Shen said: "He seems to be picking something up"
Officer Shen looked at the screen and said: "He seems to be picking something up" "I'll go to the Memory Master" "Call me if anything". After speaking, Officer Shen turned and left.
Officer Lei: "Print it out"
The scene flashed back to when Li Hui Lan broke in. Li Hui Lan asked: "What are you here for?"
Jiang Feng: "I received a call and came to check because I was worried"
Li Hui Lan said: "I'm fine, you can leave"

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: Director Jin said sternly: "If no one recognizes you, I'll send you to a psychiatric hospital."
Xu Zhengtai spread out the cards on the table and said: 'These four cards need to add up to 24 points.'
Xu Zhengtai, holding a beer bottle and smoking a cigarette, said: "I can't figure it out."
Xiao Ma drew a pattern on Xu Zhengtai's face with a pen, Liu Yi said: "Big brother, your face is all messed up." Liu Yi looked at his own face and then at Xu Zhengtai's face, lost in thought.
Liu Yi, in a fit of anger, left the yard and jumped into the pond. Xiao Ma and Xu Zhengtai looked at each other in shock.
Xu Zhengtai said: "You don't have to jump in the river just because you can't figure it out."
At this moment, Director Jin patted his shoulder, signaling him to put out his cigarette and leave.
Director Jin asked: 'What's the situation with the person who jumped into the river?'
Xu Zhengtai continued: "You know him too. His name is Liu Yi. He has been setting up a street stall with his dad since he was a kid. He always runs when he sees the police."
Director Jin thought for a moment and said: "The son of May Day."
Xu Zhengtai replied: "Yes."
Xu Zhengtai said: "He's grown so much." "Right, right, right."
Director Jin asked: "And who are you?"
Xiao Ma said: "Officer, my name is Xiao Ma, Ah Zheng has been taking care of me all along."
Director Jin asked: "What do you do for work?"
Xiao Ma replied: "Programming and software development."
Director Jin thought for a moment and said: "So, unemployed. Go back for now."
Director Jin turned and walked away, but Xu Zhengtai didn't give up. He stared at Xu Tailang and asked: "Do you recognize this person?" "What's your relationship with him?"
Xu Zhengtai looked at Xu Tailang in front of him, then turned to Director Jin and said: "Brother."
Xu Zhengtai was stunned and said, "Director Jin"
Director Jin said: 'What sir, or not sir.' 'Just open a video hall and watch more Hong Kong movies and you can call whatever you want.'
Xu Zhengtai introduced: "This is our Director Jin, he's called Jin Suo."
Xu Zhengtai said: "Director Jin, Director Jin."
Xu Zhengtai said: "The Public Security is settled."
Director Jin said, "Save it, save it. What's the relationship between you two?"
Xu Zhengtai looked at Xu Tailang and said, "Brother."
Xu Tailang said in surprise: "Ah!"
Xu Zhengtai said: "Today is the anniversary of our father's death. Where have you been?" "Hurry up and go kowtow to the old man."
Xu Tailang agreed: "Right, right."
Director Jin pointed at Xu Zhengtai and said: "You don't speak."
Director Jin turned to Xu Tailang and asked, 'What was your father's name?'
Xu Tailang said helplessly: "I really forgot his name because grandpa died too early."
Director Jin asked: 'What are you muttering?'

Xu Tailang said: 'Ah, sir.' 'My brother Ah Zheng.' 'My dad always spoiled him since I was little.' 'He never spoiled me.' 'So I went out to work when I was very young.' 'Actually, I...' 'I've never received fatherly love in my entire life.' 'So when he died, I wasn't sad at all.' 'Really.' 'If you don't believe me you can go inside and check.' 'In the portrait, he's wearing a plaid shirt.' 'The urn is dark red, placed next to the TV.' 'And there's a white cloth covering the TV.' 'You can go see for yourself.'
Director Jin pointed at Xu Zhengtai and said: "Alright, you wait here."
Xu Zhengtai was stunned for a moment, then grabbed Xu Tailang's shoulder and asked, 'How do you know I'm called Ah Zheng?'
Xu Tailang said: "It's written on your forehead."
At this moment, Director Jin came over. Xu Zhengtai covered Xu Tailang's mouth. Director Jin asked: "What are you whispering about?"
Director Jin beckoned and asked: "Come here, come here. Tell me, what's the brand of the TV?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: Che Zhenshan said: "This time, I set a trap. If Lu Xiao is killed by the Communists, either way, he will be in big trouble."
Mo Han asked: "But doesn’t the Commies not know the news yet?"
Che Zhenshan leaned back on the sofa and said: "I've already let the word out, they will know."
Mo Han leaned back on the sofa with a smile and said: "Che Zhenshan, this move is really clever."
Che Zhenshan said: "Mo Han, fortunately you were specially assigned here." "Otherwise, I almost assigned Lin Lin Xu to Lu Xiao."
Mo Han stood up and said: "Che Zhenshan, now that you mention it, it reminds me." "The cheongsam custom-made for Lin Lin should be picked up today."
Che Zhenshan said: "The cheongsam can wait, stay here and watch the show with me first."

Mo Han's words were straightforward and to the point, leaving no room for emotional appeals. Che Zhenshan was not convinced but didn't argue further, instead sitting back on the sofa with a look of resignation.

The scene shifts to the training ground, where the soldiers march in step, their formation orderly. Che Zhenshan and Mo Han stand by, watching the soldiers' drill with satisfaction. Che Zhenshan sits in a leather chair, his right hand holding a cigarette, his left hand holding a handkerchief, which he occasionally unfolds to wipe his mouth.

The scene shifts to the office, where Che Zhenshan is still sound asleep on the sofa, while Mo Han is dozing off on the leather armchair beside. Suddenly, the phone rings, and Mo Han, who is the first to notice, answers the call.
Mo Han turned his head and looked at Che Zhenshan with a smile, saying: "Che Zhenshan, I still want to discuss the cheongsam with Lin Lin."
Che Zhenshan raised his hand and said: 'Make a call.'
Mo Han's words were straightforward and to the point, leaving no room for ambiguity. Che Zhenshan, who had been dozing off on the sofa, was woken up by the sound, his expression somewhat unnatural.

The scene shifts to the entrance of the Anti-Japanese Command, where a few military trucks successively entered the courtyard. Inside the house, Mo Han saw Lin Lin enter and said: "Lin Lin, you’re here."
Lin Lin ran over and asked, "What do you need me for?"
The guard said: "The cheongsam is ready. You go pick it up. I have a task and can’t accompany you. It should look very beautiful on you."
Lin Lin said with a smile: "Then I'll go get it now."
Mo Han stopped Lin Lin and said: "Wait. Show it to me when you get back."
Lin Lin, seeing the two were getting along well, smiled and nodded to Che Zhenshan, then turned and left the room.
The two ran out of the room, and Che Zhenshan, who was sitting on the sofa, got up and went to the door to eavesdrop.
Che Zhenshan closed the door with a frown, walked to the table, and picked up the letter written by Lin Lin.

Lin Lin, holding the photo, happily exclaimed: "It's me!" Che Zhenshan smiled and nodded, then sat down on the sofa to listen to the conversation between the battalion commander and political commissar.

movie101_7052960987330118151_4320_4500.text: Lan Lan said, "I think I might have lost something here." Yuan Pengjun, with a puzzled look, closed the door.
The scene shifts to a restaurant where everyone is drinking. A man says: "The greater the capacity for alcohol, the greater the ability for business." "Everyone needs to fill up their glasses."
A man said: "President Jia, allow me to toast to you alone."
The man refused, saying: "No, no, no."
Shen Mo stood up and said, "Alina, give him the child’s drink." "If you drink again and split, I can't bear it." "Alright, our brotherhood is not found in liquor, cheers."
Shen Mo was still at home, crying uncontrollably. Yuan Pengjun walked to the window, and Lan Lan was taking selfies with a new phone.

Lan Lan was secretly taking photos with the phone, then turned and sat down, putting the phone on the table. Yuan Pengjun turned his head to look at her, then turned back to continue putting on his shoes.
Lan Lan took a sip of the soup, then took out a piece of gauze and wiped the residue off her lips. Yuan Pengjun watched her with great interest.
Lan Lan: "I may have lost my soul here, what do you think?" "What shall we talk about?"

Yuan Pengjun: "Do you know," "there is something called ephedrine," "it's extracted from some common medicines," "I've synthesized and innovated it," "if you drink it," "it will cause an urge," "an urge that kills you," "you die in immense joy," "Yes," "say it out loud."
Lan Lan took the water and said: "Like this? Are you trying to make me drink this too?" "That’s so naughty of you."
Yuan Pengjun angrily threw the shoe box on the ground and shouted, "Beast."
Yuan Pengjun hurriedly took off his coat, and Lan Lan asked, "What's wrong?" Lan Lan looked at Yuan Pengjun's chest, where a large tattoo of a phoenix was clearly visible.
Yuan Pengjun said, "I'll buy you a new one." "I'll buy you a new one." "I'll buy you a new one." "Qi Qi, do you know where Lan Lan went?"
Qi Qi looked up and asked, "What happened?"
Xiaoli Ma said, "Her phone is unreachable," "Auntie is looking for her urgently," "The calls are coming to me now."
Qi Qi replied, "It's alright, a handsome Japanese guy moved into our neighborhood, she went to charm a god."
Shen Mo asked: "Do you know where he lives?"
Xiaoli Ma took out her phone to take a picture, but Qi Qi snatched it away, saying, "She wouldn’t tell me."
Xiaoli Ma said, "I'm just reminding you."
Qi Qi said: "Am I sick that I need his phone number?"
Xiaoli Ma said, "What if Lan Lan gets into trouble?"
Qi Qi said: "It’s not certain who will be at a loss."
Shen Mo continued, "I find you young girls should take some responsibility for yourselves."
Qi Qi continued, "Sister, you just take too much responsibility for yourself, not willing to lose even once, so now you’ve ended up alone, haven’t you?"
Xiaoli Ma pointed at Qi Qi and said, "I'm telling you, if something happens to Lan Lan..."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1800_1980.text: Jiang Feng closed the door and said: "You keep saying you're fine, but look at you."
Li Hui Lan said: "I told you I'm fine!" "Stop worrying about me and just leave!"
Jiang Feng: "I can't let you live like this anymore." "I'm taking you away."
Li Hui Lan said: "Where are you going?" "You need to leave now" "My husband will be back any minute"

Li Hui Lan, with tears in her eyes, looked at Jiang Feng. She lowered her head, avoiding Jiang Feng's gaze. Jiang Feng said, "None of your business." Then he pushed Li Hui Lan towards the door. Li Hui Lan struggled, but Jiang Feng held her firmly. Jiang Feng said, "You better leave now." Li Hui Lan tried to break free, but Jiang Feng gripped her arm tightly. Jiang Feng pushed Li Hui Lan out of the door, and the door locked automatically.
Li Hui Lan kept banging on the door, shouting: "Open the door!" "You shameless thing, open up!" Li Hui Lan then walked away, leaving Jiang Feng standing there alone.
The two of them were pacing back and forth in the corridor, neither willing to yield an inch to the other.
Li Hui Lan asked: 'Why did you lock the door?' The butler was still silent, and the two of them could only stare at the locked door in confusion.

The scene shifted, and Jiang Feng's Wife returned home. She saw the shattered flower vase and the overturned coffee table and walked towards the door. She looked around and asked, "Who has been here?"
Li Hui Lan was pushed to the ground, and Jiang Feng straddled her, repeating the action of raising and lowering his body. Li Hui Lan cried and begged, 'Stop, stop, please.'

Jiang Feng: 'Where did you go?' Jiang Feng grabbed Li Hui Lan's hair and threw her to the ground. The two of them sat on the ground, gasping for breath, while Jiang Feng stood at the door, watching them.
Li Hui Lan was about to go upstairs when she was suddenly blocked by Jiang Feng. Jiang Feng grabbed her arm and asked, "Where are you going?"
Jiang Feng: "I didn't mean to." Jiang Feng squatted down in front of the old man, extended his hand to wipe away the tears that the old man had forcefully swallowed back.
Li Hui Lan asked: "Is he still alive?" "I didn't mean to." "I didn't mean to."
Jiang Feng said: "He's not dead." Jiang Feng grabbed Li Hui Lan's shoulders and said: "Leave him." "Come with me."
Li Hui Lan cried and shook her head, Jiang Feng let go of his hand, turned around and faced Li Hui Lan. Li Hui Lan said: "I can't leave" "What about my daughter if I leave?"
Jiang Feng's eyes were filled with regret, he picked up the pen and wrote on the paper in front of Li Hui Lan: "I will be back in five days."
Li Hui Lan said: "You can't call the police" "Last time I ran away from home"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Mo Han walked in and asked: "Group Leader, do you think Linlin looks good in a red cheongsam?"
Che Zhenshan responded: "Sure." and then picked up the tea cup.
Mo Han said: "Actually, I think she looks good in any color. Don't you agree?"
Che Zhenshan said: "I'm a bit tired." Che Zhenshan was unwell, and Mo Han had been assisting him all day, so he decided to rest early.
Mo Han sat down, adjusted his military uniform, leaned back in the leather chair, and looked at the ceiling.
The clock struck ten o'clock, and Mo Han brought a cup of tea to the leader, who had just woken up. The leader said: "You're awake, Group Leader." Mo Han poured tea for the leader.
Lu Xiao reported: "Group Leader, we've captured a female communist courier."
Che Zhenshan stood up abruptly and said: "What?"
Mo Han stood up and said: "The prisoner is in the cell."
Che Zhenshan asked: "How did she get the message?"
Lu Xiao said: "Secretary Yang would know best about this."
Mo Han said: "Me? Group Leader, you're the one who knows this matter best."
Lu Xiao asked: "What's going on, Group Leader?"
Che Zhenshan said: "It's not certain if she's a Communist yet. Mo Han, how about you interrogate her?"
Mo Han said: "Group Leader, I'm afraid of being accused of seeking glory, better let Lu Xiao do it."
Che Zhenshan said: "No, you'll do the interrogation."
Che Zhenshan stood up and said: "I think she might be a spy." Che Zhenshan said: "I want to interrogate her."
The two officers exchanged glances, their eyes filled with murderous intent. Yu Xuan was tied to a post in the corner of the room, looking extremely pale.
Che Zhenshan said: "Miss, this man is from Nanjing, and he's very skilled in interrogation, capable of using brutal torture. If you don't want to suffer physically, speak up now, okay?"
Che Zhenshan, after pondering for a moment, commanded: "Hold on, give the whip to Secretary Yang, he will interrogate thoroughly."
Mo Han took the whip from Lu Xiao's hand, and Che Zhenshan's expression turned extremely fierce.

Mo Han, with a heavy heart, watched as the soldiers took Yu Xuan away. He wanted to say something but didn't know where to start. He could only turn back to glare fiercely at Mo Han, who also glared back at her.

The Japanese army's listening room was in a state of alert, with everyone on high alert. Suddenly, the phone rang, and everyone's attention was drawn to it. A Japanese officer picked up the phone and said: "I have arranged for Linlin to deliver the encrypted information to you, indicating a change in plan."
Mo Han said: "But I had already set off."
Mo Han said: "Once Linlin comes back, I’ll kidnap her and we'll break out together."
Mo Han said: "No, the 'Peony Pavilion' code has been encrypted by them; you must stay behind."
Mo Han asked: "Then what will you do?"

movie101_7052960987330118151_4500_4680.text: Xiaoli Ma pointed at Qi Qi and said: "Unexpectedly, I will not let you go."
Qi Qi angrily said: "Are you crazy? What's it got to do with me?"
Qi Qi saw the caller ID on the phone, put it down without answering, and the camera slowly moved to the bathroom. A pair of slender legs stood by the bathtub, with a slender waist bent at the top.
Lan Lan lay in the bathtub, looking out the window. She took out a blade and cut her wrist.
Lan Lan seemed to have made a decision, Yuan Pengjun put down the binoculars and looked towards the door.
The phone rang, it was a call from Qi Qi. Shen Mo was busy breaking the password on the computer at that moment, and the phone kept ringing.

The next day, everyone was still sleeping soundly at the dining table. Xiaoli Ma woke up a sleeping uncle and said: "Uncle." The uncle woke up, knocked over the wine glass on the table, and the glass shattered on the floor.

The next night, Shen Mo and his friends were walking down the street, with Shen Mo supporting a drunken friend. Xiaoli Ma walked a few steps behind them, observing the group. After a few steps, he turned and walked in the opposite direction.
Lan Lan and Xiaoli Ma sneakily entered the elevator with their suitcases.

Du Yu and Xiaoli Ma were playing around in the elevator when suddenly the phone rang. Du Yu took out the phone and saw a text message from Qi Qi: "I'm in a hurry, I'll be there in 15 minutes. Don't wait." Du Yu looked at Xiaoli Ma, Xiaoli Ma asked: "What's wrong?"
Du Yu said: "It's nothing. You go start the car. Wait for me at the east gate of the community. I'll go back to get something."
Yuan Pengjun burst out of the room, he was covered in blood, staggering towards the door. He Dachang asked: "Was it you?"
Du Yu said: "I told you, as long as you go back to your old ways," "I won’t let you go."
Shen Mo angrily said: "You Shen Mo, if you are still a man, wait for me, don’t run. I have to settle this with you."
Shen Mo said: "That girl has a background." "Being with her is dangerous."
Du Yu shouted loudly: "I'd rather die being with her." "She is my true love."
Yuan Pengjun and Lan Lan drove away, leaving Xiaoli Ma and Qi Qi in the room. The phone rang, and Xiaoli Ma answered it.

The voice of Du Yu came through the phone: "Boss, why don’t you ever answer my calls? How could you miss such a wonderful scene? A devoted girl, crashing into her unfaithful lover, both dying for love, so touching."
The scene switches to Du Yu making a call, saying: "Give me back that five million. I want to take my true love away from here."
Yuan Pengjun said: "Nice car." At this moment, a black Porsche drove towards them. The couple in the car kissed passionately as the Porsche slowly came to a stop.

Shen Mo said: "Shen Mo, I've been with you for so long. Is this how you treat me? I know you never saw me as a brother. To you, I am just a laboring slave. Yes, I am despicable. I shamelessly served you. I admit to all of this. But can you just give me a way out now? You are cold-blooded. Do you understand love? If you don’t give me my money today,
Lan Lan said: "I need to talk to you."
Du Yu said while running: "I will die to show you."

movie101_6992521335159292452_180_360.text: Xiao Yun stood outside the door, eavesdropping. The dim light reflected on her face, making her look exceptionally gloomy. After a while, she opened the door and walked in.
Xiao Yun turned around, her eyes filled with reluctance. She knew that Jiang Feng's obsession with the movie would not stop, and she was afraid of being dragged into the darkness again.
Xiao Yun looked up at the clock on the wall, the hands of the clock slowly moving to the time 12:55.
Xiao Yun said, "100." After speaking, Xiao Yun looked at Jiang Feng with a complex expression, then turned and left the room. Jiang Feng and Zhang Daichen lay on the ground, stunned.
Xiao Yun took a deep breath and said, "Hello, I need to report a crime."
The screen gradually fades to black, and the film 'The Battle of Memories' officially begins.
The dressing room was filled with various suits, and a display cabinet was also present. Jiang Feng walked to the display cabinet and pressed a button on the remote control.

He took out his phone and pressed the password on the safe. After the password was confirmed, the safe opened automatically. He was about to take out the diamonds when he suddenly remembered the past.
Jiang Feng was sound asleep when a thunderclap startled him. He quickly got up and ran outside, leaving Zhang Daichen alone in the room.
The scene shifted to a dilapidated tall building. As the camera moved closer, the name 'Jiang Feng' appeared on the screen, followed by the title 'The Rebirth of a Genius'.
Xiao Yun stood up and walked to Jiang Feng, saying: "Mr. Jiang Feng, have you marked the memories you wish to delete?"
The assistant said, "All right." After the assistant pressed the button, the word 'Yes' appeared on the screen in front of Jiang Feng. He turned around and looked at the two people behind him.
Jiang Feng looked around, then obediently sat down, and the glass walls of the laboratory suddenly appeared.
The staff member pressed a button, and Jiang Feng's eyes gradually closed. A staff member said, "Please relax, we are now beginning the memory deletion process." Jiang Feng's eyes never opened again.

Jiang Feng's eyes were filled with tenderness, and he felt as if he had found something. The title of the novel was 'The Night Rain'. Jiang Feng held the manuscript and fell into memories.

The machine started operating, and the bulbs on it lit up one by one. Jiang Feng lay on the bed, his eyes tightly closed. The machine slowly descended, and Jiang Feng unconsciously stuck out his tongue to wet his parched lips. The machine stopped above Jiang Feng's head, and Jiang Feng reached out to touch it.
The doctor asked, "Mr. Jiang, did you feel any discomfort, anger, or any other significant emotions just now?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: Che Linlin said: "Alright, if he won't go, I will!"
Che Zhen Shan said, "Alright, alright, let's pretend I never came here." He sighed, "Oh, sweet child."
Che Linlin stood there in a daze, unsure of what to do next. She turned around and walked to the window, looking outside with a blank expression.

Che Zhen Shan: "First, her mother was killed by Japanese soldiers, then, her boyfriend was brutally murdered by a Japanese bayonet. After her boyfriend died, Linlin became emotionally withdrawn. She has rejected every man I introduced to her, including Lieutenant Lu. I know she blames me. She blames me for not avenging her mother all these years. Since the death of her mother, she has never called me father."
Secretary Yang stood up and said: "Commander, I should offer her an apology personally,"
Che Zhen Shan quickly said: "No, no, no, Secretary Yang. Don't worry. She will apologize to you voluntarily in due time,"
Secretary Yang quickly stopped him: "No, no, no, I think I..."
Che Zhen Shan picked up the phone and said, "Hold on," Che Zhen Shan Che interjected, "Yes, Commander?" "Yes, it's Secretary Yang."

Secretary Yang, who had been waiting outside the door for a long time, saw the guard at the door and immediately followed. He tiptoed to the stairway, peeked inside the room, and saw Che Linlin and Che Zhen Shan kissing passionately. He watched their affectionate behavior for a while before quickly leaving the scene.

The soldier who escorted Che Linlin to the cell happened to be Secretary Yang. He was pacing back and forth in the corridor outside the cell, looking for an opportunity. Seeing Secretary Yang, the soldier asked: "Secretary Yang, what are you doing here?"
Secretary Yang said: "I came here to apologize to Miss Che"
Che Zhen Shan smiled and said: "This matter is not urgent, did you know, the special envoy Bai has already arrived at the division headquarters and will make it here by noon tomorrow."
Secretary Yang asked with a smile: "So soon?"
Che Zhen Shan smiled and said: "Secretary Yang, I hope you will speak good things about us by then,"
Secretary Yang said: "The Commander has always done a great job, hasn't he?"
ZhenShan Che said: "Thank you, thank you! I will never treat you unfairly, Secretary Yang. If you have any requests, please feel free to let me know," said ZhenShan Che.
Secretary Yang said with a smile: "Well, coincidentally, I wanted to send some money to my big brother but didn't know how to ask."
Che Zhen Shan smiled and said, "That's very simple. Just tell me how much you need, and I will have Lieutenant Lu arrange it for you," he said, patting Secretary Yang on the shoulder.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.text: Li Hui Lan looked down and said, "He was questioned by the leaders," "If I disappear again this time," "he would lose his position," "I'll be fine," "It's been over a dozen years," "Nothing is going to happen to me."

Jiang Feng: 'He's scum,' 'He's not going to cherish you,' Jiang Feng pushed Li Hui Lan away angrily.

Li Hui Lan: "Stop saying things like that," Li Hui Lan suddenly interrupts Jiang Feng, staring intently at him and says, "Don't you find it strange to say such things?" Jiang Feng's eyes were filled with panic and fear, and Li Hui Lan's hands were trembling. Suddenly, Li Hui Lan lost balance and fell backward, and Jiang Feng quickly reached out to catch her but ended up falling down the stairs together.
Li Hui Lan was still in a daze when Jiang Feng appeared at the top of the stairs, holding a kitchen knife and staring intently at her.
Li Hui Lan was still half-lying on the ground, her head propped up by her hand, her eyes vacant. She struggled to prop herself up a bit more, and saw Jiang Feng tidying up the items on the table.
Li Hui Lan looked up at the sky, tears streaming down her face, then she slowly lowered her head, looking at the hand that had been holding her forehead, gently touching it with her fingertips.

Li Hui Lan was still on the ground, Jiang Feng kicked the rest of the money under the staircase. Li Hui Lan covered her head in pain, Jiang Feng looked at her with a cold expression, then stepped forward and kicked the last pile of money away. Li Hui Lan was completely defeated, she propped herself up with her hands and curled up on the ground, Jiang Feng stood there with a stern face, full of contempt.
Li Hui Lan was still crying, struggling to crawl forward. Jiang Feng walked over, stepped on her hand, and pulled her hand back.

Jiang Feng looked down at Li Hui Lan, who was kneeling on the ground, holding his leg. Li Hui Lan looked up at him with pleading eyes, then let go of his leg and collapsed to the ground. Jiang Feng stepped forward, grabbed Li Hui Lan's hair, and pressed his head against his own leg.

Li Hui Lan struggled desperately, but Jiang Feng still covered her mouth with one hand and pressed down on her with the other. Li Hui Lan screamed in fear, but Jiang Feng ignored her pleas for help. He used all his strength to press down on her, his face twisted with madness and fury. Li Hui Lan struggled desperately, but Jiang Feng still covered her mouth with one hand and pressed down on her with the other. Li Hui Lan screamed in fear, but Jiang Feng ignored her pleas for help.

Li Hui Lan struggled to turn her head, but Jiang Feng covered her mouth with one hand and pressed her forehead with the other. Li Hui Lan tried to look at Jiang Feng, but the hand on her face wouldn't let her.

movie101_7052960987330118151_4680_4860.text: At this moment, a car slowly approached from the front. Du Yu quickly pressed the remote control, and the car stopped right in front of Yuan Pengjun. Xiaoli Ma said: "What are you doing?" Yuan Pengjun strangled Xiaoli Ma from behind, and Xiaoli Ma struggled.

movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.text: The scene switches to the winding mountain roads of Japan, where Xu Tailang is racing a Subie. Xu Tailang asks the navigator beside him: "What's the current oil temperature?"

The race car driver Xu Tailang is fully focused on driving, while the commentator in the studio is closely following the race through real-time vehicle data and video, accompanied by enthusiastic commentary.

Xu Tailang: "I invited you here today" "to witness all this" "to witness that you were wrong" "that I won the annual championship" "that I succeeded"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan's resolute eyes, and Yu Xuan said: "I'm ready to sacrifice at any time."

Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan with a complex expression, filled with mixed feelings. Yu Xuan was also looking at him, her eyes filled with pleading and reluctance.
Mo Han's eyes were filled with determination, but there were also tears spinning at the corners of his eyes. He clenched his fist tightly, gripping the rope tightly.

Che Zhenshan took off the headphones, thought for a moment, and instructed: "Okay, tell Mo Han to stop interrogation for now, and don’t let him get involved in this matter again"
Che Linlin turned around in shock, looking at the unconscious Yu Xuan, and then at the silver needle in the neck.
Che Linlin walked over, loosened the rope a bit, unfastened the noose around her neck, and then removed the rope from her body.
Che Linlin took the bell from Yu Xuan's hand, touched it, then put it near her neck to listen. The sound of the bell was clear and loud.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: The girl weakly closed her eyes, tears streaming down her face. Jiang Feng looked at the girl in front of him with a face full of regret.

Officer Lei took the photo and said: "Excuse me." "Is this you?"

Jiang Feng replied, "That day, I dropped my memory chip tag on the ground."
Jiang Feng: "Remember this person, OK?" Jiang Feng took out a photo from his bag and asked Officer Lei. The photo showed a young man with a guitar.
Jiang Feng asked: "What about this person?"
Officer Lei said, "I watched the surveillance video." "I noticed you two were picking up something at the same time."
Officer Shen, who was lying on the ground, stood up and said, "Officer, I'm hungry. Do you have afternoon tea?"

Jiang Feng suddenly stopped Officer Lei and said, "Hey, hey, hey, Officer Lei," "You need to send someone to protect my wife right away."

Officer Lei's subordinate said, "Master, why haven't you come back yet?"
Officer Lei said: "I'm still at the Memory Master." "Any progress on your side?"

Officer Lei said, "This detail is very important. Get moving now. We'll meet at Li Hui Lan's house."
Officer Lei responded: "Oh, okay," and then hung up the phone.
At this moment, a woman walked up behind Jiang Feng and said, "Buddy, you're asking him to protect your wife. You might as well ask him to open the door and let us both go."
Officer Shen turned around and left, leaving Jiang Feng alone, leaning against the glass wall with a face full of bubbles.
Officer Lei walked over and said, "Master, the objects that can solve the case have been taken away by the forensics team." "Why are we still here?"
Officer Shen: "You tell me what can solve the case?" "Every seemingly unnecessary object at the scene" "had a specific role at the time of the incident."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Liu Yi shouted: "Mumu"
Xu Zhengtai shouted: "Louder!" "Mumu"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: Ling Ling, dressed in a seductive cheongsam, wore a heart-shaped jade pendant and a beaded necklace around her neck. She looked down at the necklace, her fingers fidgeting with it, her eyes filled with determination. She walked towards Yu Xuan, who was tied to the wall, her face already bearing the marks of struggle.
Lu Xiao's face changed instantly, but his voice remained calm. He said: "I'm sorry."
Ling Ling, seemingly unaware, discreetly slipped the string of pearls into the hem of her dress.
Mo Han said: "What do you think living is for?" "For the country, for the faith? Or for money and status?"
"I live only for the people I love," Ling Ling said, pulling the safety catch on the gun at her waist.
Mo Han said: "Look how beautiful this tree is," "It's a pity it's twisted by living in such an environment. What do you say to moving it one day?"
Ling Ling hesitated and said: 'But what about...' 'Won't it die if we do that?'
Mo Han said: 'No, it will grow even better.' Mo Han reassured, 'Ling Ling, I'm tired of the deceit in officialdom. Would you leave it all behind and come away with me?'
Ling Ling asked: 'Just the two of us?'
Mo Han paused and then said: 'Maybe there's one more person.'
Ling Ling turned around helplessly, her eyes red but trying to hold back the tears. She tugged at the collar of her cheongsam, trying to compose herself.
Ling Ling asked: 'Mo Han, have you ever given this kind of pendant to another woman?'

'I've been to the Memory Master place. They were very uncooperative. They insisted I produce a search warrant. Given the current situation, even applying for a search warrant will take at least ten days to two weeks. So, for now, I can't confirm who exchanged memories with you.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: Mo Han, who had been hiding in the dark, suddenly emerged. The two faced off, guns pointed at each other. Mo Han asked, 'Lin Lin, what are you doing here?'
Lin Lin asked, 'What are you doing?'
Mo Han looked at Lin Lin and said: 'I don't want to hide it from you any longer at this point. Actually, I am...'

Mo Han, with a face full of sorrow, looked at Lin Lin. After a long silence, he turned around and pressed his back against the desk. With a heavy heart, he said: 'My life is in your hands, go ahead and shoot.'

Lin Lin said: 'Mo Han, you've been using me all along, haven't you? Using me as a shield, gaining my father's trust, getting a foothold here to gather information. Am I right? Aren't you afraid of exposing yourself, aren't you afraid of dying?'

Mo Han, with a solemn expression, walked up to Lin Lin and said: 'Ever since I embarked on this path, I've regarded myself as already dead. To console the countless unjust souls like your mother's, for the happiness of hundreds of millions of suffering compatriots, for a new world, my death means nothing.'

Mo Han said: 'Lin Lin, the Japanese devils are now burning, killing, and looting everywhere, destroying our homes. Our countrymen are in deep suffering. We are all Chinese, and as a conscientious Chinese, facing national disaster, the Kuomintang not only fails to resist but also targets the communists. How can one not be angry, how can one not be heartbroken?'

Mo Han walked up to Lin Lin and said: 'Lin Lin, for the harm I've caused you, I solemnly apologize. This apology has been weighing on my heart so heavily that I could hardly breathe. That's why I planned to take you away and make it up to you with my actions.'
Lin Lin said: 'Thank you for your kindness and honesty.'
Lin Lin looked at Mo Han's face and said: "Try my birthday."
Mo Han tried to open the safe with his military knife but couldn't. He muttered, 'It won't open.'
Lin Lin said: 'Try my mother's birthday, 1208.' Mo Han tried the combination, but the safe didn't open.
Lin Lin thought for a moment and said, 'Try my mother's death anniversary, 1011.' Mo Han hesitated for a moment, then turned and walked out of the room, closing the door behind him.
Mo Han tried to calm down and quickly turned the dial, but the sound of the ticking bomb echoed in his ears.

The scene shifts to the bathroom, where Jiang Feng is staring intently at the bathtub. The water in the tub is filled with blood, and Jiang Feng's expression is extremely pained. At this moment, The Long-Haired Woman's Husband slowly approaches from behind Jiang Feng.

The scene shifts to the bathroom, Jiang Feng's father was staring at the bathtub, Jiang Feng's hand was dipping into the water, Jiang Feng's father was staring at the bathtub, Jiang Feng's hand was dipping into the water, Jiang Feng stood up and walked towards Jiang Feng's father.

The scene shifts to the mental hospital, Jiang Feng's Husband was drenched in water, his hair sticking to his forehead, he looked around and saw his reflection in the mirror. Jiang Feng's Husband was stunned for a moment, then turned to look at Jiang Feng who was still soaking in the bathtub. Jiang Feng was staring at the water with a dazed look, and Jiang Feng's Husband slowly walked towards him.

The room was in a mess. Jiang Feng's Husband looked around in confusion. He walked to the dressing table and saw his reflection in the mirror. He wiped the mirror with his hand, but it was in vain as the mirror was shattered beyond recognition.

He tried to push open the door, but it was locked from the inside. He looked up and saw a mirror on the wall, and his reflection appeared on the mirror. He looked at himself in the mirror, then at the door, and finally at himself in the mirror again. Jiang Feng couldn't hold back any longer and rushed towards the door.
The scene shifts to the interior of the house, where Jiang Feng is shouting, "Officer Shen!" "Officer Shen!" "Officer Shen!"
The scene shifts to a man in a white shirt, with the name 'Jiang Feng' appearing at the bottom of the screen.
The scene switches to a mental hospital, where Officer Shen is trapped in a glass box, muttering Jiang Feng's name over and over.

Jiang Feng slowly sat down on the bed, took off his shoes, and said, "I figured it out. You said some things are blurred. Some places can't enter. That's because you took someone else's memory. What he didn't notice, you naturally can't see clearly, where he can't go, you naturally can't go in."
Jiang Feng looked up at The Long-Haired Woman and asked, "Then, who do you say usually has the habit of wearing white gloves?”
Officer Shen replied, "There are many possibilities."
Jiang Feng asked, "What does the goldfish floating in the air represent?"
Officer Shen said, "This is just a surreal thing, is it your dream getting confused with memory?"
Jiang Feng replied, "No." " People from the medical center have told me." " This is a memory overload,"" not a dream."
Officer Shen turned around and said: "Can you tell Li Xiaoyun..."
