movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: After the meeting, Secretary Yang went to the mailroom to send a letter. After sending it, he picked up the receiver and dialed a number, then put it to his ear and waited.
Secretary Yang said: 'The 4321.'
Secretary Yang said: "Hello, brother, I want to send you some money. You mentioned last time about moving. Didn't move, right?"

Secretary Yang instructed: 'Okay, our special agent will arrive at noon tomorrow. From the division to the regiment headquarters for an inspection. I might go back to Nanjing or maybe another place, so don't reply after receiving the money.' He hung up quickly after finishing.

The scene shifts to the command room where a map is being discussed. The leader unfolds the map and says: "Comrades, Special Agent Bai is coming from the division to the regiment headquarters. He'll pass through one of these routes. Tonight we'll plant mines here and ambush with machine guns at this high point."
The instructor shouted: "Look to the right." "Look forward."
Guard ran over and said: "Report, Colonel. Just received a call from the division." "Special Agent Bai has switched to a plane and is expected to arrive shortly."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Got it, you may go."
Guard saluted and said: "Yes."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Secretary Yang, Special Agent Bai is arriving soon. You must be excited."
Secretary Yang said: "Indeed, a bit."
Che Zhen Shan said: "I'm not excited, I'm nervous, extremely nervous."
Secretary Yang said: "Colonel, with you saying that, you've made me nervous as well." "Whenever I get nervous, I feel like going to the restroom."
Che Zhen Shan thought for a moment and said: "Alright, go quickly and come back soon." "Your superior will be here shortly."

Secretary Yang, who had been waiting for a long time, finally saw Che Zhen Shan, his face beaming with a happy smile. He quickly stepped forward to greet him, but unexpectedly, Che Zhen Shan did not reciprocate his greetings.
He then returned to the office, but found that the room was empty. He hurriedly ran out to search.
Secretary Yang picked up the phone, dialed a number and said: "Please connect me to 4321."
Che Zhen Shan looked at his watch; it was already 2:05 PM. He anxiously said: "Special Agent Bai will be here soon." "Where is Secretary Yang?" "Lu Xiang, go check."
Secretary Yang listened to the phone call from the battalion commander, his face full of worry, and then he slowly put down the phone.

Secretary Yang, who had been called out by Che Zhen Shan, was somewhat panicked. He quickly looked around the office, fearing that Che Zhen Shan might come back. He hurriedly ran downstairs, but just as he reached the stairwell, he heard a knock on the door.

He stood at the doorway of the bathroom, calling: "Secretary Yang, Secretary Yang." No response came from inside. He then pushed the door open, but what greeted him was the sight of a cow dung-covered floor.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2280_2460.text: Luo Li, holding a bowl of rice, walked up to Xiao Ma and took off the cloth covering his head. Xiao Ma, with a gloomy face, looked at Luo Li. Luo Li asked, "Can you give me back my glasses?"
Luo Li said: "Stop talking and eat," Luo Li handed a bowl of instant noodles to Xiao Ma, but Xiao Ma refused to eat and spat it out.

A man said: 'Boss, please stop feeding him, you might develop feelings if you keep feeding him.' Luo Li ignored the advice of the man in front of him and put the bowl of rice in front of Xiao Ma. Then he stood up and walked towards the tied-up people.

Luo Li said: "We probably haven't captured the core management. Logically speaking, in this underworld, even if we captured an intern, their boss should have come to rescue. Their inaction to our activity puts us in a very passive position."
The man in the blue shirt said: 'Just tear up the ticket' 'Shoot him dead' 'Throw the body at the KTV entrance'
Luo Li angrily said: "Are you crazy? Killing is illegal. Do you want to be a death row prisoner? Let me tell you, you absolutely cannot kill people."

Luo Li, with a face full of regret, said: 'We've shown our hand.'
The man in the floral shirt pulled out a gun and said: 'Boss, Boss, Boss, Boss.'
Luo Li walked over and slapped him, saying: "I told you to shut up."
The man in the floral shirt, Luo Li, touched his head and walked away dejectedly.
The man in the floral shirt suddenly turned his head, picked up the bottle, and smashed it towards the wall. The others also threw the bottles in their hands towards the wall.
Luo Li, who was sitting opposite, saw this and adjusted his own collar, then picked up the wine glass on the table and drank it all in one go.
The man in the floral shirt said: 'Boss, I don't think this is any strategy. They haven't even noticed that someone is missing.'
The man replied, "I think so too."
At this moment, a man walked up to Luo Li and said, 'Boss, how about we kidnap that woman?'
Luo Li leaned back in his chair and said: "We can't touch women."
The man in the floral shirt said: 'Then let's kidnap Liu-yi'
The man in the floral shirt added, 'We can't touch children either.'
Luo Li rubbed his eyes and said: "Do you even have any sense of rules anymore?"

Luo Li said: "What are our demands? It's to resolve this through negotiation, so we just need leverage. If you kidnap the negotiation target directly, isn't that shameful, disgusting, ugly? Ah, I, Luo Li, will only be a street thug. How am I supposed to transition to the political and business world?"
The man in gray added: 'Boss, then there's only one person left we can move against now.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: Officer Shen asked: "What is the relationship with the murderer?"

Jiang Feng continued: "He thinks the murderer came to help his mom." "There's one more thing I couldn't figure out—" "In my memory, I was so ruthless to Li Huilan, but at the moment I saw her take her last breath, I had a very strange feeling."
Officer Shen asked: "What feeling?"
Jiang Feng replied: "Happiness for her." Officer Shen looked at Jiang Feng in disbelief, then lowered his head in silence.
Jiang Feng covered his face and wept, and Officer Shen continued: "Oh right, there's one more thing, the last call from Li Huilan's house was made to the murderer."
The camera switches to Zhang Daichen's home, where the doorbell rings. Zhang Daichen opens the door to find Officer Lei standing outside, holding a bag and a bouquet of flowers.
Shanshan Chen: "I brought you some medicine." "This medicine I have is very effective in removing scars." "I'll give it to you."
Zhang Daichen said: "How could I trouble you so?"
Shanshan Chen smiled and said: "It's no trouble."
Zhang Daichen: "Oh, sorry, please come in and sit." Zhang Daichen invited Officer Shen in with a smile.

The next day, Zhang Daichen walked into the kitchen with a bottle of water, opened the fridge, and Officer Lei walked in with a cup of coffee. Zhang Daichen took out a bottle of mineral water from the fridge and handed it to Officer Lei.
Shanshan Chen walked in and said: "In such hot weather, you specially came to deliver medicine. It's really too kind of you."
Shanshan Chen: "Actually, I was passing by." "I also wanted to ask you something." "I have a ticket to a concert." "I really couldn't find anyone to go with me. I wonder if you'd be interested."
Shanshan Chen took the water and said: "I'd love to go. But—"
Shanshan Chen said: "How about this, I'll give you my business card." "It has my phone number." "If you change your mind," "or your wound has any issues," "give me a call anytime."
Zhang Daichen said: "Okay, thank you."

Shanshan Chen smiled and said: "Then I won't disturb you further." "I need to get back to the hospital." The two said their goodbyes in this way, and then the scene shifted to the library. The students were quietly reading their books, Jiang Feng was explaining something to a student, and Officer Lei was strolling around the bookshelves searching for books.
Officer Lei stood up and said: "Master"
Officer Shen walked while saying: "I'm sorry""I'm sorry""I'm sorry"
Officer Shen said: "Hello Xiaoyun, is it convenient for Uncle to ask you a few questions?"
Officer Lei bent down and said to Xiaoyun Ji: "The police uncle is asking you a question." Officer Lei sat down next to Officer Shen, and Xiaoyun Ji remained silent, writing in her notebook.
Officer Lei said: "Don't be nervous, we just want to confirm a few details with you."

Officer Lei asked: "Xiaoyun Ji, do you know where your mom went during the time she went missing?" "Little girl, don't lie." "How could your mom leave home without telling you?" "And I also heard that some time ago, someone gave you a ride home." "Who was that person?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: The scene shifts to the entrance of the Kuomintang stronghold, where a car is speeding out, with the guard shouting: "Salute."

The old man said: "We have already captured the real Yang Mohan," "You must act cautiously," "Obtain the code by clever means, not by force."

The scene shifts to a bar, where Hong Zichen is recalling the past: "It was snowing that day, it was exceptionally cold, and the old lady also said."

Che Linlin said: "No, I think it was you. Think again."

movie101_6992521335159292452_3960_4140.text: Jiang Feng stood at the door, covering their mouth, unable to believe what they were seeing. The woman in the bathtub gradually sank to the bottom.

He tore open the packaging of the identity card, sat down at the table, and looked at the scattered documents. The scene shifted to a dimly lit, dilapidated house, where Jiang Feng was carrying a box full of documents.
The ink spreading on the paper revealed a face; it was The Long-Haired Woman.

The scene shifts to the present, where Jiang Feng is frantically flipping through files in the police station's evidence room. He picks up a file folder, and the unique identifier on the back immediately catches his attention. Recalling the past, he remembers this was the very file containing information about The Long-Haired Woman's biological parents. Jiang Feng quickly searches through the files in the evidence room, and indeed finds the folder he's looking for.

He picked up a file bag, flipped through it, and found a stack of photos inside. He pulled out a photo of The Long-Haired Woman from the bag. Just as he was about to look through it, someone knocked on the door.
Officer Shen said, "The files of female domestic violence victims over the years are all here."
Jiang Feng, supporting his neck, said, "I don't think she would have called the police," "This is another Li Huiran, they don't think it's a crime for their husbands to abuse them."
Officer Shen took off his gloves, sat down, and picked up the coffee pot to pour coffee for Jiang Feng.
Jiang Feng continued, "Also, the two victims' personalities are very similar," "but the killer's attitudes towards them are very different."
Officer Shen said, "One is drugged behind their back, one is killed face-to-face with a weapon. According to criminal logic, it doesn't seem like the work of one person."
Officer Shen asked Jiang Feng: "Is it possible that you received the memories of more than one person?"
Jiang Feng said, "Is it possible" "he has multiple personalities." Officer Shen put down his cup.
Jiang Feng asked, "What about Li Xiaoyun?"
Officer Shen put his hands behind his head and said: "She said there was no one else at home on the night of the crime."
Jiang Feng said, "Impossible," "She's lying.""Why don't you get her here, and I'll confront her face to face?"

Officer Shen: "You say bring her here like it's that easy!" "She's a minor," if you want to overturn this testimony, "I'll need her guardian," "her school's legal representative," and "I also have to notify the relevant youth protection agency."
Jiang Feng asked, "What is this?" "Didn't you say the last phone call from Li Huiran's house was not traced?"
Officer Shen looked at Jiang Feng and said, "I haven't verified it yet."
Jiang Feng angrily said, "You found out, why did you lie to me!"
Officer Shen said, "I have my procedures."
Jiang Feng angrily said, "Whose phone is this," "you could've found out with just one call."
Officer Shen: "Do I have to report to you?" Officer Shen bowed and took the cloth.
Jiang Feng angrily slapped Officer Shen and said, "What are you hiding?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_1680_1860.text: Da Xu turned around and patted his shoulder, saying: "Hey, hey, hey, I'm asking you, did you get the concert tickets or not?"
Da Xu: "I asked already, it's eight hundred per ticket."
Wang Xiaopo: "Eight hundred per ticket, huh."
Da Xu: "What's the matter?"
Wang Xiaopo looked at Da Xu and said: "Wow, so expensive!"
Wang Xiaopo put down the tool in his hand and said: "What's she so obsessed with?" "Why pay so much to watch?" Da Xu chuckled and squatted down.
Da Xu: "To please a woman, you need to spend some money, you know."

Da Xu: "I still can't bear it." "Who do you think I'm making this armored vehicle for?" "Seriously." "Stop bothering me." "And don't brag in front of others." "What 'I have connections' and all that."

Da Xu: "Hey, buddy, we were just talking about having fun." "When did I ever brag?" "Didn't I say I have friends over there?" "I asked already, they can't offer discounts right now." "Otherwise, the computer can't process it."
Wang Xiaopo hurriedly said: "Sorry, sorry, sorry." "Just get me the tickets." "Don't go over four hundred."
Da Xu: "You're so stingy. Honestly." After saying that, the two of them went back to their rooms.
Wang Xiaopo said: "Oh my gosh." "Waist, waist, my poor waist."
Da Xu, seeing Wang Xiaopo's panicked expression, quickly jumped into the driver's seat to help.
Da Xu said: "What are you doing, striking a pose?"
Da Xu said: "Look at it yourself." "Can you see outside through this window?"
Da Xu looked at Wang Xiaopo and said: "No, you can't see, didn't you draw it yourself?"
Wang Xiaopo angrily said: "I said the window was too big and to make it smaller. Now you've done this. Why did you put that dark film outside? How, how are you supposed to see?"
Da Xu asked: "What, what, what now?"
Wang Xiaopo: "And you installed two rear-view mirrors. What's the point?"
Da Xu said: "I installed them? Didn't you tell me to do it? Honestly."
Da Xu looked at Wang Xiaopo and said: "What do we do now?" "How about I sit on top and guide you?"
Wang Xiaopo wiped his sweat and said: "You get up there."
Da Xu said: "Gosh, you think I want to stay here?" "It's so hot."
Da Xu: "Go, go, go, go, go." "Right, right, right." "To the right."
Da Xu: "Reverse, please pay attention." "Reverse." "Turn back." "Turn back." "Go, go, go, go, slower, slower." "Go."
Wang Xiaopo anxiously said: "Come in, come down here and direct, come down."
Wang Xiaopo looked up and said: "Okay, coming right down."
Da Xu: "Left, right, left, right."
Wang Xiaopo looked up and saw Da Xu's foot, scolding: "Are you brainless? You can't tell left from right?"
Wang Xiaopo said: "What's going on?" "From outside, facing me." "You say left, right, left, right." "Do you think it's the same for me inside?"
Wang Xiaopo said: "Gosh, this is so frustrating."
Wang Xiaopo urged: "Come on, come on, start, start, start."
Da Xu: "Okay, watch closely, turn right."
Da Xu shouted: "Charge! Stop, stop, stop."
Da Xu, frustrated, scratched his head and asked, "What's the situation?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_1320_1500.text: Feng Yucheng said: "I, I don't deserve to be a man."

The scene shifts to Feng Yucheng returning home in the rain. He rode his bike in the pouring rain, soaked through and through. He parked his bike at the entrance, took off his coat, and drenched himself in the rain, letting the cold rainwater wash over his face. He closed his eyes, trying to calm his agitated emotions.

Feng Yucheng held his head in his hands, tears streaming down his face. He furrowed his brows, looking incredibly pained. His body trembled as he cried, his poor little nose was red from wiping. He kept crying and shouting, the pain in his heart too deep to bear.
The scene shifts, and the man says: 'Facing this grieving man before me, I don't know how to console him. Actually, Feng Yucheng having a woman like Shui Xiu, he is fortunate.'

The scene shifts to a rainy night, where a woman is sitting on the roadside, listening to the radio. The news says: "Shui Xiu went to the county town for her legal rights. Though we don't know the outcome, she was courageous."

The rain outside was still relentless, pouring down like a torrent. Shui Xiu sat on the steps, hugging her knees tightly, her hair sticking to her face from the rain. She looked incredibly lonely and vulnerable. The heavy rain was like a veil, covering her face, making it hard to see her eyes. The lonely figure sat on the steps, the rain soaking her, her emotions indescribable.

The camera shifts, and Shui Xiu is seen sleeping on the steps of a government building, leaning against the wall with a worn-out look. She is holding a worn-out coat in her arms, wearing worn-out shoes on her feet, and leaning against a worn-out bicycle. She slowly stands up, her legs wobbling, and walks into the government building with her coat in hand.
Shui Xiu was riding a bike on the road, but her mood was as low as the weather. She pinched her nose, still looking gloomy.
Shui Xiu was pedaling hard, her face full of worry and regret. She knew she needed to find the child as soon as possible, and for the sake of the child, she was willing to endure all hardships.
The next day, Feng Yucheng rode his bicycle to the repair shop.
The scene shifts to the village entrance, where Shui Xiu is pushing a bicycle slowly along a country path, surrounded by lush trees and bathed in the warm sunlight.

Shui Xiu was still on her way, pushing her bicycle, when she heard her daughter's voice. She felt a bit at a loss, furrowed her brows, and wiped the sweat from her forehead. She didn't know what to do, just stood there in a daze.

The next day, Shui Xiu rode her bicycle along the country path, passing through the woods and arriving at the village. The sun was shining brightly, casting dappled shadows on the ground. Shui Xiu rode her bike quickly, eager to see her daughter as soon as possible.
Shui Xiu was stunned for a moment, then regained her senses and rode her bicycle away quickly.
Everyone looked at Shui Xiu lying on the bed, and Feng Yucheng said: "Sister-in-law."

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: Xu Tailang: "Mother died."
The reporter: "Oh, I'm sorry."
Xu Tailang: "Alright, thank you everyone, that will be all." The staff and the audience below the stage were all cheering for Xu Tailang.
The crowd shouted: "Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang"
Xu Tailang walked out of the conference room with a dejected look, leaned on the balcony railing, and Father, who was lighting a cigarette, came over and said to him: "Congratulations."
Xu Tailang said: "You don't have to congratulate me with a special gesture." Xu Tailang looked at the driver who was waiting for him to get out of the car, feeling a bit embarrassed.
Father took a puff of his cigarette and said, 'I've loved driving since I was young. I never imagined you'd get this good at it.'

Xu Tailang: 'You always force me to do things I really don't like. As a kid, it was studying math. As I grew up, it was medical school. When I said I loved driving, you arranged for me to drive an ambulance.'
Father: "Your mother once said" "It's especially good for a child to grow up and become a doctor."
Xu Tailang continued: "Did she also say it's especially good that her husband, before having a child, went off to fight, ended up in prison for six years?"
Xu Tailang: "Come on." Xu Tailang sat in the car, buckled up, and with a push of the starting gear, the car roared to life. Father, standing outside, watched the car intently, his expression serious.
Xu Tailang drove up to Father, Father looked at Xu Tailang through the car window, Xu Tailang looked back at Father, both remained silent.
The scene switches to the rally race, where Xu Tailang is driving at high speed. Father shouts through the earpiece: "Slow down, Xu Tailang. Don't go too fast, ahead..."

The scene shifts to a dilapidated factory. The car drifts into a turn, kicking up dust. The car drifts into a turn, kicking up dust. The car drifts into a turn, kicking up dust. The car drifts into a turn, kicking up dust.
Xu Tailang said: 'I think I'm going to be sick.'

Xu Tailang said: "Go ahead, throw up. It's my co-driver's helmet anyway." Xu Tailang remained expressionless, focusing on driving. The car continued to drift, and the tires screeched against the ground.
The car drifted out of the alley, and Xu Tailang drove the car to the abandoned factory. The car jumped over the damaged factory wall and continued driving.
Doctor looked up and saw a person lying on the back seat of the car. Doctor said: "There's another person in the car."
Xu Tailang thought: "They say that when a person dies, their life flashes before their eyes. Will mine?"

The scene shifts to the police station, where Xu Tailang is locked in a cell. The police officer in charge of feeding Xu Tailang notices the baby milk powder on the table, picks it up, and says, "Have some milk." Then he turns and leaves.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.text: Officer Shen said: 'My wife is out there in danger at any moment,' Officer Shen released his hold, and Jiang Feng asked: 'What are you doing?'
Officer Lei said to Jiang Feng: 'Please take Mr. Jiang Feng back,' then he took his hand off Jiang Feng's shoulder.
The policeman said: "Mr. Jiang Feng, leave," and Jiang Feng, with an angry face, was forcibly taken away by the prison guard who came in.
Officer Chen Shanshan: "Sis Daichen, you're here," The two walked upstairs arm in arm, greeting acquaintances along the way.
Officer Lei walked out of the office with his clothes in hand, Policeman followed him and said: "Officer Lei," "No blade was found in Gu Haibo's stomach"
Officer Lei: 'Got it, go on'
Zhang Daichen sat down and said to Officer Chen Shanshan: 'Could you do me a favor? You're so close to Officer Shen, could you ask him when my husband can come out?'
Officer Chen Shanshan: "I'll try"
Officer Chen Shanshan smiled and said: "Thank you."
Officer Chen Shanshan smiled and said: "You're welcome"

Zhang Daichen replied: 'Actually, it's been a long time since I've been to a concert. After getting married, even the number of new friends I make has dwindled. Did you know I used to be a writer, but then I stopped writing'
Officer Chen Shanshan said to Zhang Daichen: "It would be great if you continued writing"
Zhang Daichen: "I will." "Anyway, it's never too late to write a book." Zhang Daichen smiled and nodded, looking at Officer Chen Shanshan with admiration.
Officer Chen Shanshan looked at Zhang Daichen with a smile, Zhang Daichen smiled back, then turned to look at Officer Lei on the other side.
Officer Lei: "I'll be right there."
Jiang Feng lowered his head, sighed helplessly, and then turned to look at the perpetrator who was pacing back and forth in the interrogation room.
Jiang Feng: 'Officer, I need water'
After a while, Policeman heard the sound of a door closing and looked around. He then walked to the spot where the sound came from and found a fingerprint on the windowsill.

Jiang Feng looked at Officer Lei's back, feeling a mix of emotions. He took a sip of water, then picked up a piece of broken evidence from the cup and stared at it for a long time. The shattered fragment, once part of the bomb, now lay in his hand, symbolizing the destruction it had caused to his life.
Jiang Feng stood there in a daze, as Policeman came over with a cup of water. Jiang Feng took the cup and stared at Policeman for a long time.
Jiang Feng scooped up a spoonful of ice cream, looked at Policeman, and said: 'I'm warning you, don't mess around,' then stuffed the whole spoonful into his mouth at once.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Shui Xiu said: "I'm fine." "Yu Cheng."
Yu Cheng said: "Shui Xiu, as long as you're okay, we won't fight for anything."
Shui Xiu said: 'Why not fight? I just want to fight to keep my dignity.'
Yu Cheng said: "Shui Xiu"
Yu Cheng looked at Shui Xiu and said, "Dad."
Shui Xiu said: "Uncle Lao Qing has come."
Uncle Lao Qing rushed into the room anxiously, only to see Shui Xiu lying on the bed, with Yu Cheng sitting beside her. Uncle Lao Qing said: "Shui Xiu, you really are something, huh."
Shui Xiu, seeing Uncle Lao Qing, quickly called out: "Uncle Lao Qing!" Yu Cheng also reached out to pat Shui Xiu, but was held back by Uncle Lao Qing.

Uncle Lao Qing said: 'Our village of Yingtan.' 'For decades, no one has ever lodged a complain.' 'You are really breaking new ground.' 'Shui Xiu, just listen to your uncle, stop causing trouble, okay?'
Shui Xiu said: "Uncle Lao Qing, don't be angry. Now it's not just a matter of our family and Yu Cheng. I didn't intend to blow things up. I've checked, his Liu Yuhai's slate factory is illegal."
Uncle Lao Qing said: "Illegal? What law does it break?" "That Liu Yuhai has been operating legally for many years." "He pays so much tax every year."
Shui Xiu said: "I don't care about what taxes he pays. I just know it's illegal."

Uncle Lao Qing interrupted and said: "Alright, alright, that's enough. Let's stick to the facts. This matter, let it go already. Why should you demand that he bears all the responsibility when you guys get hurt?"
Yu Cheng said: "Uncle Lao Qing, please stay out of this. I must get to the bottom of it." Uncle Lao Qing was about to speak but was interrupted by Yu Cheng. Uncle Lao Qing sighed and shook his head.
Uncle Lao Qing said: "Fine, go ahead and sue then, go on and sue, you're just like this, straightforward, go ahead and sue to the end."
Uncle Lao Qing left the room, and Shui Xiu sat on the bed, panting heavily. She opened the blanket, grabbed a carrot, and started chewing frantically.
Shui Xiu's face was flushed with red, her eyes reddened, and she swallowed hard. The next day, Er Niu came to Liu Yuhai's office, panting heavily.
Er Niu said: "Shui Xiu came back from filing a complaint. Guess what? No luck."
Liu Yuhai said: "What does this show? It shows that with reason, you can walk the world, without it, you can't take a step."
Er Niu said: "Exactly. But it's just that, that."
Liu Yuhai asked, 'Just what?'
Liu Yuhai said: "It's just that Shui Xiu filed a complaint this time. Against you."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Xiao Hua turned around and saw Xu Tailang sitting on the bed, watching TV. She walked over to Xu Tailang and stood beside him. The two looked at each other and smiled, then they both looked at the TV.

Xu Tailang picked up the remote control from the bedside table and pressed the button. The TV was showing an ancient costume drama. Xiao Hua's hand was placed on Xu Tailang's leg.

Xiao Hua said, 'I don't like this name.'

Xiao Hua closed her eyes and said, "Because he almost never spends time with me."

Xiao Hua said, 'Zhang Suzhen.'
Xu Tailang was stunned, then immediately let go of his hands, stood up in a panic, and said, "We... We can't do this. How can this be right for a straight man?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.text: He took a sip of water, then looked at the prison guard outside the window. The prison guard was wiping the window. Jiang Feng watched the prison guard's movements, then tilted his head back and swallowed the water in his mouth. After swallowing, he felt a bit strange in his throat, so he bent down to cough.

Jiang Feng gasped for breath, covered his mouth and nose with his hand, and then collapsed on the ground, gasping for breath. He lay on the ground, his face twisted with pain, his teeth gritted together, beads of sweat on his forehead, and his eyes filled with tears.
Prison Guard said: 'Don't move. The more you move, the bigger the wound gets. I'll give you a sedative injection first.' Prison Guard said, looking at Jiang Feng.

The scene shifts to a parking lot where a man with a backpack is looking for a car. He found an ambulance and opened the door. Just as he was about to get in, a man inside the car got up and tried to stab him with a knife.
Jiang Feng said to Police Officer: 'You now have two choices. Either I kill him and you shoot me, or you put the gun down and no one gets hurt.'
Police Officer said: 'Alright, alright. Don't be impulsive. I'll put the gun down.' Police Officer put down the gun, and Jiang Feng put down the knife.
Doctor told Police Officer: 'Throw the gun farther away.'
Police Officer looked at Jiang Feng, then at Doctor, and asked: "Is that okay?"
Jiang Feng said: "Handcuff your hand to his hand."
Police Officer said: "Okay."
Jiang Feng gritted his teeth and said, 'Give him a sedative injection. Do it.'
Jiang Feng continued to give Prison Guard an injection.

Jiang Feng looked at the hand of Police Officer, who was giving an injection to Prison Guard, and then at the hand of Police Officer. After a while, Police Officer finished the injection, Jiang Feng said: "Alright, can you put the scissors down now?"

Police Officer and Jiang Feng struggled to control the agitated Prison Guard. Doctor took the opportunity to cut the handcuffs with scissors. Prison Guard struggled even more fiercely after the handcuffs were cut. Police Officer and Jiang Feng kept pulling at Prison Guard's arms.

Police Officer took the handcuff keys from his waist and started to pick the lock. After a few twists, the handcuffs clicked open. He rubbed his eyes and looked at the unconscious Prison Guard in front of him. With a sigh of relief, he put the keys away and gently closed the car door.
Zhang Daichen was sitting in the cinema, her face expressionless. She took out her phone from her bag and texted Police Officer.

The scene switches to a flight returning to Beijing. Zhang Daichen's phone rang. The caller ID showed an unknown number. After a moment of hesitation, she answered the call. Zhang Daichen said, 'Hello.'
Prison Guard said into the phone: 'Zhang Daichen'
On the other end of the phone, Zhang Daichen was shocked. The voice on the phone asked, 'What's wrong with your voice?' 'Hello? Did you get out?' 'Don't ask these things now.' 'Where are you?'
Zhang Daichen replied: "Wanxiang Music Hall."
The policewoman asked, 'Who are you with?'
Zhang Daichen replied: "With a friend. What's the matter?"
Police Officer said: 'Stay there, don't move. Wait for me.'
Zhang Daichen, covering her mouth, made a call, saying: 'Hello.' 'Hello.'
Zhang Daichen asked: "What happened?"
Zhang Daichen said: "Nothing"

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Second-Rate said: "What?" "Destroying the environment?"
Liu Yuhai said: "Destroying the environment? Isn't this woman possessed or something?"
Liu Yuhai said: "In that case, for the next couple of days, don't go to work." "Keep a close eye on Shui Xiu for me." "If anything happens, hurry back and notify me."
Second-Rate replied: "No problem," and Liu Yuhai also smiled in agreement. The photo showed Shui Xiu and another villager working together.
Girl looked at the photo and said: "This photo"
Wu Zheng said: "This was taken inadvertently when I was in England for the talks." "Also, Shui Xiu, I have something I'd like to discuss with you."
Shui Xiu said: "Whatever it is, just tell me."
Wu Zheng said: "I'm thinking of organizing a photo exhibition in a while, and would like to use your portrait rights. What do you think?"
Shui Xiu said: "What?" "The rights of the portrait?"
Wu Zheng said: "It means that I want to use your image from my photos, I need to have your consent."
Girl looked at the photo and said: "You've made my sister-in-law look so good in the photo," "why wouldn't we agree?" Right, sister-in-law?
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng brother, I don't know much about this portrait right thing, but if you want to use it, just do it."
Wu Zheng said: "That's great."
Wu Zheng took out a thick book and said: "Look at this," "This is your fee for the use of the portrait rights."
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng brother, what are you doing?" "You take my picture and then offer me money; that's not acceptable."
Wu Zheng said: "Shui Xiu, listen to me... When I use your portrait right, it is a requirement to compensate you."
Shui Xiu said: "I don't care about rules or regulations, all I know is I can't take this money."
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng brother, if you keep doing this, then I won't allow you to use my portrait rights at all."
Girl said: "Wu Zheng brother, can I give you some feedback on this photo?"
Wu Zheng said: "Sure, go ahead."
Girl said: "There are so many beautiful spots in our village, why didn’t you take pictures of them?"
Wu Zheng said: "Oh, there are places more beautiful than this?" Girl said: "Of course, sister-in-law, when you're feeling better, let's take Wu Zheng brother for a tour around." Shui Xiu nodded.
Wu Zheng said: "Okay."
The next day, Wu Zheng and his group went to the mountain. Standing on the mountaintop, Wu Zheng said: "This is truly beautiful."

Wu Zheng said: "We used to walk up there before, but because of the sinkhole, we now go this way." Wu Zheng pointed to the distant mountains, showing the girls the unique geological features of the area.
The next day, the sun shone on the mountains, and the village was filled with the sounds of roosters and dogs.

The scene switches to a village where Wu Zheng is walking and talking: "The scenery of the English countryside is beautiful, but there's no way to promote it. It would be great if people from outside the mountain could come see our beautiful landscape. Our village intellectual here is quite anxious, he wants to do something for the village."
Shui Xiu and the children came out of the house, Shui Xiu asked: "Wu Zheng brother, what are you thinking about?"

Wu Zheng said: "Shui Xiu, look, this place of yours, with its mountains, waters, stone fortresses, Gong, and an abundance of historical legends and revolutionary relics, if tourism could be developed here, it would definitely be a big draw." Shui Xiu looked at the scenery in front of her, feeling very pleased.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Xu Zhengtai continued, "I was thinking, what if something happens to me and I'm not around anymore? There should still be someone to carry on the Zheng Tai Gang."

movie101_7089369392055583246_2040_2220.text: Zheng Jin, while pacing, said: "Oh, why report it, why call the police? The police are so busy, can they help you find a dog? After hanging up the phone, Zheng Jin was already sweating profusely. He put the phone on the table, pulled down his collar to fan himself, and took out a tissue from his pocket to wipe his sweat.

The camera switches to Wang Xiaopo practicing basketball in a desolate factory. He practices layups tirelessly, pouring all his energy into this one move. His movements become mechanical, but his success is also evident. He sinks a shot, bounces the ball, and starts again.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Mrs. Zheng, who was about to take off her shoes to go into the water to wash her feet, heard the phone ringing. She sat down and answered the call, saying, 'Hello?'

Mrs. Zheng asked: "Where?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "Why don't you just tell me?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "I can tell you, but you understand the rules, right?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "Rules, what rules?"

Mrs. Zheng said: "Ten thousand."

Mrs. Zheng said: 'Good that you know, be straightforward.'

Mrs. Zheng said: "Alright alright, I'll go get the money now! Alright alright, bye." After hanging up, Mrs. Zheng started to chase after Wang Xiaopo.

Wang Xiaopo, who was originally wearing a shirt and trousers, took off his clothes and threw them on the ground. He then collapsed onto the bed, pulling up the quilt and quickly went to sleep. But in his sleep, he suddenly sat up, realizing that Mrs. Zheng was not there. The room was empty, and he looked around in confusion.

The next morning, Wang Xiaopo woke up in bed, looked at the dog beside him, and asked in confusion: 'Whose dog is this?' He got up and looked around but didn't see anyone, so he got dressed and went downstairs to the living room.

Wang Xiaopo knocked on the door and shouted: "Is anyone there?" "Is anyone there?" "How can you leave a dog unattended?" "Are you even human?"
Wang Xiaopo knocked on the door several times, but there was no response. He looked around and then walked away.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1860_2040.text: Man said: "It can increase your income, and might even make your place famous throughout the country."

Shui Xiu thought for a moment and said, 'Should we discuss this with the village head?'
Village Chief's Daughter said: "As for my father's stubbornness, you won't be able to convince him."

The villagers shouted loudly: "Tear it down, tear it down, tear it down, tear it down, tear it down, tear it down."

The villagers, carrying tools, rushed into the factory, and Wensheng's Wife, leading the women, walked in the middle, proudly holding up their tools. The men and women gathered together, ready to start working.
Man rushed over and said, 'What are you doing?'

Shui Xiu frowned and said: "Mei Feng, leading everyone here to smash the factory is risky. If there’re landslides ahead, won't more women become widows?"

Shui Xiu said: "Everyone knows that mining slate is the most dangerous. Our men are risking their lives to earn money. Our ancestors have always been poor, and now things are becoming more difficult. How can you talk about preserving the heritage of the village?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_3540_3720.text: Xu Tailang put his hand on Xu Zhengtai's shoulder and said: "I want to go find someone." "To have a word." "Promise me, you'll stay right here." "Don't go anywhere." "Okay, wait for me to come back."

On the way home, Xu Tailang was still drunk, leaning on the window and sleeping soundly. The two of them went to the rooftop to find a place to rest. Xu Zhengtai lit a cigarette and took a deep puff.

The night gradually enveloped the small town, and Xu Tailang sat alone by the gate of the old house, resting his arms on his legs, lost in thought. A mother and daughter passed by him, the mother hugged the daughter and walked forward, while Xu Tailang lowered his head, seemingly deep in thought.

Xu Tailang: "I really didn't expect him to be such a fool when he was young," "especially after you left."

Xiao Hua asked: "What about your father?"
Xu Tailang: "He was locked up for six years" "and came out when I was six years old" "turning from a headstrong youth" "into a particularly irascible middle-aged man."
Xiao Hua looked at Xu Tailang with a smile, recalling the conversation with Xu Zhengtai on the rooftop, "My father was a test pilot."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2040_2220.text: Shui Xiu continued, 'Our ancestors, for generations.' 'They relied on breaking stone slabs for a living.' 'It was something they had no choice but to do.' 'But now, we have a choice.' 'You have the ability to change all this, so why not do it?'

Shui Xiu said, "Stop calling me."

Village Chief said, 'I advise both of you.' 'Don't jump to conclusions.' 'Do you think engaging in tourism is that simple?' 'It requires a lot of money.' 'Moreover, in our poor village with broken houses, who would come to visit?' 'Even if you invest money, it will go to waste.' 'I think it's better to be more realistic.'

Old Qingshu’s Daughter said: 'Dad, nowadays tourism doesn't need much money at all.' 'We can just focus on the county town.' 'City people now prefer our natural scenery.' 'Just like how our villagers like the vibrant city outside.' 'You don't understand this kind of cultural taste.'

Shui Xiu said: "Alright, goodbye."

Shui Xiu said, "Okay, I'll give it a try."
The girl said, "Alright, thank you. No need to see me off, go back now."

movie101_7089369392055583246_2400_2580.text: Wang Xiaopo, who was lying on the bed, suddenly opened his eyes. He turned his head to look at Da Xu, then quickly lay down again and pulled the quilt over his head.

The camera then moves to the inside of a room, where Wang Xiaopo is lying on the bed, seemingly asleep. Da Xu shouted from a distance: 'Wang Xiaopo, Wang Xiaopo!' Hearing Da Xu's call, Wang Xiaopo immediately got off the tree, and Da Xu hurriedly ran over.
Da Xu, seeing no response, pushed the door open and called out, 'Wang Xiaopo, Xiaopo, are you in?'
At this moment, Wang Xiaopo was still sleeping soundly. Da Xu used a wooden stick to hook the door lock and then broke in.
Da Xu knocked on the door with a stick and said, 'Hurry, are you asleep? Get up to pee! Hurry up, can you hear me? Open the door.'
Da Xu said: 'Hurry up, hurry up! I’m slipped! I’m slipped! I’m slipped! Quickly, I got pinched and it hurts, quickly, quickly, hurry, hurry up.'

Da Xu, who was holding the door, was woken up by the sound of the door opening. He opened his eyes and saw Wang Xiaopo, and he immediately got up and said: "Hey, you're sleeping so heavily, I'm in pain from being pinched."

Wang Xiaopo said: "You go back, I want to sleep"
Wang Xiaopo turned around and went back to bed, Da Xu said: "Why do you want to hibernate? Get up"

movie101_6969128384144081416_3720_3900.text: Xiao Hua said: "When I was young, I rarely saw him. Later, he and my mother separated, but I still invited him to my wedding. He said, 'Just lift up my head and look at the sky the next day.'"

Tai Lang said: "Do you think," "The moment my mom jumped off the building," "She regretted it?"
Xiao Hua walked up to him, touching his face and said: "If your mom could see you now," "She would definitely regret it."

Zheng Tai said: "Can you promise me two things?"
Zheng Tai nodded and said: "Sure," "I promise you." Then, Zheng Tai took another sip.
Zheng Tai took a sip of alcohol and said: "Don't cause trouble for the next few months."
Zheng Tai said: "If others do not provoke me, I do not provoke them. If others provoke me..."

Tai Lang said: "And it's about your wedding with Xiao Hua" "Let me handle it."

Tai Lang stopped, turned around, and patted Zheng Tai's shoulder saying: "You promise me, if you have a child in the future, don't kick his face when you get angry."

movie101_7228950501038293560_2940_3120.text: Yu Cheng said: "My Shui Xiu is not like that at all."

Shui Xiu said: "Okay, those are your words, I will remember them." Mei Feng glared at Shui Xiu and turned to leave. Shui Xiu looked at Mei Feng's back, feeling a pang of regret, but also understood that this was a stubborn person who couldn't be persuaded by words.
The village chief announced the results of the vote: "Liu Yuhai 115 votes, Feng Laoqing 114 votes, Shui Xiu 114 votes, Fengshan River 53 votes."

"I just signed a very big order with Boss Wang from Shanghai." "They ordered a full 20,000 square meters of stone plates." "Just for this year, that order will keep us all busy."
Liu Yuhai laughed and said: "I, Liu Yuhai, have one principle." "Money isn't everything."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3300_3480.text: The workers were complaining about the rising cost of tickets, and at this moment, Reporter Chen was riding a bicycle past the construction site. The scene gradually fades to black.

The police car continued to drive and said: "Good, straighten up, straighten up, hey, more to the right, more to the right, good, this turn is good, to the left, to the left, to the left, to the left, to the left, hey, to the right, to the right, good, a bit slower, stop."
The man in the car said: "Slipping slope, slipping slope, hold it, hold it."
The man said: "Step on it, step on it, step on it."
The driver said: "Alright, I'll go down and push." The driver opened the car door and prepared to get out.

The man said: 'Wait for me, wait for me.'

The police chased and said: 'What armored vehicle?' 'Don't run, don't run,' 'What's there to run for, get down.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_4800_4980.text: Xu Zhengtai took the microphone and said: "Don't forget, don't forget, I am a person without skills, this whole family relies on you, all relies on you, all relies on you."
The scene shifts to an office, where a woman lies on the ground, and several people stand around. A man said: "We have to hide out in Hong Kong again."

Xu Zhengtai and Xiao Hua were the first to step onto the stage, with Xu Zhengtai pulling Xiao Hua's arm, they both smiled awkwardly at the crowd below, then Xu Zhengtai pulled Xiao Hua into a tight hug, and the bridesmaids below the stage were clapping and cheering.
Xu Zhengtai walked over, patting him on the back, trying to calm him down. Then he hugged the two of them together, sharing in their joy.

Liu Yi, who had been shot in the chest, was lying on the ground, his eyes dim and his mouth bloodied. He seemed to be in a trance, with a faint smile on his lips. The scene gradually faded, and Liu Yi was lying on a bed in a morgue, with Jia Yi standing beside him.

The scene shifts to a rainy night, with raindrops the size of beans falling from the sky. A drenched little dog sits in the middle of the road, lightning flashing and thunder rumbling in the sky, while Xu Tailang stands in front of a closed gate, holding a guitar.

The next day, Xu Zhengtai returned to his hometown. He parked his motorcycle outside a small restaurant, wiped the dust off the body, looked at the old-fashioned decor, then rode the motorcycle onto the road.

Huang Zhiqiang sat on the ground, surrounded by scattered books and tapes, with a motorcycle lying on its side nearby. He reminisced about the days when he used to run frantically, slam his fists into the sandbag, and cry until his eyes were red.

The two chased each other with sticks, running back and forth in the alley. After a few rounds, they were completely exhausted and stopped running. They stood face to face, panting heavily, and then Liu Yi turned and left.
Xiao Hua leaned on Huang Zhiqiang's back, looking at the night view, feeling very content.

The scene shifts, and the two brothers are walking on the railway tracks, with Liu Yi's arm around Xu Tailang's shoulder. The strong wind blows, and Xu Tailang looks back at Liu Yi, then they turn around and walk back.

The funeral scene was heartbreaking, and the after-story of the two also gradually unfolded. Xu Zhengtai, who had been busy for a while, was squatting by the door, burning the paper money from his father's will. He took out a stack of banknotes from his pocket, casually threw them on the ground, and then picked up a few more.

Xu Tailang walked over, squatted down to add some wood to the fire, stood up, and the two looked at each other for a moment. Then, Xu Tailang picked up a stone from the ground and threw it into the fire pit. The stone fell into the fire, instantly extinguishing the fire.
The scene shifts to the office, where the tables and chairs are overturned, and the floor is covered with scattered documents. Xu Zhengtai and Xu Tailang pushed the door open and walked in.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Liu Yuhai said: "Having no money is absolutely not an option. I only recognize one word, and that is money."

Liu Yuhai continued, "So, here and now, let me make a statement to everyone, I'm going to expand my slate factory to fatten the wallets of more of our fellow villagers. When that time comes, I will help everyone make more money and let our villagers live the life of the wealthy sooner rather than later."
Liu Yuhai's wife and Mei Feng in the audience looked at each other, while Liu Yuhai smiled and said, "My speech is over!" Then he sat down next to the village head.
The man in the yellow shirt said: "Please welcome Li Shuixiu to speak." Er Niuzi stood up and bowed to the villagers.

Li Shuixiu said: "Fellow villagers, I, Shuixiu, am not good at speaking. But today, I want to introduce a concept to everyone. That is soil and water conservation and environmental protection. Maybe you all, don't understand the concept I'm talking about, so let me put it another way. We live at the foot of the big mountains, relying on the mountains for our livelihood. It's natural, but if we use up the mountains, what will our descendants rely on? Quarrying slate is profitable, but we all understand its dangers. Moreover, quarrying slate also damages our ecological environment."
Mei Feng said: "What you're saying, we also can't understand, right? If we can't understand, then explain it clearly."

Li Shuixiu continued, "Then let's talk about tourism. As long as everyone trusts me, Shuixiu, I will lead everyone to vigorously develop our Yingtang's tourism, promote our village far and wide. As long as we can make tourism work, every family in our village could become wealthy."

The boss said, "Oh, women these days are too realistic. As long as you have this, they'll throw themselves into your arms." The boss gestured towards the television, then continued, "Hey, brother, are you still single now, got a target yet?"
The fat man said: "Did anything develop with the girl you filmed last time? You have to seize the moment and not let the duck that's in your hands fly away."
Wu Zhen said: "Alright, alright, you're right, I can't argue with you. Let's talk business, have you looked at the tourism planning proposal I gave you last time?"
The boss looked at him and said, "I've seen it, it's good."
The bald man said: "You want me to invest."
Wu Zhen said: "Nonsense, if I'm not asking you to invest, what am I asking for?" "Once this tourism project kicks off, a significant amount of funds needs to be invested. What do you think?"
The big brother said: "Buddy, let me tell you, I've always wanted to be a miser in my life, not spending a penny, but if you're asking me for a loan, I might consider it."

Officer Shen was stunned by Jiang Feng's words. He shook his head in despair and collapsed to the ground, while Jiang Feng also knelt down beside him. The two of them, having exhausted their arguments, were left in a state of utter exhaustion.

He looked at the gun in his hand, pulled the trigger, but the bullet only hit the ground near Shan Shan's head. Jiang Feng was heartbroken, he held the gun tightly, his breathing became rapid, his eyes filled with tears, and his lips trembled slightly.

The scene switched to the past, in a memory, Jiang Feng was in the electroshock room, and the person in front of him was Officer Shen. Jiang Feng asked, "Who is this person?" Officer Shen suddenly stood up, grabbed the taser from Jiang Feng's hand, and ran out of the room.
Officer Shen replied, "I went to see the memory master."

The two of them were fighting desperately, and the gunshot wound on Officer Shen's leg was getting worse and worse. In the end, the mouse was caught, and the police entered the warehouse and found the missing person list. The officer said: "Underage"
Officer Shen said seriously: "We can't let Li Hui Lan's incident happen again." "You stay with Dai Chen for a while and hide."

The scene suddenly flashed back to the night Officer Shen found the dead Dai Chen, the words 'take good care of yourself' written on the note in his hand, and the terrifying memory of hitting Dai Chen with a gourd repeatedly surfaced in his mind.
Officer Shen gently stroked Li Hui Lan's cheek with his thumb, tears streaming down his face. He knew he couldn't let go.

Wang Xiaopo pointed at Da Xu and said, 'So what?'

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Er Niuzi said: "I can no longer call you brother, I'll just call you Village Chief Liu."
Er Niuzi asked with a smile, "Brother Hai, what's wrong with you?"
Liu Yuhai replied: "Lost my voice during the village head election."

Er Niuzi said: "Hey, no matter what, brother," "Now I'm the biggest in the village, no, you're the biggest." "Shui Xiu is sidelined, she’s trying to do tourism, but does she know anything about tourism?" "Uh, if no one comes, what can she even do?"
Er Niuzi, with a sinister smile, squatted in front of Liu Yuhai and asked, 'Do you know what they're up to now?'
Er Niuzi, rubbing his hands, said: "Shui Xiu, Yao Yao, and that pretty-boy photographer," "They went to visit some tourist attraction."
Liu Yuhai, with wide eyes, said: "Visit?"
Er Niuzi said: "What visit? I think they're just out having fun." "I really don't understand what Feng Yucheng is thinking, how can he bear to watch his wife mess around with others every day?"
Er Niuzi, with hands behind his back, looked at Liu Yuhai and said, "That man of hers, he's just a worthless bum."
Liu Yuhai took the napkin and wiped his chin, then looked at the two people in front of him and said, "This is your tourism plan."
Shui Xiu said: "Liu Yuhai village head, the more detailed parts are later on, please take a look."
Liu Yuhai glanced at Yao Yao, then picked up the jar of pickles on the table and took a sip. After a sip, he put it down and said, "No need to look at it."
Liu Yuhai looked at the two of them and said: "Shui Xiu, I just want to ask you one thing." "Since you want to develop tourism, you need funds, right? Where are you going to get that money?"
Shui Xiu said: "Village head, we've calculated it." "Right now, to develop tourism, we don't need that much money." "As long as we can get the word out, the tourism will take off."

Liu Yuhai nodded and said, "I understand what you're saying. My principle is still the same: money. If you can make money, I'll support whatever you do. But, look at our village committee, we can't even squeeze out a penny."
Liu Yuhai looked at the two of them and said, "How about this, if you can get the money, you go ahead. If not, then let's drop the matter."
Liu Yuhai said, "Alright, as long as you agree, I'll find a way to get the money." After saying this, Liu Yuhai stood up and walked outside.
Liu Yuhai looked at the notice on the wall, pretending to be interested, and muttered to himself: "Money." "You're a bloodless knife."

movie101_6992521335159292452_5940_6120.text: Officer Shen, who had been unconscious for a while, was awakened by Jiang Feng shaking him. He opened his eyes and saw Jiang Feng, then he tried to get up. Jiang Feng quickly supported him, saying: "Don't move." "Stay still." "I'll help you."

Officer Shen, with all his might, managed to push the knife back onto Jiang Feng's neck. The two of them exerted their last bit of strength, struggling for dominance. The knife's blade was visible, pressing against Jiang Feng's neck, as Jiang Feng's hands slowly dropped.
Officer Shen stared at the ceiling, unable to calm down for a long time. The scene of trying to strangle him still vivid in his mind.

Officer Shen, with wide eyes, was extremely frightened. He struggled desperately, trying to grab the short knife from Jiang Feng's hand to cut off his own throat. Jiang Feng, with all his strength, firmly held onto the knife, preventing Officer Shen from touching it.
Jiang Feng, with sweat dripping down his face, struggled to open his eyes, looking disoriented. After a while, he suddenly heard a strange noise behind him.
Officer Shen's eyes were filled with terror. He recalled his childhood, running through the reeds with his mother. His mother said: "What's wrong? Take a look."
Zhang Daichen, while mending, looked at her and asked: "Why won't you divorce him?"
Shanshan Chen said: "You wouldn't understand."

Officer Shen said: "But I don't want to see him hit you again." After saying this, Officer Shen lowered his head and started to tidy up his clothes. Shan Shan looked at Officer Shen with a face full of resentment and hatred, but when Officer Shen turned to her, she immediately averted her gaze.
Shanshan Chen said: "At least I still have you."
Shanshan Chen, crying, said: "I wish he were dead."
Shan Shan Chen looked at her daughter with a firm gaze and said: "You must not say such things again." The little girl, with tears in her eyes, looked at her mother, then lowered her head and cried.
Officer Shen said: "I'm sorry." "I don't want to see him hitting you again." In the memory, Officer Shen's eyes were filled with tears.
Officer Shen, with a face twisted with fear, closed his eyes as the axe blade slowly moved towards his forehead. In that instant, time seemed to freeze.
The scene shifted, and the flashlight illuminated the cage. Shan Shan Chen said: "Dai Chen Jie. Dai Chen Jie, he's awake."
Officer Shen weakly said: "Xiao Feng... Xiao Feng..."
Jiang Feng, supporting himself on the ground, said: "Be careful" "Take it slow, take it slow." Jiang Feng, who had just struggled to get up, was now forced back down by Zhang Daichen.
Jiang Feng: "Shanshan Chen, you're okay." After saying this, Jiang Feng gently touched Shanshan Chen's face, and then the two embraced tightly, crying out loud.
Shanshan Chen and Zhang Daichen exchanged a glance and quickly turned to look at Jiang Feng. At that moment, Jiang Feng was standing at the door, drenched in the rain, with a blank stare inside.
Zhang Daichen replied: "Since I woke up, he has been standing outside all the time." The three of them looked towards the door, and Jiang Feng, who was already drenched, looked even worse.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Wu Zheng placed the item in his hand on the table and said: "Wu Zheng brother, what is this?"
Wu Zheng said: "This 100,000 yuan is for your travel expenses."
Shui Xiu looked at Yao Yao and said: "We, how can we use your money."
Wu Zheng said: "Shui Xiu, you see, I have used your portrait rights" "You did not charge me for using fee" "Gave me such a great help" "This can be considered as my gratitude."
Shui Xiu looked at the two of them, sighed, and said: "Okay, this money" "consider that we borrowed it" "when we have completed the tourism project" "we will pay you back"
Wu Zheng nodded and said: "Alright."
Liu Yuhai threw the wrapped item on the table, stood up, and said: 'Good job, Shui Xiu, you are talented.'
Yao Yao said: 'You said when you were running for the village chief that you would make everyone in the village rich.'
Liu Yuhai said: "Yes, I did say that. I want everyone to get rich quickly by carving stone slabs, by their own labor."
Shui Xiu said: "What about our tourism?"
Yao Yao said: 'I keep my word.'

Liu Yuhai said: "Since you have already got the funds, then just go ahead. I just want to see whether everyone is willing to make money by carving stone slabs or relying on your half-baked tourism for a living."

Shui Xiu said: "Today, I convened everyone because I have something to say. As the old saying goes, one depends on the hills when living in the hills and relies on the water when living near water. Our place here, with its beautiful mountains and clear waters, and so many ancient villages. Why can't we do easy and profitable tourism business. Today I, Shui Xiu, take the lead in opening up the Zhonghe Hall in the old residence for tourists to visit."

Shui Xiu said: "Everyone, you can participate in our tourism cooperation in the form of equity. Men can be guides and security guards, women can cook. Take out our knitted handicrafts to sell as artworks, sell all the walnuts, chestnuts, and persimmons, and we will all make money."
Shui Xiu: 'Fellow villagers, do you think it's good?'
The crowd responded: "Okay."
Er Niuzi said: "Shui Xiu sister-in-law, what's so good to see in our broken house? Don't lose so much at that time that we can't even wear pants, right?"

Shui Xiu said: "You, < Er Niuzi>, just rest assured, as long as you enter the valley, not only will you be able to wear suits and shoes, you will also be able to marry a college student from the city."
Er Niuzi said: "Really? Sister-in-law, you can't fool me."
Er Niuzi: "I'm not lying to you."
Er Niuzi said: "Then I'm in, I will buy shares."
Shui Xiu said: "Well, the method of equity participation is written in detail here. All of you should read it carefully. Yao Yao, you distribute it to everyone."

movie101_6969128384144081416_4980_5160.text: Xu Tailang and Zheng Tai ran out of the office, Xu Tailang said: "Zheng Tai, this one is faster."
Zheng Tai closed the car door and said: "Whatever, just give it to me, I'll drive."
Xu Tailang said: "Let me do it," "Your leg is broken."
Zheng Tai said: "Fine, you do it, I'll teach you some techniques on the side."
Xu Tailang smiled and got into the car.
Zheng Tai and Xu Tailang got into the car, Xu Tailang checked the car condition, and Zheng Tai fastened the seatbelt.
Xu Tailang looked up at Luo Li, then turned his head to signal Zheng Tai behind him. He reached out and took the USB drive from Luo Li's hand, then looked at Zheng Tai.
Zheng Tai said: "This is Huang Zhiqiang's current address. Hurry up, he'll go back to Hong Kong soon."
Zheng Tai looked at the photo, pursed his lips, and said: "Alright, I'll deal with this guy."
Luo Li said: "We're just small fry," "No need for big talk," "Just staying alive is enough."
Xu Tailang thanked him and rolled down the window. Luo Li looked at the window as it rolled down.
Luo Li watched as Zheng Tai drove away, standing still, lost in thought.
Zheng Tai was drifting in the factory with the drift car, the tires smoking as they rubbed against the ground.

The car sped through the factory, splashing dust on the road. It passed through a bridge over a small river and then turned into a narrow alley. The driver suddenly heard someone shouting: "Turn left—no, turn right!"

Zheng Tai drove the car onto the sidewalk, directly passing through the intersection where Xu Tailang and Luo Li were. Xu Tailang, in the passenger seat, asked in astonishment: "How did you just do that?"
Xu Tailang was driving and suddenly turned into a narrow alley, with clothes hanging outside the house on both sides. The car sped through the narrow path, and Xu Tailang suddenly braked.
The two sat in the car, silent for a long time. The boss at the barbershop was still reading the newspaper.

Xu Tailang and Zheng Tai got out of the car and walked towards the alley where Huang Zhiqiang was, while Huang Zhiqiang was observing the two of them. The three of them walked into the alley, and Xu Tailang and Zheng Tai stopped in their tracks as soon as they turned around.
Huang Zhiqiang was walking down the alley with his subordinates when he bumped into Zheng Tai and Xu Tailang coming towards him. After passing by, Zheng Tai said: "This never ends."

Zheng Tai and Xu Tailang walked into the corridor, and two men in black immediately rushed towards them. Zheng Tai threw a flying kick at one of them, and Xu Tailang also kicked down the other. The two men in black fell to the ground. Zheng Tai and Xu Tailang looked up and saw a man with an iron rod standing on the second-floor staircase. The two men in black had already run away.
The two turned around to see the commotion in the alley, and a group of people were beating and kicking, fighting fiercely.

movie101_6992521335159292452_6120_6300.text: Officer Shen slowly walked into the room, and Jiang Feng comforted the women, saying: "Don't be afraid". The cold moonlight shone on Officer Shen's face, revealing a look of madness and madness.
Officer Shen stood there in a daze, slowly raising his head to look forward.

Officer Shen continued: "Just by a whisker" "If he had fired the shot, it would have all been over" "Just by a whisker," "Actually, I don't want to drag you and the child into this" "I know how many medicines you took and injections you had in those years to conceive" "Now, finally" "We have been waiting for this moment".
Jiang Feng, holding a gun, said: "Shut your mouth."
Chen Shan Shan, in a panic, said: "Xiao Feng," "Xiao Feng," "Xiao Feng, are you alright?"
Chen Shan Shan: "Shan Shan" "Shan Shan" "Shan Shan"

Officer Shen: "According to my plan" "Chen Shan Shan would kill your wife" "you would grab my gun" "shoot Chen Shan Shan dead" "I would try to stop you and" "accidentally kill you" "You see this is the only way"
Jiang Feng cursed: "You monster." Then he stood up and rushed towards Officer Shen.
Dai Chen, with tears in her eyes, stood up and said: "Officer Shen, if you want to kill him, kill me first."
Officer Shen pointed the gun at the woman and said: "Move aside"
Chen Shan Shan, with a trembling voice, said: "If your head is filled with my husband's memories" "You will not pull the trigger"
Officer Shen's hand holding the gun trembled slightly. Then he slowly said: "Do you think I really don't dare to shoot?"
Officer Shen: "I've been waiting for you to come back."
Officer Shen recalled the beautiful woman who had been haunting his dreams for so many years, and the scene shifted back to the night of the incident.
Dai Chen continued: "If I had not married you back then" "what do you think I would be like now?"
Officer Shen: "Actually, I know how much you have sacrificed for me" "I did want children, too" "I was truly scared of you suffering again"
Officer Shen trembled as he held the gun, his lips trembling slightly, and he said: "Will you come with me"

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: A Villager asked: "Does tourism really make money? How much can it give us a year?"
Another Villager said: "Exactly, don't lose all the money we have made."

Yao Yao said: "Listen to me, everyone. It depends on the number of tourists and the size of everyone's income. As long as we have a Phoenix tree here, we are not afraid of not attracting this golden phoenix. What do you guys think?"
Er Niuzi said: "Shui Xiu, if we really lose, and I can't find a wife, I have to go with you."
Shui Xiu said: "Okay, I happen to lack a son."
Er Niuzi climbed halfway up the ladder, gripping the top of the plaque with both hands, and began to pull himself up. The onlookers below were very anxious, yet they also held back their laughter.
Wu Zheng and Er Niuzi climbed down the ladder, and the villagers waved goodbye to them.
Shui Xiu stood at the door and announced, "Today our Yingtan small chef's farmhouse restaurant officially opens. Welcome everyone to come and taste!"
Yao Yao and Er Niuzi brought the dishes out, and seeing Er Niuzi come out, the man with crutches stood up and greeted him.
In the kitchen, Yao Yao was helping Shui Xiu wash vegetables, Yao Yao said while working: "Shui Xiu, Wu Zheng is really good, you see tourists say they will come."
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng took beautiful pictures of Yingtan, these tourists want to see how beautiful Yingtan is based on his photos. He really helped our village a lot."
Yao Yao said: "No, Wu Zheng is really a good man."

Yao Yao was busy in the kitchen preparing dishes. The sound of clinking glasses and lively conversations filled the courtyard. Everyone was in high spirits, eagerly looking forward to the new year's eve banquet.
Shui Xiu said: "Everyone sit down and rest for a while, Feng Yucheng, come!"
Yao Yao sat down, handed out the surveys, and started asking questions to the villagers.
Yao Yao said: "One day, from catering and tourism, the net earnings are two thousand and eight." Everyone laughed.
Er Niuzi and others also learned about the plan to use the mountain to grow fruit and wanted to participate. They all said: "Shui Xiu Shui Xiu" "We also want to buy shares."
Er Niuzi said, "Not possible, not possible. When we asked you to invest, you didn't want to. Now you see that we are making money, you all want to. This is too opportunistic."
Mei Feng said: "Er Niuzi, don't be a toad yawning - it's not like you can bite. Do you hear me? Go away!"
Mei Feng said: "Shui Xiu, I'll listen to you!"
Shui Xiu said: "Mei Feng, as long as you all trust me Shui Xiu, I welcome you to join."
Mei Feng said: "We trust you, let's work sisters!" After saying this, Mei Feng turned around and left with the crowd. The next day, Yao Yao arrived at the construction site early.

movie101_6969128384144081416_5160_5340.text: The scene shifted to an alley, where a group of people were fighting fiercely, throwing punches and kicking, with shattered glass under their feet.
The two quickly picked up the scattered vegetables on the ground and threw them at the chasing men. Then they picked up large bags of goods nearby and continued to fend off the crowd with them.
Tai Lang said: "Go" and threw the bamboo basket in his hand.
The two immediately started fighting with the approaching men. Zheng Tai grabbed a stick and swung it at the people around him. Tai Lang also joined the fight, kicking one of the men in the chest.
After confirming that the person was indeed Zheng Tai, Tai Lang quickly ran out of the room, through the narrow alley, and arrived at the doorstep of Huang Zhiqiang's house.
The police kicked open the door to the stairwell, and the two men ran up the stairs, with the police closely pursuing them.
The two residents, angered by Tai Lang's words, picked up buckets of water to throw at him. One of them even grabbed a wooden stick and chased Tai Lang into the house.
Zheng Tai was kicked to the ground, and the three of them wrestled together.
Zheng Tai grabbed the thug's neck and threw him to the ground. The thugs were scared into screaming and ran out of the house. The police arrived shortly after.
Tai Lang swung the stick at Zheng Tai again, and the two wrestled together once more. During the scuffle, Zheng Tai was pinned down.
After confirming that the man was dead, Zheng Tai left the kitchen and went to the rooftop. He looked up at the sky, then at the rooftop door, and finally at the building across the way.
The two immediately started fighting with the minions, and Zheng Tai kicked one of them in the face. The minions, caught off guard, began to flee.

The police chased after them, and they ran towards the rooftop. The thug followed closely behind, and the two wrestled with each other. The thug pressed Tai Lang down, and they began to struggle. The thug lifted Tai Lang and threw him aside, and Tai Lang grabbed the thug's leg and bit down hard.

Tai Lang was forced to retreat to the stairwell entrance, but he was kicked to the ground by the thug, leaving him no choice but to retreat into the stairwell. He grabbed the edge of the stairwell and swung his legs up, kicking the thug in the chest.
He took a bottle of beer from the basket and walked inside. Tai Lang was still hanging from the eaves, motionless. Huang Zhiqiang looked down at him and slowly withdrew his hand.

Tai Lang lay on the rooftop, his right hand hanging outside the edge. He struggled to lift his body, his eyes red with anger. He wanted to grab the knife and chop down, but found it had fallen to the ground.

Huang Zhiqiang turned around, ready to throw the bottle, but Zheng Tai leapt up and grabbed his arm. Unexpectedly, Huang Zhiqiang used his momentum to throw Zheng Tai towards the railing. Zheng Tai grabbed Huang Zhiqiang's shoulder, but Huang Zhiqiang countered with a throw, sending Zheng Tai flying towards Tai Lang.

Tai Lang shouted: "Zheng Tai". He was hanging half of his body outside the railing, his legs dangling in the air. He struggled to lift his head and looked around. Huang Zhiqiang was lying on the ground, motionless, with blood gushing from his chest. There was a pool of blood not far from him. Tai Lang shouted: "Huang Zhiqiang".

movie101_7089369392055583246_3660_3840.text: Wang Xiaobo urged: "What the heck, hurry up, hurry up"
Wang Xiaobo said: "That won't do, it's stolen then."
Wang Xiaobo said: "How can you call it stealing?" "No, no, help me, help me."
