Wang Xiaobo was pulled back by Da Xu and shouted: "Run!"
Wang Xiaobo said in a panic: "Run!" "Run, which way do we run?" "There’s no time left!" Wang Xiaobo searched for a hiding place, but was still discovered by the other party.

The police car sped down the road, and Officer Zhang, after getting into the car, adjusted his hat and said: "Where did this armored vehicle come from?" "This kid is talking nonsense." "Let’s go, Officer Zhang."
Wang Xiaobo and Da Xu were hiding nearby, carefully observing the situation. After confirming that no one was around, they exchanged a glance and said, "Was that Zhang Li's father?"
Da Xu said: "We'd be done for if he caught us." "Keep going, keep going."
The phone rang, and Mrs. Zheng, who was dozing off on the sofa, groped around and answered the call. "Hello?"
Mrs. Zheng's smile gradually faded, and she said: "You don't follow the rules."
Mrs. Zheng said: "I, I, I, Da Xu, I've transferred the money, please give Sesame back to me, okay?"
Mrs. Zheng asked: "Did you call the police?"
Mrs. Zheng denied: "No, I definitely did not call them."
Mrs. Zheng said: "I saw it all, you even had someone lying in ambush there." "Tell them to leave at once."
Mrs. Zheng said: "Da Xu, I was wrong, I admit it, I was wrong, I was wrong, okay? I'm going to check now. I'll tell them to leave, okay?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "Hurry up, my patience is limited." After saying this, she hung up the phone and got up to leave.

The girls discussed: "Someone even posted a smartphone picture of the armored vehicle online." "I think it's not a military exercise," "It seems more like a stunt." "Exactly, it was rampaging on the streets. I heard there was a guy with a big beard giving orders on top." "That one didn't get sold off."

Zhang Li left the meeting room and walked down the hallway. She suddenly remembered something, turned back, and picked up a miniature garden model from the conference table. She looked at it for a long time, then turned and left.
Zhang Li took the model and looked at it admiringly, saying: "It's really beautiful, actually, it's a pity you didn't go to military school."
Wang Xiaobo said: "Let me tell you about this tank."

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: Jiang Feng said: "In other words," "if I want to have my memory erased again," "I would need to undergo another surgery within seventy-two hours."

The doctor said: "To be precise, it's within 72 hours starting from the first memory reload. And it's not about taking it out, it's about permanent deletion, currently, there is no technology capable of extracting memories twice. During this time, Mr. Jiang Feng, you may also want to think it over. If you really decide to undergo the surgery, please let us know in advance."
Jiang Feng said: "Then I'll make a reservation first."
Zhang Daichen, after thinking for a moment, said: "Can't we wait until all the memories are restored before we decide?"

He remembered the scene when he was diagnosed with leukemia, the doctor's words echoing in his ears. He recalled the scene when he was told that the only way to save himself was to find a bone marrow donor, and the only hope for him was to take the risk and gamble with the experimental drugs.
Jiang Feng leaned back in the chair, hands clasped, pondering something.

The scene shifts to a dilapidated house in the reeds, where a man and a woman are having a passionate moment. The man, who is now Jiang Feng, is sleeping in a chair. The scene shifts again, and at this moment, Hui Lan is at home, and Jiang Feng, who is now delivering a package, peeks through the curtain and says: "I was just about to order takeout."
The scene shifts to a memory, and Hui Lan said: "I brought you food," "medicine," "books," "and clothes for you to change into."
Hui Lan replied with a smile: "Thank you."
Jiang Feng said: "I saw her. She's doing well so don't worry."
The scene shifts to a moment when Hui Lan is playing the piano. A voice from the phone says: "Hello, Hui Lan."
Hui Lan said: "I just wanted to report that I'm safe."
Jiang Feng turned around, took a sip of water, and said, 'If you keep doing this,' 'does it make any sense to hide?'
Hui Lan was stunned. Jiang Feng turned around, holding a cigarette, staring at her. The two of them looked at each other in silence.
Hui Lan looked at Jiang Feng with a face full of grievance and resentment. After a while, she slowly lifted her head, took a deep breath, and then looked at Jiang Feng and said: 'You're right.'

Zhang Daichen took the initiative to walk into the room, Jiang Feng was holding a pile of books, Zhang Daichen said: "Thank you for taking care of me all this time," "but there are some things," "I must go back and clarify things with him."
Jiang Feng replied, 'Okay, I'll come with you.'
Jiang Feng said, "No need, I can handle it by myself."

Jiang Feng's smile gradually faded. He stood still, digesting this shocking news. He remembered the scene of Hui Lan's death, her hand weakly hanging by the bathtub, and the desperate struggle he had shown to save her. Jiang Feng locked the door with a padlock.

The scene shifts to the past, when Zhang Daichen was about to leave with a stack of books. Jiang Feng, who was carrying a bag of books, was about to step out of the house, but paused. He turned around and looked at Zhang Daichen, who was standing outside. Zhang Daichen didn't say anything, just silently looked at him.

movie101_6969128384144081416_5340_5520.text: Xu Zhengtai, lying on the ground, struggled to lift his head and saw Xu Tailang lying not far away. He painfully said: "I'm in so much pain," "I'm going to die."
Xu Zhengtai: "I won't die, but I'll be jailed for ten or eight years."
Xu Tailang turned his head and said, "Six years."
Xiao Hua opened the door and saw Xu Zhengtai, calling out: "Husband."
Xiao Hua rushed over and called out: "Wife..." "Wife..."
Xiao Hua: "A Lang" "What happened to you guys"

Xu Zhengtai: "I'm sorry" "Listen to me, wife" "I've prepared some things for the kid" "Put them in" "the box next to your bed" "Listen to me" "Those things will be worth a lot of money in the future" "I'm not a waste, am I?" "A Lang"
Xu Zhengtai: "After I go in, you have to take care of my wife and child. Forget it, don't worry about my wife. You act as the kid's father."
Xu Tailang: "No, I the hell can't do this."
Xiao Hua: "Stop talking", Xu Zhengtai looked up at the sky, two birds flew across it.

Xiao Hua looked at the surroundings. The flood had risen to the ankles, and an umbrella was floating on the water surface. The wind was blowing, and the trees by the river were making a rustling sound.
The scene shifts to a courtroom where the voiceover continues: "The court adjudicates," "The defendant Zhengta," "Convicted of intentional injury," "Imprisoned for six years."
Xu Zhengtai: 'Xu Zhengtai, cool,right' The scene shifts to the rooftop where the four of them took group photos.
The next day, the three of them went to the movies. After the movie, the three walked arm in arm down the street. Xu Zhengtai and Xiao Hua kissed on the street.

Xu Zhengtai: "In the future, we could become someone like Du Yuesheng", Xu Zhengtai smoked, recalling the past, in the end, he and Xiao Hua decided not to open the shop and instead went to the KTV. The next second, Xu Zhengtai hugged Xiao Hua tightly.

Xu Zhengtai: "It's normal to not be able to continue the business, don't be sad, I will support you." Xu Zhengtai hugged Xu Tailang tightly, while the girls watched the demolition of the Duotang Restaurant, unwilling to say goodbye to the place that housed their shared memories.
Xu Tailang paced back and forth in the corridor, unable to accept the fact that he had lost his lover. He sat down and stared at Xiao Hua on the bed, who had her eyes closed.

The baby in the next bed was crying. Xu Zhengtai raised his hand to comfort the baby, but his hand was already full of bruises. Xu Zhengtai's condition was extremely bad. He was lying in the hospital bed with his eyes half open, his face pale. His hand was full of bruises and bloodstains. He was looking at the baby in the next bed with a smile on his face.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Liu Yuhai followed Shan Tao to the construction site, seeing the neatly arranged marble slabs. Liu Yuhai asked Shan Tao: "Shan Tao, what's going on? Why are there so few people here?"
Shan Tao said: "I heard that everyone has been going for tourism with Shan Xiu recently." "The number of tourists here has been increasing."
Liu Yuhai said: "Tourism? Isn't this strange? I, in slab factory, can't compete with tourism?"

Shan Tao said: "Liu Yuhai, don't be disheartened." "I have a piece of good news here." "The boss from Guangzhou called me this morning and said that he wants to order thirty thousand square meters of slabs at once."

Liu Yuhai said: "Thirty thousand, plus the twenty thousand from the Shanghai boss, that's fifty thousand." "Oh no, it's over, it's over, with so few workers, it'll take me until the Year of the Monkey and Month of the Horse to finish."

Shan Tao, after pondering for a moment, said: "But that's true." "We have to guarantee the delivery time if we sign a contract with them." "Otherwise, they may claim damages." "Liu Yuhai, we have to think of a solution."
Liu Yuhai said: "Anyway, I cannot let others enjoy the benefits that should belong to me." "I will think of a solution."
Er Niuzi shouted: "Liu Yuhai, Shan Tao."
Shan Tao said: "I have something to do. I'll go over there first." Liu Yuhai watched Shan Tao's departing figure, while Er Niuzi approached with a flattering attitude.
Liu Yuhai said: "Er Niuzi, long time no see, you are radiant." "What have you been doing these days?" "Don't you know that my slab factory is open?"
Er Niuzi said: "I know, but I'm afraid to ruin it like Feng Yucheng."
Liu Yuhai said: "I'm running a slab factory, not a crematorium." "Are you afraid of dying?"
Er Niuzi quickly stepped forward and said: "Liu Yuhai brother, you you you, calm down, calm down" "I'm not afraid of death, I just think Shan Xiu's tourism business is very prosperous, really."

Liu Yuhai said: "Stop mentioning 'tourism' to me. I find that word annoying now." Liu Yuhai patted Er Niuzi's shoulder and said: "Oh boy, you are such a smart aleck, leaving my slab factory and running to Shan Xiu's to curry favor."
Liu Yuhai said: "Disloyal, whoever feeds you is your mother, right?"
Er Niuzi said: "Liu Yuhai, you underestimate me. I was a runner there, aiming to gather their information, didn't I come back to report to you?"
Er Niuzi said: "You see, Shan Xiu receives eight groups of people a day." "She makes money hand over fist." "Everybody sees that tourism really brings in money."

movie101_7089369392055583246_3840_4020.text: Zhang Li said, "Well, this one is the latest Russian-developed T95 tank. Its missile-firing cannon can effectively penetrate 1,200 millimeters of armor at a long range. It's also equipped with fully automatic sensors. Its maximum off-road speed is 85 kilometers per hour."
Zhang Li said, "Stop talking, I don't understand it anyway. Since you like tanks so much, let's plan to take our wedding photos on a tank in the future." The man laughed and looked at Zhang Li.
Zhong Qin, who had been waiting outside for a long time, saw Zhang Li coming out of the restaurant through binoculars. He quickly hid and observed Zhang Li's movements.
Zhong Qin, who was hiding not far away, saw this and hurriedly ran away, not bothering to hide anymore.

Zhong Qin, who had been hiding in the bushes, saw Wang Xiaobo sleeping soundly under the tree and leisurely walked over. He crouched beside Wang Xiaobo, looked around, then began to move the leaves above his head. With a gentle push, a large branch fell, but the leaves were still too heavy. Zhong Qin continued to move the leaves, but Wang Xiaobo, with a snore, turned over and woke up, scaring Zhong Qin away.
Mrs. Zheng: "Hey, wake up, wake up, hey, you've slept all night, alright." Wang Xiaobo groggily got up.
Mrs. Zheng: "Still looking at me, huh?" "That's right, that's it," "My Sesame at home smells just like this," "I'm telling you."
Wang Xiaobo said, "I just gave it to him." Mrs. Zheng said, "I'm not buying that. You two are always together, acting like siblings."

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Jiang Feng helped her adjust her necklace. Assistant looked up at Jiang Feng, then turned around and opened the door to leave.

Jiang Feng's eyes were filled with reluctance, as he watched Xiao Yun's silhouette gradually fade away. He turned his head helplessly, sat on the edge of the bathtub, staring blankly at the water in the tub.

The scene shifts to a dimly lit room, where Jiang Feng is lying in bed, unable to sleep, staring blankly at the ceiling. In the flashback, Doctor said: "Your hospital really must have messed up my memory"

Doctor said: "Mr. Jiang, we do have a confidentiality agreement signed," "we won't look into your memory content," "that is to say," "we are only responsible for the security of the memory chip," "not the content itself."
Jiang Feng said: "But the memory should be continuous, right?" "It can't just pop out of nowhere like this, can it?"
Doctor said: "Didn't I tell you it would take three days to fully recover? Maybe in a couple of days, you'll remember everything from start to finish."
Doctor said: "How about I go over it again with Mr. Jiang"
Doctor said: "If it's our problem, we will definitely take responsibility. But as of now, all your suspicions have no proof. They're all just your conjectures."
Jiang Feng said: "I've already checked the data," "this surgery has not been approved in many countries," "that means it definitely has flaws in certain areas."
Doctor put down his foot that was on the table, stood up and leaned towards Jiang Feng, saying, "Mr. Jiang, do you know how modern plastic surgery started?"

Doctor stood up and said: "Let me tell you, after World War I, many soldiers suffered facial injuries. At that time, the development of plastic surgery not only helped them reconstruct their faces but also rebuilt their self-confidence, allowing them to return to normal life better. Now, cosmetic surgery has evolved from negative rescue to positive improvement, everyone has the opportunity to become a better version of themselves."

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Feng Yucheng shouted: "Shui Xiu". He called out with a trembling voice, his body swaying on the crutches. movie101_6969128872847770149_1140_1320.text: The complex machinery in front of Jin Taonian started to operate, and the sound of the machine filled the entire room. Jin Taonian stared at the machine with a serious expression, but soon a smile appeared on his face.

Wang Xiaopo's apprentice said: "Master, the company wants us to quickly check the high-voltage line near Qingliang Men."
Wang Xiaopo said: "Not going, not going." "I'm not feeling well today."

Wang Xiaopo said: "Master, you should still come." "If not, per regulations, I have to go by myself." "I'm practically begging you; if there's any mishap with this task, I won’t be able to become a permanent employee next month."
Wang Xiaopo, while speaking, glanced at Mrs. Zheng beside him, then continued to ask: "Where are you at?"
Wang Xiaopo replied: "I'm right beneath the iron tower across from Wu Hua Tai Securities at Qingliang Men."
Wang Xiaopo said: "Wait for me."
Wang Xiaopo took out his mobile phone, and Mrs. Zheng quickly stepped forward and said: "Sir, my pet Sesame hasn't been seen for two days. Please help me."
Wang Xiaopo said: "Can you wait here for a bit? I'm really asking you."
Wang Xiaopo, who was nearby, saw this and hurriedly walked over, saying: "Master."
Wang Xiaopo got out of the car and said: "Ah, Master."
Wang Xiaopo turned around and said: "Why are you just standing there?"
The man asked: "Why aren't you wearing your uniform?"
Wang Xiaopo said: "Stop your nagging and get to work." The two of them then went back to their tasks.
Wang Xiaopo, while walking, said: "Come on, this one's no good, needs replacing."
Wang Xiaopo hands the insulator to the master and says, "Master, I didn’t bring a new one."
Wang Xiaopo said: "How can you be so dense? I just can never teach you."

Wang Xiaopo, who was repairing the cell phone tower, saw the dropped phone and threw it to the ground. The phone shattered into pieces. Wang Xiaopo shouted at the worker, "What are you looking at? Hurry back and get one!"
The worker said: "Master, take it easy, I'll be right back."
Wang Xiaopo said while working: "Today even drinking cold water gets stuck in my teeth."
Da Xu arrived at the village committee on his bicycle, but was stopped by a woman who said, "It's you, you, don't run, don't run."
Shen Yan said: "I'm asking you, did you tamper with our generator?" Da Xu replied: "What generator? Your generator has been burnt out long ago."
Shen Yan said: "Okay, let's forget about the generator then, but tell me, was that armored vehicle thing you’re doing?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_1380_1560.text: Young Policeman said: "He escaped?"
Xiao Xing said: "Yes, there's no time to talk about this right now, you need to investigate quickly!"
Young Policeman replied: "However, according to the on-site traffic police investigation, no clues were found."
Xiao Xing said: "Not finding clues is normal, it's raining so heavily today, someone has been hit."
Young Policeman said with a laugh: 'Didn't you say the driver claimed he hit a dog?'
Xiao Xing said: "But I clearly heard a woman's moaning"
Young Policeman, who was working on the computer, looked up at Xiao Xing, then lowered his head and said, "Around 7:00."
Xiao Xing replied: "Around 9:10."
Young Policeman asked in surprise, 'How do you know?'
Xiao Xing said: "Because I got in the car around 9." "Officer, you don't need to repeatedly verify this information because I can't see."
Young Policeman said with a smile: "I am Lava Monster, Lava"
Young Policeman stood up and said, 'Sorry, please hold on a moment.'
Xiao Xing looked at the screen, and the police were even more agitated, with one saying, "Look, look, look, find the guy, find the guy, find the guy"
Old Policeman said: "I'm just messing with you"

Old Policeman suddenly walked in, sat down and said: "Oh, who is this? Isn't it the famous Liu Chun?" "What are you doing here?" "Oh my, how did I meet you here?" "Chun, I didn't expect this, drinking 6 bottles of Erguotou in 7 minutes."

Old Policeman said: "Impressive," "The entire East City knows about this legend," "Amazing," "Drinking again," "Let me have a bit, okay?" Old Policeman took the bottle of liquor from Drunkard's hand and continued: "Take them away," "Sober up outside."
Old Policeman, holding a bottle of liquor, watched as Xiao Xing was taken away, then turned to leave, but after a few steps, he turned back.
Old Policeman took off Young Policeman's glasses and said, "Can you just throw away your broken glasses?"
Young Policeman put on the glasses and said: "This is fashion!"
Old Policeman said: "Fashion my foot! Come, come, come, give it to me." "Carefully go through the report on Zheng Huiying's missing case."
Old Policeman walked over to Young Policeman, patted his head, and sat down next to him.
The boss said: "Miss Lu Xiaoxing, right? I heard everything you said just now. Don't worry, you can go back now, it's getting late. If anything comes up, we'll contact you."
Xiao Xing said: "I'll leave this matter to you then."
Old Policeman glanced at Young Policeman, patted his shoulder, and said: "Miss Lu is not convenient right now, take her to the car."
Xiao Xing said, 'Okay,' and the young policeman hurriedly left.
Xiao Xing said: "Take care of yourself since your legs aren't good"
After speaking, the two turned and left, while Old Policeman watched their departing figures with a trace of envy.

Old Policeman, who had been leaning on the table, suddenly sat up straight, his hands constantly fiddling with something in his hands. The light in the room dimmed, and a beam of light from a flashlight shone in.

movie101_7228950501038293560_4920_5100.text: The villagers clapped and cheered: "Come, come, come."
Shui Xiu looked at everyone and said: "Please be quiet." "Next, please, let's have Minister Yang give a speech."

Minister Yang said: "Folks, today we have come to your Yingtan Village," "I'm very happy to see your village," "with its ancient charm, dignified and serious," "very generous," "it really has a taste of the elegant lady of a secluded residence." "It's really beautiful, an overwhelming beauty," "I think we should vigorously develop the tourism industry here." "From today onwards, if you have any difficulties, come to me." "Our superiors will strongly support everyone."

Shui Xiu said: 'Thank you, leaders, for your strong support of our Yingtan Village's tourism.' 'The elders and folks of Yingtan Village will also cooperate to the best of their ability' 'To make this tourism successful, and keep it going.' 'Now, please Minister Yang for the unveiling.'

The two of them unveiled the tombstone together, which attracted the attention of everyone. The stone inscription on it read: 'Commemorative plaque for the joint construction of ecological park by Chairman Wang Minjia and Secretary Shui Xiu'. After the ceremony, everyone gathered around the tombstone, and the village secretary announced: "Now, please join the leaders for a tour."

The villagers cheerfully welcome the arrival of the film crew, and the film crew is warmly welcomed by the villagers. The film crew members are busy setting up the film equipment, and the children are anxiously waiting for the film to begin.
Minister Yang asked: "Yao Yao, are there any difficulties with the tourism work now?"
Yao Yao said: "Yes, our village chief does not support us in developing tourism."
Minister Yang said: 'That, I will think of a way to coordinate for you.'
Yao Yao said: "Alright, thank you, Minister, please this way."
Shui Xiu: 'This is the East Gate, which has a history of several hundred years.' 'Everyone, walk up and take a look.'
The scene shifts to the village entrance, where Shui Xiu, Yao Yao, and Wu Zheng are walking down the steps. Wu Zheng looks at the two and says: "Yao Yao, Shui Xiu, you can go back now."
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng brother, from now on, consider Yingtan as your own home. If you have the time, come back for a visit."
Wu Zheng said: 'Okay, when I have time, I will definitely come to see you. Shui Xiu, take good care of Yu Cheng.'
Shui Xiu looked at Wu Zheng with a smile, and Wu Zheng also smiled back at her. Then, Shui Xiu said to her daughter: "I'm leaving."
Yao Yao waved and said: "Goodbye, Brother Wu."

Wu Zheng said: "Goodbye." After saying that, Wu Zheng turned around and got into the car, but halfway up the hill, he stopped and looked back at the two women standing on the steps. He seemed to hesitate, but ultimately didn't say anything.
Yao Yao waved goodbye to the Yang family couple.
Yu Cheng watched the departing figure of Wu Zheng, feeling a bit reluctant. Wu Zheng got back into the car, started the vehicle, and left the village.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1680_1860.text: Zhang Yijun, who had just escaped, was cornered against the wall. She raised her gun and fired wildly at the SWAT. One of the SWAT, hit in the chest, fell to the ground. The other two SWAT, seeing this, accelerated and crashed into the wall with their shields.

Fan Jiaming said: "Cover me at nine o'clock". Fan Jiaming and Zhang Yijun quickly ran to the car. Zhang Yijun held the gun with both hands, pressing the muzzle firmly against the enemy's head. Fan Jiaming crouched behind the car, covering Zhang Yijun's back. Zhang Yijun kept firing, but was eventually shot in the leg. Fan Jiaming quickly helped her retreat.
Zhang Yijun took out a grenade from her bag, threw it on the ground, and then more and more grenades were thrown out. Fan Jiaming shouted: "Grenade"
The bomb under Mai Jia Laoda's car exploded, and the flying Mai Jia Laoda was thrown onto the car roof. He then crashed heavily onto the glass of the opposite car.

Mai Jia Laoda was knocked down by a bullet. Zhang Yijun rushed over and pinned him down, while Cui Minho hid behind the car, watching the two of them. Mai Jia Laoda struggled to raise his gun to shoot, but his arm was pinned down by Zhang Yijun. Cui Minho took the opportunity to run away.

Zhang Yijun, who had just changed clothes, was searching for a place to hide. Mai Jia Laoda, who had taken shelter behind a car, was preparing to counterattack. The special police, who had just eliminated one of the snipers, noticed Mai Jia Laoda's position through the scope. Mai Jia Laoda, who had just changed magazines, was ready to get up and fight.

The car of Mai Jia Laoda suddenly started, it was about to run over the people on the elevator floor. The people on the elevator floor scattered in panic, and the car of Mai Jia Laoda drove towards the elevator. The car of Cui Minho was still chasing behind. The car of Mai Jia Laoda drove into the elevator.
The police quickly set up a spike strip. Fan Jiaming's car reached the downhill section, and the tire spikes deployed, puncturing the tires.

Mai Jia Laoda crashed into the police car, and the vehicle immediately overturned. Mai Jia Laoda, who was in the back seat, was knocked out by the impact. The police took Mai Jia Laoda away, and Jin Taonian, who was in the front passenger seat, was also taken away. Mai Jia Laoda cursed: "Go to hell"
The police car behind was blown up, and the SWAT officers were knocked down. Cui Minho shielded the female inspector behind him, while Park Yuzhe crouched down to check the injured Mai Jia Laoda.
Park Yuzhe took the sniper rifle from the hands of Cui Minho and loaded it into the car. The mercenaries were completely unaware and had no resistance.

Mai Jia Laoda, who had just gotten out of the car, was shot in the left shoulder by Cui Minho. Park Yuzhe, who was running behind him, shot him in the right shoulder as well. Park Yuzhe then crouched and fired several shots at his abdomen.
The car drove into the car wash, Jin Taonian hid behind the car and shot the driver in the head. The motorcycle gang was still shooting from behind. Jin Taonian said: "Let's go."

The mercenary driving the car was hit and fell out of the vehicle. His companions quickly took his place and continued the chase. A mercenary in the car shot Jin Taonian in the leg. Jin Taonian was hit and fell to the ground.
Fan Jiaming, who had just rushed out of the fire, was also hit by the drug dealer who had come out of the fire.
Fan Jiaming's helmet fell off, and the car continued to run over the body. Fan Jiaming yelled: "Stop!"

Fan Jiaming fired back at the enemies. The hit drug dealer was thrown out of the car, and the drug dealers kept coming. The rear of the car was hit, and the left rear wheel was blown up. Despite the car being damaged, Cui Minho drove away.

The driver was shot dead, and the car drifted out of the tunnel. Fan Jiaming's bodyguard, seeing this, raised his gun and fired wildly at the rear of the car. The hostages inside the car ducked their heads in fear. The driver's car flew out of the top of the building, crashing through a row of billboards.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Da Xu looked at the two of them and asked, "How did you guys find out?"
Reporter Chen said: "Dude, stop pretending, you're a celebrity on the internet now."
Reporter Chen, seeing this, asked: "Where's the armored vehicle?" "Let me take a look."
Da Xu said: "What armored vehicle? There's none. Don't bother me, I need to get tools to fix something. Move, move, move away."

Grandpa said: "This time, the decline in China's stock market is completely due to this, the country's subprime mortgage crisis." "You see how they borrowed money to spend here and now they can't settle their accounts, affecting our stock market."
A woman said: "I'm telling you, you old man, how can you have your feet in two boats?"
Grandpa: "I haven't, you're mistaken, you're mistaken. How could I do such a thing? No."
Auntie: "Are you being dishonest in your speech now?" After saying that, Auntie turned and left.
Grandpa: "Ma'am, how could you just say I have my feet in two boats?"
Auntie continued to shout: "Are you still not admitting it?"
Grandpa: "But you've never made your intentions clear to me, willing to be with me."
Auntie: "I'm saying, shouldn't you men always take the initiative a bit?"

Grandpa: "If you put it this way, I understand completely. I want to tell you that I, as a person, would never have my feet in two boats. If I ever have my feet in two boats, let me fall off this iron tower."
Grandpa looked at the distance and said: "What's the big deal?"
Da Xu arrived at Mrs. Zheng's house on his bicycle, dismounted, and seeing Mrs. Zheng tending to the plants, asked: "What are you up to?"
Da Xu ran over and asked, "What? What's going on?"
Da Xu pointed at the vegetable and said: "Do you even know what this is?" "Mucking around with it without a clue."
Mrs. Zheng said: "Messing around? Isn't it just a tank?"
Da Xu said: "Goodness, you even know it's a tank? Knowing it's a tank and still messing with it? I should take you to the military court straight away."
Mrs. Zheng said: "Military court? Do you think you're an uncle from the People's Liberation Army?"
Da Xu pointed at Mrs. Zheng and said: "I'm just joking with you." "What are you doing?"
Mrs. Zheng: "Hurry up, move this vehicle a bit. My stuff is trapped underneath."
Da Xu: "Huh? What stuff?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "If I can't get the thing out, my precious is gone. Do you get it?" "My sesame."
Da Xu asked: "What happened? Is your child in trouble?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "It's even more precious than a child to me."
Da Xu said: "Oh, is it your own child? In danger? Kidnapped? Call 110."
Mrs. Zheng said: "It's not a child. It's a puppy."
Da Xu pointed at the sign and said: "Kidnapping a dog is also illegal."
Mrs. Zheng: "Oh, hurry up and move the vehicle a bit, would you? You, you"
Da Xu: "Alright, alright, I'll move it right away." "Have you seen my friend? A guy."
Da Xu: "I saw him."
Da Xu asked: "Where is he?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "He left. He's even more annoying than you. I begged him for ages, and he wouldn't move the vehicle either."
Da Xu looked around and said: "He's gone off?"
Da Xu: "Just wait a moment. I'll call him."

Da Xu took out his phone from his pocket, but it was turned off. He quickly turned it back on and put it to his ear, only to hear a few rings before the call was silently hung up. Da Xu looked puzzled, glanced back at the group, and helplessly put the phone back in his pocket, saying: "What's with this lunatic, turning his phone off?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.text: Shui Xiu watched as her daughter got further and further away, her heart aching with pain. Meanwhile, Yao Yao, having fulfilled her wish, stood in place and waved enthusiastically.
Shui Xiu watched Feng Yucheng's departing car with a heavy heart, tears swirling in her eyes.

Feng Yucheng wrote in the diary: "During my time in Yingtan, I deeply appreciated the beautiful scenery of the mountains. At the same time, I experienced the simplicity of the people living here. I have left Yingtan. But I don't know why, a sense of nostalgia always lingers in my heart. I feel a deep, unbreakable connection with this place."
The next day, Shui Xiu accompanied Feng Yucheng to the village committee. Shui Xiu supported Feng Yucheng and said, 'Take your time, there's no rush.'
Feng Yucheng, with a cane, was walking slowly when Shui Xiu supported him from the side. Seeing his struggling state, Shui Xiu worriedly said: 'You need to eat more, you're too skinny.'
Suddenly, someone shouted: 'Something's wrong, something's wrong, there's been an accident. The quarry exploded, go check it out!' 'It's bad, the quarry exploded, hurry and see!'

The scene shifts to a meeting room where a leader is speaking: 'Liu Yuhai not only forged documents to illegally operate a quarry but also used explosive materials illegally, causing a fatal accident that led to more serious public incidents. Now, the offender Liu Yuhai has been criminally detained. At the same time, there will be a thorough safety inspection of all quarries in the county. Those with proper documentation will be strictly reviewed, and those without will be immediately shut down. Comrade Feng Lao Qing will temporarily serve as the director of the village committee in Yingtan Village. Shui Xiu will assist with the work, quickly calming the public and actively guiding them. Shui Xiu's case against Liu Yuhai will be concluded soon with compensation awarded.'

The scene shifts to the inside of the house, where Shui Xiu returns to find the table full of delicacies. She walks up to the table, her eyes wide with disbelief, her face filled with tears. She stares at the table, as if in a trance, and suddenly starts to cry softly. She slowly reaches out her hand, touching the table that holds the food and the wine, as if trying to confirm that everything before her is real.

Shui Xiu's eyes were filled with disbelief, her pupils dilating and contracting. She swallowed hard, her breathing becoming rapid. She tried hard to control her emotions, but tears continued to uncontrollably flow. At that moment, Feng Yucheng came in with two plates of food, looked at Shui Xiu in front of him, and said, "Don't move."
Shui Xiu looked at Feng Yucheng with a smile, Feng Yucheng looked back at her with a smile, their eyes met, and they smiled at each other.
Feng Yucheng said: 'This time, it's my turn to take care of you.'

movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.text: Xiao Xing, who had just regained consciousness, slowly opened her eyes and saw a familiar figure standing at the door.

Xiao Xing, who had been awakened by the sound, suddenly opened her eyes wide, but found that her hands and feet were tightly bound to the bed by iron chains. She struggled hard to free herself, but to no avail.
Tang Zheng said, "I'm sorry, I didn't mean to hit you. Actually, you could have been let go, but then I found the 'OnlyMeet' app on your phone. Do you think playing like this is thrilling?"
Xiao Xing said, "Please, let me go."
Xiao Xing looked at Tang Zheng and said, "You're the one who saved me."
Tang Zheng's expression was extremely perverted, and the bloodstains on Xiao Xing's body were quickly smeared all over Cong Cong (Animal)'s body.
Tang Zheng placed the blood-stained will on Cong Cong (Animal)'s body, and the scene shifted to the operating room where a doctor was performing surgery on Tang Zheng.
Tang Zheng looked at the sharpener in front of him, his eyes gradually moistening.
Tang Zheng turned his head and saw a photo of Xiao Xing on the big screen. He smiled at the photo.
The screen gradually fades to black, and the scene switches to the next day. At this moment, Tang Zheng is walking down the hallway with a limp.
Xiao Xing said, "Alright, I know I was wrong, I'm sorry, I won't leave you alone at home again." "Hey, Cong Cong."
Xiao Xing came out of the bathroom, and Cong Cong (Animal) was barking at the door. Xiao Xing walked to the intercom and pressed the answer button.
Xiao Xing opened the door and greeted Tang Zheng.

Lu Li said, "Are you an idiot?" Then continues, "Miss Xiao Xing, good day, following the clue you provided yesterday, we've investigated the accident site, and it turns out someone did go missing, a woman."
Lu Li looked at Cong Cong (Animal) and then at Tang Zheng, frowning and said: "Usually, we would ask..."
Xiao Xing continued, "Usually, you should be asking me if I saw clearly the car's make, license plate number, and the driver's age, physique, and such questions."
Lu Li nodded and said, "Yes, that's right."

Xiao Xing continued, "I can't describe the car's shape, the driver was over 1.8 meters tall, around 182 or 183 centimeters, as for the license plate number, I think even if you're not blind, it's very hard to see clearly and remember it in such heavy rain."
Lu Li nodded and said, "Yes."
Xiao Xing said, "You seem to not trust me very much."
Lu Li quickly denied, saying, "No, no, no, I just want to understand more."
Xiao Xing said, "Lu Li Officer, you're probably about 35 years old, 1.75 meters tall."

movie101_6969128872847770149_1860_2040.text: The car burst out, crashing into the signboard on the roadside, and the billboards hanging on the wall fell one by one.

Jin Taonian was the first to react, shooting the driver in the leg. Park Yuzhe immediately got up and shot at Jin Taonian, but Jin Taonian dodged the bullet by leaning to the side. He then stepped on the clutch and sped up, chasing after Park Yuzhe.

Jin Taonian shouted: "Be careful", Jin Taonian sped up and overtook the police car, weaving through the narrow alley. He sped through the streets and alleys of Hong Kong, with no intention of stopping. He was determined to catch up with Shen Meijing, no matter what the cost.

Jin Taonian sped up and overtook Park Yuzhe. Park Yuzhe was stunned for a moment, then quickly turned the handlebars and braked, stopping the motorcycle behind Jin Taonian's. Jin Taonian also braked, matching Park Yuzhe's speed, and waited for him to catch up.
Jin Taonian was still weaving through traffic, completely ignoring the rules on the road. The police chased after him, but Jin Taonian didn't panic and kept his cool, even performing a few drifts.
The police chased after him on motorcycles. Jin Taonian was fearless, swerving the bike left and right. The police kept up the pursuit, and the sound of the chase echoed through the street.
Jin Taonian was closely following Park Yuzhe on his motorcycle. Suddenly, a black car blocked their path.

The police car sped down the street, with Park Yuzhe closely following on the motorcycle. The street was crowded with cars, and the police car weaved through the traffic, narrowly avoiding collisions.

The motorcycle weaved through the streets, taking a sharp turn at the intersection. Jin Taonian braked at the last moment, stopping the motorcycle on the grass by the road, then dismounted and ran towards the other side of the road, quickly darting into the parking lot of the building opposite.

Jin Taonian was thrown off the motorcycle and rolled on the ground. Park Yuzhe arrived in time and stopped the motorcycle. Seeing Jin Taonian lying motionless on the ground, he immediately got off the bike and ran towards Jin Taonian.

The police car was parked in front of the gate, and the body of the other person was lying on the ground. Park Yuzhe slowly walked towards the body. He looked around, then turned his head to the other side. His expression was serious, and his eyes were filled with anger.
The person on the other end of the phone, Jin Taonian, was getting ready to leave. Park Yuzhe turned around, frowning, and said, "Where are you going?"
The voice on the phone said: "Director Cui, the weapon has fallen" "The bag is shot" "Yes, it was hit." Park Yuzhe frowned, rubbing his eyes.
Cui Minho and Shen Meijing got out of the car, Cui Minho opened the back door of the police car, and the two looked inside. The box containing the formula was slowly taken out.

Cui Minho and Park Yuzhe exchanged a glance and then looked towards the sandbag barrier in front of the police headquarters. The sandbags were densely packed, with a large gap in the middle, through which the helicopter could be seen.
The helicopter slowly descended, and the mercenaries on the ground were already in position.

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: The scene shifts, and Shui Xiu returns home. She walks into the house with a bowl in her hands, only to see Yu Cheng sitting on the sofa reading a book.
Shui Xiu came out with the medicine and said: "Yu Cheng, this is the prescription from Doctor Wang from Shitou Village. You should drink it."
Yu Cheng watched Shui Xiu's back and said: "Oh, it's been so long and there's still no improvement."
Yu Cheng said while eating: "Injuries take a hundred days to heal. You can't just expect them to get better right away."
Yu Cheng, sitting on the sofa, asked Shui Xiu who was folding clothes: "Did you go to see them again?"
Yu Cheng said while drinking: "Don't worry, I know what I'm doing." "We're not people who make false claims." "But if they don't admit their mistake, I won't let it go."
Yu Cheng sat on the sofa and said, 'You've been wronged.'
Shui Xiu smiled and said, "Who else but your wife could do this? You should just focus on getting better. I'll handle everything else."
Yu Cheng, while smoking, said: "It's not appropriate for a woman to be out in the open like this." Shui Xiu, who was tidying up the clothes, overheard this sentence.
Shui Xiu walked over with clothes and said, "Why isn't it appropriate? Winning a lawsuit depends on reason. Liu Yuhai has bullied us too much. I can't swallow this anger."

Yu Cheng looked at the empty room, feeling a sense of unease. He leaned on the crutches and slowly moved towards the table. Suddenly, he heard Shui Xiu's voice: "I'm just afraid you'll be overworked."

Yu Cheng, supporting himself on the crutches, sat down on the sofa and said, "The word 'people' has one mouth, 'official' has two. No matter how reasonable you are, we only have one mouth." "If it doesn't work, let's just endure it a bit longer."
Shui Xiu said while mending: "Yu Cheng, why are you so weak now?"
Yu Cheng said: "I'm already crippled like this, can I not be weak? You always wanted a child."
Yu Cheng said: 'In the future, I can't give you anything and will only drag you down. If it really doesn't work, let's get a divorce.'
Yu Cheng was silent for a while, then slowly stood up.
Shui Xiu, surprised, said: "Yu Cheng, why are you saying this? Didn't we agree to stay together for a lifetime?"
Shui Xiu said: "I will take care of you for a lifetime." Yu Cheng nodded in agreement. Shui Xiu continued: "Don't say such things in the future."
Shui Xiu, holding a basin of dirty clothes, followed behind. Seeing Shui Xiu, Shan Tao was a bit surprised. Shui Xiu looked at her, then at the basin in her hands, and slowly walked towards her.
Shan Tao said: "Take this." "Our man doesn't know how to talk, please don't take it to heart."
Shan Tao, holding the towel, said: "Use this money to buy something nourishing for Yu Cheng."
Shui Xiu: "Shan Tao."

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: The three of them put down their boxes and start to get to work. Cui Minho says: "Let's start." Cui Minho and Shen Meijing take out the electrostatic detector, while Park Yong-cheol takes out the seismograph.
Park Yong-cheol turned around and said to Cui Minho: 'The glasses are already connected to the NIS management officer's office,' 'We can start anytime.'
Cui Minho said: "November 6th, 6:10 AM Hong Kong time" "NIS Cui Minho" "Begin weapon program verification"
Cui Minho squatted down and said, "I'll use pliers to cut the wire." He then took the pliers and cut the wire. After the wire was cut, the radiation detection instrument showed no abnormality.

Cui Minho said: "The suspected portable weapon is placed inside a dark brown genuine leather briefcase." "We need to separate the briefcase from the weapon," "only then can we verify the authenticity of the weapon." After speaking, Cui Minho took out a small iron hammer and gently struck the top of the briefcase. The briefcase immediately split open.

Park Yong-cheol, who has already opened the zipper, is cutting the bag with a pair of pliers. He says to Cui Minho: 'You haven't been willing to assess its power because you've never seen this weapon.'
Li Yanming said: 'If something goes wrong with this weapon, simply put,' 'everything you see will disappear.' Zhao Zhiren looked out the window, and the pilot nodded in understanding.

Cui Minho said, 'This device's appearance is 90% similar to the DC8 prototype,' 'But it seems the suspected weapon hasn't been officially activated,' 'For safety considerations,' 'I suggest we connect with the suspected device to verify.'
Cui Minho looked up and said, "It's probably safe" "I don't think it's contaminated"
Shen Meijing suddenly asked: "Wait" "Apart from an official connection" "Is there any other way to verify the authenticity of the weapon?"
Li Yanming said: 'Cui Minho, your NIS and our communications,' 'never mentioned that the verification process would activate the weapon.'

Cui Minho said: "Li Yanming sir" "If this is a counterfeit" "Connecting won't cause harm" "Conversely" "If it's the lost portable weapon" "I can use the activation program" "to set the weapon to shutdown mode". Cui Minho said seriously: "In any case" "It's safer than doing nothing"

Li Yanming, who was originally looking down, suddenly raised his head to look out the window. Zhao Zhiren also followed his gaze. Li Yanming said: "Mr. Cui, I agree with the Korean side verifying the weapon" "The police escort convoy for the weapon is ready" "Once the procedure is finished, leave immediately"
Cui Minho took out a tablet and compared the data on it with the sealed bag. After inputting the data, the display showed a 3D structural model of the sealed bag.

Cui Minho said: 'Confirming the portable weapon DC8,' 'We are entering the weapon activation program.' After speaking, Cui Minho handed the tablet to Shen Meijing, who took it and shook it a few times.

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: The river was not wide, and the girls were washing their clothes while chatting. One girl said: "Wu Zheng, are you coming to play with us?" movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: The scene shifts to a small path in the park, where Lin Chunhu is walking and explaining to Old Secretary: "I, no, no, no, no, the turtle farming cooperative is just getting started, I have a lot of work to do."

Old Secretary said: 'This shows that you have earned a lot of respect from everyone. Over the past few years, your turtle farming has led everyone to prosperity, and your capability is evident to all. Everyone chose you, so if you don't become the secretary, should we let Zhang Dong take over?'

Lin Chunhu sighed in relief and said: 'That's a relief. But then, what is the real cause?'

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Liu Mengting, I'm really troubled by all this fuss. You see, on one hand there's you, and on the other my father. With you two at odds like this, how are we supposed to live in the future?"
Liu Mengting waved her hand and said: "You and your dad can live however you like. I don't want to marry you and be a pig farmer's wife."

Zhang Xiaobao shouted while chasing: "Liu Mengting", "Liu Mengting", Zhang Xiaobao was still chasing after Liu Mengting, the two of them were running towards the small bridge in the forest, and then the scene gradually faded away.
Zhang Xi walked and called out, 'Uncle Lin, is Uncle Lin home?'
Lin Genxing came out and said: "Oh, Zhang Xi, you're here, come on in, sit for a while."
Lin Genxing said: "Ah, my dad has gone to play chess with old Wang." "What's up, you got something you need from him?"
Zhang Xi said: "Nothing much. Your dad is an old party member of our village, isn't he? I just came to see him. And this is just a little token of appreciation from me."
Lin Genxing laughed and said: "Don't mention it, don't mention it."
Zhang Xi said: "It's not worth much. We have village elections coming up, and we know who's fit to be the village head, don't we?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_4020_4200.text: Li Yanming asked: "Where is Equator now?" Zhang Yijun immediately understood and took out a sniper rifle from her backpack, carefully loaded it, and aimed at the police downstairs.
The scene shifts to a restaurant, where Li Yanming and Sofi are sitting face to face. Li Yanming is pouring wine while Sofi is drinking vodka.

Sofia said: "Officer Li, I really don't know what you're talking about." Li Yanming reached out to grab the bottle of mineral water from Sofi's hand, but Sofi pulled it back, causing Li Yanming to retreat in frustration.

Li Yanming said: "To put it simply," "Since I entered this restaurant" "Everything here no longer belongs to you" "Including your life." Sofiagazed at Li Yanming, and Li Yanming continued: "What are we working so hard for?" "Isn't it just to make our family comfortable?"
Sofia said: "If you dare to touch my granddaughter," "I assure you that you won't die a good death."
Li Yanming: "Quietly come with me""I promise your family will be safe and sound."
Zhang Yijun: "They will escort Sofia back to Hong Kong." "Once she's in the car," "any mishaps in future underground trades will fall on her."
Jin Taonian: "She won't rat us out."
Zhang Yijun: "That's the rule. Whether we believe it or not, others will. If she's willing to go with Li Yanming, she's given up her own life."
Jin Taonian aimed the sniper rifle at the woman's head, and the woman looked at him calmly. The sight of the gun was still on the woman's head, and the people around were getting closer.

Jin Taonian slowly raised his sniper rifle, the muzzle slightly shaking. He aimed at the forehead of the middle-aged woman, Sofi, who had just come to visit him. Jin Taonian pressed the trigger, and Sofi's eyes trembled slightly.
At this moment, Jin Taonian was aiming at Li Yanming with a sniper rifle. The police surrounded the building, and the standoff between the police and the robbers continued.

Jin Taonian slowly raised his gun, aimed at the target, and squeezed the trigger. Li Yanming, who was walking in front of his mother, suddenly stopped, turned his head, and saw his mother smiling at him. He was stunned for a moment, then turned back to look at his mother.

At this moment, Jin Taonian was hiding in the dark, watching the situation on the street. When Li Yanming turned around, Jin Taonian shot him in the left shoulder. Sofiawas about to rush over but was pulled back by another subordinate. Jin Taonian shot Li Yanming in the right shoulder. Li Yanming fell into the nearby bushes.

The scene shifts to a memory, in which Li Yanming is sitting on the ground, looking at a pair of headphones hanging on a balcony. He then stands up and runs towards the direction of the sound, with the police chasing after him.
Li Yanming ran into a narrow alley, with Jin Taonian closely following in the car. The car suddenly stopped, and Li Yanming ran into a dead end, realizing he was surrounded.
Li Yanming ran into the candy store, and the door closed behind him. Jin Taonian furiously drove the car, suddenly stopped, got out, and walked towards the candy store.

movie101_7010686199291445773_3180_3360.text: Xiao Xing said, "I am so ridiculous, a blind person like me trying to be a witness, what can I do in this state."

The police said, "Xiao Xing, the owner of the phone number you gave us before is named Yu Lu, a 25-year-old girl. We received a report that she disappeared. This must be related to the recent series of disappearances. If it weren't for your timely report, providing such important clues, how could I have linked it together?"
Xiao Xing said, "Lu Li Officer, I better not cause you any more trouble, you investigate it yourself."
Lu Li sighed and said, "Xiao Xing, do you know why blind people light a lamp when walking at night?" "Because when the light is on, others won't bump into them."
Xiao Xing paused for a moment and then said, "Please give me a ride home one last time," "For someone like me," "Hailing a cab is harder than climbing to heaven,"
Lu Li's eyes were filled with tears, and he nodded silently.
The scene shifts to Xiao Xing, who is in the bathroom, turning on the light, preparing to take a bath.
Xiao Xing closed her eyes, and the scene from that night became clear in her mind. Lin Cong said, "That's right, I didn't see clearly, but I'm sure I saw him hit someone."
Liang Cong said, "What's wrong with skipping class, I just came here to rehearse, I didn't do anything else, I took the money from home because we needed to add equipment."
Lin Cong said, "I wanted to win that prize to buy a new pair of roller skates, but I absolutely did not lie."
Liang Cong shouted, "Stop bossing me around, you're not my real sister," "You never were,"

In the bathroom, Xiao Xing was taking a shower. The water was hot and steamy. She closed her eyes and slowly raised her hands to wash her face. The scars on her legs were clearly visible. She covered her face with her hands and wept silently.
At this moment, Xiao Xing was soaking in the bathtub, and Tang Zheng's phone rang.
Xiao Xing, in a bathrobe, answered the call. On the other end, Tang Zheng said, "Hello" "Say something."
Xiao Xing, combing her hair, said, "I know who you are, say something, if you have the guts, don't hide."

Xiao Xing continued, "That boy," "Reminds you of Liang Cong right?" "The night of February 16th, three years ago," "Intern officer Lu Xiao Xing," "Went to the Eighth Day Club," "To find her brother," "Even though he wasn't your real brother, you were so good to him," "So you had no choice but to tie him up,"
Xiao Xing said, "Stop talking, shut up."
Xiao Xing said, "Liang Cong deserved to die," "because he didn't know what love is."

movie101_7089369392055583246_960_1140.text: Wang Xiaopo said: "Good job, you got the scrap car so quickly?"
Wang Xiaopo lifted the tarpaulin and said: "Are you kidding me, is there anything in Nanjing my friends can't handle for me? How is it?"
Wang Xiaopo said: "Don't tell me, this is the car from my company."
Da Xu said: "Your junk car is only worth ten thousand at most" "Making money is now the most important"
Da Xu pushed Wang Xiaopo and said: "Are you crazy? You're aiming at me now."
Da Xu said: "Even this condition is not acceptable. The generator is broken, I need to replace it."
Wang Xiaopo scratched his head and said: "I lost to you, damn it."
Da Xu said: "What's with the attitude, I think it's pretty good."
The two were designing the blueprint of the new car, and then they started to manufacture according to the blueprint. They ground, welded, and unscrewed the screws.
The two of them were discussing the blueprint of the car. Wang Xiaopo was wearing sunglasses, holding a drill in his hand, constantly adjusting the angle, looking very fierce.
The brothers in the garage were welding, and Da Xu and Zhang Li were still on the street looking for the car.

The camera switches to Zhang Li's room, Zhang Li is in high spirits, whistling as she admires herself in the mirror. Mother Zhang walked in with a thick stack of banknotes, and upon seeing Zhang Li, began to brag.
Mother Zhang said: "Zhang Li, take a look." Zhang Li rolled over on the bed, Mother Zhang continued: "Zhang Li, oh dear, be a good girl, listen up."
Zhang Li struggled and said: "Mom, what are you doing?"
Mother Zhang said: "Would you take a look, get up, come on, take a look."
Zhang Li took the money and said: "Mom, are you involved in pyramid scheme? You would be happy if you sold me out, right?"

Mother Zhang looked at the photo and said: "What are you talking about?" "Really, look at this, these conditions are all very good. They all have houses and cars." "That is way better than your electrician." "Hey, alright, alright, Zhang Li, be a good girl, listen to mom." "You go and meet them, you won't be at a loss anyway, right?"
Zhang Li said: "Mom, if it's not a loss, you go."
Mother Zhang said: "What kind of talk is this, how did you become like this?" Zhang Li stormed out of the room, leaving Mother Zhang alone, cursing under their breath.
Da Xu said: "Wang Xiaopo, it's your phone." Wang Xiaopo said: "Bring it to me."

Wang Xiaopo was tightening screws under the car, and suddenly his phone rang. He took it out to check, only to see that it was a call from Zhang Li. Wang Xiaopo quickly said: "Zhang Li, Zhang Li". Before he could finish, Da Xu snatched the phone away.
Wang Xiaopo said: "Oh my, do you think I'm playing? I'm exhausted. And then you nag at me?"

Wang Xiaopo said: "I'm also helping build our new house." Da Xu turned around to repair the car. Wang Xiaopo continued: "Ah, don't scare me, I am scared easily." Suddenly, the phone rang again. Wang Xiaopo frowned, glanced at the caller ID, and answered the call.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4200_4380.text: Zhang Yijun looked around for a way out, and saw a rolling shutter door. She hurriedly ran over, but it was locked from the inside. Li Yanming and Jin Taonian were closing in, so she ran to the next shop. The pursuers followed closely, and Zhang Yijun had no choice but to run back the way she came.

Zhang Yijun, with tears in her eyes, stabbed at the person in front of her with a dagger. The latter fell to the ground. Zhang Yijun then ran to the front of a taxi, jumped onto the hood, and lay down.

Zhang Yijun was hit by a car and fell to the ground. The informant Li Yanming and Jin Taonian rushed to check the situation. Seeing Zhang Yijun was still alive, they quickly crawled towards the car. Li Yanming was about to reach the car when he was hit by another car.

Li Yanming and Jin Taonian were running desperately on the street. They turned a corner and saw a car parked in a narrow alley. Li Yanming didn't care about the car blocking the way, so he ran straight into it. Jin Taonian quickly caught up, and the two of them ran through the narrow alley.

Zhang Yijun was still in pain from the impact. She grabbed Li Yanming's hand, trying to break free, but was thrown to the fence of the pedestrian bridge. Li Yanming got up and stepped on the car, trying to control the direction of Zhang Yijun's fall.

Zhang Yijun and Jin Taonian were knocked to the ground. They quickly got up and ran towards a car. Zhang Yijun was about to open the car door when Jin Taonian pulled her back. Zhang Yijun shook off Jin Taonian and ran forward again.

Zhang Yijun, who was locked in the cage, tried to break free by biting the netting. Jin Taonian opened the cage and pulled her out. Zhang Yijun bit the netting and tried to escape, but Jin Taonian grabbed her and threw her against the car. Jin Taonian, who was kicked to the ground, tried to get up but was kicked in the head by Zhang Yijun.

Li Yanming was pinned down by Zhang Yijun, unable to move. He quickly adjusted his position and grabbed Zhang Yijun's waist, flipping them both to the ground. Zhang Yijun used her legs to lock Li Yanming's neck, while Li Yanming used his arms to hold her ankles, struggling fiercely.

Zhang Yijun and Li Yanming were wrestling on the ground, Zhang Yijun was holding Li Yanming's waist, and Li Yanming was trying to flip over, trying to gain control. But Zhang Yijun was stronger and pinned him under her.

Zhang Yijun was pinned down by Jin Taonian, unable to move. She struggled desperately, trying to break free from his grip. But Jin Taonian was stronger and pinned her down again. Zhang Yijun kicked at his face, but he quickly grabbed her ankle. Zhang Yijun tried to stand up, but Jin Taonian pulled her back down.

Zhang Yijun was pressing down on Li Yanming, using her knee to hold down his arms. Li Yanming struggled painfully, trying to break free. At this moment, the police arrived just in time to stop the fight and apprehend the two suspects.
Li Yanming struggled to get up, and the police immediately aimed their guns at him. He shouted: "Officer Li, keep calm." But the long-haired Zhang Yijun was captured by the police.
Li Yanming was shoved by the police, and the leading policeman said: "Take her back." Li Yanming was then taken away.

At this time, a black Toyota car slowly drove into the parking lot. Jin Taonian, who was hiding in the car, watched everything happening in the parking lot. The police escorted the hostages out of the building, and the hostages looked at Jin Taonian in the car.

Jin Taonian watched as Zhang Yijun got into the car, the bodyguards closed the car door, Zhang Yijun sat in the car and stared at Jin Taonian, Jin Taonian stared back at her, the car window was slowly rolled up, and Jin Taonian was driven away.
The scene shifts to a bustling night market. Cui Minho is eating hot pot at a stall.
Cui Minho said: "Shen Meijing," "since we left the temple," "you've been telling us to turn off our phones."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Zhang Xi said: "We know what's going on, right?"
Lin Genxing said with a smile: "We got it."
Zhang Xi said, "Alright, I have some business to attend to, so I'll leave now." After saying that, Zhang Xi left, and Lin Genxing stood up to see him off.
Lin Genxing took out a can of wine from the gift box, Father of Genxing grabbed the can and said, "Return this item to the sender."
Lin Genxing said, "This isn't very appropriate. How can we return it after we've opened it?"

Father of Genxing said, "Lin Genxing, you really are a fool. How dare you accept something from their family? Accepting their gift means you owe them a vote. Do you even know what kind of people their family are? As for Zhang Dong, who's the village chief now, since he took office, has he ever done anything for the village? I'm telling you, son, I've lived a long life and I know better. If you want a better future for the village, we need a good leader. I think Chun Hu is a good choice. In tomorrow's election, I'm definitely voting for him."

Lin Genxing said, "You want to vote for him, that’s up to you. Anyway, no one knows who you vote for. Besides, we’ve already accepted the gift. Refusing it would offend them, so we might as well take it."
Father of Genxing said: "Buy an identical one and give it back to them."
He opened the door and walked out, looked at the 50 yuan in his hand, sighed, and said to himself: "Only a fool would return it." Then he walked away without looking back.
The wife was sweeping the yard when she saw her husband coming back with gifts. She said: "Wow, hubby, you’ve done well today. Let me see what you got."
The man replied: "Of course, the village chief is generous, isn’t he?"
The woman said, "So, according to you, the village chief might be re-elected in this term."
The man pointed at the woman and said, "Not necessarily."

The man continued, "Think about it, we accepted the gift." "But in the end, who gets our vote is up to us." "It’s a secret ballot; only we know who we voted for." "I think Zhang Dong might end up with nothing."
The woman asked, "Then who do you think in our village will get elected? Who are you planning to vote for, hubby?"
Zhang Xi said: "I'll vote, but I won't tell you." After saying that, Zhang Xi left with the fat man.

Zhang Baoliang brought out the dishes and said: "Son, come quickly, it's time to eat! Today, we have pork trotters, pork stomach, pork ears, and pork intestines—all your favorites! Just smelling and looking at it makes your mouth water. Come quickly!"

movie101_7010686199291445773_3360_3540.text: Xiao Xing said, "Stop, stop, stop!"
Xiao Xing said, "But it's worth him dying this way," "because he died in the arms of his sister."
Xiao Xing said angrily, "Shut up."
Xiao Xing said into the phone, "You read my diary"
Lu Li, who was reading Braille, said, "It's easy to buy a Braille reader."
Jingkuang: "To be honest," "I really like your diary."
Xiao Xing asked, 'What do you want to get from me'
Xiao Xing said, "Wait a little longer, you will understand me more."
Xiao Xing angrily said, "What exactly do you want", then Xiao Xing hung up the phone. The call was transferred to Jingkuang's phone, which was playing a voicemail.

Lu Li looked around the entrance for a while and said, "Yulu disappeared here before she disappeared," "The camera also captured her getting into the Golf 6," "I've checked the license plate," "It's fake."
Lu Li took a drag of his cigarette and said, "He hit Zheng Huiying," "Ding Peipei's car is also a Golf," "The license plate is also fake."
Xiao Xing picked up the dog leash from the table and called out, 'Cong Cong.'
Cong Cong immediately stopped barking and lay down at Xiao Xing's feet.
Xiao Xing crouched down and called out, 'Cong Cong.'
The next day, Lu Li packed his bags and prepared to return to the hospital. He said, 'There won't be many days before the competition, I have to hurry up and practice.'
Jingkuang sat and said, "Then what if I get injured again"
Lin Chong said, 'Brother is an indestructible body, don't worry, give me the power bank.'

The scene shifts to Lin Chong who received a message from Xiao Xing. He unlocked his phone and opened the chat page, filled with messages from Xiao Xing. Lin Chong read, 'I really can't give up Cong Cong.'
Xiao Xing came out of the ward and saw Lin Chong packing. Xiao Xing asked, 'Lin Chong, where are you'
Lin Chong looked back and said, 'She's looking for you.'
Xiao Xing said, 'Lin Chong.'
Xiao Xing walked in and shouted, "Lin Chong!"
Xiao Xing: "Hey, he's here."
Xiao Xing pulled Lin Chong and asked, "Where is he?"
Xiao Xing pushed Lin Chong away, saying: "Get out of the way"
Xiao Xing said: "Lin Chong, listen to me first"
Lin Chong grabbed Xiao Xing's hand and said, "What on earth do you want"
Xiao Xing grabbed Lin Chong and said, "Can you wait for Lu Li to come before leaving?"
Lin Chong questioned, "Why should I wait for him"
Xiao Xing said, "That offending driver has already targeted you. It's very likely that he was the one who hit you. Can you listen to me?"
Lin Chong: "Why should I believe you?" "You should take care of yourself first." "And," "I don't have a sister like you."
Lin Chong said, 'Let go.' Xiao Xing tugged at the backpack strap, trying to take the bag away.

Xiao Xing was still at the hospital entrance, anxiously waiting for Lin Chong to come out. She was holding Cong Cong's harness with one hand and pointing to the right with the other. Cong Cong was obediently standing beside her.
The scene shifts to a bus stop at night. A few people are waiting. One of them said, "Didn't get the bonus, almost lost your life, you might as well find a job on 58 like us."
At this moment, a few men approached and said, "Hey, isn't that the woman from just now?"
The bus arrived at the stop. Cong Cong ran up to greet it. Lin Chong sat down on the bench, looking listless, and pondered for a long time before making a decision.

The bus stopped at the station, and Lin Chong got on. The bus driver scanned the passengers, and Lin Chong looked around. Suddenly, a figure flashed by, and Lin Chong quickly stood up to look out the window. A familiar figure appeared in the aisle, and Lin Chong hurriedly ran over.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: Yuan Xiaoou, who had been waiting for a long time, finally saw Qi Jia. He quickly turned around and hid back behind the bookshelf, his body barely moving as he watched Qi Jia leave the reading room.

The scene shifts to the second timeline, where Liu Chong is cleaning the library, and the books on the shelves are neatly arranged. Liu Chong brings a kitten to the second timeline's He Jie, who is reading a book. He Jie plays with the kitten while reading.
Yuan Xiaoou, hiding behind the bookshelf, watched the two leave, then looked up at the familiar cover of the book, feeling a mix of emotions.
The next day, Yuan Xiaoou was reading a book by the window when Qi Jia suddenly opened their eyes. Qi Jia said, 'You’re awake.'
Yuan Xiaoou struggled to stand up and said, "You've been crying."
Yuan Xiaoou rubbed his eyes and said, "Ah, no," "You must be thirsty," "Let me get you some water."
Yuan Xiaoou, who was tidying up the books on the shelf, went out without looking back. Qi Jia, who was behind him, leaned against the wall, sighed, and then turned to leave.
Yuan Xiaoou asked, 'What's wrong?' 'Stomach ache?' 'Here, take this,' 'I’ll get you some medicine.'
Qi Jia quickly refused: "No need, no need, it will pass after a while." Qi Jia took the cup of water from Yuan Xiao and walked to the side to drink it.
Qi Jia, with a smile, put down the chopsticks, walked towards the bedroom, and asked Yuan Xiaoou as she walked, 'What did you dream about?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I" "Dreamed about the silly things I did on graduation day."
Qi Jia said: "What you did can hardly be called silly." "What I did was truly foolish."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Well, it's all in the past now. Let's look forward. Alright?"
Qi Jia said: “I can’t forget it. As soon as I sober up, it all comes rushing back. Didn’t someone say that unconditional love is the most powerful voice in this world?”

Yuan Xiaoou said: "You must have seen that on social media." "What is unconditional love?" "That’s just a weak awareness of security leading to high bad assets." "Balanced give and take, that’s love." "You gave too much, do you understand?"
Qi Jia said: 'There’s such a thing as giving too much love? I just want simple happiness, but why?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Who doesn’t want that? It’s just that you chose the wrong person."
Qi Jia, with tears in her eyes, looked at Yuan Xiaoou, then lowered her head and said, “I should have left with him earlier.”

Qi Jia pushed Yuan Xiaoou away and walked to the dining table to sit down. Yuan Xiaoou followed and said: 'You two are like two ships sailing in opposite directions, yet you insist on tying them together. That only leads to going in circles.'
Qi Jia put down the bag and said: "I'm willing. I'm willing to go wherever he goes."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "You don't mind eating a hundred beans for the stench, do you? You’re already perimenopausal and still haven’t let this go."
Qi Jia, with a cold and angry voice, said: 'Get out, and close the door on your way out.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.text: Cui Minho said, "Park Yuzhe, if we wait any longer, we won't make it."
Park Yuzhe turned his head and looked at Cui Minho with a smile, "Give him five more minutes."

Cui Minho, holding a glass of wine, walked briskly towards the banquet hall. He bypassed the seated guests and headed straight for the bride, who was having her makeup done. He took the bride's hand and led her to a seat.
Cui Minho approached and said, "It's time. Can we start the banquet?"
Grandmother said, "We can start now."
Grandmother asked, "Where did Daddy go?"
The mother hurriedly took Ming Jian back to her side. Cui Minho stood aside, looking at his phone, while Yun Hee-sun was also busy with her phone. Only Ming Jian was left alone in the room.
Yun Hee-sun: "Husband, it's starting, go in quickly."
Cui Minho said, "Let's go, let's go."

The guests below the stage were also very excited, applauding and expressing their joy. Yun Hee-sun and Cui Minho were also very happy, smiling at everyone. Then, Cui Minho handed Ming Jian to Yun Hee-sun.

The guests applauded warmly, and Cui Minho and Yun Hee-sun happily took Ming Jian down from the stage. The four young assistants followed closely behind, their steps exuding an indescribable elegance.
At this moment, two bodyguards escorted Park Yuzhe to the stage. Cui Minho was holding Ming Jian, and Grandmother took the child from his arms. Park Yuzhe called out: "Team Leader."
Cui Minho turned to Park Yuzhe and said, "Didn't we agree on tomorrow morning?"
Cui Minho looked at Yun Hee-sun, then turned to Park Yuzhe and said, "Sorry, Mrs. Cui, the timing is tighter than we imagined."
Yun Hee-sun said: "You weren't invited to this banquet, you came uninvited. Do you understand manners?"
Cui Minho looked at his wife and said, "Wife."
Cui Minho said, "Sorry," "Wait for me outside."
Cui Minho kissed his mother's cheek and turned to walk towards Yun Hee-sun, who was standing still, looking at the setting sun.
Cui Minho called out, "Wife," and Yun Hee-sun turned around.

Yun Hee-sun, looking at Cui Minho, said, "Before we got married, I already knew everything you sacrificed for the country." Yun Hee-sun placed the paper money in Cui Minho's hand and continued, "I was going to give this to you tomorrow." "Remember to buy it back." "Don't worry about us."
Cui Minho, holding Yun Hee-sun's hand, said: "Ming Jian, I leave him to you."
The next day, amidst the rising sun, a fire truck slowly drove into the Hong Kong International Finance Center. The fire truck was fully equipped and a firefighter said, "It's a chemical incident."

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Suihuayi Yuan Cun Nan said: "The old village secretary of our village was admitted to the hospital these past few days."
Zhang Dong asked: "What illness?"
Suihuayi Yuan Cun Nan said: "His high blood pressure acted up again." "Given his health," "I reckon he won't be able to carry on much longer, right?"
Suihuayi Yuan Cun Nan said: "Yes, yes, yes."
Zhang Dong flipped through the book and said, "That's all."

The man in black continued, "There’s also this Lin Chunhu, who has established a turtle farming cooperative in Tea Flower Village. I heard that over 80 households have joined. They even offer free technical support, promise to buy the products centrally, and help with finding customers to integrate into the domestic market."
Zhang Dong put down the contract and said, "Buying people's hearts, huh? Alright then, this time elder brother brought back some gifts, let’s hand them out to everyone."
The scene switches to a man receiving a new phone, saying, 'Wow, a gold one!'
Lin Chunhu said, 'In a few days, we must change the water in this pond, the turtles are getting ready to hibernate, and the water quality must be kept clean.'
The scene shifts, and the two are at the pond. Lin Chunhu says, 'Alright, alright.'
The scene shifts, and the neighbor sees Gen Xing running anxiously, shouting: 'Lin Chunhu ah' 'There's going to be a disaster' 'Someone's going to die.'
Lin Chunhu said, 'Don't panic, speak slowly.'
Suihuayi Yuan Cun Nan said, 'Gen Xing's mother is threatening to jump off a building, the village head and secretary are not at home, you have to go have a look, I can only turn to you now, hurry!'
Lin Chunhu said: "Alright, let's go quickly."
Gen Xing looked up and said, 'Mom, please come down.'
Lin Chunhu said, "Gen Xing’s mom, come down quickly, we can talk this through. Come on, everybody, help get some straw to cushion the ground, Gen Xing’s mom."
The crowd quickly helped the two untangle and said, 'Mom, please come down.'
The camera switches to the villagers' courtyard, where everyone is busy gathering straw. Everyone is looking up at the sky, hoping that the rain will stop.
Gen Xing knelt on the ground, crying and saying, 'Mom, please come down. If anything happened to you, what would happen to my brother and me? Mom, please come down.'
A woman in the crowd shouted, 'That’s right, let's talk it out, please come down quickly.'
Gen Xing's mom said, 'I just want everyone to see how I am being driven to death by you two unfilial sons.'
Lin Chunhu shouted, "Be careful! Careful! Where’s Gen Xing's dad?"
Gen Xing said, "My brother went to pick him up in the car."
The crowd shouted, 'Be careful, Gen Xing's mom, please come down!' 'Come down, come down!'

Genxing's Dad shouted, "Old lady, you better come down right this moment! What are you doing? If you die, what am I going to do? If you're gone, I won’t want to live either. I’m telling you, I’ll go back and drink pesticide right now, and we can simply die together."
The son said, 'Mom, please come down.' Gen Xing's mom covered her face and wept.
Lin Chunhu said, "Gen Xing's Dad, Gen Xing's mom, both of you, don't be anxious. If there's any grievance, tell me, I’ll help you solve it."

The scene shifts to a meeting room, where a man says, 'Lin Chunhu ah, the old lady and I, we’ve lived our whole lives together, but now that we are old, we have to live separately. What’s the point in that, tell me?'
Lin Chunhu pointed at the two and said, "Gen Wang, Gen Xing, what’s going on here?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Qi Jia, seeing Yuan Xiaoou turn and walk out of the room, hurriedly got up and closed the door. Just as she was about to leave, Yuan Xiaoou came back in, holding a magazine in his hand, ready to go out.
Yuan Xiaoou: "Look at this, look at what you used to be, look at what you've done to yourself now," "What’s the big deal? It's just premature aging, if we're sick we take medicine, that's all."

movie101_7010686199291445773_3900_4080.text: The elevator doors slowly opened, and Cong Cong, covered in blood, lay on the ground. He struggled to lift his head, trying to push himself up with his front paws, but soon collapsed again.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Lu Chunhu said, 'My speech is over, please vote for me.' The villagers applauded and cheered for Lu Chunhu.
