movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: A female villager asked: "How should we deal with this?"
Town Mayor said: "If this really happened, we will investigate thoroughly."
Zhang Xi said: "Okay, so is Lin Chunhu's election today invalid?"
Town Mayor said, "Decisions can only be made after investigation," "This matter has not been fully investigated yet, has it?"
Zhang Xi pointed to the notice and said: "Come on, everyone come have a look," "Someone rigged the election, come see."

Zhang Xi continued to read: "The president of the tortoise farming cooperative in Camellia Village, Lin Chunhu, during the election period, delivered two tortoises to our village's old party member Aunt He, in order to gain an extra vote in the election."
The villagers were not convinced. One of them said: "How can offering a tortoise be bribery?"

Zhang Xi continued to explain to the villagers: "During the election period, whatever is offered is considered bribery, "as per the legal regulation" the team leader of the village organization term ends in six months"to the end of the community election"under the pretext of helping and condoling"indirectly giving things to voters" is also considered bribery."
Genxing's Dad said to Zhang Xi: "I tell you Zhang Xi, how could you be so heartless, Lin Chunhu is doing good deeds and you label it as bribery, there's no such thing!"
The crowd echoed: "Yeah, yeah, way too much."
Zhang Xi asked: "Genxing's Dad why are you so upset, could it be, that you also benefitted from Lin Chunhu?"
Genxing's Dad angrily tore down the village committee's announcement and walked away, saying: "This is outrageous!"
A woman said: "How can you speak like that?" "Enough, let's go." The crowd dispersed.
The scene shifts to an office, where Town Mayor is serving water to Lin Chunhu, who says: "Tea break."
Town Mayor said: "Thank you, mayor."
Town Mayor sat down and asked: "Lin Chunhu, I want to ask you, did you or did you not give Aunt He the tortoises?"
Lin Chunhu answered: "Yes."
Town Mayor asked again: "Do you know Aunt He is a party member?"
Lin Chunhu said excitedly: "I know she is a party member!"
Town Mayor asked, "When did this happen?"
Lin Chunhu thought for a moment and said: "The 6th," "the day before the village's party organization's community election notice was issued."
Town Mayor asked: "Then when you gave her the tortoise, did you hint about the election?"
Lin Chunhu said: "No."
Town Mayor asked: "Then why did you give him the tortoise?"

Lin Chunhu explained: "I had no motive, I just heard Aunt He was not in good health recently, and she was all by herself, so I felt sorry for her. I sent a home-raised tortoise, just to give her some strength."

Lin Chunhu said: "I was born in Camellia Village and grew in Camellia Village." "I always want to do more for the villagers of Camellia Village." "I won't say anything else." "I, Lin Chunhu, have a clear conscience."
At this moment, the village secretary came in and said: "Mayor Yang, please come out, two old men insisted to see you." Town Mayor got up and went out.

Genxing's Dad said to Town Mayor: "Hello Mayor Yang, Mayor Yang, you cannot just listen to the Zhang brothers. Lin Chunhu is unjustly defamed. Thirty of our village elders co-signed to vouch for him. Here is the joint guarantee letter, Mayor Yang, take a look."
Genxing's Dad replied, "Their names are all here." "Actually, every New Year and holiday," "all the elders over seventy in our village receive a consolation gift from Lin Chunhu."
The village elder continued, "Whenever the poor and lonely elderly in our village fall sick, he is always the first to front up their medical expenses."

The next day, Yuan Xiaoou carried Qi Jia out of the house, descending the steep steps of the alley. Qi Jia, wearing a dress, looked extremely pale. Yuan Xiaoou ignored the onlookers and carried Qi Jia quickly to the hospital.

Qi Jia ran desperately on the street, as if her feet had a death switch, speeding up like they were sprinting towards the sunset. She ran into the hospital, and the first thing she did was to check the IV drip.

In the hospital room, Qi Jia woke up from a nightmare, gasping for breath, clutching the pillow tightly. The sunlight streamed in through the window, illuminating the pale complexion of Qi Jia as she lay in bed, unable to sleep.

Lin Shuer, understanding her meaning, comforted her with a smile and said, "Stomach hurts, doesn't it?" "Your stomach must have done something terrible in a past life." After saying this, she stood up and adjusted the IV drip.
Qi Jia said: 'You shouldn't have saved me.' 'If I die,' 'nothing will hurt anywhere.'
Lin Shuer said: "So what if a jerk found a mate?" "Is it worth it?" After saying that, she looked at Yuan Xiaoou.

Lin Shuer said: "Since you can't let go," "Why didn't you go to Beijing with him in the first place?" After saying this, Lin Shuer stood up and walked towards the door, while Qi Jia turned her head to watch her leave.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: The Old Man said: "Yes, Mayor Yang, this is not a bribery election at all. You must investigate him thoroughly and return Lin Chunhu's innocence, okay?"

Mayor Yang said: "The Old Man, don't worry. We will definitely investigate this matter." "If Lin Chunhu really didn't bribe, we will not wrong him." "You two go first." "We are still investigating this matter." "When you go back, just wait patiently for our news."
The Old Man said: "Okay, Mayor Yang, we'll take our leave first."
Mayor Yang said: "Okay, goodbye." The Old Man left, and Mayor Yang watched him go.
The scene switches to a group of people eating. Zhang Dong says: "Come on, come on, Chichi."
A man raised his glass and said: "Let's toast to Secretary Zhang Dong."
Zhang Dong said: "Low-key, low-key, low-key." "The town committee members haven't been finally decided yet." "Low-key, everyone take one, come."
Zhang Dong said: "Brother, why are you so careful? Everyone present today is our own brother. If you don’t take this village secretary position, who will take it? Everyone agrees, right?"

A man said: "You see, the elected committee members, the old secretary is old, Liu Mengting is just a freshman out of school, she has no experience." "Lin Chunhu’s eligibility has been cancelled." "Now, in terms of strength and qualifications, this secretary position can't be given to others."
Everyone chimed in: "Yes, yes, yes, yes, well said."

Zhang Dong said: "Okay, to be honest," "I didn't want to be it initially," "Being a village official is not a great job," "Being a village chief is annoying enough for me," "However, since everyone trusts me so much," "and the village can't find a suitable candidate for the time being," "I'll reluctantly go along with the public opinion."
Everyone raised their glasses and clinked them together, saying: "Cheers, let's drink."
The man in the red shirt said: "Speaking of this election," "it not only has people's will," "but also the will of heaven."
The man next to him said: "Yes, who allowed our Xiaobao to take such a nice photo, it's simply a divine favor."
Everyone agreed: "Yes, yes, yes, Xiaobao is the number one hero." "Bao Liang brother, I toast to you."
Bao Liang, after thinking for a moment, said: "Ah, by the way, why didn't we call Xiaobao for a couple of drinks?"
Bao Liang said: "Xiaobao must not be called, he is kept in the dark about this matter."
The scene shifts to a bamboo forest, where Bao Liang and Zhang Dong are shouting: "Mengting! Mengting! Mengting!"

movie101_7010686199291445773_4260_4440.text: Xiao Xing tightly gripped the dagger in her hand, which belonged to Qian Qian. She tried to pull it back, but Xiao Xing held on tightly. Xiao Xing suddenly let go, and Lin Chong quickly grabbed the dagger, placing it back in its sheath.
Lin Chong: "Can you spare some time for me, Miss Xiao Xing?"

Xiao Xing, with tears in her eyes, nodded silently. Then, Lin Chong, wearing roller skates, skated towards Xiao Xing. Xiao Xing, also on roller skates, tried to skate forward but lost balance and fell. Lin Chong rushed over to help Xiao Xing up.
Xiao Xing said: "I'm here, I'm here" "Don't think about anything" "Hold my hand tight" "Just feel it"
Xiao Xing said: "I can't"
Xiao Xing said: "It's okay, it's okay." "Don't be a slave to fear." "Come on, take it slow."
Lin Chong: "Oh."
Lin Chong:"Xiao Xing sis, don't think that I am carefree, actually, I have worries too, but when I'm feeling down, I go roller skating. That flying feeling, it’s amazing."
Lin Chong and Xiao Xing were walking in the square. The square was deserted, and the only lights were from the hanging bulbs.
Xiao Xing, holding onto Lin Chong, laughed and said: 'Lin Chong, wait a minute,' as the two of them skated hand in hand, completely unaware of the danger that was approaching them.
Lin Chong turned around and said: "Xiao Xing" "Go down"

Xiao Xing said: "Can you come with me to a place?" Lin Chong agreed, and Xiao Xing continued: "Alright." Xiao Xing smiled at Lin Chong, and then the two went to the hospital. In the hospital, two patients were lying on the beds in the operating room.
In the blink of an eye, Qian Qian was already lying on the operating table, her hands and feet tightly restrained.
The man in black continued: "Can any of you tell me" "why on earth there are disgusting apps like 'Just Date' in this world" "Why didn't you answer the phone?"
The man: "The phone was off, no battery."
The man looked at her and said: "You used that filthy app to meet men again, didn't you?"
The girl with sunglasses said: "That's online socializing."

The scene switches to a flashback, where Xiao Xing's boyfriend scolds Xiao Xing: "Why can you girls" "Hook up with others so casually? Look at yourself now" "Dressed like that, do you still look like a decent girl? What happened to your face?"
Xiao Xing turned away and said: "It's none of your business."
The man in black pressed down on Qian Qian and said: "No" "Tell me what happened to your face" "Why do you dirty your bodies" "And also dirty my hands?"

The woman struggled and said: "Let go of me," "I'm old enough, even my parents don't control me, why do you?" "I'm an adult, I do whatever I want" "I just went out, I just hooked up with men" "What can you do about it?"
Xiao Xing, pushed to the side, angrily said: "How dare you hit me, how dare you?"
The man in black clothes shouted: "Tell me why, why."
He reached out to touch Qian Qian's face, but stopped in mid-air. The blood on his fingertips was too terrifying. He couldn't bear to touch her.
The doctor's words hit Lin Chong's heart like a hammer, he cried out: "Qian Qian". In the operating room, Qian Qian lay on the operating table, her heart no longer beating.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5460_5640.text: Park Yuzhe turned his head and said: "Cui Minho". Suddenly, a group of armed men rushed out from the narrow alley and blocked Cui Minho's way. They were all holding guns and shouting: "Drop it"
Park Yuzhe cursed, "Damn it", and then the two of them hid behind the cover of the truck, observing the opposite side. At this moment, the opposite side was still unaware of their location.
Cui Minho looked into the distance and said, "Suddenly so many people showed up" "Let's split up"
Park Yuzhe: "Let's go together"

Park Yuzhe, who was hiding under the truck, saw Cui Minho injured, so he quickly took out two pistols and handed one to Cui Minho. After exchanging a glance, they both ran towards the back of the truck. The enemy's firepower was fierce, and the two had to stay close to the truck while looking for an opportunity to shoot.
Park Yuzhe, who had just rushed out of the ambulance, was instantly surrounded by a group of people. He quickly shot and killed two of them. Cui Minho asked, "Can you handle it?"
Cui Minho signaled to Park Yuzhe, and Park Yuzhe immediately ran to the other side of the truck. Cui Minho followed closely behind, shooting as he moved.
Cui Minho and Indian Henchman were still fighting fiercely. Cui Minho shouted, "Councilor"

Park Yuzhe and Indian Henchman exchanged fire, with Park Yuzhe taking the opportunity to move to the rear of the truck. Indian Henchman was stunned, and Park Yuzhe quickly reached the other side of the truck, taking aim at Indian Henchman.

Cui Minho, clutching his wound, hobbles away. Park Yuzhe, who had been hiding behind the wall, follows him. The two of them sneakily cross the road and hide in a corner where they can observe the situation on the street.
Cui Minho and Indian Henchman got out of the car and ran towards the warehouse. Indian Henchman fired a few shots, but Cui Minho was unharmed.

Cui Minho was shot in the abdomen, and Park Yuzhe immediately helped him up. Cui Minho fired a few shots at the enemies but was overwhelmed by the firepower of the enemies and couldn't stop the bleeding from his abdomen. He hid behind a cover and fired a few shots.

Cui Minho, enduring the pain, grabbed Park Yuzhe's shoulder with one hand while pulling out a submachine gun with the other. He loaded the gun and prepared to counterattack. Indian Henchman, seeing the situation was bad, turned to flee.

Cui Minho was shot in the left shoulder. Park Yuzhe supported him and they ran towards the rooftop. Cui Minho was seriously injured and kept bleeding. Park Yuzhe supported him to the edge of the rooftop.
The two, supporting each other, moved forward. Cui Minho, clutching his wound, leaned against a large vehicle. Park Yuzhe said to him, "Hold on for now."

Park Yuzhe, who had been shot in the shoulder earlier, was hit again. Cui Minho, who had been hiding behind the car, was hit in the back by a bullet. He then slumped down, clutching his wound. The drug dealer who had just shot him was also shot dead by Park Yuzhe.

At this moment, Park Yuzhe rushed over, grabbed the man's collar, and smashed him against the wall. The man struggled to grab Park Yuzhe's arm, trying to twist it behind his back. Park Yuzhe used his strength to break the man's arm.

Cui Minho, who had just rushed out of the car, was shot in the left shoulder. He staggered and leaned against the wall, trying to pull out the magazine from his right shoulder, but the gun-wielding Indian Henchman was also shot dead.
Cui Minho was pinned down by the man in black, and at that moment, Park Yuzhe arrived just in time to pull Cui Minho up.

Park Yuzhe took the gun, and the two of them quickly dealt with the bodyguards in front of them. Then, Park Yuzhe and Cui Minho crouched down behind a cover, while Indian Henchman on the roof continued to aim at them. Park Yuzhe fired back at Indian Henchman, and Cui Minho also shot Indian Henchman's leg.

Cui Minho and Zhang Yijun, seeing the situation deteriorating, quickly fled the scene. The two of them went to the alley behind the truck, with Zhang Yijun covering fire from behind and Cui Minho running to the front.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Zhang Xiaobao said: "What did I do to offend you this time? I've already advised my dad about the pig farm issue." "He promised he would change."
Liu Mengting said: "See for yourself."
Zhang Xiaobao took the photos and said, "What are these?" "Aren't these the photos I took last time we went to Aunt He’s house together?" "What's going on?"

Liu Mengting said: "Shouldn't I be asking you that?" "Only you, me, and Brother Chunhu were there that day." "How did this photo get out?" "Do you know Brother Chunhu was falsely accused of bribery because of this photo?"
Liu Mengting said: "Tell me." "Wasn't this done by your dad colluding with your family members?"
Zhang Xiaobao said, "I really don't know anything about this."
Liu Mengting said: "This is your camera." "If you don’t know, then who does?"
Zhang Xiaobao, after listening, was very angry, turned to look at Liu Mengting, and said, "You think I was involved in this, don't you?"
Liu Mengting said, "Zhang Xiaobao, I used to think you were different from those people. But now, I am really disappointed in you, you know that?"

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Even though the camera is mine, many people have had access to it." "And many people have borrowed it." "Forget it, I won't explain anymore." "Mengting, we've known each other for so many years." "I thought you would at least have some basic trust in me." "Now I see, I overestimated myself."
After saying this, Zhang Xiaobao turned and left, leaving Liu Mengting kneeling on the steps, unable to recover for a long time.
Zhang Baoliang looked at the goldfish in the tank, then at the two of them, and couldn't help but start coughing violently.
Zhang Xiaobao, who was on the second floor, hurriedly came down upon hearing the noise. Approaching, he asked, "Dad, have you seen my camera?"
Zhang Xiaobao asked impatiently: "Have you seen it? I’m in a hurry. Have you seen my camera or not?"
Zhang Baoliang shook his head and said, "No, just don’t go out."
Zhang Xiaobao pointed at Zhang Baoliang and said, "Did you hide my camera?"
Zhang Xiaobao pointed at Zhang Baoliang and said, "Yes, I took it."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Give it back to me."
Zhang Xiaobao pointed at Zhang Baoliang and said, "You did this, didn’t you?" "You used the photos in my camera." "You didn't want Brother Chunhu to become the secretary, right?"

Zhang Baoliang said: "If he becomes the secretary, our family wouldn’t have peaceful days." "Didn’t you hear him say in his campaign speech that he wants to manage the Mother River?" "Isn’t that targeting our family?" "If he does that, how will our pig farm survive?"
Zhang Xiaobao, after listening, walked over to Zhang Baoliang and said: "Just because of this, you mixed with those people from East Zhang Baoliang?" "Doing such conscience-defying things?"
Zhang Baoliang said, "I'm doing this for survival."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: Lin Shuer looked at her and said: 'Come on, tell me, I've asked you eight hundred times and you never answer, what is it really about?'
Qi Jia opened her eyes and said: "I want to be a teacher."
Qi Jia said: 'On graduation day when I wore my wedding dress, I always felt that he was going to say I do.' After saying this, Qi Jia sat up.
Lin Shuer said: 'If that were the case, even if he went to hell, I would go with him.'
Yuan Xiaoou, who had just closed the ward door, heard this and couldn't help but stop in his tracks. He then slowly turned around and said, 'I never thought he would say that he wasn't ready.'

Lin Shuer said: 'Qi Jia, you have only two choices now, first is to go to Beijing and snatch him back, you're not afraid of death, what else is there to fear? Second, completely annihilate him from your mind, dice him up, cremate him in your skull, and let the pathetic remains flush out with your tears. From then on, reborn from the ashes, start a new life. If all else fails, there's still Yuan Xiaoou to try.'
Yuan Xiaoou, hands in pockets, calmly said, "No." "Can we consider my feelings when speaking?"
Lin Shuer shook his head and said, "No."
Qi Jia suddenly said: "I'm going to Beijing."
The car was driving on a tree-lined highway. Qi Jia asked, "Sis, is fear of flying also a symptom of early menopause?"

Qi Jia sat in the passenger seat, looking at the driver. The driver glanced at her and then turned his head to drive. Qi Jia's inner monologue: "This time going to Beijing, don't screw up okay? If it's a love you can't forget, then prove it to us."

The car sped along the coastal road, with the sea breeze blowing and the sky clear. The sunset cast a golden glow on the water, and the gentle waves lapped against the shore. The car passed through the bustling streets and entered the quiet suburbs, stopping in front of a villa.
The scene shifts to a rural area, where a car slowly drives along a path surrounded by rapeseed fields. The car stops, and Qi Jia gets out.
Qi Jia's mother anxiously shouted, "Qi Jia!"
Qi Jia happily exclaimed, "Ah!"
Qi Jia replied while closing the car door: "Just squat behind the car's rear, nobody can see you."
Qi Jia said angrily, 'You think you both are blind or what?'
The three of them ran towards the rape seed field, with Lin Shuer saying from behind, 'Blockhead, get back in the car, what's a girl peeing got to do with you?'
Yuan Xiaoou worriedly said: "Be careful there, don't step on a wasp nest."
Qi Jia ran while saying, "There are wasp nests in the mustard flowers." "Lin Shuer, you're right," "that's just being mindless."
The two of them ran and played in the rapeseed field, as if they had returned to their childhood.
The next day, Qi Jia drove Lin Shuer to the village where Yuan Xiaoou lived. The car passed through a small bridge and stopped in front of a house.
Qi Jia said: "I'll go get the money."
Grandma said, "This chicken soup, I started simmering it at four in the morning."
The man said, "Alright."
The man served the soup saying, "Here, have some soup."

movie101_6969128872847770149_5640_5820.text: Jin Taonian and Park Yuzhe were still in a standoff. Jin Taonian hid behind a wall, while Park Yuzhe retreated while shooting. Jin Taonian suddenly got up and ran towards Park Yuzhe.

Jin Taonian, who had just rushed to the cement truck, was now covering Shen Meijing. He quickly got up and hid behind the truck, while Shen Meijing, with her gun, covered Jin Taonian's back. Jin Taonian then went to the other side of the truck to cover Shen Meijing's rear.

The two of them quickly ran to the side of the car, Jin Taonian hid behind a concrete pillar, while Park Yuzhe ran to the edge of the roof and fired a shot. Jin Taonian turned around and shouted: "Advisor!" Jin Taonian and his subordinates quickly suppressed the firepower of the building, and the bullets hitting the ground made a terrifying sound.

The drug dealers who ran out from the factory were all knocked down by Jin Taonian. Park Yuzhe and Jin Taonian hid behind a van, Jin Taonian opened the door first, and Park Yuzhe quickly got in. Jin Taonian closed the door and aimed the gun at the front.
Jin Taonian and Cui Minho were both shot and fell to the ground. Park Yuzhe quickly helped them hide by the car.
Cui Minho weakly said: "Advisor," Park Yuzhe's eyes were red, his face covered in blood, he shook Cui Minho's head vigorously, trying to wake him up.
Cui Minho, with his last breath, said: "This...""There's no hope...""Mission...""We must complete the mission..."
Cui Minho, with his last breath, said: "Advisor," "Advisor, pull yourself together." "Advisor, pull yourself together." "Pull yourself together."
At this moment, Park Yuzhe's face was covered in sweat, and his pupils were dilated. He turned his head to see Jin Taonian and Shen Meijing standing behind him with their guns.

The shot switches to the warehouse where Park Yuzhe was previously shot. Park Yuzhe was hit in the left shoulder by Cui Minho and fell to the ground. Jin Taonian and Shen Meijing stood behind him, guns raised, on high alert.

The two men in suits lay there, stained with blood, motionless. Jin Taonian stood nearby, his gun raised as if still in the midst of firing. The surrounding henchmen stood with their guns at their sides, all eyes fixed on the two men in suits. The scene was eerily quiet, with only the sound of heavy breathing and the distant waves crashing. The night grew darker, and the people on the shore grew colder.
The scene shifts to the middle of the road where a body bag is being moved. A police officer says to Song An: "Song An boss, I've seen everything, there's no Xiao Yuan."
Song An nodded, and the superior turned and left. The scene shifted to a quiet residential street, with warm sunlight bathing the earth and flowers in the mountains.

At this time, a black taxi stops in front of a villa. The driver opens the door and gets out, followed by a bodyguard. Inside the house, Yun Hee-sun is playing with a child. The child is watching the TV that the nanny is holding.
Yun Hee-sun was sitting by the window eating an apple when the ringtone of her phone startled her. She quickly stood up and walked to the intercom, pressing the answer button.

Yun Hee-sun, hearing the commotion, quickly pulls her son back into the room and closes the door. Then she walks towards the door, facing Shen Meijing, who is standing at the door, with a look of reluctance in her eyes.

movie101_7010686199291445773_4440_4620.text: Man looked at the big screen, and the projection showed Xiao Xing in a white dress slowly approaching him. He looked at the big screen in disbelief.

Man held his wife tightly in his arms, while Xiao Xing sat quietly by the door. The two couples remained silent, filled with guilt. The heavy rain outside the window was like an endless drum, constantly reminding them of the mistake they had made. The night deepened, and the rain grew heavier.

The scene shifts to the study, where Man stood by the window with his back to the room, seemingly deep in thought. The study was filled with books, and a desk with a few decorative items was placed in the middle. Man turned around and walked slowly towards the desk, his eyes fixed on a spot on the wall.

The scene shifts to a room where Man is picking up a smartphone from a drawer full of various mobile phones. He flips through them one by one until he finds the right one, then immediately leaves the room.
Man glanced at the time, 9:23 AM, and saw that Xiao Xing had called 11 times.
Jingkuang clicked on the computer and said: "Not afraid of the dark""This guy's new ID has already logged in."
Lu Li asked the officer beside him: "Have you fixed the location?"
Jingkuang looked at the computer and said: "Fuhua Villa 32B""The owner's name is Tang Qian"
Lu Li: "Good, Jingkuang, take the search warrant" "We'll head over first and you guys can rendezvous with us" "It's a capture operation"
Lin Chong: "Yes." Lin Chong and Xiao Xing walked towards the villa. After they got into the car, the three groups drove in different directions.

Jingkuang: "Good," "I understand," "Tang Qian is 20 years old this year," "What's strange is," "For the past three months, there's been absolutely no traceable record," "Not even phone records," "and credit card activity disappeared together," "Tang Qian also has an older brother," "named Tang Zheng," "He's a plastic surgeon," "and also three months ago," "he sold his own hospital."
Lu Li: "Siblings, huh?" The two of them pushed open the door and entered the room, turning on the light.
Xiao Xing, who had been waiting at the door for a long time, pretended to be calm and let him in. Lin Chong turned around and said: "Xiao Xing sis, can I acknowledge you as my blood sister?"
Xiao Xing stopped him: "Wait for me a second."
Lin Chong followed Xiao Xing's instructions and went to the living room. He threw his backpack onto the coffee table and sat down on the sofa, stretching out lazily.
Xiao Xing placed the photo of Lin Chong next to the vibrating bell, hesitated for a moment, and then let out a sigh of relief.
The scene shifts to a quiet evening at home, with Xiao Xing holding a guitar and stroking it affectionately. Lu Li called out from a photo frame: "Lin Chong, are you still there?"
Lin Chong: "Oh, Xiao Xing sis""So you were a cop""That explains it""You always exuded righteousness."
The scene shifts to a photo of the four of them together. Lin Chong took out his phone and said: "Liang Cong, he's Liang Cong, you"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Bao Liang said, "You know about the great pig farm in the village. Why is it leased to our family every year? They willingly give us such a good place because over the years I've been treating them well, providing them with good food and drinks, and offering fine tobacco. Ah, if you still recognize me as your father, go back to your room obediently."
Bao Liang said, "Son, you have to understand, I do this for the sake of our family. As long as we father and son are united, we can raise more pigs and make more money."
Xiao Bao said, "Stop it, I don't want so much money. What I want is a clear conscience. To be human, one must have a conscience. Without it, we're worse than pigs."
Bao Liang cursed, "Bastard! How dare you talk to me like this? It was me, your father who's worse than a pig, who raised you. Spoiled piglet, if you've got the guts, then leave!"
Mayor Yang said, "Take the camera, here."
Bao Liang shouted, "Come back! If you dare leave through that door, never come back!"
After the performance, Xiao Bao left the stage with his bag and ran straight to the alley where he lived. He jogged all the way, eager to get home.
The scene shifts to the village committee, where Mayor Yang is having a cup of tea with a sister. Mayor Yang asks, "Sister, how does Lin Chunhu behave usually in the village? Is he good to people?"
Mayor Yang replied, "He's very good, especially kind to the elderly."
Mayor Yang asked, "Then does he have anything to do with this election?"
Mayor Yang said, "Town leader, town leader!"
Mayor Yang asked, "Hey, what's the matter, young man?"
Xiao Bao said, "Town leader! I'm actually here to clarify something." "Lin Chunhu didn't rig the election." "The photo, it was actually... I took it, you see."

Mayor Yang said, "Everyone, please be quiet." "I've called you all here because there is a very important matter I need to announce to you all." "Everyone has been very concerned about the bribery case in our village's election." "Over these past few days, our township investigation team has conducted a comprehensive investigation into this matter, and now, the results are out."

Mayor Yang said: "After verification from various aspects, Lin Chunhu has not engaged in any election bribery. Therefore, the results of our election still stand. Also, during the two recommendations and one election process, Lin Chunhu received the highest call from both party members and the masses."
Mayor Yang said: "After the decision of our superior party organization, it has been confirmed that he is the candidate for the new Village Party Branch Secretary of Teahua Village."

movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.text: Yun Hee-sun was stunned for a moment, then looked at Shen Meijing's eyes and nodded slightly. After a long while, she moved to the left, leaning against the wall, and slowly began to speak: "You must have seen it coming, didn't you?"
Shen Meijing rushed into the room, knelt down in front of Yun Hee-sun, and held her in her arms. Yun Hee-sun, who had been pretending to be strong, finally couldn't hold back and cried out loud.

The two of them sat on the ground, heads bowed, not knowing what they were talking about. The child in the living room was playing with toys, completely unaware of the serious conversation in the hallway.
Li Yanming stood by the window, his fingers lightly tapping on the glass. He was thinking about Shen Meijing's words when suddenly he turned and saw Shen Meijing.
Li Yanming: "Fan, there's a mole." "Check for me after we left the headquarters." "All entries, communications, and email records."
Li Yanming, with tears in his eyes, looked at his wife and daughter, then closed his eyes and shook his head.
Li Yanming, who had been standing idly by, finally couldn't help but sigh deeply. He slowly walked to the glass window, looking down at the bustling crowd below, appearing thoughtful.

Li Yanming, who had been leaning against the wall, suddenly stood up, his eyes red, and walked towards the glass window of the monitoring room, then he leaned against the glass window and looked outside.
A female officer said: "Chief Li, in the past two days," "only the professor made a call within the crisis team."

The scene shifts to the police station, where Li Yanming is sitting in front of a computer, listening to the interrogation tape of Yun Hee-sun. After listening, he nods his head, indicating that he has received it.

The scene switches to Professor Zhao making a call: "Angela?" "It's Professor Zhao, do me a favor." "Can you find out where Li Sir's third-grade paper is from last time?" "Also, I'm sorry," "Please organize the paper on my desk." "I only want to keep 5, 6, 15, 16, 17, 18." "Discard the rest."

The police officer on the other end of the phone said: "Can you find out where Li Sir's third-grade paper is from last time?" Li Yanming nodded, the officer continued: "Also, I'm sorry, please organize the paper on my desk. I only want to keep 5, 6, 15, 16, 17, 18. Discard the rest."

The scene shifts to the police station, where Li Yanming listens to the voice recording and takes notes. The recorded voice listed 16 names, all of which were people who had previously confessed to committing crimes. Li Yanming frowned at the list, lost in thought.
Li Yanming was sitting in front of the computer, listening to music and writing lyrics. He took off his headphones, clicked the mouse twice, and then put his headphones back on.

The voice on the recording said: "Can you find out where Li Sir's third-grade paper is from last time?" "Sorry for the trouble, please organize the paper on my desk." "I only want to keep 5, 6, 15, 16, 17, 18." "Discard the rest."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Yuan Xiaoou said while serving the food: "Meat, it's ready, eat it all."
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Give me more meat'
Yuan Xiaoou said, "Sorry, that's all the meat there is."
Lin Shuer said: "Cooking more won't kill you"
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'I only used half a chicken.'
Lin Shuer said, "It's not even your meat."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Eat more meat, this is free-range chicken, eat as much of the remaining food as you can, if you can't finish, let her eat it."
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'What are you doing, Qi Jia hasn't eaten yet'

Lin Shuer said: "Delicious," as Yuan Xiaoou and Qi Jia nodded in agreement. Lin Shuer then took out a tablet and said: "By the way, Qi Jia, look here, I found the same ones for you, check it out on JD.com."
Qi Jia said: "Are we still going? I'm still not sure"
Lin Shuer said: "When do you plan to decide, big sister, they're about to get married soon"
Qi Jia said: "I still can't believe he would marry someone else."
Lin Shuer said: 'Then I can't believe I'm not a billionaire either'
Lin Shuer said, "Oh come on, hurry up and eat, or you'll be too weak to cry. Quick, eat the meat, hurry."
Qi Jia said: "We better not go."
Lin Shuer said: "Coward, it's just a wedding crash, what's the big deal?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia, if you actually manage to crash the wedding," "will you settle in Beijing?"

Lin Shuer said: 'If you don't stay in Beijing', 'Are you planning to kidnap Liu Chong back to Xiamen?', 'Let me tell you', 'I've already planned the steps for the wedding crash', 'We need close cooperation from the three of us', 'Come here', 'Once we're in Beijing', 'Qi Jia, you should not lose your virginity first'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Huh?"
Qi Jia said: "No, no, don't show yourself." The three of them then went to Yuan Xiaoou's car to head home.
Qi Jia looked out the window and said, "You know the construction industry" "Only in Beijing can you enter the core circle"
Lin Shuer said: "But Beijing has no sky, no sea, bad environment, high pressure." "Apart from you, I have nothing in Beijing."

Liu Chong looked at her and said, 'Are there monsters outside?', 'Why won't you try?', 'Or do you prefer to follow your parents' arrangements, drinking tea, reading newspapers, stamping papers for life?'

Liu Chong said, "No," "Have you ever thought," "In a completely unfamiliar city," "The moment you open your eyes it's all pressure," "It's not just about our bodies and minds," "Even our love would be defeated."
Liu Chong said, "You know, in my dictionary, there is no word for defeat. Qi Jia, I really don't want to miss this opportunity. The company chose me among tens of thousands."
Lin Shuer said, 'But there's 1.3 billion people in China, and I chose you alone'
Liu Chong said, "Why don't you go first, if it doesn't suit you, come back."
Liu Chong said, 'Do you think so little of me, think I can't do it?'
Lin Shuer said, "I don't mean that" "I'll wait for you here". Liu Chong looked at Lin Shuer, feeling helpless.
Liu Chong said, 'But I don't believe I'll be back', Liu Chong looked at Qi Jia in the car, then turned to look at Lin Shuer, and walked towards the car.

Qi Jia looked at the night scene outside the window, her eyes sparkling. The raindrops hit the window, resembling the tears in her eyes that were about to fall. She pursed her lips, her expression turning melancholic. The raindrops merged with her tears, blurring the boundary between reality and fantasy.

movie101_7010686199291445773_4620_4800.text: Lin Chong asked in shock: "You are her sister."
Xiao Xing led Lin Chong to the first floor, where Lin Chong introduced, "This is our brother Liang Cong's practice room."
Xiao Xing asked, "Is this a rehearsal?" Lin Chong replied, "Yes."
Lin Chong walked up the stairs, Xiao Xing followed him and came to the stairway downstairs. Xiao Xing looked at Lin Chong practicing the drums on the stage, and quietly watched him for a while.
Lin Chong stood up, looking at Xiao Xing with a smile in his eyes. He lifted his drumsticks, and the usually quiet and orderly drum set began to hum.
Xiao Xing lit a match, held up the photo, and lit the incense.
Lin Chong was arranging photos on the table in the music room. Xiao Xing stood behind him, hands in pockets, looking down, not knowing what to say.
Lin Chong turned around and said, "Xiao Xing sis, come over too."
Lin Chong turned to look at Xiao Xing, paused, and said: "They have all left me one by one—my dad, my brother, and Cong Cong."
Lin Chong turned around, stunned. The scene shifted to outside the villa, where Lu Li drove up and parked in front of the villa.

The car slowly stopped in front of a villa with a well-lit entrance. The two got out of the car and walked towards the villa. The villa had a European architectural style, surrounded by trees, exuding a sense of luxury.
Lu Li and Xiao Xing were still searching in the dark. Lu Li, frustrated, drew his gun but found nothing, so he had to put it back.
At this time, Lu Li and his group were approaching the door. The sound of the door opening attracted their attention. They stopped and looked towards the door.
Lu Li and Lin Chong were the first to enter the room, they held flashlights and walked cautiously, examining the room's layout.
Lu Li picked up a small trophy and a few picture frames, all of which held memories of Xiao Xing and Lin Chong. Lu Li's eyes welled up with tears as he looked at the photos.
Lu Li, holding a flashlight and a gun, cautiously descended the stairs.

Lu Li, holding a flashlight in one hand and a gun in the other, cautiously approached the door. He bent down to examine the lock, inserted the flashlight into the keyhole, and shone it on the lock to get a clearer look. After some fiddling, he finally picked the lock successfully.
Lu Li, who entered last, turned on the flashlight and swept the room. The room was in a mess, and Lu Li looked displeased.
Lu Li looked at the newly arrived car, tears streaming down his face. He then looked at the license plates, which all read 'Loving You'.

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: The audience below the stage applauded and said: "Good, really good."

Mayor Yang continued, "Good, everyone be quiet, I have a very important matter, to announce to everyone, after verification through public reporting, one of the candidates, Zhang Dong, has engaged in election bribery. The bribery is very clear, and the evidence is also conclusive. So our township party committee has decided to revoke his eligibility as a committee member. In this term's election, he will not participate. Even if elected, it would be invalid."
The crowd responded with, "Exactly, exactly, exactly," and the man stood up to leave.
Younger Brother asked, "Big brother, where are we going?"
Younger Brother said: "Big brother, about this, I know we messed it up, I didn't realize they took something, and couldn't keep their mouths shut."
Zhang Dong impatiently said: "Get out, get out"
Younger Brother said, "Big brother."
Younger Brother said: "Scram."
Younger Brother said, "Alright alright alright, I'll scram I'll scram." Younger Brother opened the car door and got out.
Zhang Dong shouted: "Close the door!"
Zhang Dong said, "I'll wait for you to get out."
Zhang Dong angrily said: "A bunch of useless people,"
Younger Brother shouted from behind: "Big brother, big brother," Zhang Dong drove away in a luxury car, and Younger Brother watched as the car got farther away.
Zhang Dong got out of the car, closed the door with a slam, walked around the front of the car, and kicked the tire twice with anger. Then he raised his hand and smashed the car window.
The old houses in the ancient village are dilapidated, but the spirit of the old houses remains. The village is quiet and peaceful, like a serene painting.

Meng Ting continued, "Now, our farmers' lives are better, but our rural domestic sewage has become an important source of water pollution. So, our village organization has decided to try using ecological treatment to deal with our village's domestic sewage."
A parent asked: "Xiao Liu, what is ecological treatment? We don't understand, can you explain it to us?"

Meng Ting continued, "Okay, this ecological treatment refers to, after collecting and settling the sewage, to build constructed wetlands. Through the joint action of wetland plants, organic substrates, and microorganisms, and through multi-layer filtration, degrade pollutants, purify water quality and discharge rationally. This method of sewage treatment is itself quite low-carbon and environmentally friendly, plus the investment cost for individual projects is low, it's a purely ecological treatment approach."
Woman in Red Clothes said: "Sewage treatment tanks, aren't those things found in cities?"
Another woman chimed in: "Exactly, building a sewage pool at our doorstep, that would smell terrible."
The parents responded, "Yeah."

Meng Ting pointed at the screen and said: "Everyone, take a look." "This is a model of a constructed wetland from the next village." "This afternoon, you can all follow me for a visit, and once you see it, you'll understand."

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: Li Yanming turned his head, and a voice came through the walkie-talkie: "Professor, the police need you now"
Zhao Zhiren said: "Everything you do is classified," "I don't know anything, how can I cooperate with you?"
Zhao Zhiren said: "Based on the safety of Hong Kong residents, DC8 absolutely cannot stay in Hong Kong."
Song An also confirmed the weapon and locked it in safety mode.
Li Yanming said: "Please help me take good care of the weapon"
Zhao Zhiren said: "These are all classified"

Song An said: "Before you realize the situation," "Our war with the equator has already begun," "If you compromise this time," "He will turn Hong Kong into a real underground weapon trafficking center," "Deal?"
Zhao Zhiren said: "Professor, Mr. Cui, you go check DC8 first"
Li Yanming stared at the screen, then suddenly stood up and left. At the tunnel entrance, Fan Jiaming and Mr. Cui were heading towards the tunnel together.
Li Yanming said: "No need, if I guess wrong, I have a document in my computer, if I guess right, you take my place."
Fan Jiaming watched as Li Yanming got into the car, then turned to look at Zhao Zhiren.

The scene switches to Zhao Zhiren sitting at the table, typing on a typewriter. He is wearing a red cardigan, his face serious, with a cigarette in his mouth. He pauses, then presses the space bar, the carriage moves to the next line. He looks up, his eyes gleaming as he stares at the blank paper in front of him, thinking.

Zhao Zhiren looked at Li Yanming with a complex expression. Outside, Li Yanming and the others were bidding farewell to the interns. Li Yanming waved and said: "Officer Li," "do we really not need us?"
The scene shifts to a man in a suit slowly approaching the door of a room, his face showing a cunning smile, then he pushed the door open slightly, and the door was closed again.

The scene shifts to Li Yanming arriving at Zhao Zhiren's home. He pushed the door open and looked around. Zhao Zhiren came out from behind the door. The two looked at each other, and then Zhao Zhiren closed the door.
Zhao Zhiren said: "Looking for me?" Zhao Zhiren handed over the shoes and walked to the desk to turn off the radio, while Li Yanming sat down and took off his shoes.
Zhao Zhiren stood by the window, looking out.

Li Yanming said: "Fourteen years ago I was transferred to the serious crime squad," "when I was dealing with the first case," "my superior told me that policemen are humans too," "and humans can also commit crimes."
Zhao Zhiren said: "Your boss has a very high opinion of you," "First case, he let you catch one of your own"
Zhao Zhiren said: "But unfortunately, he found the wrong person."
Zhao Zhiren turned around and looked at Li Yanming: "Why?"
Li Yanming said: "Because I'm used to suspecting everyone"
Zhao Zhiren smiled and said: "Then you are not very popular"
Li Yanming smiled and said: "Not at all," "The case was solved, and I also caught the boss," "Because he wanted to push the responsibility to his subordinates"

movie101_7010686199291445773_4800_4980.text: At this moment, Tang Zheng suddenly appeared behind him, slowly approaching with a smile. Lu Li turned around and was instantly drenched with cold water.

Jingkuang, holding a flashlight, came out from behind a wall and joined the fight, knocking Lu Li to the ground. Lu Li, crawling on the ground, said, 'So many people outside,' 'you don't catch the ones you should,' 'you come here to catch me,' 'to catch me.'
Lu Li and Tang Zheng were still fighting in the garage, and suddenly a figure flashed by.
Tang Zheng, who had just rushed out of the freezer, was immediately cornered by Lu Li and choked by the neck. Tang Zheng struggled desperately, but to no avail.
Tang Zheng, who had been knocked down, quickly got up and grabbed Lu Li's neck, throwing him forcefully to the ground.

The two of them were knocked to the ground by the falling cabinet. After getting up, they found themselves surrounded by scattered paint cans and tools. Lu Li picked up a wrench from the ground and handed it to Tang Zheng.

Lu Li, who was originally lying on the ground, suddenly got up, and Tang Zheng was kicked to the ground. Lu Li picked up a wooden plank and smashed it towards Tang Zheng. Tang Zheng dodged and got up, and the two started fighting again. Lu Li pinned Tang Zheng to the ground and said, 'Caught you,' 'I have caught you.'

Lu Li, who was originally kneeling on the ground, suddenly stood up, grabbed Tang Zheng's collar, and said, "You're the one who should die." He then punched Tang Zheng, sending him flying and crashing into a wooden cabinet.
Tang Zheng kicked Lu Li in the chest, then stood up and looked around.
Tang Zheng walked over to Lu Li, squatted down, and looked at him.
Tang Zheng looked at the dying Lu Li with great excitement.
Tang Zheng, lying on the ground, slowly closed his eyes.
Jingkuang, holding a flashlight and a gun, cautiously entered the operating room, only to find Tang Qian lying on the bed with a bandage wrapped around her head.

He held a flashlight and carefully observed the person on the bed. There was a large bandage on the head of the person, and his/her eyes and mouth were also covered. Jingkuang looked up and saw another patient in the next bed, also heavily bandaged. Jingkuang was stunned by the sight of the two patients.

Jingkuang pressed the emergency stop button, but the lights did not respond. He was so anxious that he broke the button. The door did not open, and Jingkuang's flashlight ran out of batteries, plunging the room into darkness.
Jingkuang walked in, and the two girls looked at him as he approached. He stopped in front of them and stared at the girl in the middle, who looked back at him with vacant eyes.
Jingkuang said, 'Hello, Captain Shan?' 'This is Jingkuang.' 'Found all the missing girls,' 'yes, they're all alive,' 'send the brothers over to help fast,' 'hurry up.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: Qi Jia was driving in the rain, with the wipers struggling to clear the heavy rain from the windshield. The raindrops were streaming down the glass, blurring the view. Qi Jia picked up a tissue to wipe the raindrops off the glass, leaving a clearer view. The raindrops outside were like little teardrops, scattering in the air, while the rain inside was like tears, hitting the heart.

The heavy rain outside the window kept falling, Yuan Xiaoou was driving with one hand and holding a tissue with the other to wipe the rain from the window, the wipers were struggling to clear the rain from the windshield.

The scene shifts to a rainy night, with rain pouring down from the sky. Liu Chong is driving with Qi Jia in the passenger seat. The car slowly comes to a stop, and Liu Chong unbuckles the seatbelt, opens the door, and steps out. He then helps Qi Jia out of the car.

The scene shifts to the car, where Qi Jia is leaning against the passenger seat, her head resting on the window, and her eyes closed. Yuan Xiaoou is leaning against the driver's seat, holding a cigarette in their mouth, and a handkerchief in the other hand, gently wiping the water off Qi Jia's face.

The scene shifts to 2013, with the rapid development of the city and towering buildings, Yuan Xiaoou and Lin Shuanger stand on the street looking up at the sky, saying: "I think I am still suitable to stay behind."
Lin Shuanger, who was about to leave, was called back by Yuan Xiaoou. Yuan Xiaoou shouted: "Come back!" Lin Shuanger turned around and left.
Lin Shuanger asked: "Are you not happy to see an old classmate?"
Liu Chong, surprised, said: "Happy, happy, I just didn’t expect you two to be together."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "No, Liu Chong."
Lin Shuanger said: "This affair, it's a long story," "Sit, sit."
Lin Shuanger said: 'Such a big deal as marriage, yet you didn't send us an invitation.'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I hesitated for a long time and still sent the invitation to Qi Jia""But I think with her character""Even if she received the invitation, she would not come"
Lin Shuanger pushed Yuan Xiaoou onto the sofa and said: "Guess what."

Lin Shuanger said: "The truth is, Liu Chong, Qi Jia is really happy for you" "But she is so busy, she sent me and little Yuan Xiaoou to help.""She repeatedly asked us""She hopes the two of us can be your bridesmaids and best man""Witness your happiest moment on her behalf."
Liu Chong put down the trophy, smiled, and said: "I think she's doing really well. The bridesmaids and the best man are already set, you can come and attend the ceremony."
Lin Shuanger said: "We have consulted a master, Yuan Xiaoou's Bazi is very favourable for you"

Lin Shuanger said: "Really, don't underestimate him, he's not the sharpest tool in the box, but he is indeed the best match for your best man. In the words of the master, it's called completion. We must believe in the words of the master."
Lin Shuanger said: "This is also Qi Jia's wish, she sincerely blesses you"
Lin Shuanger nodded and said: "Okay"

Qi Jia opened the bedroom door, a large cardboard box was placed at the entrance, Qi Jia curiously walked up to it and opened the lid, there was a beautiful wedding dress inside. Qi Jia held the wedding dress in her arms, looked at herself in the mirror, then the scene shifted to a church, where guests were queuing up to enter.

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: Chun Hu angrily said: "What is going on here"
Second Brother handed the letter to Chun Hu and said: "Chun Hu, take a look," Chun Hu took the letter and started reading it.

Chun Hu holding the agreement, read: "For the convenience of managing our household and establishing a business," "my brother and I have voluntarily decided to divide our household." "Eldest brother, Lin Genwang," "will support our father," "and second brother, Lin Genxing," "will support our mother." "Both will look after their respective parents," "provide for their every need till the end," "bear clear responsibilities," "and not interfere in each other's affairs." "To ensure there is proof of this arrangement," "we're putting this in writing as a testament."
Old Father said: "This is all what we agreed upon back then, written in black and white"
Old Father said: "The two of us elders, each living in a different house, if one of us falls ill in the middle of the night, no one would even know, let alone take care of us."
Second Brother said: "My old man and I want to chat and speak our minds," "but we have to do it behind their backs," "it feels like being thieves."
Old Father said: "This, both of us living separately, my legs are not good. Last night, I got up to get some water and fell. When my old wife found out," "she wanted to move in to take care of me"
Mother said: "But Eldest Brother adamantly refused." "He said if she moved in, the two brothers would no longer look after us."
Chun Hu said: "Living together is no big deal," "and we're family now."

Eldest Brother said: "Of course not" "My dad's health is poor" "My mom just had surgery last year" "If both of them live in my house" "Food, drinks, medical expenses, all would be on me alone. How can I afford it? And he wouldn't help."
Second Brother said: "What, I don't help?" "Who paid the twenty thousand yuan hospital fee for mom's surgery last year?"

Chun Hu said excitedly: "Stop arguing, aren't you ashamed?" "This is about supporting your parents, not contracting a turtle pond." "Genwang, Genxing," "I initially agreed to let you join our turtle farming cooperative," "but now, I need to reconsider."

Chun Hu angrily said: "If you don't support your parents, it means you have no character. And people without character are not welcome in our cooperative. When we'll allow you to join depends on your future conduct, understood?"
Old Father looked at Chun Hu and said: "Chun Hu, in the future, can my old wife and I still live together?"

Chun Hu continued: "Don't worry" "This agreement is not valid" "There are laws in the country" "Just because you signed an agreement to separately support each parent" "doesn't mean you only take care of your own" "If you don't look after them," "it constitutes the crime of abandonment." "Even if you take it to court," "the judge will likely side with me." "Alright," "regarding the issue of supporting parents," "don't just think about how much money you are spending."

movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.text: The scene shifts to the outside of the emergency treatment station where workers in protective suits are still busy. They are pouring large quantities of white powder into a large iron barrel.
The crowd was directed to enter the decontamination tent, and the infected person was taken to the police car by the officers.

The police were cutting off the clothes of the infected people, and the infected were being sent to the disinfection room. The police would check the infected people's bodies, and then they would be sent to the designated treatment center.
The scene shifts to the street, where two police cars slowly drive to a square and stop. Several police officers get out of the cars, looking around.

Li Yanming, who was walking, suddenly stopped and took out his phone to make a call. The people behind him looked puzzled. Li Yanming had already hung up the phone. The reporters were discussing the incident.

Li Yanming was the first to step forward, wearing a mask and a protective suit. The others followed, some hesitantly taking a step forward. The plastic curtain separated two groups of people, one clean and one dirty.
A police officer came over and said: "Professor," "The police need you now."

Zhao Zhiren looked at Li Yanming with a puzzled expression, then lowered his head to look at the ticket in his hand. After putting on his glasses, he stared at Li Yanming and said: "Mr. Lee, our drill isn't over yet."
Li Yanming asked: "Why are you doing a drill?" Zhao Zhiren was taken aback and didn't know how to answer.

Zhao Zhiren asked: "Why are you looking for me? Honestly, Mr. Lee, I don't really like working with government agencies. Everything you do is classified. I know nothing. How can I collaborate with you? Right?"

Li Yanming said: "The National Intelligence Service of Korea suspects their number one wanted man, a man nicknamed 'Equator', along with his assistant courier, successfully stole raw material spheres and handheld devices from both Koreas. UK MI6 intercepted reliable information that the weapon will be handed over in Hong Kong. Korean experts are on their way to Hong Kong. So far, I know what you know."
Zhao Zhiren glanced at Zhang Yijun, then turned his head and said: "This is all classified."
Li Yanming said: "When you're asked to work," "you have the right to know." "You are a physics professor, not Snowden."
The two took off their glasses and fastened their seat belts. The scene shifted to an airport runway at night, where a plane was slowly landing.
Jin Taonian came up and said: "Hello"

The plane landed smoothly, and a car drove up to the plane and stopped. The captain and the ground crew stood in two lines to welcome them. The people in the car were Jin Taonian and Cui Minho. Cui Minho looked around with a serious face, then opened the car door and walked out.

movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.text: Lu Xiaoxing turned around, walked to the door, and opened it. The dazzling light made her squint her eyes. She took a few steps forward, and the image of Mr. Ma appeared in the corridor.

Lu Xiaoxing and Cong Cong (Animal) left the hospital. Lu Xiaoxing walked out of the hospital main gate with Cong Cong (Animal), and a group of security guards followed them. Lu Xiaoxing and Cong Cong (Animal) walked out of the gate, and the security guards followed behind them.
Lu Xiaoxing and Mr. Ma met again. Cong Cong (Animal) was very happy to see them. Mr. Ma said: "Three years without seeing you, you now have such a cool bodyguard."
Lu Xiaoxing said: "It's called Cong Cong (Animal), it is my eyes."
Lu Xiaoxing looked at Cong Cong (Animal) and said, "Cong Cong (Animal), indeed looks quite handsome."

Lu Xiaoxing said: "Mr. Ma, I have learned braille in the past three years." "I can now type, read, and surf the internet proficiently." "Cong Cong (Animal) can take me anywhere I want to go." "I believe that blindness can no longer be an obstacle to my work and life." "I want to re-apply for admission."
Mr. Ma said: "Lu Xiaoxing, I don't want to discourage you. The reason you had to leave the school was not because of your blindness, but due to your severe violation of rules."

Mr. Ma continued: "During your internship with the police" "you left your post without permission." "Your impulsive actions" "resulted in serious consequences." "I know your brother's death" "was a huge blow to you." "But that mistake" "is something that cannot be undone." "If you ask me, you should go back."
Lu Xiaoxing pressed the switch, and the traffic light changed from red to green.

Lu Xiaoxing and Cong Cong (Animal) stopped at the zebra crossing. The traffic light was red. Lu Xiaoxing looked at the traffic light, and the red light turned green. Lu Xiaoxing and Cong Cong (Animal) continued forward. Lu Xiaoxing was about to cross the road when a car suddenly came from the side and hit Lu Xiaoxing. The scene froze, and Lu Xiaoxing's figure turned into a faint light.

Lu Xiaoxing was walking with Cong Cong (Animal) when suddenly a car honked at them. Lu Xiaoxing turned around in confusion. The car honked again, and Lu Xiaoxing looked back and said: "Are you looking to die? Can't you see where you're walking? I almost ran you over!"
Lu Xiaoxing ran desperately on the road, her hair flying wildly in the wind, and she kept looking back.

Lu Xiaoxing was walking on the road when suddenly a car almost hit them. She looked around in confusion. She looked at the traffic light, and when the green light came on, she hesitated for a moment. She looked at Cong Cong (Animal) and then walked forward slowly.
Lu Xiaoxing was exhausted, leaning on the roadside steps, panting heavily. She reached into her pocket, but to her surprise, there was no money. She kept looking.

Lu Xiaoxing touched the wounds on his leg, then took out a spray from his bag and sprayed it. Back home, Lu Xiaoxing packed up his work materials and personal items. He put away the photos with Mr. Ma in them and put them on the bookshelf.
She opened the packaging to find that it was indeed the book she had ordered. She put down the boxes and looked at the books, her face filled with a happy smile.

Lu Xiaoxing sat on the floor, watching Cong Cong (Animal) eat heartily. She looked at Cong Cong (Animal) with a face full of love and anticipation. Cong Cong (Animal) seemed to understand her owner's wishes, finishing the meal in one go.

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: Man continued: "Think about the old man's wishes, take good care of the old man's health, that's settled then, the two old men will live together, as for the support payments, the two brothers will split them equally."
The next day, the village was as quiet as usual, with only a few villagers wandering around. A calf was leisurely sucking milk from its mother in a yard.
Old Secretary walked out of the office, shaking hands and greeting Mayor Yang: "Oh, Mayor Yang, hello, hello, hello"
Mayor Yang said: "I heard your blood pressure has been a bit high recently. You really need to take care of yourself."
Old Secretary said: "It's a minor issue, no big deal, no big deal."
Mayor Yang said: "Please, please, please, come on in."
Man said: "Please, please, I've come today, mainly to prepare for the re-election of our Camellia Village Party organization, to get a sense of things."
At this moment, a man in a gray suit came over and asked: "Mayor Yang, are there any new policies for this year's election?"

Mayor Yang said: "This year's village Party organization election is not just the business of the Party members. We're implementing a system of two nominations and one election. Candidates are nominated by both Party members and the public. The entire village can participate."
Man in Gray Clothes said: "What if some people are away all year, working or doing business and can't come back, how can they be recommended then?"
Mayor Yang said: "Public recommendation cannot be delegated," "We will try our best to inform them," "Those who can come back should come back," "Those who can't," "will have to forgo this right"
Man in Gray Clothes said: "Alright Mayor Yang, let's sit inside."
Mayor Yang said: "Alright, alright, let's go", and the group set off together.
Seated Woman said: "From what you're saying, my Xian Gen isn't a Party member, so he has no chance of becoming the village Party Secretary?"
Woman in Black Clothes said: "Your Xian Gen, even if he were a Party member, he still wouldn't stand a chance."
Seated Woman asked: "Why?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "I'm not joking, hey, look here, the problem with your illegal house construction last year for the wedding, that's no small matter, so even if your Xian Gen were elected, he would be removed from office."
Seated Woman said: "Is it that serious?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "Of course." "Anyone who was released from prison less than five years ago," "violated family planning policies," "or didn't fulfill their duties for a long time, is disqualified."

Woman in White Clothes said: "Hey, if you count it this way, there aren't many qualified people in our village. My Fang Sheng is one. But on the other hand, our nursery business has been growing, he doesn't even have time to catch a breath. Even if he were elected, he wouldn't care."
Seated Woman said: "Oh, you're boasting"
The next day, Man in Gray Clothes and Woman in Black Clothes went to the tea garden to pick tea. Man in Gray Clothes was running in the tea garden and shouted: "Xiao Bao, hurry up"
Man in Gray Clothes: "Alright, got it"
Man in Gray Clothes asked: "Is it heavy?"
Man in Gray Clothes said: "Not heavy"
Mayor Yang: "If it's not heavy, then move faster"
Man in Gray Clothes said: "I'm catching up"

movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.text: Dean: "Oh my, I've heard that the two of you are considered the golden couple among this year's graduates." "You guys managed to express a commitment to each other in a way that makes us all believe in love again." The audience broke into warm applause.

Qi Jia, holding Liu Chong's hand, said: "I, Qi Jia, am willing to marry Liu Chong as his lawful wife. In good times and better, in wealth and more wealth, in health and better health, for the rest of my life, I will love you, be loyal to you, cherish you, until death do us part."

Liu Chong, with a smile on his face, accepted the certificate from the dean. Qi Jia, standing below, was filled with envy. Lin Shuer, looking at Liu Chong on stage, was filled with regret. She said: "I'm not ready yet." The scene freezes on the faces of the three of them.
Qi Jia: 'Dizzy, chest tightness, shortness of breath, heart palpitations, weak legs. All these symptoms started at that moment. And what happened next, I just can't recall.'
The scene shifts to a hospital, where Qi Jia is standing at the nurse's station, looking down at the form in her hand. The title of the film, 'Meet Miss Anxiety,' appears on the screen.

The scene shifts to a hospital, where Old Doctor is urgently pushing a hospital bed, with a mother and daughter walking behind, the mother holding the child's hand and skipping along. The child is holding a toy in her arms, and the mother is holding the child's hand, both of them happily hopping forward.
The scene shifts to the hospital, where Qi Jia is pushing Lin Shuer to the surgery room, and the corridor is bustling with people coming and going.

The scene shifts to the hospital, where Lin Shuer is sitting in the corridor, looking at her phone. She is watching a video of a man and a woman embracing and kissing, with the title 'Scandal' appearing on the screen.
The scene shifts to the hospital, where Qi Jia and her family are waiting for the doctor to see her.

The scene shifts to a hospital, where Qi Jia is sitting in the lobby waiting for Old Doctor to see the doctor. The phone screen shows a message from Old Doctor, which reads: 'Qi Jia, I am sorry, I have a lot of work to do, can't take care of you now, wait until it's over, come to the pharmacy to buy medicine.'

The scene shifts to the gynecological clinic, where Old Doctor is diagnosing patients. A woman with a white beard is wiping sweat and talking to Old Doctor: '"Menopausal syndrome," "Take the prescribed medicine," "Control your diet and maintain hygiene," "Next patient."'
The man in the floral shirt said: "My Chris always encourages me, not having MC doesn't mean anything. Tomorrow is another day, but every day is the same."
Old Doctor: "Menopausal syndrome," "Take the prescribed medicine," "Control your diet and maintain hygiene," "Keep exercising."
Qi Jia said with red eyes: 'Can you say something else?'

Old Doctor: "Menopausal syndrome," "In traditional Chinese medicine it's called syndromes before and after menopause," "Kidney Qi declines, Tian Gui is exhausted, Chong and Ren are imbalanced, organs lack nourishment, Qi and blood are deficient."
Qi Jia replied: "I just missed my period. If this were a cheesy TV drama, I'd be pregnant."
Qi Jia suddenly stood up and said: '"What are you looking at?" "A CT scan with your naked eye?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.text: Li Yanming, with a vacant expression, said: 'Since coming back from Macau,' 'I've been constantly thinking,' 'Why? Why am I always one step behind the Equator?'
Zhao Zhiren took a sip of coffee, looking at Li Yanming with a smile, then put down the coffee cup, leaned forward, and said seriously, "The Equator."
Zhao Zhiren looked at him with a smile, but Li Yanming's gaze was fixed on him, not moving. He continued, 'Both the United States and South Korea have failed to find you over the years. I'm honored.'
Zhao Zhiren said: 'Know I'm the Equator, and just come with these few people?'
Li Yanming said, 'Mr. Song hasn't left yet. No matter how sure I am, I can't give this credit to him.'
Zhao Zhiren tilted his head and looked at Li Yanming with a smile, saying: "Your character will kill you." "Do you want to be the police chief?"
Li Yanming said: "Chief? Back in high school, he was still copying my homework. Don’t mention this to anyone." Li Yanming said with a smile, and Zhao Zhiren laughed and adjusted his glasses.
Zhao Zhiren took off his glasses, looked at Li Yanming with a smile, and asked, "Why"
Zhao Zhiren lowered his head and said, "There's no reason." "It's just business." Zhao Zhiren's eyes were not as sharp as usual, and he looked down.
Zhao Zhiren said: "In the entire process, you did one thing wrong." "You should not have hit a woman." "Apologize to her."

Zhang Yijun, with a sinister smile, strangles Li Yanming's neck with a wire. Li Yanming, in pain, struggles and rolls over, trying to free himself. Zhang Yijun, however, continues to pull him by the wire, dragging him along.

Zhang Yijun, who was originally pinned down, suddenly stood up, grabbed Li Yanming's neck with one hand, and lifted him up. Then, with a fierce look, he punched Li Yanming to the ground. Li Yanming, who was lying on the ground, quickly got up and grabbed Zhang Yijun's ankle, twisting it forcefully. Zhang Yijun, in pain, let go of Li Yanming and fell to the ground.

Jin Taonian, who was originally standing in front of the bookshelf, stepped forward and pressed Li Yanming's neck with his knee. Li Yanming struggled desperately, but Jin Taonian pressed down even harder. Zhao Zhiren, who was originally observing the situation from the table, stood up in anger.
The man in gray clothes, who was pushed down, was struggling to get up. He was also one of the four K-88 members. Zhao Zhiren looked at the man with a fierce expression.

Li Yanming was pinned to the ground by a hand on his shoulder. He looked up to see that it was Zhang Yijun. Zhao Zhiren stood beside them, expressionless, while Jin Taonian looked at Zhao Zhiren with a smirk.

At this moment, Li Yanming's eyeball suddenly became lifeless, and his pupils uncontrollably dilated. Zhao Zhiren tightened his grip on the hand holding the poison pill. Li Yanming's eyes gradually turned black.
Zhao Zhiren, with a cold expression, turned and left. Li Yanming, lying on the ground, had a look of peace on his face.

movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.text: Lin Chong looked at the ukulele in his hands, then turned and walked out of the lobby. Xiao Xing sat on a bench in the park, recalling the scene when she first met Lin Chong.
Lin Chong sang, "The dark sky hangs low, bright stars follow, the insects fly, whom are you missing?"
Lin Chong picked up the guitar and started playing, singing 'Roses on the Ground withered' 'Cold wind blows, cold wind blows' 'Who are you thinking of'

Lin Chong sang while looking at Xiao Xing: "As long as you're by my side" "Insects fly, flowers sleep" "Pairs after pairs are beautiful" "Not afraid of the dark" "Only afraid of a broken heart" "No matter if we're weary" "Nor the directions far and wide."

Lin Chong stopped playing, put down the ukulele, and took out the phone from the bag next to him. He handed the phone to Xiao Xing and said, "Oh, a message from Captain Lu, he says, the criminal has been apprehended, asking where we are."
Lin Chong and Xiao Xing sat on a park bench, looking at their cell phones, with the music box in the car playing softly.
Tang Zheng sent a message to Xiao Xing, then heaved a sigh of relief, threw his phone onto the road, and drove off into the distance.
The group walked towards the ambulance, and someone shouted, "Hurry up, Shan Dui, Shan Dui, Shan Dui."
Jingkuang said, 'Shan Dui, I can't seem to get in touch with Captain Lu.'
Shan Dui asked again, "Where is his car?"
Jingkuang pointed behind and said, "It's back there."
Shan Dui turned around and said, "You go look for him again," "Come with me."
Shan Dui said, "They're coming," and then ran away.

The camera cuts to the interior of the house, where a series of footsteps can be heard. The camera follows the footprints, moving from the wooden floor to the marble floor, and finally stops at the feet of a man wearing leather shoes.
Tang Zheng took out a bottle of wine from the bag and poured a glass, then opened the piano lid and started playing. Xiao Xing came downstairs, sat on the sofa, and looked at Tang Zheng.
Xiao Xing closed the door and saw Tang Zheng playing the piano. She turned on the light, walked towards Tang Zheng, and softly called out, "Lin Chong."
Xiao Xing asked, "Is that Captain Lu?"
Xiao Xing saw Shan Dui holding a bottle of wine with a paper boat in it, and asked, "Who is it?"
Tang Zheng turned his head and called out, 'Sister.'
Tang Zheng turned around and said, "Don't be nervous."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: Yuan Xiaoou stood in front of the mirror, buttoning up a shirt, then put on a suit, adjusting the suit jacket while looking at himself in the mirror. Lin Shuer walked out of the fitting room, looking around, and saw Yuan Xiaoou coming out from a fitting room behind her.
Yuan Xiaoou buttoning up his suit jacket, walked towards Lin Shuer and said: "Didn't you always say your boyfriend is tall and strong? Why are the clothes so small?"
Yuan Xiaoou buttoning his suit, said: "Wear whatever fits." "Why are you complaining so much?"

Lin Shuer: "Hey, it's fine." Lin Shuer, holding the wedding bouquet, ran out of the church, while Yuan Xiaoou drove up in a luxury sports car. Lin Shuer opened the car door and helped Qi Jia into the passenger seat.
Qi Jia asked: "Do I look much different from graduation?"
Lin Shuer said: "It's been over three years. Who hasn't changed a bit?"
The officiant asked: "Where's the bride?"
Lin Shuer looked around and said: "The bride's wedding car is still stuck on Xizhi Bridge." "Let's cut in line and go first."
Lin Shuer: "Today is your last chance. If you fail, turn this wedding into your funeral. Bury your ignorant youth and obsessive love."
The scene switches to the wedding day, Lin Shuer and Liu Chong walk arm in arm down the aisle, the guests applaud and smile, Liu Chong looks at Lin Shuer and says: "What's the matter, nervous?"
The priest asked: "Groom, do you pledge to love her and regard her as your wife for the rest of your life? Do you?"
Liu Chong: "I do."
The priest asked: "Bride, do you pledge to love him and regard him as your husband for the rest of your life? Do you?"
Qi Jia held Liu Chong's arm, looking down, while Lin Shuer stood behind them, looking at the two. The priest then announced that the two were husband and wife.
Qi Jia said: "I, Qi Jia, am willing to marry Liu Chong as my lawful husband—whether in health or greater health, in wealth or greater wealth."
Qi Jia: "Starting today," "I am willing to love you," "be faithful to you," "cherish you," "until death do us part."
Liu Chong said: "You already made a choice. Why overturn it now?"
Qi Jia walked up to Liu Chong and said: 'I am willing to go anywhere with you.'
Qi Jia said: "I don't love you anymore." "Just go."

Qi Jia turned to look at Liu Chong, who was at a loss for a moment, then turned to look down the aisle. At that moment, Lin Shuer appeared at the church entrance, walking slowly towards the wedding stage.

Qi Jia, holding the bouquet, walked slowly down the aisle, her face showing a hint of nervousness. Yuan Xiaoou stood at the front of the church, his eyes fixed on Qi Jia. Lin Shuer also looked at Qi Jia with a face full of anticipation. Qi Jia's eyes were filled with tears as she looked at Yuan Xiaoou.

Qi Jia, looking at Liu Chong, was momentarily stunned. She had never thought that the man she had loved for so long would treat her like this. Her eyes were filled with tears, but she still managed to smile. Liu Chong, with a heavy heart, walked towards the altar, while Lin Shuer stood aside, watching everything.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.text: The car windows were riddled with bullet holes, and the building behind was ablaze with thick smoke.

The cargo hold door opened slowly, and a group of neatly dressed people appeared in the frame. They were all wearing black mourning clothes, carrying a long rectangular casket. The people at the front of the group were wearing military uniforms, standing solemnly.

The coffin was slowly carried onto the hearse. The pallbearers were all wearing mourning masks, their expressions somber. One of them carried a photo of Cui Minho. In the photo, Cui Minho was dressed in a suit, exuding an air of gentleness.
Yun Hee-sun was deeply moved and had tears in her eyes. She said: "I want to talk to my husband."
Cui Minho sat in the car, looking at the photo of his father, his eyes gradually moistening. Meanwhile, Yun Hee-sun's mother was helped down from the vehicle by a bodyguard.
Yun Hee-sun, unable to hold back her grief, ran forward, and the staff quickly stopped her.
Cui Minho looked at Yun Hee-sun with a face full of pleading and said: "Where is Min-kyun?"
At this moment, Kim Hae-sook and a few others walked over. Yun Hee-sun stood up and said: "Director Choi, we really appreciate you."
Cui Minho looked at the man and said: "We for him"
Cui Minho looked at everyone and said: "Everyone has worked hard."
Cui Minho said: "My greatest regret is that I couldn't protect Woo-cheol."
Kim Hae-sook said: "Director Choi, we truly appreciate your efforts. Welcome back safely."
Cui Minho slowly raised his hand, trying hard to move his fingers. He tried to speak, but couldn't form words. Yun Hee-sun covered her mouth, sobbing softly.
Cui Minho: "Deputy Director Choi Minho of the National Intelligence Service reporting to the general and the Director of the National Intelligence Service."
Yun Hee-sun quickly stepped forward to support Cui Minho's head, then held his hand. Cui Minho placed his hand on Yun Hee-sun's palm, and they held each other tightly.
Cui Minho opened his eyes and looked at the woman in front of him, then slowly closed his eyes again. The scene shifted to Shanghai World Financial Center.

The scene switches to an office, where a subordinate is reporting to the manager: "Mr. Song, we found out that this Professor Zhao Zhiren is not a Vietnamese Chinese, according to the nation's information, he is a member of the Kuomintang in Taiwan."

movie101_7010686199291445773_5160_5340.text: Tang Zheng said, "People like us," "how could we be afraid?" "Do you know," "I've always thought the reason you got in my car that day" "was fate," "because we share the same misery."

Tang Zheng turned his head to look at her, then turned back to the wine glass in his hand. Xiao Xing pushed the door open and rushed into the room. Tang Zheng stood up and said, "You love your brother, and I love my sister."

Xiao Xing said, "But they died by our hands," "My life is ruined," "Even this can't help with the pain inside me," "Could anything be more hopeless," "Might as well," "Let's join them," "I'll help you."
Lin Chong came out from around the corner and shouted, "Sister, run!"
Tang Zheng and Lin Chong were knocked to the ground by the bookshelf, and Xiao Xing was stunned watching them.
Lin Chong shouted, "Xiao Xing sis, call the police, hurry!"
Tang Zheng grabbed Lin Chong by the collar and pushed him against the wall, choking him fiercely.
Tang Zheng grabbed Lin Chong's collar and was about to strangle him when Lin Chong bit his arm. Tang Zheng pushed Lin Chong away, and Lin Chong was thrown onto the coffee table in the lobby.
