Lin Chong hurriedly got up and ran towards the stairs. Xiao Xing followed closely behind, but Tang Zheng suddenly appeared and grabbed Lin Chong's hand, pulling him back. Xiao Xing arrived just in time and kicked Tang Zheng away.

Xiao Xing, who had just run out, was tripped by Tang Zheng's foot. Her phone fell to the ground, and she was about to pick it up when she was grabbed by the collar by Tang Zheng. Lin Chong rushed over, pulling at Tang Zheng's hands.
Tang Zheng grabbed Lin Chong's collar and glared at him fiercely. Lin Chong tried to break free but was held tight. Tang Zheng suddenly let go, and Lin Chong took the opportunity to escape.
Tang Zheng grabbed Lin Chong's arm and threw her to the ground. The already dazed Lin Chong barely reacted before Tang Zheng kicked her in the stomach, causing her to pass out.
Tang Zheng was walking up the stairs with his luggage, while Xiao Xing was frantically packing her belongings.
Xiao Xing hurriedly searched every corner of the room, Tang Zheng also searched the room but was more cautious, only took a few steps before stopping.
Xiao Xing quickly turned off the tape recorder, and Tang Zheng walked over and plugged the phone charger into the power outlet.
The lights in the villa suddenly turned on, and Xiao Xing, who was in the middle room, hurriedly hid under the bed. Tang Zheng, who was in the bedroom, stood up and looked around.
Tang Zheng, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally entered the building. He took out his phone from his pocket and dialed Xiao Xing's number.
In the pitch-dark hallway, Tang Zheng lit a cigarette and waited for Xiao Xing.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The scene shifts, and the film officially begins. A luxurious car is seen driving along a mountain road.
The scene shifts to a mountain road, where a red Land Rover is driving. The road is lined with fallen leaves, and the vehicle's wheels kick up a spray of dust.
The car slowly drives along the mountain road, with bamboo forests on both sides, a gentle breeze blowing the leaves, and sunlight shining through the gaps in the bamboo.

The scene shifts, and a car stops in front of the village committee. A group of people come forward to open the car door. The man in the passenger seat gets out of the car. The man in the driver's seat holds an umbrella for him. The man in the passenger seat is Zhang Dong, the big brother everyone is talking about.
The scene shifts to four women sitting around a table, chatting. A few people pass by and one of the women asks, "Who is this rich man?"
The woman said: "Oh, that’s our village chief Zhang Dong. You don’t recognize him?"
The woman said: "She's only been married a few months." "The Village Chief spends most of his time in Jiangxi." "Of course, she wouldn't recognize him."

Another auntie said: "If you talk about our village, his family has the most brothers. I remember when they were little, all five of them would gang up in a fight. Everyone was afraid of them. They are very influential now."
Another woman said: "The oldest Zhang Dong is the village chief," "He doesn’t manage the village affairs and spends most of his time in Jiangxi doing nursery business."
The woman said: "The second brother, Zhang Xi, is a contractor." "Remember the road repair we had in our village?" "It was contracted to him."
The woman continued: "The third brother, Zhang Nan, is the security director of the village. He owes so much money to the small store that he could write a book about it."
The auntie continued: "The fourth brother, Zhang Bei, is the factory director of the flour mill. The fifth brother, Zhang Zhong, is a big local ruffian in the village."
Another woman said: "East, West, North, South, isn't this a full mahjong hand?" Everyone laughed.
The woman said: "Let me tell you, do you know why he came back from Jiangxi at this time?"
The woman in black asked: "Why?"
The woman said: "For Secretary selection."
Another woman said: "Oh, that makes sense."
The scene shifts to the outside of the restaurant, which is surrounded by greenery and has a simple yet elegant atmosphere.
The scene switches to the outside of the inn, where the innkeeper sees them off. The innkeeper says: "Come come come." "Zhang Dong, big brother, you must be tired from this trip."
Zhang Dong asked: "Anything happened in the village during the half-year I was away?"
The man in red said: "Brother, these are the materials prepared by the brothers." "Come, have a look." "Sit down."
The man eating noodles said: "Brother, our cousin Zhang Baoliang has now surpassed the Sapium Wood King Zhang Baotang and has become the new richest man in our village."

The man in the red shirt said: "The assistant village chief Liu Mengting has organized some kind of environmental volunteer team." "It seems that she has some big opinions about the water quality of the Da Xi River outside our village."
Zhang Dong said: "Just a bunch of kids messing around."
The man said: "Big brother."

movie101_6969128872847770149_6540_6720.text: Song An analyzed: "According to the bulletin given to us by Interpol, his two couriers were last seen with an underground buyer nicknamed 'His Highness' in Estonia. We suspect that they made the transaction for the DC8 here. Also, we've analyzed the information Mr. Lee left us before his death, we believe the next target from the equator should be in Kyoto."

Song An's expression was complex, with a hint of helplessness and regret. The scene shifted to a snowy mountain in Japan, with a temple at the peak. Two stone lions stood guard, and the gate was closed, with no visitors in sight.
The scene shifts to the entrance of the village, where a stone tiger stands guard. The weather is gloomy, and a train slowly approaches the village.

The scene shifted to a small town, with a train slowly arriving at the station. A car drove past the station, and the camera slowly panned down to reveal that it was a vehicle for the Japanese Red Cross Society.

The four of them were still stretching their arms when a minivan suddenly drove up. The driver was a Japanese man, and the person in the passenger seat was a middle-aged man with glasses. The Japanese man in the passenger seat looked at the four people stretching their arms, then turned his head and got off the car.
Song An got out of the car, looked around, and then pressed the start button on the machine. The machine started to operate, and the sound of the machine came on.

Song An opened the mailbox, and a group of people walked towards the post office. The group was led by a man in a suit, with the rest following behind in coats and carrying bags. They walked in an orderly fashion, and Song An was among them.
The two walked into the station together, Song An glanced around and then led the woman to a bench to sit down. The woman placed her bag beside her.

He sat on the bench beside the heater, took out a pack of cigarettes from his pocket, but hesitated to take one out. He rubbed his hands together, the heater beside him was slowly emitting heat, Song An placed his hands on the heater, feeling the warmth bit by bit seeping into his skin, spreading through his veins and arteries, slowly reaching his brain. The cold in his body seemed to be burnt away a little.
The train slowly arrived at the station. The platform was empty, with only a few security guards standing in place. A man with a backpack walked briskly towards the train.

The man in black coat and hat on the train was quietly observing the people in the car. The man in white overalls was leaning against the car window, holding a small notebook and pen, covertly writing something. The man in black coat and hat on the train suddenly stood up and left the car. Song An and his companion sat in the waiting room, one reading a newspaper and the other fiddling with a bamboo basket.
The staff said: "Mr. Song An, we're ready."

Song An walked out of the station with a serious face, followed by a group of subordinates. He took the light rail home, sitting in the vehicle and staring out the window, lost in thought. His expression was very serious, as if he was preoccupied with something. The station was bustling with people, but Song An was the only one in the vehicle. He remained silent, deep in thought.
The train slowly started moving forward. The snow outside the window fell continuously, and the trees were covered with thick snow, making the whole scene look like a painting.

On the way to Italy, Song An and his group took a train. They arrived at a small town in Italy. Song An walked through the aisle of the train, his eyes scanning the surroundings. He noticed a young man and a young woman walking towards him. Song An's gaze fell on the young man's suit pocket, and he walked up to him. The young man took out a book from his pocket, and Song An sat down opposite him.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: Qi Jia ran out of the church, holding up her skirt, and ran down the street. Qi Jia ran and ran, with a big smile on her face, and said, "Qi Jia, you don't love me as much as you think, because you always want me to love you more. You haven't realized this until now, but I know."
Qi Jia ran into the church, looking around for Liu Chong.

"You will definitely regret this," Yuan Xiaoou said, then turned and left. Qi Jia, who was standing at the wedding scene, watched as Yuan Xiaoou left the church, then turned and walked towards the archbishop, while Liu Chong looked at the now empty church in a daze.

Qi Jia thought to herself: "This love is like a tug of war, we both want the other to love us more." "Desperately trying to win the game." "But I forgot, if the other lets go of the rope first." "You'll just fall and hurt yourself badly." "I've been asleep in this dream for seven years." "When I woke up, he had already reached the other side and I didn't know where I was."
The scene shifted to a bustling road, with cars coming and going incessantly.

Qi Jia returned home alone, dragging a suitcase as usual, but this time there was no smile on her face. She went to the kitchen, her eyes dull, and looked around. She reached out to touch the little bear on the shelf, as if trying to get back to normal, but her eyes were still filled with sadness.

Qi Jia returned home after the wedding, lifted the curtain in the kitchen, and was surprised to find the shelf full of various kinds of edible medicinal materials. She looked at the shelf with satisfaction, then opened the door to the cabinet, where a box of wedding cookies and other items were stored.

Qi Jia opened the cabinet doors, inside were various kinds of milk and soybean milk. She squatted down and slowly closed the doors. Next, she opened the drawer doors, inside were beans and grains. She reached in and fumbled around.
Qi Jia was about to open the drawer when she heard Yuan Xiaoou's footsteps. She quickly pulled out a kitchen knife from the knife box and hid it behind the door panel.
Yuan Xiaoou's voice came from outside: "What are you rummaging through?"
Qi Jia squatted in the kitchen, suddenly stood up and said to Yuan Xiaoou, "I forgot something very important."
Qi Jia said, "What are you looking for? I'll help you find it."
Qi Jia turned around, ready to cook, and said, "I just forgot what I forgot." "It's just early menopause, I'm not senile." Qi Jia paused, then said, "Why do I forget everything!"
Yuan Xiaoou comforted her: "Don't worry, don't worry." "Forgetfulness is also a symptom of early menopause." "It's something very important, right?"
Yuan Xiaoou nodded and said, "Hmm."
Yuan Xiaoou said, "That very important thing probably isn't in the kitchen, right?" "It should be in your room." "Think along those lines."
Yuan Xiaoou quickly agreed: "Yes, yes, yes."
Qi Jia turned around and said, "Isn't it?"
Qi Jia turned and walked away, saying, "Why am I so smart?"
Yuan Xiaoou lying on the bed said, "Wine bottle, mineral water bottle, shoe brush." "Which one are you looking for?"
Yuan Xiaoou lying on the bed said, "It's this one." "But where's my turtle?"
Yuan Xiaoou got up and asked, "In the middle of the night, what are you looking for a fish tank for?"
Qi Jia holding the fish tank said, "Yuan Xiaoou, you have to help me find my turtle."
Qi Jia asked, "When did you raise a turtle?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_5340_5520.text: Tang Zheng lit a cigarette with a lighter, the flame flickered on his face, he turned and walked up the stairs, the lighter's flame casting a dim light on the wall, he reached the top of the stairs, and the flame on the lighter gradually died out.

Xiao Xing, with a face full of sorrow, didn't notice the subtle changes in her body. As she continued to cry, her body began to tremble uncontrollably. Tang Zheng, who had just come out of the elevator, was walking along the corridor with a cigarette in his mouth. He was about to enter the room when he saw Xiao Xing's condition through the door crack.

He turned around and walked a few steps, suddenly stopped, looked around, and then he lit a cigarette. As he was about to take a big drag, he noticed a trail of cigarette butts on the ground. He followed the trail and found a half-smoked cigarette. He stepped on it hard and then turned around.
Tang Zheng walked in with a lighter, the light from the flame casting on his face, revealing his anxious expression. He closed the door behind him and walked further into the elevator.

Tang Zheng, holding a lighter, cautiously approached the room. The light from the doorway shone into the room, revealing a somewhat cluttered desk and a bed covered with a quilt. Tang Zheng looked up at the window, and suddenly, a gunshot echoed from upstairs.
Tang Zheng lit a lighter and walked towards the window. The rain outside was fierce, as if trying to break in. The thunder was loud and the flashes of lightning split the sky.

Xiao Xing, who had just opened the door, was about to enter when she saw the scene. She immediately hid behind the door and called Tang Zheng. Tang Zheng took out his phone and dialed Xiao Xing's number, but there was no answer.

Jingkuang closed the door, leaving Tang Zheng and Xiao Xing inside. Xiao Xing, who had been hiding in the darkness, immediately turned on the light. Tang Zheng, who had just closed the door, was startled by the sudden light and quickly turned off the light again.

Xiao Xing looked at the door in front of her, her pupils dilating. In her imagination, the figure of the perpetrator gradually became clear. It was a man with a gaunt face, hollow eyes, and a gaunt figure. Xiao Xing's body involuntarily shrank back.

Jingkuang, who had just entered the door, was startled by the sight of a cigarette butt on the floor. Xiao Xing, who had just stood up, was startled by the sight of the cigarette butt on the floor. Jingkuang, who had just stood up, was startled by the sight of the cigarette butt on the floor.
Xiao Xing, who had just rushed out of the elevator, was drenched in blood, with a trail of fresh blood extending from the corridor to the elevator.
The phone screen flickered in the dark, Tang Zheng holding a lighter, cautiously illuminating the hallway with the flame.
The scene shifts to a man in a trench coat, who sneaks into a house in the dead of night. He tiptoes to the bathroom, where the bathtub is filled with water and flowers float on the surface.

Xiao Xing, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally got the opportunity to break in. She took out a card and placed it on the reader, then gently pushed the door open and walked in. Jingkuang, who had been soaking in the pool, slowly got up and walked towards the door.

Xiao Xing, who had just entered the room, saw the door of the room being sealed. She hurriedly ran to the door, but the door was already sealed. She couldn't get in. Jingkuang also rushed over, but the door was sealed too. Jingkuang shouted: "Lin Chong"
Jingkuang: "Lu Li" "Lu Li" "Pull yourself together" "Lu Li"
Lu Li, struggling to speak, said: "Xiao Xing," "Danger!"
Jingkuang shouted: "Over here!" "Lu Li is here!" "Somebody help!"
Xiao Xing hurriedly walked down the stairs, calling out: "Lin Chong", "Lin Chong", "Where are you?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Liu Mengting, this place has a beautiful view, how about I take a photo for you?' Liu Mengting agreed. Zhang Xiaobao put down his backpack and started taking photos.
Liu Mengting said: 'Good,' 'Sit here,' 'Sit,' 'Sit well,' 'One, two, three,' 'Hmm, looks good.'
Zhang Xiaobao asked: "Liu Mengting, didn’t you just go into town a couple of days ago? Why are you heading to the city again?"

Liu Mengting said: "Old Lady He is almost out of medicine, Uncle Lin needs to get a senior's card, his daughter needs to apply for a birth permit, and then there's Old Lady Song, who wants me to bring a jar of pickles to her son in the city. Ah, I'm too busy to keep up."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Village assistant, I think you're just a runner and jack of all trades."
Liu Mengting said: "Nonsense, what I do is all about serving our villagers, unlike you, all talk no action."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "How have I been all talk no action?"
Liu Mengting said: "You’ve been talking about organizing a beautiful countryside photography exhibition for a while now, but there's been no movement on it yet."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Who says? The photos are all ready, look." "Not bad, right?" "Now, my dad is helping me find a venue," "As soon as the venue is secured, the exhibition will start."
Liu Mengting said: "Your dad, your dad, your dad, always bringing up your dad, when will you manage to do something on your own?"
Liu Mengting, seeing Zhang Xiaobao's hesitation, bravely stepped across the stones first, and Zhang Xiaobao, holding the plastic bag, followed suit.
Zhang Xiaobao asked: 'Liu Mengting, you’re always so busy, do you have any plans for the future?'

Liu Mengting said: "Well, my plan is to manage our village's water environment well, make our village a national ecological demonstration village, and then, protect our village's ancient buildings, and also, to develop our village's cultural tourism resources heavily, then let people from all over the country come visit our village."
Liu Mengting asked: "And then?"
Liu Mengting said: "And then, if I get the chance, I would like to go back to school to continue studying my major."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Still studying, huh? You’ll be an old maid by the time you're done, then how will you marry me?"
Liu Mengting shouted: "Stop it."

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Hey, Liu Mengting, actually I have my plans too. You know, my dad just bought me a car recently, right? He said he's going to buy me a house too." " Seeing as we’re both not so young anymore, shouldn’t we..."
Liu Mengting said: "Hey, why are you walking so slow? Old Lady He is waiting for us at home, let's move faster." The two hurriedly left the tea garden and arrived at the village.
After a while, the clay pot was steaming, and Liu Mengting covered it with a cloth and poured the steaming hot soup into the bowls.

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: Cui Minho walked up to the captain and said: "Cui Minho Director, thank you for being willing to help out this time too."

Then, the leaders got out of the cars and walked towards the airport together.

Cui Minho and Park Yuzhe walked side by side, their eyes following the direction in which Kim Hae-sook was taken. The bodyguard opened the car door, and Kim Hae-sook was put in the back seat of the car.

Cui Minho saluted, and Kim Hae-sook returned the salute. Kim Hae-sook said to Cui Minho: "Cui Minho Director," "You have worked hard this time," "I heard your son is having his first birthday feast today," "I've already sent someone to deliver a congratulatory gift to your home."
Cui Minho lowered his head and said: "You're too kind." Kim Hae-sook looked at him with a complex expression, then turned and walked away with Cui Minho.
Kim Hae-sook said while walking: "I've reviewed your records," "and to be honest," "I need to apologize on behalf of my father," "to your family," "Cui Minho," "the nation owes you a lot."
Cui Minho said: "I don't know what to say to that."

Kim Hae-sook said: "Park Yuzhe is our agency's best operative; he will ensure your complete safety. By working together, we will ensure a safe return for everyone. I entrust the safety of this country, as well as that of Northeast Asia, to you all."
Cui Minho said: "We will certainly do our best." The plane took off into the dark night, and the situation became more urgent. The special envoy team prepared to act.
The scene shifts to a room where a security guard says, "Chief Li, please place your cell phone and personal belongings here," and then puts away the items.
Zhao Zhiren said: "Thank you." Zhao Zhiren put the box aside, stood up, and walked towards Li Yanming, extending his hand to say: "Thank you."
The two policemen patted Zhao Zhiren down, finding nothing unusual, and then gestured to Li Yanming saying: "This way, please."

Zhao Zhiren and Li Yanming walked into the analysis room. The female officer scanned Zhao Zhiren's fingerprint, and Zhao Zhiren put on a virtual reality headset, while Li Yanming waited for the analysis report in front of the coffee table.

The scene shifts to the interior of the police station, where Zhao Zhiren and Li Yanming walk side by side, passing by rows of computer workstations. The two stop in front of a large screen displaying surveillance footage.

The scene shifts to the police station, where Li Yanming and Zhao Zhiren walk briskly into the command center. The colleagues who were originally busy with their work all stood up and greeted him, then returned to their posts.

The scene switches to a meeting room, where Li Yanming is holding documents and walking to his seat, followed by Zhao Zhiren and a female officer. The female officer hands the documents to Zhao Zhiren, who sits down after placing them on the table.
Li Yanming said: "This is Inspector General Wang Jian-zhong, aside from me, he will coordinate the operations of the crisis team entirely." Wang Jian-zhong stood up and left the room.

Wang Jian-zhong said: "Ladies and gentlemen present," "These underground buyers are very cunning," "But we have identified two locations," "And the Criminal Intelligence Division has tracked their movements."

movie101_7010686199291445773_5520_5700.text: Xiao Xing looked at Lin Chong, then at the window. She took a deep breath, steadied her emotions, and then removed the two locks on the window. She gently pushed the window open, and the rainwater immediately soaked her. She didn't hesitate and dragged the heavy chain through the two locks. After opening the window, she slowly pushed the door open.

Xiao Xing was about to open the door when a hand suddenly reached out from inside the room and grabbed the chain lock. Xiao Xing was startled and turned to see Tang Zheng standing on the balcony, about to climb in through the window.
Xiao Xing sang: "The dark sky hangs low" "The bright stars follow" "Insects fly, insects fly" "Who are you missing"
Police Officer said, "No good, request mobile phone location tracking."
The police officer said, "Xiao Hu, request mobile phone location tracking, keep calling Xiao Xing, hurry up."
The ambulance sped along the road, while Xiao Xing anxiously rushed into the villa, only to see Lin Chong lying on the floor convulsing. Xiao Xing hurriedly helped Lin Chong to lie down properly.
The man who was laughing moments ago had his face covered in blood. Xiao Xing quickly went to help Lin Chong, who was lying on the ground, and then picked up the gun and smashed it on the ground.
Xiao Xing was scared and shrank back, accidentally bumping into the charging Tang Zheng. Xiao Xing screamed in fright, and Tang Zheng continued to walk forward.

Lin Chong and Xiao Xing were knocked down by a blow from behind. Xiao Xing tried to get up but was pinned down by Lin Chong. Tang Zheng, who had just come up the stairs, saw this through the crack in the door. Xiao Xing struggled to get up and closed the door.

Tang Zheng walked to the door, listening to the song coming from the phone. He picked up the phone and saw that it was a video call from Xiao Xing. Suddenly, a few drops of water fell from the ceiling onto his head. He looked up to see Lin Chong hanging from the beam, his feet dangles in the air.
Xiao Xing gently wiped the blood from Lin Chong's mouth and nose, then opened the trash can nearby.
Xiao Xing took out a bottle of sleeping pills from the bag, unscrewed the cap, and poured a few pills into her hand. She then took the pills and placed them on Lin Chong's chest.
Tang Zheng picked up the fire extinguisher, took a swing, then aimed at Xiao Xing.
Tang Zheng stood at the doorway, his eyes gleaming in the darkness. He reached down to pick up the dropped briefcase and pressed the walkie-talkie inside it.

Tang Zheng looked at the key in his hand, then tossed it aside, pushing open the door to the study. The room was dimly lit, furnished with a desk and a few chairs, and a large clock stood in the corner.

The scene shifts to Tang Zheng, who is pacing back and forth in the living room. He pulls back the curtains and looks out the window. Xiao Xing is sitting on the sofa, staring blankly at the floor. Tang Zheng slowly walks towards Xiao Xing.
Xiao Xing retreated while saying, "Don't come any closer."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: Qi Jia said: "A pet raised from childhood."
Yuan Xiaoou lay on the bed and said: "People and their pets really match each other." "I've been here for four years, and I've never seen any turtles." "I bet it turned into somebody's turtle jelly."
Qi Jia said: "Even if it turned into a turtle spirit, you have to help me find it."

Qi Jia was holding a glass of water and fell asleep on the bed, with the glass still in her hand. Yuan Xiaoou was lying on the floor surrounded by scattered food wrappers and a turtle, with a bottle of alcohol next to him.
The scene shifts to the kitchen, where Yuan Xiaoou is looking up a soup recipe on a tablet. Qi Jia asked, "What do you mean by transferring me fifty thousand dollars?"
Lin Shuer drove up to Yuan Xiaoou's house and said, "I have to go on a business trip for a while." "That money is for Qi Jia's treatment."
Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou and said, "You can't just not accompany her." "She even had hallucinations yesterday."
Qi Jia asked in confusion: "What?"
Qi Jia happily said: "Yuan Xiaoou"

Lin Shuer, while driving, said: "Then you'd better cure her before I get back."
Qi Jia smiled and said: "I spent all of last night watching the moon."
Qi Jia laughed and said: "Otherwise," "be careful that some parts of your body might also become a hallucination."
Qi Jia ran back into the room, shouting: "It's over, it's over." "Alternating between acting up and depression – it seems only a psychiatric hospital can treat her."
Qi Jia turned and walked away, Yuan Xiaoou stood there stunned, watching Qi Jia's retreating back, Yuan Xiaoou: "What's wrong?"
Yuan Xiaoou was startled, hurriedly dodging and said, "Hey, don't touch me!"
Yuan Xiaoou, pointing at Qi Jia, said: "Big sister, did you wake up with multiple personalities? Don't scare me."
Qi Jia, frightened, said: 'My heart is beating so fast. Could I be having a heart attack?'

Yuan Xiaoou said: "No, this is just one of the early symptoms of menopause. You need to take medicine." Qi Jia was about to leave, Yuan Xiaoou handed her some medicine and said: "Here, here's the medicine."
Qi Jia turned her back and said, 'I won't drink it.'

Yuan Xiaoou, holding the soup, pleaded with Qi Jia: "Madam, for the sake of your health, please drink it, I beg you." Qi Jia turned her head to look out the window, then turned back to Yuan Xiaoou and said: "Let's be fair then." "Drink this bowl of Ganges water, and we'll be menopausal buddies in the next life."

Qi Jia said: 'Let's be fair then. Drink this bowl of Ganges water, and we'll be menopausal buddies in the next life.' The two of them took a sip of the Ganges water. Qi Jia suddenly slapped Yuan Xiaoou's thigh, causing Yuan Xiaoou to choke on the water, coughing repeatedly.
Yuan Xiaoou touched his neck and said: "I feel it, I feel something special." "Do you feel it?" After speaking, Yuan Xiaoou went to the bedroom door, closed it while touching his neck, and sighed.
Yuan Xiaoou's spit was stuck to the cactus, and Qi Jia was drinking milk while watching the broadcast on TV.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia, you need to tell them," "say goodbye, say goodbye." Yuan Xiaoou picked up the tablet and continued: "This is your new diet."

Yuan Xiaoou continued: 'And you must follow the seven house rules. First, no drinking, second, go to bed early and get up early.' Qi Jia pointed at each rule as they were mentioned. Yuan Xiaoou added: 'Oh my.'
Qi Jia walked and asked, 'Don't lock me out. What was number four again, and five?'

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Liu Mengting carefully wipes the medicine and then feeds it to Auntie He saying, "Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget."
Liu Mengting took the porridge and said, "Okay, I got it!"

Zhang Xiaobao was taking photos of Liu Mengting and Auntie He, when Chun Hu came over with a plate of snacks. Zhang Xiaobao saw Chun Hu and said: "Hey, Chun Hu bro, what a coincidence, you're here too."
Chun Hu happily said: "Yes, Auntie He hasn't been well," "so I brought a turtle I raised myself," "to help Auntie He regain strength."
Zhang Xiaobao happily agreed: "Ah, alright."

Liu Mengting said with a smile: "Alright, alright, Auntie He." Then Liu Mengting followed Chun Hu out of the room.
Chun Hu responded: "Yeah."
Chun Hu holding a turtle said, 'Look, this turtle is so fresh! Auntie He, are you feeling any better?'
Auntie He said: "Much better!"
Chun Hu happily said: "That's good to hear, it's great that you're recovering!"

Auntie He gratefully said: "Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes. Over the past few years, I can't even count how many turtles I've received from you."

The scene shifts to the village committee, where the villagers are reading the village notice. The notice reads: "Announcement for the election of the Camellia Village Party Organization." "According to the requirements of the higher-level party organization, our village will elect the next committee members of the Party Organization."
Bao Liang, holding the pig head, looked at Director in front of him, then burst into laughter, and said: "Bao Liang ah,"
Bao Liang laughed and said: "Hey, hey, hey."
Director said: "You didn't need to bring a gift when you came." "Why are you being so polite?"
Bao Liang holding the pig head said: 'Director, this is the pig face we cured ourselves at home.' 'You can't find this kind of stuff in Jiangxi.'
Director said: "Old Five"
Director said: "Oh."
Director said: "Take it to the kitchen and prepare it well." "Let's have it for lunch."
Bao Liang covered his face and said: "Okay, okay."
Bao Liang instructed his subordinates: "Prepare a good bottle of wine, so I can have a drink with Bao Liang."
Bao Liang smiled and said: "Alright alright alright."
Director looked at Bao Liang and said: "Ah, Bao Liang."
Bao Liang said: "Hey."
Director asked: "How's business in the first half of the year?"
Bao Liang laughed and said: "Not too great, business is tough these days."
Director said: "You're being humble, aren't you? You've always been the richest person in our village."
Bao Liang sighed and said: "Oh, richest in the village? I'm barely scraping by. For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm."
Director said: "That's a good thing!"

Bao Liang continued: "But dealing with the land isn't easy." "The two households living there refuse to move no matter what, causing a big fuss." "Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out."
Director laughed heartily, Director said: "Bao Liang ah"
Bao Liang said: "Oh."
Director said: "This timing isn't right."
Bao Liang said: "Huh?"
Director said: "We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you, will it be inappropriate?"
Director thought for a moment and said: "Those with ulterior motives will accuse me of favoritism."
Bao Liang said: "Hey, in our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?"
Bao Liang asked: 'Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?'
Bao Liang said: "Leverage? How could that be?" "My pig farm has all the proper paperwork."

"DC8 is a handheld weapon developed unilaterally by the Korean side." "Its power is unknown." "I personally believe that this weapon is quite dangerous."

Everyone fell into deep thought. The police officer who had previously spoken to Officer Wang also looked troubled. Li Yanming, with a furrowed brow, suddenly raised his head and said: "I have an idea."
Li Yanming stood by the floor-to-ceiling window, looking at the bustling street outside, full of neon lights, and he took a drag of his cigarette.
Li Yanming, who was smoking by the window, heard the sound of the plane crashing and turned to look. The plane was slowly descending, and the city's lights were gradually disappearing from view.

The scene switches to the plane, where Li Yanming says: "According to international conventions," "Cui Minghao, as the director," "you cannot possess the activation codes for the device at the same time."

The police said: "Zhe Yu, you take care of one set" "Another set, I've already transmitted to a National Intelligence Service officer stationed in Hong Kong" "She is well-versed in Hong Kong affairs" "Upon arrival, she will contact you proactively"

movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.text: Tang Zheng handed the umbrella to Xiao Xing, who then closed the door. Tang Zheng walked to the cabinet, opened a drawer, and rummaged through it. Lin Chong's body was lying quietly under the cabinet.

Lin Chong, lying on the bed, slowly opened her eyes. Xiao Xing rushed to Tang Zheng, who had just closed the door, and threw the dagger in his hand at him. Tang Zheng caught the dagger and embraced Xiao Xing, saying: "Xiao Xing" "Accept your fate."
Xiao Xing, who had been lying on the sofa, got up, kicked Tang Zheng to the ground, then walked to the coffee table, picked up the briefcase, and slung it over her shoulder.
Tang Zheng, who had just rushed out of the elevator, was knocked down by a man in black who had been ambushed. He struggled to get up, but his head was throbbing with pain.
Xiao Xing: "Come out" "Do you just like hiding in the dark?"
Tang Zheng, who had just escaped from death, was momentarily stunned by the sight of the bomb. He couldn't help but laugh out loud. Xiao Xing said, 'You are just like me.'
Tang Zheng asked: "Is it meaningful to live so painfully?"
Xiao Xing, holding a match, said: "Who is like you?" "If you want to die, go die yourself!"
Xiao Xing, scared, retreated while holding a match, and said: "Don't come closer" "Stomp your foot"
Tang Zheng said: "Keep chopping, don't stop." Xiao Xing was scared and stopped chopping. Tang Zheng said: "Give me the key to the lock."

Tang Zheng, seeing Xiao Xing so calm, felt a bit at a loss. He then took out a match and lit it. The sound of the match being struck brought a look of surprise to Xiao Xing's face, but she still didn't move. Tang Zheng, with a puzzled look, struck the match again and again, each time receiving the same reaction from Xiao Xing.

Tang Zheng, seeing this, was terrified. He stood there, frozen, watching Xiao Xing. Xiao Xing, with trembling hands, held the match, staring at Tang Zheng. Tang Zheng, with wide eyes, looked back at the match in Xiao Xing's hand, then at the matchstick on the wall, and finally at Xiao Xing.
The scene shifted, and the lights in the room went out. Tang Zheng threw away the guitar in his hand, Xiao Xing lit a match, and Tang Zheng picked up a stand with a music sheet on it.

Xiao Xing, who had been hiding in the bedroom, saw Tang Zheng coming towards her with a gasoline-soaked cotton ball and quickly picked up a fire extinguisher to spray it at him. Tang Zheng, who was hit by the extinguisher, fell to the ground, and Xiao Xing took the opportunity to run out of the house.

The fire was spreading rapidly, and the room was quickly engulfed in flames. The photo of Lin Chong was also burned to ashes by the fire. The smoke from the fire was everywhere, and the room was filled with thick smoke. The fire was everywhere, and Tang Zheng was trapped in the smoke.

Xiao Xing, who had been hiding in the closet, pushed the closet door open forcefully. She ran to the living room, turned on the light switch, and Tang Zheng, who had just rushed in, collided with her.

Tang Zheng picked up a wine bottle from the table and smashed it towards Xiao Xing. Xiao Xing dodged and then grabbed Tang Zheng's ankle, pulling hard. The two wrestled together, and Xiao Xing managed to stab Tang Zheng's ankle with a heel.
Tang Zheng swung his arm forcefully, hitting Xiao Xing's head against the wall. Xiao Xing, dazed, tried to crawl away but found her hands stuck to the floor.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: Qi Jia was about to get in bed when Yuan Xiaoou suddenly appeared. Qi Jia asked: 'How did you get in?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'For your safety, I made an extra key.' 'Let me tell you something,' 'People who are prone to insomnia shouldn't talk before bed.' 'It excites the brain and emotions.'
Qi Jia said: "I'll give you three seconds to get out."

Yuan Xiaoou said: 'Not like you did just now with your head covered.' 'For people in poor health,' 'the exhaled carbon dioxide,' 'you end up inhaling it back.' 'Over time,' 'it can lead to brain hypoxia,' 'brain stroke,' 'brain death.'

Yuan Xiaoou said: "Then you really don't know how to sleep."
Qi Jia said: "You're an idiot, get out." "Hurry up, get out."

Qi Jia said: "Let me tell you" "You can't sleep on your left side like you just did" "This way, it can compress your heart causing insufficient blood supply" "You need a pillow to sleep" "But the pillow shouldn't be too high" "Yes, align your cervical spine" "Yes, exactly like that" "Then spread out your arms and legs, like a frog"

Yuan Xiaoou said: "Yes" "All your bones and muscles are fully relaxed" "Now" "Place both your hands over your belly button" "This is what Taoism calls settling the qi in the dantian" "Then imagine yourself as a little bee spreading its wings and flying" "Fly"

The next morning, sunlight streamed into the room through the curtains, and the cozy little bed was empty. Only a chair and a side table were left in the room. Qi Jia lay on the bed, covered with a quilt, eyes closed. She slowly opened her eyes, and after a moment of thought, she got up from the bed.
Qi Jia sat up and asked: "What are you doing here?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia, it's time for sit-ups" "From now on, every morning, you need to do sit-ups" "After work in the evening, I'll run with you"

Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don't force me." "I have a temper too." "If you don't comply, I'll make you." "On the first day, thirty sit-ups." "One, two, three." "Do you see this?" "You actually remembered my name." "This is the result." "Keep going." "Come on, five, six, seven." "Two, two, two." "Enough for the first day, you barely passed."
Qi Jia lay on the bed and said: "Eighteen, nineteen, twenty-six, thirty."
Qi Jia lay on the ground and said: "You hurt me!"

The camera switches to the street, Yuan Xiaoou is walking and making a phone call, saying: 'I left lunch in the fridge,' 'Just heat it up in the microwave at noon. Also,' 'don't even think about eating instant noodles or chips,' 'because I threw them all away.' 'Don’t think you can buy junk food with your money,' 'because your wallet now has no money in it.'
Qi Jia walked to the mirror, took off her skirt, and put on a long skirt underneath, then put her skirt back on and adjusted it in front of the mirror.
